TextBody: Hi Laura, I’ve checked the artwork. Please seen my comments below. * Should colors also be extended to the sides ( beside the print free zone on the right) or should it stay white for this brand? * If you like you can move the best before cox to the same height as the text box. Subject: Bisphenol A questionnaire - response required
TextBody: Good morning We have received a questionnaire from Samworth Bros, who receive the (Asda) Café Hash Browns, regarding the use of Bisphenol A in packaging and production materials in light of the upcoming legislation changes. The questions are included below followed by some detail about Bisphenol A and and the legislative upcoming changes. Please can you review the below and provide a response to the questions. If BPA/Bisphenol A is present additional information is required. A response is requested by close of business on the 1st September, any issues please let me know Leigh 1. Are any of your raw materials / ingredients / packaging packaged to us in materials containing BPA & Bisphenols? * Yes/No If yes, please provide details. 2. Do any of your WIP materials used within your process contain BPA or Bisphenols? * Yes/No If yes, please provide details. 3. Does any of your food contact processing equipment contain BPA or Bisphenols? * Yes/No If yes, please provide details. 4. Please provide/attach a written declaration covering the above criteria * As a supplier to Samworth Brothers we require your support in understanding any exposure to the proposed EU legislation change in the use of BPA and Bisphenols in packaging and equipment within your process. Context of EU legislation change: On June 12, 2024, an EU Member States expert committee voted in support of a European Commission proposal to ban some bisphenols, including bisphenol A (BPA), in food contact materials. The restriction proposed by the European Commission would effectively ban from the manufacture and use of food contact materials those containing BPA or other carcinogenic, mutagenic, toxic, and endocrine-disrupting bisphenols. The ban would cover plastic and coated packaging, but also other types of Food contact surfaces like food processing equipment. The proposal follows a different ban that was enacted six years prior prohibiting BPA in drinking bottles and containers for infants and children, as well as its use in other consumer products like receipt paper. The new, proposed ban will apply in particular to food and drink cans, kitchenware, tableware, and food contact articles used in professional food production. Next, the European Parliament and the Council will assess the proposal. If there is no opposition, the ban could be adopted by the end of 2024, with implementation periods of up to three years. The proposed ban is based on the European Food Safety Authority’s (EFSA’s) recent lowering of its tolerable daily intake (TDI) for BPA. EFSA’s current opinion on the TDI for BPA is grounded in a nontraditional risk assessment process, which has drawn both support and dissent from the global scientific community. BPA BPA (and other Bisphenols) are chemicals used in production of plastics and resins. They have historically been used widely in food contact materials and packaging, including: • The coatings and linings used for food and beverage cans • Polycarbonate bottles/containers • Polycarbonate moulds • Rubber seals • Inks • Adhesives • Food contact materials (FCM) including bulk storage containers and moulds. They are being banned due to concerns that they are mutagenic (affecting Human DNA) carcinogenic (cancer-causing) or because they interfere and negatively impact with the human reproduction or hormone systems. Scope The scope includes BPA and all other Bisphenols that are also a known risk, e.g. Bisphenol S: • In finished product food packaging • In food contact surfaces of bulk storage and transportation containers used for food • All other food contact materials and surfaces used in the production of food through the manufacturing process of ingredients and finished products • Varnishes & coatings • Printing inks • Adhesives • Rubber (e.g. seals) • Ion exchange filters • For the other Bisphenols (other than BPA) there may be some scope to continue their use for specific applications, but only if given specific prior legal approval by the relevant Authorities • There are also testing requirements to show that BPA is not present in food contact materials and able to migrate into food, particularly in recycled paper and board packaging • Food contact materials and packaging must be accompanied by a written declaration that they comply with the new requirements Timescales • Food contact materials as sold (e.g. bottles, films etc) and products placed in FCM containing BPA can remain on the market for 18 months after the legislation comes into effect (June 2026) • Certain food contact materials including equipment used in manufacturing can continue to be used for 3 years after the legislation comes into effect (Dec 2027)

Subject: NOMAD FOODS EUROPE - NOTIFICATION OF COMPLAINT - Case Number: 00488605
TextBody: Dear Sanja, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have registered it in our system under case number 45527. I am very sorry to hear that you received a claim about a product clump that was found in the 750 g Aunt Bessie's Lightly Seasoned Potato Wedges. Batch information: Lotcode: L4 063 B04 0BJ 10:01 Production day: 03/03/2024 After reviewing the picture, I can indeed confirm that the foreign body is a clump of product/coating. There must have been some build-up of slivers/coating on a part of the production equipment and this must then have become dislodged at some point during the production. Normally this kind of clumps are removed by the optical sorter after freezing and before packing, but it appears that, despite our best efforts, some foreign material has escaped our monitoring system. Indeed, unfortunately, there is no system in the world that can fully detect and reject all these kind of clumps. Especially when the clump is below a “pile” of wedges (there is a constant product flow), it is difficult for the optical sorter to detect it. Based on the batch code, I have conducted an investigation into our production records of this specific batch. I cannot see anomaly in the production records of this batch. I also cannot see any remarks about product clumps in the results of our hourly quality checks. I am thus confident that this issue is not widespread and can confirm this does not impose any risk whatsoever. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered and are constantly investigating how we can improve our processes and improve our machinery. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me again.

Subject: Introduction - Keshav Logistic - Global Presence with Worldwide Network Since 2010
TextBody: Dear Sir/ Madam Greetings of the day! I hope this message finds you well. Following our discussion, I am pleased to introduce Keshav Logistic. "A complete solution of TRANSPORTATION, CUSTOM CLEARANCE & FREIGHT FORWARDING" KESHAV LOGISTIC which was formed in 2010 and today is one of prominent Shipping and Logistics solution provider. We are working as a Transporter in door-to-door delivery, costal shipping in all over India. We are pleased to inform you that KESHAV LOGISTIC is involved in International Freight Forwarding, Custom Clearance, Warehousing, transportation, Project Handling. Our highly experienced staff stands ready to provide various services like documentation, customs assistance, insurance, packing, shipping, storage and inland transportation. Our staff handles everything from pre-shipment to post-shipment formalities. We specialize in export packing and crating, shipping all types of cargo from household goods to general cargo, automobiles, HAZ, etc. We would glad to meet you & happy to assist you, feel free to contact us on below:- For any sales inquiry contact on below:- Pradeep Gadhvi - Cell: 9099929165 -Email: pradeep@keshavlogistic.com<mailto:pradeep@keshavlogistic.com> Nitin Yadav - Cell: 90999 22165 - Email: nitin@keshavlogistic.com<mailto:nitin@keshavlogistic.com> Prince Singh - Cell: 99245 11165 - Email: sales4@keshavlogistic.com<mailto:sales4@keshavlogistic.com> OFFICE ADDRESS: - Office No. 8, Aum Ganantra Plaza, Plot No. 97, Sector 8, Gandhidham - 370201 - Kutch, Gujarat. *FREIGHT FORWARDER* KESHAV LOGISTIC is one of the key factors for strong global supply chain management. As one of the leading Gateway Exim, we offer efficient sea freight solutions customized to your needs. From Full Container Loads (FCL) to Less than Container Loads (LCL), on all major global routes, with guaranteed transit times. VALUE ADDED SERVICES. 1. Sea freight export consolidation. 2. Door to door delivery. 3. F.C.L consolidation. 4. Warehousing, distribution and delivery. 5. Order follow-up tracking systems. *CUSTOM CLEARANCE AGENT* KESHAV LOGISTIC provides comprehensive customs clearance services for hassle free import and export of consignments by sea, air and road. We also assist our clients in preparing documents related to import and export, completion of appraisement and examination procedures and payments. Our team of experienced professionals swing into action to clear cargo the moment it arrives, saving our customers time and money. After completion of all customs formalities & documentations, we deliver the consignments at customer's desired destination. VALUE ADDED SERVICES. 1. Customs Clearance under High Seas Sales (HSS). 2. Re-Export or Re-Import Customs Clearance. 3. Export Consignments by Air/Sea. 4. Export Promotion Zones like SEEPz, Technology Parks & Bonded Cargo. 5. Order follow-up tracking systems. 6. CFS/Factory stuffing. 7. Multi-modal transport operators. *TRANSPORATION* At KESHAV LOGISTIC, transportation is a key part of our logistics service, whether it's delivering a single container shipment or managing road transportation for sensitive drilling equipment and vehicles from port to remote destinations in India. Special survey reports are prepared on feasibility of road routes, site accessibility and weather conditions and delivery time. VALUE ADDED SERVICES. 1. Inland Transportation. 2. Temperature Controlled Cargo. 3. Part/Full Loads 4. Over Sized Cargo. 5. Complete Local Transportation. 6. Door-to-door distribution. 7. Express Service. We invite you to explore how Keshav Logistic can support your logistics needs. Please visit our website www.keshavlogistic.com<http://www.keshavlogistic.com/> for more detailed information or contact us directly at your convenience. We are excited about the opportunity to work with you. Thanks & Warm

Subject: NOMAD FOODS EUROPE - NOTIFICATION OF COMPLAINT - Case Number: 00486826
TextBody: Hi Sean, Hope you are well. Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 45570. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : L4 174 C08 0BJ 21:52 Production day : 22/06/2024 Based on the provided pictures we have received, we can confirm this is a piece of sprout on the potato. Sprout can occur while the potatoes are being stored. Potatoes with sprout are still good for consumption, but the sprout should be removed. After frying , the sprout can indeed look strange, like a slug as the consumer claims. It appears that, despite our best efforts, some foreign material may have escaped our monitoring systems. Based on the lotcode, we have conducted a thorough investigation into our production records and quality documents for the specific batch. I confirm the production process did not show any anomalies. Also in our QC checks I cannot see any remarks with regards to sprout. We are therefore confident that this complaint is not widespread. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Overgang Duitse designs - Belviva
TextBody: Hoi Els, zie hieronder geschatte overgang op basis van huidige forecast Sprietjes van Frietjes: momenteel hebben we folie om het hele jaar nog te produceren. Ik zou dit in de gaten houden en ten laatste schakelen naar nieuwe folie eerste run 2025 is dit ok? of moet dit vroeger? Belgische frieten: we hebben nog folie tot begin november. Klassieke frieten: we hebben nog folie tot begin oktober - bij schakelen naar nieuwe folie, schakelen we ook naar de regular cut. Groetjes, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63 M +32 472 41 34 87 thread::bFvP7frNFjOxdDBxYI1He3Q::

TextBody: Hi All, we are now making sure order is in the system and Girteka can book. We apologies for the inconvenience. Please can I ask to always start your emails from a new email. Now our system had recognized that you started from a previous email and this order was linked to the mail you send regarding order for W28. Because this was linked to a person that did this during back up only, this did not pop up as a new case.

Please note that the loading of this order has been rescheduled to the week of 23/09, instead of the earlier forecasted 30/09 (and not 16/09 as mentioned below) :) Please note that adapting the buyer for this order to World Food Brazil, could result in shipping companies refusing these containers, related to earlier legal procedures between World Food and the shipping companies. Could you please check internally and confirm if you would like me to adapt this order? Thank you!

Subject: Remittances
TextBody: Good afternoon, I appreciate you have sent over remittances yesterday, but I am being informed we don't have enough to release the orders that are scheduled for loading on Monday. Enclosed you can find an updated overview of your invoices. Overdue invoices have been highlighted in orange. Could you please pay these and send over the remittances, so our credit control department can release the orders? Based on your new financial results, we are in touch with our credit insurer, but it will take some time before we get feedback on that. Thank you and wishing you a lovely weekend.

Subject: Purchase Order No PUR975291 from JJ Food Service Limited
TextBody: Please find attached our purchase order PUR975291 . The purchase order can be confirmed by clicking on the following link and using the below details. Please be aware that the Vendor Self Service Portal (VSS) is not compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) or older versions. You will need to use an up-to-date browser to use our portal such as Chrome, Safari, Edge and Firefox. https://vss.jjfoodservice.com/login/PUR975291/596975 Purchase order : PUR975291 PIN: 596975 Please be aware that Fraudsters are using the name JJ Food Service to fraudulently source goods.Suppliers to JJ Food Service be especially aware. * JJ Food Service will never order goods without a period of negotiation and a formal trading agreement would be issued requiring you to supply product details etc. * Never send goods if the address is different to our published distribution sites. * Only dispatch upon receipt of a formal order and be aware that we do not collect our orders from your premises. * Only dispatch if formal confirmation of your order is sent, after using the recognised booking-in procedure, which will be given to you via the JJ Purchasing team. If in any doubt please bring to our urgent attention. Contact: 00 44 1992 701710 P.S. To open the attached file, Adobe Acrobat Reader version 7 or greater must be installed on the system. Many Thanks Purchase Team JJ Food Service Limited www.jjfoodservice.com<https://mandrillapp.com/track/click/31005253/www.jjfoodservice.com?p=eyJzIjoiSV9BSEZHMDM1YmptLUhwOE5IcXpFcE1mQjdZIiwidiI6MSwicCI6IntcInVcIjozMTAwNTI1MyxcInZcIjoxLFwidXJsXCI6XCJodHRwOlxcXC9cXFwvd3d3LmpqZm9vZHNlcnZpY2UuY29tXCIsXCJpZFwiOlwiNWU3NGVhYjkzZDZiNGE2NzgxZjI4ODQ1MTZkZDJjYjFcIixcInVybF9pZHNcIjpbXCI3NWJiYWIxNmRhZThkODU3Y2NlMzUwNjhiMTM5OTBkZTg5NjQ0ZWNiXCJdfSJ9>

Subject: Asociados #SoyLogístico en el Puerto de Veracruz; COMCE & Alibaba y más...
TextBody: Newsletter, 30 Agosto 2024 [https://logistixnews.com/admin/wp-content/themes/jannah/boletin/images/rs-f.png]<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWb> [https://logistixnews.com/admin/wp-content/themes/jannah/boletin/images/rs-l.png] <https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWc> [https://logistixnews.com/admin/wp-content/themes/jannah/boletin/images/rs-x.png] <https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWd> [LogistixNews] Portal de noticias especializado en la industria logística en México y América Latina [https://logistixnews.com/admin/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/LXN-IMG-1.jpg]<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWe> Consejo de #SoyLogístico sesiona en el Puerto de Veracruz<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWe> México está en la lista de los 10 principales exportadores del mundo, sin embargo, existe la preocupación sobre la falta de infraestructura en puertos y aeropuertos nacionales, además de la administración en las aduanas. Virgilio... <https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWe> ... Continuar leyendo<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWe> [https://logistixnews.com/admin/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Banner-Soy-logistico-LXN.jpg]<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFaf> [COMCE y Alibaba impulsan eCommerce transfronterizo]<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWg> COMCE y Alibaba impulsan eCommerce transfronterizo<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWg> Pierre-Claude Blaise, director general de la Asociación Mexicana de Venta Online (AMVO), destacó que solo el 3 % de las compañías que venden en línea exportan, por lo que consideró que se debe impulsar el comercio electrónico... <https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWg> ... Continuar leyendo<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWg> [Emergent Cold invierte en nuevo almacén en Guadalajara]<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWh> Emergent Cold invierte en nuevo almacén en Guadalajara<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWh> Emergent Cold LatAm —proveedor de servicios de logística y almacenamiento a temperatura controlada para alimentos en América Latina— anunció la construcción de un almacén de productos alimenticios en Guadalajara,... <https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWh> ... Continuar leyendo<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWh> [Logistixnews]<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFag> [IMT: México registra 16 mil muertes al año por accidentes viales]<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWi> IMT: México registra 16 mil muertes al año por accidentes viales<https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWi> Querétaro, QRO., 27 de agosto de 2024. En México se producen entre 15 y 16 mil muertes por año debido a incidentes viales, destacó Alberto Mendoza, director general del Instituto Mexicano del Transporte (IMT), e indicó... <https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFWi> ... En México, se registran al año cerca de 350 mil colisiones en la industria del autotransporte y, según datos del Instituto Nacional de Estadística y Geografía (INEGI), el 95 % de éstas... <https://imei-mexico.emlnk.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GDIJ6HN5HJ-0A5LVOVs2HFSjgQjvPlikKXEI3Oe5K36-0y.0OFu1X3ziNH3k_YwZIHKJFaZ> ... Subject: ICS credit blocks
TextBody: Hi Below orders have been booked for loading on Monday, but still have a credit block. Please be reminded that all orders for loading “next working day” should have a delivery in the system in order not to interrupt an efficient supply chain and facilitate smoothless loading. Orders that get this far in the supply chain (slot booked) should really be managed more proactively. I now released the orders myself: [cid:image001.png@01DAFB8B.0FC8BA50] In this case, I would guess that an internal limit which covers a larger horizon will be the best option. @Service Operations<mailto:ServiceOperations@agristo.com> – can you initiate this for Richard to sign off please?

Subject: Discover the World’s Favourite Pastries in 2024!
TextBody: Transform your kitchen into culinary success. Click here<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/es?s=418238&e=280117&elqTrackId=9a42947388a84f0e8d0267239dc5ddbd&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF59E2E2AD2CC65CD131ABA1FA8C7F0CCE4EC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> to view the online version [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7B04493e12-48a7-4bf8-a963-9adf8d791fff%7D_FHA_Insider_eDM.png]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13366&elqTrackId=5D9D090D80D7DD91C1F89BB6A5C379A8&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF526BBDA4216B02F1334296365A6479ADFEC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> Hi 0, As the world continues to be inspired by global food trends and the artistry of patisserie, like those showcased in your favourite baking shows, we’re taking you on a delicious journey this month. Just as these shows bring the magic of the kitchen to life, we want to bring you closer to the heart of pastry perfection. In this edition, we explore the world’s most beloved pastries. Whether you’re a pastry chef, home baker, or just love sweets, this 5-Minute Coffee Read is your ticket to indulge in the best global treats. [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7Ba30a381c-56e7-4b60-8e4b-040fb29919eb%7D_croissant.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=404020ACCD1D24099CDFA1E8FA1276A3&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF529F3D4E2B31ACC8957D4CDE7010148FFEC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7Bb723a967-44c9-4e35-9425-8786b59a0b01%7D_macaron.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=5B7CA6824BCD8692D419727D9EBFB1FC&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF5C4BEFB40F7C7D490D9D826F52AA7C5BDEC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7Ba10faa14-d7cb-4f3f-9a95-c5e6cac5c9f7%7D_backlava.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=9283C874A81BC7E4169DA745A3E0E1AD&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF54DD9A8848BC55CA28DADB8D772BB5271EC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7Bf9e3d681-7ba7-4c23-addc-0d2f8d8ec738%7D_puff.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=5A139C0A9950225019A6AB395D4B1D44&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF515B3593FF369145683233DDE92A51E1FEC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> Croissant – The French Classic You can’t start a day in Paris without a buttery, flaky croissant. Its origins might surprise you—this French favorite actually has Viennese roots! One bite, and you’ll understand why it’s a global morning must-have. [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7B23a133c8-adfc-4c39-9ee8-12cfe6f3fb0e%7D_Two-croissants-on-a-platter.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=FE13527C5E347A80813DC17A010EEE6F&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF51B4A1AC06D2AAD8465EB4E1250F898C1EC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> Macaron – A Little Bite of Parisian Heaven The origins of this famous pastry and delightful treats can be traced back to the 8th century, believed to have been introduced by Italian chefs and later refined by the talented French pâtissiers. From vanilla to salted caramel, macarons are a flavor adventure in every bite. How do you resist them? [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7Bb8a5f712-fb51-4fc0-b701-782e18357479%7D_A-collection-of-macarons.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=2D32CC23E71DB13CABA44378A5175E08&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF517B86DAC1848FD0B9867D3CB8E3D70ABEC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> Baklava – A Sweet Symphony from the Middle East Born in the royal kitchens of the Ottoman Empire, Baklava is a masterpiece of delicate filo pastry, meticulously layered and filled with finely chopped nuts. Each bite is a testament to centuries of tradition—taste it, and you’ll understand why this sweet indulgence has been cherished for generations. [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7Bdc6180a7-0d08-488a-8686-e2e77ab814c7%7D_Different-variations-of-the-baklava.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=D913498B6918772F725672DB67FF648C&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF5EC79CF0FEE8BAF370835292021EF22E8EC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> Puff Pastry – The Ultimate Culinary Chameleon Known as pâte feuilletée in French, puff pastry is a culinary marvel celebrated worldwide for its incredible versatility and irresistible, flaky texture. Whether you're crafting sweet fruit tarts or savouring cheesy twists, puff pastry’s delicate layers serve as the perfect canvas for endless creativity. [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7Ba7c7f875-e3d1-4fe1-8d96-9b0a5ddefe10%7D_Fruit-topped-puff-pastry.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=18149DF8311B32F7ADA3BF08EB335115&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF53DEB0B98CAD5E9203279A829B76C7F0AEC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> Danish Pastry – A Breakfast Must-Have Hailing from Denmark, these pastries originated from Vienna bread brought by Austrian bakers in the 19th century. Imagine waking up to the aroma of a warm, fruit-filled Danish pastry—whether raspberry or cream cheese, they’re a delicious start to any day. [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7B937fd80a-21a6-41b5-988e-3d0cb0566ca9%7D_Cream-cheese-and-jam-Danish-pastry.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=30FA775DE98BBEAC7884BF5D7AC29410&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF5CD247FF1CFBF2BFDF31E3AE5EF7871DAEC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7B9e3d2949-5027-4499-b021-b2183a7b4e97%7D_danish.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=13364&elqTrackId=92279C6E053129839C97EB7D51D6DCE8&elq=b8794cb4c8224868b9982291410fceff&elqaid=3806&elqat=1&elqak=8AF58C568532D3751246F1137FE692C29195EC177F1DCE4EF45F2EB96B8F5D951970> Ready for more? Subject: ICS credit blocks
TextBody: Hi Below order has been booked for loading on Monday, but is not “on delivery”. Please be reminded that all orders for loading “next working day” should have a delivery in the system in order not to interrupt an efficient supply chain and facilitate smoothless loading. Orders that get this far in the supply chain (slot booked) should really be managed more proactively. Issue was that there were no prices on the order, which causes the delivery block. Richard confirmed me that prices can be prolonged until end August 2025, which I did. Adding prices then caused a credit block 😕 I see no due invoices, so I released the order myself: [cid:image003.png@01DAFB8D.968F5FB0] In this case, I would guess that we need to apply for a higher Groupama limit that covers a larger horizon. @Beau Taylor<mailto:Beau.Taylor@agristo.com> – can you initiate this please?

Subject: Proposal deal
TextBody: Hello My name is Mr Terry Greg, I was the Head Operation Manager Investors Direct Capital Funds with Reputable Bank here UK, I wish to state that I am impressed with your brief profile details on the internet network and I feel that it will be good to share this cooperation with you. I represent a Deal interest totalling £46,950.000.00 (forty Six Million Nine Hundred and Fifty Thousand Pounds). I hope this cooperation will be of interest to you and we can go ahead with the details upon your response. Regards Mr Terry Greg Phone Contact: Tel: +447436905348

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 31.08.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 31.08.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: Unlock Global Opportunities for FMCG Suppliers at our 2025 B2B Networking Events
TextBody: Dear AGRISTO nv, I’m thrilled to share our exciting 2025 plans with you, which present valuable opportunities for FMCG suppliers like yourself to connect with leading retailers and key stakeholders around the globe. These events are designed specifically to foster partnerships, explore new markets, and help you expand your business reach. Our lineup of B2B events brings together top manufacturers and retailers in the FMCG space, offering unparalleled networking opportunities and direct access to potential buyers. Whether you're looking to grow your presence in Beauty Care, Health, Snacks, Confectionery or other FMCG categories, our events provide the ideal platform for building relationships and driving growth. 2025 B2B Stamegna Networking Events: Stamegna European Network - Beauty Care, Make-up, Beauty Accessories. 26-27 January - Milan, Italy. Stamegna Central Asia Network - Beauty Care, Health Care & Wellness, Beauty Accessories. TBC - Almaty, Kazakhstan. Stamegna European Network - Snacks & Confectionery, Beverages, Dry Grocery & Canned Food. 26-27 March- Budapest, Hungary. Stamegna Middle East/Africa/Asia Network - Beauty Care, Make-up, Beauty Accessories. 23-24 March - Dubai, UAE. Stamegna Middle East/Africa/Asia Network - Snacks & Confectionery, Beverages, Dry Grocery & Canned Food. 23-24 March - Dubai, UAE. Stamegna European Network - Beauty Care, Health Care & Wellness, Beauty Accessories. 21-22 September- Amsterdam, Netherlands. Stamegna European Network - Snacks & Confectionery, Beverages, Dry Grocery & Canned Food. 21-22 September- Amsterdam, Netherlands. Stamegna Middle East/Africa/Asia Network - Health Care & Wellness. 16-17 November - Riyadh, Saudi Each of these events has been crafted to deliver maximum value, ensuring that FMCG suppliers can effectively connect with retailers, explore untapped markets, and secure new business opportunities. I’d love to discuss how attending these events can benefit your business and how we can support your growth objectives in these key regions. Please don’t hesitate to reply to this email or reach out directly for more information. Looking forward to hearing from you. Carla Toledo Head of Sales carla@stamegna.eu<mailto:carla@stamegna.eu> Stamegna Retail Management Unsubscribe<https://stamegnaretail.odoo.com/mail/mailing/924/unsubscribe?res_id=1340336&email=sales%40agristo.com&token=8857ce3d761b6488dcbf05e40d0269335c1cbf9058580a1019c798a7ae2578c72cfe7462bd26380d68b06ce5204ee388aa8415161f7031cb3f665d6f79c5c9b6> | Here you can ask for your data to be deleted or modified<mailto:info@stamegna.eu> | <https://stamegnaretail.odoo.com/r/4ar/m/8192752> Unsubscribe<https://stamegnaretail.odoo.com/mail/mailing/924/unsubscribe?res_id=1340336&email=sales%40agristo.com&token=8857ce3d761b6488dcbf05e40d0269335c1cbf9058580a1019c798a7ae2578c72cfe7462bd26380d68b06ce5204ee388aa8415161f7031cb3f665d6f79c5c9b6> [https://stamegnaretail.odoo.com/mail/track/8498375/a2e44a87f4cf623de0018f2315e04597814d3de9effa8e2825f9587c4856ae45/blank.gif]

Subject: 【Wellness Tokyo 2024】Book Your Booth Now!
TextBody: ※This email is being sent to those who have exchanged business cards with TSO International in the past at our organized exhibitions and other trade shows, as well as those who have visited us in the past. If this email is not displayed correctly, please click here<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/webmail/511761/2445135671/4859104d102961e553002374ab456e8946742598dfab7f664d635b29ae9482d1> [https://bit.ly/4g3yfSu]<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/en-/7prcfz/2445135671/h/I4QrxlkswxYUNL20Bq1YJ8xV29r6RH_jMMI91_dr0bU>​​​ AGRISTO Dear Sophie Selk san, ________________________________ [https://info.tso-int.co.jp/l/511761/2024-06-17/7plqwf/511761/1718679040YGh9sCSF/WellnessTokyo2024_en_4C.png]<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/en-exhibitor-/7prcg3/2445135671/h/I4QrxlkswxYUNL20Bq1YJ8xV29r6RH_jMMI91_dr0bU> 【Date】 NOV. 27th [Wed.] - 29th [Fri.], 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM 【Venue】 TOKYO BIG SIGHT - EAST HALL ________________________________ Wellness Tokyo is now accepting exhibitor applications! Why Book Your Booth Now? Get ahead in your planning: Reserving your booth early gives you the time to carefully design your space, plan your promotions, and set up meetings, ensuring you maximize lead generation at the event. Choose the best location: Early bookings offer a wider range of booth options. Secure your spot now to select a location that best supports your strategy. Wellness Tokyo has diverse zones, ensuring there’s an area that perfectly suits your products! If you have any questions, please contact us at anytime. ▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀ ＜ Application process ＞ 1. Select the Area where you would like to exhibit. [https://info.tso-int.co.jp/l/511761/2024-06-25/7pm5gr/511761/1719290920Hk8RDSVv/____________DM_WT__________.png]<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/en-exhibitor-/7prcg3/2445135671/h/I4QrxlkswxYUNL20Bq1YJ8xV29r6RH_jMMI91_dr0bU> 2. Contact with Show Management Office to specify the booth size and location. [https://info.tso-int.co.jp/l/511761/2024-06-25/7pm5kn/511761/1719300978GcalcmPs/4.png] <https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/en-inquiry-/7prcg6/2445135671/h/I4QrxlkswxYUNL20Bq1YJ8xV29r6RH_jMMI91_dr0bU> 3. Application submission and Payment. 4. Exhibitor Success Team will get in touch with you to prepare until the show. ▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄ Exhibition Overview: Wellnes Tokyo Dates: NOV. 27th [Wed.] - 29th [Fri.], 2024 Venue: TOKYO BIG SIGHT - EAST HALL URL: https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/en-/7prcfz/2445135671/h/I4QrxlkswxYUNL20Bq1YJ8xV29r6RH_jMMI91_dr0bU ________________________________ ■Contact： Wellnes Tokyo​​​​​ Show Management Office Organizer: TSO International Inc.

Subject: Gamma Export - Agristo. Price confirmation for 2x40 new purchase order
TextBody: Dear, Please note that I am giving training whole week, so I have limited access to my mailbox. My mails are being read with delay. Please call our office for urgent matters.

Subject: Referenz #GeVo2003844088: Anliegen-Nr.: 2003838898, [ Beschwerde ] GUT&GÜNSTIG, GUT&GÜNSTIG Rösti-Ecken 750g, Agristo NV, 18.6.2026, LOT D02524171 19:41,
TextBody: EDEKA Kunden- und Ernährungsservice Anliegen-Nr.: 2003838898 Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, anbei erhalten Sie ein Kundenanliegen zur Prüfung. Wir haben eine Mitteilung aus unserer Kundschaft (Endverbraucher*in) erhalten. Bei diesem Vorgang ging es um den folgenden Sachverhalt: Beschwerde Produkt: GTIN: 4311501057445 Artikel: GUT&GÜNSTIG Rösti-Ecken 750g Marke: GUT&GÜNSTIG Lieferant: Agristo NV Lieferanten-Kürzel: 0005181091 MHD: 18.6.2026 Charge: LOT D02524171 19:41 Sachverhalt: Der Kunde beschwert sich darüber, dass das Produkt auch nach 45 Minuten im Ofen nicht die Konsistenz, besonders im Inneren haben - sieht matschig aus, nicht fest wie bei anderen Marken. Kunde verwendet 5-6 Packungen innerhalb 14 Tage. ________________________________ Wir bitten um eine detaillierte Stellungnahme innerhalb von zwei Werktagen nach Eingang dieser Mail. Die Stellungnahme schicken Sie bitte ausschließlich per E-Mail unter Beibehaltung des Betreffs an reklamation@edeka.de<mailto:reklamation@edeka.de> und den vollständigen Verteiler dieser Email. Sollten Sie das angegebene Timing nicht einhalten können, bitten wir um rechtzeitige Mitteilung. Mit freundlichen Grüßen i.A. Simone Schefer EDEKA ZENTRALE Stiftung & Co. KG Geschäftsbereich Qualitätsmanagement Qualitätssicherung Eigenmarken Tel.: +49 (40) 6377 26 72 EDEKA - Wir lieben Lebensmittel. EDEKA ZENTRALE Stiftung & Co. Subject: Agristo - europ garden
TextBody: Dear Emiel, Please accept my apologies for the delay in responding; we have been extremely busy with the success we've experienced and the challenges it brings. To answer your question, I must admit that I had no experience in fry production just five months ago. Previously, I was a renowned jeweler, working in Belgium and France under the brand "Holemans." I invested in professional equipment to start our production. For the past two months, we have been producing high-quality semi-artisanal Belgian fries and have very recently begun selling them. Currently, we are working at a rate of 400 kg per week, but we expect to quickly scale up to one ton per week and beyond. We source fresh potatoes locally, which are excellent but sometimes inconsistent in price, size, and availability. We position ourselves as a producer of high-quality products under the brand Belga Fries. We have opened two fritkots to test how the Thai market responds, but our primary focus is on selling to professionals. Our professional clients include companies looking to create their own brand with our product, as well as restaurant chains. In the future, we also plan to expand into retail distribution. While importation is an interesting prospect, we are currently facing challenges related to preservation and our size, which limits our ability to handle very large quantities. Thank you very much for your interest and understanding.

Subject: Questions about (1) Free time of containers (2) ETA in December, MSC
TextBody: Dear All valuable partners, To handle containers arriving, we would like to confirm below matters. 1. Free time of containers Our standard of required free time is as below. Container type Free Demurrage Free Detention Reefer container 5 calendar day 4 calendar day Dry container 14 calendar day 5 calendar day If your free time is shorter than above, Please write your condition in below and return to us? (If you do not know details of free time due to EXW or FOB terms, we will check it with our forwarding partner.) Container type Free Demurrage Free detention Reefer container calendar day calendar day Dry container calendar day calendar day (2) ETA in December As we informed, due to close of customs office and warehouse during Christmas and New Year, we cannot handle containers arriving here during below period. REEFER container : from December 10 to January 6 DRY container : from December 18 to January 5 Please recheck your Cargo Ready Date and Shipping schedule. a. If you expect Cargo Ready Date delays later than our required ETD, b. If your container may arrive in above period, We need to change the shipping schedule to be ETA later than January 6, 2025. In above cases, Please be sure to contact us and follow to our instruction. In addition, MSC count free demurrage for all containers by calendar day. If possible please avoid to use this shipping company. We appreciate your kind understanding and feedback. *This email has been sent from a send-only address. Please reply to in charge person of our purchasing dept. Sincerely yours, Overseas Import Department Purchasing ******************************* KOBE BUSSAN CO.,LTD. 125-1 Hirano, Kakogawa-cho, Kakogawa-shi, Hyogo, 675-0063 Japan TEL:+81-79-457-5068 FAX:+81-79-457-5092 E-mail: purchasing@kobebussan.co.jp URL: http://www.kobebussan.co.jp *******************************

Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

Subject: Réclamation consommateur - Reponse fournisseur [N° de reclamation=FR-2024-11610] du 27/08/2024 14:29:07
TextBody: Cher, Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informé de ce sujet, que nous avons immédiatement enregistré dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket 00046133. Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre que votre client n'était pas satisfait de la qualité de cette série. La qualité de nos produits est d'une importance capitale pour nous, et nous sommes déterminés à résoudre cette question. Informations sur le batch: Date de Production: 22/04/2024 Un système complet d'assurance qualité est en place et les principes de l'HACCP sont appliqués. Cela comprend un système complet de surveillance sur la ligne de production. Les produits finis sont échantillonnés toutes les 60 minutes et examinés pour leur qualité, y compris leur goût. Des enregistrements complets de tous ces contrôles, ainsi que d'autres contrôles, sont conservés. En fonction du code de lot, nous avons effectué une enquête approfondie dans nos registres de production et nos documents de qualité pour cette série spécifique. Il n'y a aucun anomali rapporté pendant la production concernant le goût des dauphines. Si vous avez d'autres préoccupations, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter à nouveau. Cordialement, Sandrine Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Meet Cupffee team at Vienna Coffee Festival!
TextBody: Discover Cupffee innovative cup, special discounts, and partnership opportunities in Vienna this week. [https://stratus.campaign-image.eu/images/91589000007209081_2_1684852124840_header.png] <https://cupf-zcmp.maillist-manage.eu/click/114563b5d2c3f98f/114563b5d2c3517d> [https://stratus.campaign-image.eu/images/91589000007209081_zc_v1_1684853018873_20230504_220118.jpg] <https://cupf-zcmp.maillist-manage.eu/click/114563b5d2c3f98f/114563b5d2c3517f> Dear Partners and Brand Enthusiasts, We are excited to invite you to join the Cupffee Team at the upcoming tenth anniversary of the Vienna Coffee Festival<https://cupf-zcmp.maillist-manage.eu/click/114563b5d2c3f98f/114563b5d2c35181> from September 6-8 at booth number 1 at Marx Halle<https://cupf-zcmp.maillist-manage.eu/click/114563b5d2c3f98f/114563b5d2c35183> in Vienna. The festival will take you on a journey of discovery through the world of coffee, with a focus on conscious and sustainable coffee enjoyment. We are eager to share how Cupffee is revolutionizing the coffee experience and spearheading sustainability efforts. Cupffee is made with all-natural, vegan ingredients, produced using an eco-friendly process that generates zero waste and no pollution. 🌱☕️ Learn more <https://cupf-zcmp.maillist-manage.eu/click/114563b5d2c3f98f/114563b5d2c35185> At Cupffee, we're not just part of the conversation, we're driving real change. As pioneers in sustainable packaging, our reach is truly international! With rapid production and efficient delivery systems in place, we ensure that our delicious edible cups get to you swiftly, no matter where you are. Don’t miss the chance to experience our innovative coffee cups at the Vienna Coffee Festival! Visit us at booth number 1 to connect and collaborate as we work together to save the planet, one Cupffee at a time. 🌍

Subject: Quoting Prices
TextBody: Good Morning, We have recently requested an opportunity to quote you our prices for your European or UK domestic transport. I just wanted to follow up and see if it is possible to give you our prices, even if it is just for a comparison. Waller operate trailers across the UK and Benelux, Germany and France and have done for almost 60 years specialising in the food and food ingredients industry. I'm confident we can offer you some very competitive prices but also an exceptional reliable service. Would it be possible to quote my prices? Looking forward to hearing from you. Many thanks [a] [a] Paul Rolfe Sales Director [a]

Subject: packaging data request
TextBody: Hello, We have received a mandatory request to upload packaging details for ASDA. This includes a request for Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) information I have attached a template. Please could you complete it with packaging information for the following products: 60032517 SALT AND VINEGAR FRIES 60030321 POTATO TOTS Please could you provide the information for all packaging components across the primary, secondary, and tertiary categories. Please ensure your submissions includes all tapes/labels/glues/inserts/layer pads/supports where applicable. Could you return the data to me by the 6th of September please. If you are not the correct person to contact, please forward this email to someone that can help. If there are any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Subject: Morrisons Hash Brown Stars 1st production
TextBody: Hi Evelien, Please can you confirm that the Morrisons Hash Brown Stars 1st production is still this week. Please can you send me the QC data for the run & arrange to send me start, middle & end samples from this run? You can send a mixed case if this is easier than a case from start, middle & end. Please let me know when I can expect them. Please follow the requirements below to ensure that I can access the samples easily when they arrive. o Ensure Paperwork references the Samples arriving on the vehicle. o Ensure all cases are labelled with the attached template, clearing indicating who the samples are for. o Ideally mark up the pallet that has samples on. o Ensure Newcold Corby are aware in advance of the samples arriving, advising PO No and No of sample cases. Sample information should be sent through to the following contacts: Matt Dunn matt.dunn@newcold.com Sam Smith sam.smith@newcold.com Customer Care Corby customercare.corby@newcold.com

Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

Dear Maaike de Blezer, Good day Thank you for your kind response to our contact through your website. We are responding to your below questions one by one and please see a very short presentation of our company We are GSM-FUJI LLC , Ship suppliers located in Houston Texas USA. We are part of Fuji trading global group and with an annual turnover of more than 20 M USD . Our main scope is supplying commercial vessels with provisions and stores. * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? Yes, we have been purchasing frozen potatoes for many years from local vendors in USA. What is your experience in this field? We own 2 warehouses in Houston with Freezer and Cooler facilities and we handle a lot of frozen foods like vegetables, meat and fish as well as fresh provisions and dry food canned products. * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? We currently work with local distributors for french fries and various brands according to availability and pricing. As our operations and sales are growing year by year, we are constantly looking for standard quality, better prices and more sustainble operation. This way instead of buying from local vendors we would like to check the possibility of importing by ourselves. * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Last 12 months show around 6,000kgs sales for French fries, which grows on about 10-15% / year * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? We own 2 warehouse facilities with freezers and coolers as well as big storage areas. We also own a fleet of 25 trucks of all sizes most of them refrigerated and we arrange delivery to our customers by our own means to ensure the quality and freshness of the product * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? Please check our group website www.fujitrading.co.jp/english<http://www.fujitrading.co.jp/english> * What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? our market strategy is to grow our sales and operations providing a high level of quality in products and services with less possible carbon footprint. We are ISO 9001:2015 certified and working under HACCP protocols. Our customers are ship owning companies and their commercial ships that call US Gulf ports and we supply them with provisions and general stores. We are also major supplier of Catering companies for vessels. We remain at your disposal for any other information that you may need. We also look forward to more details of your products like packaging prices , etc . Subject: Contacto
TextBody: Estimado Señor: Gracias por su correo. Apreciamos su interés en nuestra empresa! Para evaluar su solicitud, deseamos obtener una imagen más clara de su empresa. Podría informarnos y proporcionar información detallada sobre lo siguiente?: Ya compra productos congelados (de patata)? Cuál es su experiencia en este campo? En caso afirmativo, con qué marcas o empresas trabaja actualmente? Por qué desea cambiar? Qué volúmenes de papas fritas por SKU compra anualmente? Dispone de su propio canal de distribución o socios? Y almacenes? Podría proporcionamos más información sobre su empresa? Tiene un sitio web? Cuál es su estrategia de mercado? Quiénes son sus clientes? Qué productos específicos desea comprar de nosotros? Si tiene alguna pregunta adicional, no dude en ponerse en contacto con nosotros. Atentamente, El Equipo de Ventas, Maaike De Blezer --------------- Original Message --------------- From: [rafaelveliz@oceanblueseafood.com] Sent: 31/08/2024 22:58 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Contacto Buenas tardes; me gustaría saber con quién puedo comunicarme para cotizar cargas de papas fritas. Sin más por mencionar quedo a sus ordenes. Saludos. Atte. Rafael Veliz Castillo rafaelveliz@oceanblueseafood.com Zapopan, Jalisco. México. thread::hcJIKWWdH4-c1sflUseXjnQ::

Heather Dewachter Customer Service Officer Agristo nv P T +32 56 14 17 54 thread::g5XCztkjFOu0RdcIka3iXHQ::

Dear sir, mrs. thanks for your response and hope you doing well. certainly we are working with catering long time ago from different direction around the world and now i am located in UAE, as i doing the business here i am interest with extending our business and we have our Wherehouse in UAE and we are working with catering services right now and looking for some really good brand to interduce it in uae. we are looking for long terms deal and with at least for starting 2 full container we are planning to making a marketing plan for retails and wholesale companies like carrefour, spar, lulu, city supermarkets, spines, viva supermarkets. regards rami ________________________________ From: Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> Sent: Monday, September 2, 2024 3:41 PM To: rami@finpuu.com <rami@finpuu.com> Subject: Thank you for your interest Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? * What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Subject: PLUS project: 2024-04397 | CORR- DV aardappelen 8 sku - Agristo
TextBody: [https://assets.bettyblocks.com/9c446904fda248a18d7498592fecbcee_fd43c2d304504f658da28b2d30113618/56/plus-logo.png] 4.1 Upload PDF print proof Project No: 2024-04397 Project Name: CORR- DV aardappelen 8 sku - Agristo Beste Agristo Evelien Cremers Artwork, Het artwork voor CORR- DV aardappelen 8 sku - Agristo is afgerond. In opdracht van PLUS Retail heeft u van de Artwork Studio een aparte mail ontvangen met een link waar u de bestanden als illustrator file kunt downloaden. De lage resolutie PDFjes ter inzage zijn hier ook te downloaden. Let op: deze PDFjes zijn alleen ter info en kunnen niet gebruikt worden voor productie doeleinden. De bestanden zijn door PLUS Retail goedgekeurd. Het is niet toegestaan zonder uitdrukkelijke toestemming van PLUS Retail enige wijzigingen (tekst en lay-out) aan te brengen. De gebruikte kleuren staan vermeld in de aangeleverde bestanden. De kleurreferentie wordt u toegestuurd. De barcode moet door de drukker nog worden voorzien van hun technische specificatie. De verantwoordelijkheid voor de leesbaarheid van de gedrukte barcode ligt te allen tijde bij de drukker. De code-cijfers zijn akkoord gegeven door PLUS Retail. Graag de PDF proef/proeven van de drukker voor controle uploaden in PAP voor 11-09-2024. Klik hier<https://plus.pim.today> om in te loggen deze activiteit te voltooien. Alvast hartelijk dank! ________________________________ Dear Agristo Evelien Cremers Artwork, The artwork for CORR- DV aardappelen 8 sku - Agristo is finished. On behalf of PLUS Retail you did receive a separate mail with a download link for the illustrator files from the Artwork Studio. Also, the low resolution PDF files can be downloaded with this link. Note: these PDFs are for information only and cannot be used for production purposes. The files have been approved by PLUS Retail. It is not permitted to make any changes (text and layout) without the explicit permission of PLUS Retail. The colours used are listed in the supplied files. The colour reference will be sent to you. The technical specifications are still to be added to the barcode by the printer. Responsibility for the readability of the printed barcode always remains with the printer. The code figures have been approved by PLUS Retail. Please upload the PDF proof(s) from the printer for approval in PAP before 11-09-2024. Click here<https://plus.pim.today> to login and complete the activity. Thank you in advance! Met vriendelijke groet, /

Hello Sr! I work for a service company, we help other companies to import. We help them in the bureaucratic and also in the negotiation, almost a Door to Door operation for our client. I will reply for my client: 1. Yes, we already imported for other clients, we have a lot of expertise importing. 2. My client buys from the national market, but they have a good quantity, they want to import. 3. They informed me, if the price and quantity is good, they have a group of companies that will import 24.000 tons year aproxx. 4. As I said, my client have a group of distributors willing to import, we are the way. 5. Yes, www.pranacomex.com<http://www.pranacomex.com>, we work importing for more then 10 years, we attend some big companies in Brazil. 6. Potato sticks is the shape of it, like the picture below: [cid:image002.png@01DAFD25.FC731A30] We’d like to you’re the price for your grade A and B of this product. I’ts not pre fried. Atenciosamente,

Subject: AUCHAN FRITES CLASSIC 2500 GR - Premières fabrications endommagées
TextBody: Bonjour Je vous remercie de nous tenir informés des constatations que vous avez faites lors de la réception de nos échantillons de la première prodution d’Auchan Frites Classic 2500 g. Chaque heure, l'opérateur doit faire un contrôle visuel sur la conformité de l'emballage et la soudure. Un carton est retiré de la ligne d’emballage, et tous les sacs sont minutieusement inspectés pour garantir que les emballages sont correctement fermés. Les résultats de ces inspections sont consignés dans nos documents de qualité. Dans l’entretemps j’ai consulté les fiches d’emballage de cette production et aucun problème n’a été signalé ou enregistrés. Sur la base des photos reçues qui montrent la localisation des endommages, je suppose que les endommages se sont produits pendant le transport des échantillons. Nous nous excusons à l'avance pour tout inconvénient. Cordialement Felien [cid:image001.png@01DAFD55.45106200] Felien​​​​ Van Haudenhuyze Technical Sales Officer T +32 56 54 10 57<tel:+32%2056%2054%2010%2057> • M +32 472 40 47 19<tel:+32%20472%2040%2047%2019> Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com<https://eu.content.exclaimer.net?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=f39dfd12db3def1186c3000d3aaa3a50&excomponentid=E_Xg2xpZEE7COvcAHBDP1EjLNrmijgfYCtnikvl0Y9o&excomponenttype=Link&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1> [Fun for the whole family, check]<https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fagristo.com%2Fconcepts%2Ffood-for-the-whole-family-check%3Futm_source%3Dsignature%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_campaign%3Dconcept_wholefamily&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=f39dfd12db3def1186c3000d3aaa3a50&excomponentid=fNzOg0PRePB_qa6Mf1q61yBAZ1vsG7z38CkDqnxAhGw&excomponenttype=Image&signature=B-su3AcuzsJMugbhZ43HrZc6pP5ApplTbQ1cQ_kKJhhvYF6G7xNE7qCoJY6R5V3ikbQBOsz6Fwf1teT29hHZDiw7PzAUYmAI_Tgjh-No_OeIriob_5p2bPZtZf0K9RdQ1LsIpp-RHd2ZVML1CjvpAwrC85vyp0EQhzEeskjSp_mmFcMDYTyXFShzvlIhXDEjdJmBVezUTnzy_uH_6TlD9irZw_eHkt3uQ0LvBN-KBocevs8MDnYfAvcAogPi_uOjqQsclacaERqhtlXGTnd_2r0Rvot1_eabmeXIJTRSJe5iT3MWNK-goFudGrPMfMWMsmbWXvyxX7kK_Tt9H40rvA&v=1>

Subject: Commande 72280916 - Erbree
TextBody: Bonjour Quentin, Le chauffeur de la commande 72280916 - Erbree est malade, une insolation probablement due à la chaleur de ces deux derniers jours. Cela nous met donc en difficulté pour ce commande en direction d'Erbree pour demain.... Il était prévu qu'il soit chargé à Mouscron demain pour être déchargé pendant la nuit dans le F35 Erbree à l'ITM à 2:45. Pourriez-vous nous donner un nouveau créneau de déchargement pour jeudi matin svp? Je vous prie de m'excuser par avance. Cordialement, Service Agristo nv Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 8710 Wielsbeke Belgium thread::xMAQNNMsHeqhTaNPHjdZDHQ::

Subject: 【IEコラム：Vol.3】よりよい現場を作るために必要な3つの事
TextBody: 画像が表示されない場合はこちらをクリック<http://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/es?s=1673224453&e=1199279&elqTrackId=20f49e6a7ff34e609f310c9929b85f0e&elq=0d67fb329ab04e238052600f03f8085f&elqaid=37296&elqat=1&elqak=8AF55F2C17D495E49401DE0423D37D8017530B2E6429882788DD1131900ABCD4797A> [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/{5a6ff22d-9a06-49b5-943e-e00a5f7cd3bd}_img-logo.gif] IE（Industrial Engineering）コラム Vol.3 【第3回】IEの重要性を考える：よりよい現場を作るために必要な3つの事 1人ひとりの時間という資源を有効に活用し、より良い現場をつくるために必要なことは何か考えてみると、少なくとも3つのことが大切なように思います。 1つめはその現場を正しく理解することです。 具体的にはどのような資源（人、モノ、設備など）を投入し、何をアウトプット（製品、サービスなど）する現場なのか、そのアウトプットを生み出すプロセスはどのようになっているか（工程、作業方法、作業分担など）を理解します。 当たり前の話だと思いますが、それが良い現場をつくることになるので、対象が現在どのような状態になっているかを明らかにしなければいけません。 2つめは問題を正しく認識し、その問題の解決を進めることです。 問題を認識するといっても、その現場を漠然と眺めていても問題は見えてきません。 よりより方法はないか？ 人による違いはないか？ 作業ペースに問題はないか？ など、しっかりと自分なりの判断基準（ものさし）を持って現場を見ていきましょう。 次いで、その問題を数値でとらえ、問題解決を行い、問題解決されたことを証明することが大切です。 3つめは現場で働く人の意識です。 先述のように現場を正しく理解し、問題解決をしようとする意欲を高めていくことが重要で、これをモーションマインドということもできます。 モーションマインドを高めるためには、問題解決を行う技術を持っていることと問題解決を行う場を創る必要があります。 その活動の中で人が技術を身につけ、成果を認められ、目標に対する達成感を持ち、次の目標に取り組むというサイクルを回し続けなければいけません。 様々な企業の現場を見てきましたが、このサイクルを回し続けている企業は本当に強い企業になると確信しています。 執筆者：(株)日本能率協会コンサルティング 角田 賢司（敬称略） IE士資格取得講座 [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/%7B4d1aaadc-15f2-4675-a896-dbd9712c7f7b%7D_seisan-pro_logo.png]<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729637296240903%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC3%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=5372&elqTrackId=49C3E1303070F83E68EE7EE3C15480A0&elq=0d67fb329ab04e238052600f03f8085f&elqaid=37296&elqat=1&elqak=8AF51E0BAB8EA6771D44AEC6F792C33937680B2E6429882788DD1131900ABCD4797A> 10月7日（月）より開講します！ 生産性改善・サプライチェーン強化・製造DX導入 原点は “IE” です！ 現場が解る、現場の課題解決ができる、IEのプロ『IE士』育成をお勧めします！ 本コースの詳細はこちら<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729637296240903%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC3%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=5372&elqTrackId=70040E651FFC15A85CF3B04E43F3F7D2&elq=0d67fb329ab04e238052600f03f8085f&elqaid=37296&elqat=1&elqak=8AF58F8A7677148E6BAE903CED6A6C4BC1170B2E6429882788DD1131900ABCD4797A> お申込みはこちら<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729637296240903%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC3%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=2104&elqTrackId=2D7168C45FD869D504EC0C53B0FAE609&elq=0d67fb329ab04e238052600f03f8085f&elqaid=37296&elqat=1&elqak=8AF5A258F7F410F85E67B27E98AE203CF9BB0B2E6429882788DD1131900ABCD4797A> ●生産・製造部門のマネジャー、リーダーとその候補者 ●社内研修講師、ものづくり教育担当 すぐに、いつでも・どこでも・何度でも学習できる！ オンライン（アーカイブ）セミナーのご案内 IE基礎テクニック習得コース<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729637296240903%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC3%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=22870&elqTrackId=58B1971B609D4C4C13BCCAB4BAE40760&elq=0d67fb329ab04e238052600f03f8085f&elqaid=37296&elqat=1&elqak=8AF5B707E786F440E4DFBB04132EFBECC2F80B2E6429882788DD1131900ABCD4797A> Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 02.09.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 02.09.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

TextBody: Bonjour, Je n’ai plus de place avant le 05/09 à 21h00.. Dans l’attente de votre retour à ce sujet pour la confirmation ou ono de livraison au 05/09 à 21h00 de voter coté. Bon Mardi Cordialement, [cid:image001.png@01DAFDD6.52DE25D0]https://teams.microsoft.com/l/chat/0/0?users=quentin.hugues@mousquetaires.com [cid:image002.png@01DAFDD6.52DE25D0] De : Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Envoyé : lundi 2 septembre 2024 16:07 À : Quentin HUGUES <quentin.hugues@mousquetaires.com> Objet : Commande 72280916 - Erbree Bonjour Quentin, Le chauffeur de la commande 72280916 - Erbree est malade, une insolation probablement due à la chaleur de ces deux derniers jours. Cela nous met donc en difficulté pour ce commande en direction d'Erbree pour demain.... Il était prévu qu'il soit chargé à Mouscron demain pour être déchargé pendant la nuit dans le F35 Erbree à l'ITM à 2:45. Pourriez-vous nous donner un nouveau créneau de déchargement pour jeudi matin svp? Je vous prie de m'excuser par avance. TextBody: Hi David, 29/08 we loaded order 650175. with 26 pallets of hash browns. 30/08 we had 4 loads: 641735 with 26 pallets of waffles 650429 with 26 pallets of skin on chips 650206 with 26 pallets of alphabets 651960 with 26 pallets of hash browns It takes about 3 days for them to arrive. So first one should have arrived on Sunday, ant the 4 others yesterday. If not I can check with our transporters. For loading on Friday we have 1 load of sweet potato fries, and 2 load of skin on chips. We also have 2 loads of waffles (646719, 651969) - I would like to save stock for the Aldi Directs. Are you OK for me to move back those deliveries? As informed we will have more pallets available for loading 10/09, so I would move 1 to after this run. And 1 even later if possible. Can we do this?

Subject: Can You Do This?
TextBody: Dear sales, Greetings to you and your family. Please let this not sound strange to you because I am not asking you for money, my only surviving lawyer who would have done this, died mid of this year. I prayed and got your email address from your country's guest book which I got from my late husband's archive and I wish to visit once more if God will in his infinite mercies grant me In view of your good profile. I want to solicit your assistance in the discharge of my will. I am Mrs. Olivia Anderson, from London and i am 68 years suffering from endometrial cancer. Please, I want you to help me create a charitable project with the money that I inherited from my deceased husband who died in a motor accident. I was brought up from a motherless baby's home and was married to my late husband for twenty nine years without a child. My friends have plundered so much of my wealth since my illness and I cannot live with the agony of entrusting this huge responsibility to any of them anymore, so I sold all my inherited belongings and deposited all the sum of �9,000,000 GBP (Nine Million Pounds) with my bank. All I need is an honest person who will use at least 60% of the funds as I would instruct, then the rest 40% will go to you for helping me accomplish this mission because donating this money to charity is the only legacy I can leave behind after my death. No money is required from you to carry on with this project because it is my heart desire to make a generous gift to you to work for a charity in your country. I don't mind if you are a Christian,Muslim,Hindu or Buddhist rather my only paramount concern here is whether I can trust you because this generation is filled up with greedy and fraudulent people all over the world. I will give you more details as soon as I hear from you. Looking forward to your urgent response on my private email address below. olivia.andearson12@zohomail.com adriene213@outlook.com
