TextBody: Goedemorgen Melissa, Dit is 2 containers geworden ipv 1 Dank Met vriendelijke groet, William Nannes J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Tel: +310226396408 Mobiel: +31610946168 Mail: william@jpb.nl<mailto:william@jpb.nl> J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

Subject: D24-01768 Congelados del Cibao -> Brokeimsa
TextBody: Goedemorgen Melissa, Er zijn vier orders voor Congelados del Cibao en deze moeten alle vier op naam van Brokeimsa. De orders waren hier niet goed aangemaakt en daardoor ook niet goed aan jullie doorgegeven. Vroeger deden we voor deze klant wel op hun eigen naam, maar sinds een hele tijd al doen we alleen nog Brokeimsa. Zou je de volgende orders aan willen passen? D24-01768 D24-01769 D24-01770 D24-01771 Gaan de slot boekingen er dan uit? Kan je me op de hoogte houden? Alvast bedankt! Met vriendelijke groet /

Subject: D24-01771
TextBody: Hoi Melissa, Ik zie dat D24-01771 voor 27-09 gevraagd is, maar dit is de vertrekdatum van de boot. Zou deze order ook op 24-09 geladen kunnen worden? Ik had met Nathalie de afspraak dat zij alle orders altijd op de maandag zette van de gevraagde week, omdat de verkopers hier nog wel eens niet goed kijken 😉 Zou je dat heel misschien ook willen doen? Bijvoorbeeld er wordt door inkoop donderdag doorgegeven, dat jij ‘m op de maandag van die week zet. (Als dat kan wat betreft productie natuurlijk) Ik weet natuurlijk niet hoe dat bij jullie werkt en hoe Nathalie dat deed, dus geen idee of dat makkelijk is of niet. Ik hoor het graag. 😊 Dankjewel alvast! Met vriendelijke groet /

Subject: COMPLAINT  Ref:BX142215
TextBody: BX142215 Please quote the above reference on all correspondence 3rd September 2024 Agristo N V Fao Richard Storer Old Mill Place High Street Tattenhall Chester CH3 9PX FOR THE ATTENTION OF - Q A Dept OUTSTANDING COMPLAINT -Jacks Thin & Crispy Oven Fries 8 x 750g Details of Complaint - packs unsealed on back seam Batch Details C03241840824 1.7.26 Our records show that, to date, we do not appear to have received correspondence enabling us to conclude this matter. The complaint was originally reported to us through our branch Eastleigh 314 - Tel 02380 610816 on the 15th August 2024 Could you please ensure this matter is looked into and concluded as soon as possible. You may wish to refer to the original complaint notification when doing so. We will require copies of all correspondence to enable us to close our files. However if a copy has recently been forwarded to us, please disregard this reminder. If for any reason you are unable to comply with this request or should you have any queries relating to this matter, please do not hesitate to contact myself or a member of the Customer Relations Team. Thank you in anticipation of your co-operation. Yours faithfully Hayley Sembhi Customer Relations This is a confidential email intended only for the person it is addressed to. Booker may monitor and record all emails. The views expressed in this email are those of the sender and not Booker. Internet communications are not secure and therefore we do not accept legal responsibility for the contents of this message. Booker Limited (00197380) Registered in England Registered Office: Equity House Irthlingborough Road, Wellingborough NN8 1LT. VAT Registration Number: GB 220 4302 31.

Subject: Documents 470143
TextBody: Dear all, Please find the attached file, which indicate that two PAL of the products have passed their one-year production date. We regret to inform you that we cannot accept these quantities due to their expirer . We would like to understand how it was possible for such old and near-expiry quantity to be sent to our company. Unfortunately, we are unable to sell these products, as they are consistently rejected by our customers. Also , we need you to send the CN for attached claim which have the same problem . We look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this matter.

Subject: D24-01771
TextBody: Hi Kirsten, Ja tuurlijk, normaal zet ik die steeds op maandag als jullie de week van laden doorgeven (maar ik had wat hulp om orders in te geven vorige weken). Ondertussen aangepast voor D24-01771. Pas ik dit ook aan voor D24-01767 aub? Mvg, Melissa Maekelbergh Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 14 17 45 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Planning Beemsterboer [planning@jpb.nl] Sent: 3/09/2024 10:02 To: service@agristo.com Subject: D24-01771 Hoi Melissa, Ik zie dat D24-01771 voor 27-09 gevraagd is, maar dit is de vertrekdatum van de boot. Zou deze order ook op 24-09 geladen kunnen worden? Ik had met Nathalie de afspraak dat zij alle orders altijd op de maandag zette van de gevraagde week, omdat de verkopers hier nog wel eens niet goed kijken 😉 Zou je dat heel misschien ook willen doen? Bijvoorbeeld er wordt door inkoop donderdag doorgegeven, dat jij ‘m op de maandag van die week zet. (Als dat kan wat betreft productie natuurlijk) Ik weet natuurlijk niet hoe dat bij jullie werkt en hoe Nathalie dat deed, dus geen idee of dat makkelijk is of niet. Ik hoor het graag. 😊 Dankjewel alvast! Met vriendelijke groet /

Subject: Get Ready! One-Click Audit Downloads -
TextBody: Imagine the peace of mind knowing your audit reports are ready in minutes ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ [https://gallery.eocampaign1.com/45c7d3ac-c98b-11ee-aec2-9d5b5d9db191%2Fmedia-manager%2F1711366441168-foodsafelogo%20png.png] Effortless Food Safety Compliance, One Tap At A Time! [https://gallery.eocampaign1.com/45c7d3ac-c98b-11ee-aec2-9d5b5d9db191%2Fmedia-manager%2F1711366748847-New%20HP%20Image%20PNG.png] Hi! We have some fantastic news to share! We’re thrilled to highlight our One-Click Audit Download feature, a game-changer for your compliance and audit processes. What Does This Mean for You? Customizable Audit Reports - Effortlessly compile all necessary documents and records on FOODSAFE into a single, professionally formatted PDF. Tailor your reports to meet specific audit requirements, ensuring you have everything you need at your fingertips. Effortless Sharing - Quickly email, share, or present your comprehensive audit report to auditors. This streamlined process eliminates the need for manual compilation, making your audit preparations smooth and efficient. Save Time & Stress - With our One-Click Audit Download, say goodbye to the hassle of navigating through endless data records, downloading files, and piecing them together. Our feature automates this process, significantly reducing the time and effort required. Why You’ll Love It? Imagine the peace of mind knowing your audit reports are ready in minutes, giving you more time to focus on what you do best—growing your business. No more last-minute scrambles or worries about missing documents. Our One-Click Audit Download ensures you are always prepared, enhancing your compliance management with ease. We’re excited to bring you this incredible convenience and can’t wait for you to experience it. Stay tuned for our launch! Sign up now for a chance to get early access, win free memberships and take advantage of this innovative feature designed to make your compliance journey simpler and more efficient. Sign Up Now<https://eot.myfoodsafe.co.uk/f/a/xy_5vZyRTRN2nC-Bw-_2Tg~~/AAAHUQA~/RgRouVU_P0UgNTRjOTlhMzg1ZjFjNTJhMTYwOWEyNjQ4OGY2MDkxODBEHWh0dHBzOi8vd3d3Lm15Zm9vZHNhZmUuY28udWsvVwVzcGNldUIKZs8_0NZmQxEcIVIRc2FsZXNAYWdyaXN0by5jb21YBAAAdws~> Paddy Founder & CEO The FOODSAFE Team 85 Great Portland Street London W1W 7LT United Kingdom You can unsubscribe<https://eot.myfoodsafe.co.uk/f/a/iMuqzwG-Ri6-WIxv3OMlKg~~/AAAHUQA~/RgRouVU_> at any time.

Subject: 88991 Spar FB Complaint - Crinkle Cut Chips 750g 600887
TextBody: Dear Ciara , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00046061. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Bath information: Lotcode : B04241032102 Production day : 12/04/2024 In all our production plants we have very stringent hygiene rules and measurements. All visitors, operators or working personnel have to wear hair nets and protective clothing. Also men with beards have to wear a beard net. We also have a procedure for how we have to put these on: first the hair and beard net have to be put on, afterwards the protective clothing, this is to avoid having hair on the protective clothing We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Wakefield goods in
TextBody: Morning All Due to our recent James Bridge closure all deliveries are now going to our Wakefield depot. Please can you pass the below on to your transport & your hauliers used to deliver our orders Goods in temperature delivery times below Ambient goods in times 6am to 12pm Frozen goods in times12pm to 7pm Please follow the process below when booking in an order. * All deliveries must be book in Via phone or email – Info below * If a message is left on the answer phone please leave a contact number for goods in to confirm a date/slot/ref * If an email is sent goods in will respond with a date/time/ref * No deliveries will be accepted if they haven’t booked in or if goods in haven’t confirmed a date/time/ref * The teams email/numbers are all below for any other support required. Wakefield Address Blakemore Foodservice (Wakefield) Unit 3 Premier Park Oulton Wakefield West Yorkshire LS26 8ZA Wakefield Number (0113) 2014512 Wakefield Email wakegi@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:wakegi@afblakemore.co.uk> Below is the contact information for all of my team including phone numbers & emails should you need to contact ourselves if you’re having any issues booking in orders Demand Planners Contact info Working Hours 7am to 3.30pm Name Number Email Rebecca Downie 0121 522 6321 (EXT 3356) RDownie@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:RDownie@afblakemore.co.uk> Louise Farmer 0121 526 8400 Ext 2246 LFarmer@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:LFarmer@afblakemore.co.uk> Deborah Colley (Team Leader) 0121 5226321 Ext 3636 DColley@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:DColley@afblakemore.co.uk> Team Email FoodserviceDemandPlanners@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:FoodserviceDemandPlanners@afblakemore.co.uk>

TextBody: Good afternoon Chetna, Would it be possible to direct your questions to service@agristo.com? This way, we can ensure that the emails are picked up even when your regular contact person is not available. Thank you in advance, this would be greatly appreciated. TextBody: Hoi Marleen, klopt wat betreft beide kroketten. 76 ton zal in 1x geproduceerd worden W39 ik heb me vergist van lijntje Groetjes, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63 M +32 472 41 34 87 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Van Durmen, Marleen [marleen.van-durmen@iglo.com] Sent: 3/09/2024 13:44 To: service@agristo.com Subject: van alles Dag Marlies, Bedankt voor de vele antwoordjes al. 312705 - 96017386 Plain croquettes Zie ik dat nu goed dat het volledig gevraagd volume van 76 ton gemaakt wordt in W39 Indien wel, bedankt voor het pushen Belgische kroketten Als ik het goed zie zijn er nog 7 pal v/d Belgische kroketten 800g die nog niet op een order zitten, in de commentaar staat weekend 31/08 +/- 16 pal, ik vermoed dat dit hoort bij de lijn erboven, vermits daar nu 16 pal van in stock zijn. Dank alvast. Mvg, Marleen Marleen Van Durmen Demand & Supply Planner thread::bFvP7frNFjOxdDBxYI1He3Q::

Subject: FTP Waitrose Honey roasted parsnips
TextBody: Hello, Please find in the below email link to the final artwork. Please ensure you send to your printer to download promptly within 24 hours, or you may incur charges for a re-release of the artwork. Please send us a PDF for approval prior to plate ordering and printing. Following your first print run, please can I request that you send 8 samples of packaging for us to review. The retailers will also use these to upload your products on to their online home shopping systems. Please can you confirm both your planned print date and expected sample delivery date. Many Thanks, Jowita *** Please note the message below originated on the Internet. Subject: Réclamation qualité Sysco France / Litige n° 24,5938 - 2708824 ET 24,594 - 2708829
TextBody: Cher , Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informé de ce sujet, que nous avons immédiatement enregistré dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket 00047211. Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre que votre client n'était pas satisfait de la qualité de cette série. La qualité de nos produits est d'une importance capitale pour nous, et nous sommes déterminés à résoudre cette question. Informations sur le batch: Date de Production: 30/06/2024 Comme il s'agit d'une réclamation répétitive sur la même production, j'ai demandé une investigation par le site concerné. Le manager de qualité de Nazareth a été informé et va étudié les réclamations. Je reviens le plus vite possible avec une réponse. Entretemps, avez-vous la possibilité de tracer les numéros de lots complèts? Maintenant le code de l'heure n'a pas été communiqué. Avec les codes de l'heure nous avons possibilité de retracer les échantillons du lot et faire une investigation approfondie. Si vous avez besoin de plus d'informations ou d'assistance, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter. Cordialement, Sandrine Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

TextBody: Hello Jessie, First of all We would like to thank you for this message. We'll set up the taken out of this container for September 4th. Thank you again for you attention and have a great day! Sincerely Em ter., 3 de set. de 2024 às 09:50, Faturamento - WFB <faturamento@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:faturamento@wfbusiness.com.br>> escreveu: ---------- Forwarded message --------- De: Import - WFB <import@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:import@wfbusiness.com.br>> Date: ter., 3 de set. de 2024 às 09:34 Subject: Fwd: HAVITA/ WORLD FOOD BUSINESS - OVERVIEW FREE TIME - WEEK 36 To: <Faturamento@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:Faturamento@wfbusiness.com.br>> Segue e-mail. ---------- Forwarded message --------- De: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com<mailto:service@agristo.com>> Date: seg., 2 de set. de 2024 às 06:09 Subject: HAVITA/ WORLD FOOD BUSINESS - OVERVIEW FREE TIME - WEEK 36 To: import@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:import@wfbusiness.com.br> <import@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:import@wfbusiness.com.br>>, francisco@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:francisco@goldenfoods.com.br> <francisco@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:francisco@goldenfoods.com.br>>, comex@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:comex@goldenfoods.com.br> <comex@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:comex@goldenfoods.com.br>>, anton.fechner@fedeco.eu<mailto:anton.fechner@fedeco.eu> <anton.fechner@fedeco.eu<mailto:anton.fechner@fedeco.eu>>, alicea.esperanca@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:alicea.esperanca@goldenfoods.com.br> <alicea.esperanca@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:alicea.esperanca@goldenfoods.com.br>> Good morning Remant just notified us that the following container is the last one for now that has to be urgently picked up at POD: WORLD FOOD BUSINESS IMP E EXP LTDA – 458319 // CBE2409715  HLBU9863500 dwelling on terminal for 38 days. This one is related to AG2820, of which we started the release this morning so I expect this one will be taken out soon as well. Finally there! Good job everyone and thank you for your cooperation on this.

TextBody: Goedendag, Bijgevoegd treft u onze inkoopbevestiging. D24-02000 – IO24-01316 - Laden week 39 -> JPB 1 kg uit voorraad laden D24-02001 – IO24-01317 - Laden week 43 Bestemming: Mauritanië Verzendadres: ETS B.M.C. Met vriendelijke groet, William Nannes J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Tel: +310226396408 Mobiel: +31610946168 Mail: william@jpb.nl<mailto:william@jpb.nl> J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Subject: Finished artwork is available (With colour proof)
TextBody: Dear Supplier, Project:284.23690 W47 Diepvries friet NPD's Batch 2 (3)-6. Specificaties+DT+WT has been finalised. The Low resolution PDF(s) for your information can be downloaded in a task waiting for you in the Pack module. NOTE! These files are to be used only to give you an idea of how the artwork is going to look like. They are not suitable for print. In the same task you'll see the FTP download link where you can find the High Resolution files meant for the printer. 2 colour references will be sent to you today through DHL, the tracking number is displayed in the same task. You will receive the envelope containing the colour references within 2 working days. 1 Colour reference is for your own personal use. 1 Colour reference Should be sent to your printer. (In case the projecttype is 1.2, 5.1 (or occasionally 5.2) the colour references will be send to you after approx. 4 days, this gives the printer the advantage to already start with creation of the printing plates. For these project types a separate task will appear with the Parcel tracking number). If you need any assistance please contact your FroQ project manager. Or call us at +31302476080. Please also read and follow up the print model request letter.

Subject: Food and Beverage Magazine Weekly Newsletter
TextBody: View in Browser September 3, 2024 Advertisement If you would like to contribute to F&B Weekly, please contact Lauren Kane, Director & Editor-in-Chief, via email at Lauren.Kane@fbmagazine.com or Michael Politz, Publisher, via email at michael@fb101.com. TOP NEWS Newport Harbor Island Resort Announces Jaysen Elrod as Exectutive Chef Newport Harbor Island Resort via Food and Beverage Magazine The newly reopened Newport Harbor Island Resort, a quintessential New England coastal destination and the only resort on Goat Island, announces the appointment of Jaysen Elrod to Executive Chef, effective immediately. In his new role, Elrod has overseen the re-concepting of the on-site dining outlets and will manage all culinary operations for the resort, which just underwent a $50 million renovation in time for the summer season. "We are thrilled to announce this incredibly well-deserved promotion for Chef Jaysen to Executive Chef of our culinary operations," said David Smiley, General Manager of Newport Harbor Island Resort. Read More Black Tap Craft Burgers & Beer Brings Its Award-Winning Burgers and CrazyShake® Milkshakes to Brickell City Centre Black Tap Craft Burgers & Beer via Food and Beverage Magazine Black Tap Craft Burgers & Beer, the renowned burger establishment founded by husband and wife duo, Chris Barish and Julie Mulligan, is thrilled to announce the grand opening of its newest location in Miami on the fourth floor of Brickell City Centre. Opening on Aug. 5, Miami residents and visitors can indulge in the flavorful world of Black Tap's craft burgers, delectable wings, fresh salads, iconic CrazyShake® milkshakes, ice-cold craft beer and inventive cocktails. Black Tap Miami spans 6,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor seating to serve a combined 200 diners. Read More Advertisement BEVERAGE Archer Roose Welcomes Conley Downing as New Chief Marketing Officer Archer Roose via Food and Beverage Magazine Archer Roose, the pioneering brand within the canned wine sector, is thrilled to announce the appointment of Conley Downing as their new Chief Marketing Officer. With over 17 years of experience in the spirits industry, Downing is a passionate and versatile commercially-minded marketing leader specializing in building, nurturing and exiting early-stage brands. Read More Wines of the Presidents Food and Beverage Magazine You are what you eat ... you are what you drink. What did the presidents eat and drink? Read More Advertisement Serving up health plan solutions Promoted by United HealthCare Offering a robust health plan may help with recruiting and retaining top talent, boosting employee satisfaction and encouraging healthier behaviors in your staff. With UnitedHealthcare, you’ll find an array of flexible health plan solutions — including wellness and incentive programs. Learn More HOSPITALITY NEWS Einstein Bros.® Bagels Provides Line Relief for Parents Adding School Drop-Off Lines to Their Morning Routine Einstein Bros.® Bagels via Food and Beverage Magazine Einstein Bros.® Bagels makes the dreaded school drop-off line a bit better this back-to-school season with its "Line Relief" Free Bagel & Shmear. Rewards members will enjoy a free fresh-baked bagel and cream cheese with any purchase when they order in the app or online and skip the line. Read More World Food Championships Welcomes Bar Keepers Friend as 'Official Clean Team' World Food Championships via Food and Beverage Magazine As final preparations are being made by World Food Championships to host hundreds of amateur and professional cook teams in Indianapolis this fall, one thing is guaranteed — the Kitchen Arena will be spotless. The World Food Championships announced that Bar Keepers Friend will serve as the "Official Clean Team" at this year's event taking place Nov. 8-12 at the Indiana Farm Bureau Fall Creek Pavilion located at the Indiana State Fairgrounds & Event Center. Read More Advertisement Promoted by Bunzl Food Packaging Supplies Cleaning & Hygiene Supplies Material Handling Supplies Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) Learn More Acclaimed Tokyo Restaurants, Udatsu Sushi and Rokusho, to Launch in Los Angeles Boulevard Hospitality Group and Three Star Lane via Food and Beverage Magazine Boulevard Hospitality Group and Three Star Lane announced their inaugural collaboration, bringing two Tokyo institutions to Los Angeles. Under the direction of Hisashi Udatsu and Naotaka Ohashi, September 2024 will see two distinctive culinary and cocktail-forward destinations open within a historic former Hollywood recording studio on Sunset Boulevard. Read More Trailblazing Chef Brings Brilliance and Bold Flavors to Chicago Suburb's Culinary Scene K.C. Gulbro via Food and Beverage Magazine In the culinary world, a relentless drive for excellence and innovation truly sets the stage for the top chefs. K.C. Gulbro, renowned and nationally recognized Chef, owner of both FoxFire Restaurant and Copper Fox event venue, and Chef Ambassador for Certified Angus Beef® epitomizes this standard. His accolades, groundbreaking menu innovations, and an unwavering dedication to community engagement are reshaping the culinary landscape. Read More Advertisement The Explosive Growth of RTD Cocktails: An Industry Deep Dive — What Is the Impact? NRS via Food and Beverage Magazine The RTD cocktail market has experienced remarkable growth, capturing the attention of manufacturers, retailers and consumers. This analysis delves into the latest trends, supported by National Retail Solutions scan data, to provide a comprehensive overview of the current state and future potential of RTDs in the beverage alcohol industry. Read More The New Restaurant and Entertainment Venue at 63 CityCenter Will Feature Live Music, Southern Comfort Food, One-Of-A-Kind Memorabilia, Outdoor Patios, and a Premier Nightlife Experience Space Marks Fourth Location, Joining Nashville, Gatlinburg, Tennessee TC Restaurant Group via Food and Beverage Magazine TC Restaurant Group, a premier owner-operator of entertainment and dining destinations, is teaming up with country superstar and Academy of Country Music Artist of the Decade Jason Aldean to bring Jason Aldean's Kitchen + Bar to the Las Vegas Strip this fall 2024. TC Restaurant Group is known as the leading operator in Nashville's famed lower Broadway district and aims to deliver the best of the Music City experience to Las Vegas. Read More BeatBox Announces Expansion of Board with Industry Leaders Toby David and Christine Perich BeatBox via Food and Beverage Magazine BeatBox, a leading innovator in the ready-to-drink alcohol category, based in Austin, Texas, is excited to announce the addition of two distinguished industry leaders to its leadership team. Toby David will be joining BeatBox's Board of Directors, while Christine Perich will join as a Strategic Advisor. Read More Prize-Winning Pastry Chef Celebrates Social Change With Coffee-Inspired Creations Nespresso ZA via Food and Beverage Magazine This Women's Month in South Africa, Nespresso ZA is partnering with rising culinary star Motheba Makhetha to integrate Nespresso coffee into culinary experiences within the South African context while highlighting the exceptional talent of women in the culinary sector. Subject: Temperature Logger Reminder
TextBody: Dear partner, In the last few months, we have had some challenges with temperature loggers in the container, this includes but not limited to * missing/misplaced temperature logger * temperature logger not turned on * temperature logger only recorded first few hours since loaded The availability of a working temperature logger is very critical in maintaining the products safety and quality. Failure in compliance may delay the shipment as the products will need to be assessed internally and possibly externally, and may lead to rejection. We kindly request for you to implement a process to ensure a working temperature logger has been placed in each container. This may include supporting activity such as: * Providing evidence that the working data logger has been placed on the container by including a photo along with the shipping documents * Recording the serial number of temperature logger placed * Marking the location of the temperature logger with a bright coloured paper * Provide detail for each container or set a standard location of where the temperature logger is placed * Testing the temperature logger prior to shipment and ensure it is working properly and the battery is in good condition Thank you for your continuous support.

Failure in compliance may delay the shipment as the products will need to be assessed internally and possibly externally, and may lead to rejection. We kindly request for you to implement a process to ensure a working temperature logger has been placed in each container. Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 03.09.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 03.09.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Dear Maaike, Nice to meet you. My name is Cynthia. We are an importer in Hong Kong, Macau and mainland China and aims to provide high quality food and beverage products from worldwide. We mainly provide bulk pack for catering, western restaurant, hotel and café and small pack to retail store. You may check our company website: https://www.foodgears.com.hk/ We are now looking for potato products supply, could you let us know does your company having business partner in Hong Kong? At this moment, we did not purchase frozen potato products but we do purchase frozen cakes and fruits from worldwide. We are interested in the below items. It would be really appreciated if you could send me a soft copy of your company's catalogue, pricelist, spec, artwork/photos and please advise the MOQ and logistic information. Waffle cut fries 4x 2.5 kg 10x10 French Fries 2.5kg 4x 2.5 kg 12x12 French Fries 2.5kg 4x 2.5 kg 14x14 French Fries 2.5kg 4x 2.5 kg Salted Crispy 9x9 French Fries 2,5kg 4x 2.5 kg 13x13 Crinkle Cut 2.5kg 4x 2.5 kg Thank you.

Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Subject: EMALEX IMPORT - EXPORT Sarl.
TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

De code werkt slechts 15 minuten en als u een nieuwe code aanvraagt, werkt deze code niet meer. Verificatiecode voor account: 59835822 Hebt u problemen met de code? Bekijk de fout en controleer of de e-mail-id 'PZ88LBC' is. Als dit niet het geval is, kijkt u of u een bijgewerkte e-mail hebt ontvangen of vraagt u een nieuwe code aan. Subject: Quoting Prices
TextBody: Good Morning, We have recently requested an opportunity to quote you our prices for your European or UK domestic transport. I just wanted to follow up and see if it is possible to give you our prices, even if it is just for a comparison. Waller operate trailers across the UK and Benelux, Germany and France and have done for almost 60 years specialising in the food and food ingredients industry. I'm confident we can offer you some very competitive prices but also an exceptional reliable service. Would it be possible to quote my prices? Looking forward to hearing from you. Many thanks [a] [a] Paul Rolfe Sales Director [a]

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: Credit Limit change for 1000011398 JABER MEASAM FO
commercial collaboration
TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: Proposal for cooperation between Agristo & Van Gillern Ltd.
TextBody: To whom it may concern, My name is Adam Gillern, and I am a Junior Sales Representative at Van Gillern Ltd., Kamenice, Czech Republic. Our company specializes in the production of PE films and plastic packaging materials. According to my official information, you are a manufacturer of fries, potato specialties and mashed potatoes, which you package for sale. We would like to offer and supply you with the necessary packaging material made from PE or BOPP film. The film is produced according to your wishes, printed, and delivered flexibly. All details for production and printing can be discussed and determined together. I would also like to tell you that we have recently tested our new five-layer film in a thickness of 70mi, which has met with a positive response from customers due to the reduction in packaging weight and, of course, price. For your information: In the field of manufacturing this packaging material, we have many years of practice and experience. We supply these packaging materials to Western and Central Europe. We are a family-owned company, and the satisfaction of our customers has been, is, and always will be our goal. We propose discussing future cooperation in a personal meeting to clarify all technical and commercial terms. I would be very pleased to hear from you soon.

Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: Ibérica Expo Londres, 26-27 Noviembre - Canal Horeca
TextBody: Presenta tus productos ante importadores y operadores de HoReCa y minoristas especializados. View this email in your browser.<https://mailchi.mp/ibericaexpo/londres24-2?e=0cc3d4a978> [https://mcusercontent.com/a6e317164e52fe1bd9effc27d/images/bcbd72d5-318e-08f3-6174-1abb24d917b4.png] <https://bellavita.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=a6e317164e52fe1bd9effc27d&id=7c4a9c3acd&e=0cc3d4a978> Ibérica Expo abre sus puertas a las empresas agroalimentarias españolas los días 26 y 27 de noviembre en el centro de exposiciones Olympia en Londres. Este año, el evento se presenta como el Pabellón España del European Pizza Show, el principal evento B2B del Reino Unido enfocado en el sector de la restauración mediterránea. [https://mcusercontent.com/a6e317164e52fe1bd9effc27d/images/58b9f7b3-773a-518e-2d7c-0f3f36b22fd9.png] <https://bellavita.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=a6e317164e52fe1bd9effc27d&id=91000c312d&e=0cc3d4a978> La participación en Ibérica Expo representa una oportunidad única para presentar tus productos ante los principales importadores y distribuidores de alimentos y bebidas, así como de compradores y operadores de HoReCa y también de minoristas especializados. Rellena este formulario<https://bellavita.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=a6e317164e52fe1bd9effc27d&id=89670426cf&e=0cc3d4a978> y nos pondremos en contacto. Pallets x item 400495 ( start ) * 6 chep pallets x item 400182 als laatst laden in de lengte -> 2x3 pallets op een rij Ik neem dit ook nog op met expeditie, maar misschien kan je het alvast zo in het order noteren. Laden van zodra goederen beschikbaar. Subject: Temperature Logger Reminder
TextBody: Hi Ricky, Thank you for bringing this to our attention. I will check with all parties involved if the procedures are still followed correctly. I'm not sure what the cause would be for loggers shutting off after a few hours or not working at all. We might have to do some tests on the loggers we are currently buying. Our temperature loggers should always be placed in the same location: the last pallet at the doors to the left (see orange indicated pallet, the blue one is only if we have 2 loggers in one container): The logger will be fixed on the top most box, between the foil and the box, the box will be marked with a label "LOGGER": The logger number should be mentioned on our invoice, but I think that for our external loading locations that step is not possible. I'll check that for you and come back to it: The only measure we are unable to take is the picture of every logger. Our staff does not have the time nor the means to achieve this. My request to you: It would help us if Aldi could give us a list of particular orders which had issues with the logger, so we can better investigate what went wrong and what the cause would be for the logger issues. Thank you.

Subject: Lidl - Ireland Price Differences - Agristo NV (CB)
TextBody: Good Morning, I hope you are well. I am writing to you in relation to invoices which were submitted and have been flagged with price differences on the below Item: The invoice numbers in question is: 90626307, 90627305, 90627306 Supplier Nr INT Supplier Name Item No NAT Item No INT Item Description Listing Type KI Quantity WAWI Quantity Invoice Product Group Product Group Description Neg Country Delivery Date WH Invoice Number Invoice Amount Currency Lidl Price Invoice 21163 Agristo 228146 135175 Sweet Potato Fries 500g Normalsortiment EM 20 1080 1080 20/40 Potato Products INT 21/08/2024 NEW 90626307 10903,61 EUR 1,647 1,671 21163 Agristo 228146 135175 Sweet Potato Fries 500g Normalsortiment EM 20 10800 10800 20/40 Potato Products INT 28/08/2024 NEW 90627305 21601,59 EUR 1,647 1,671 21163 Agristo 228146 135175 Sweet Potato Fries 500g Normalsortiment EM 20 3240 3240 20/40 Potato Products INT 29/08/2024 NEW 90627306 22282,91 EUR 1,647 1,671 Please note debit notes will be issued for the differences. If you do not agree with a debit note, please reply to this email with proof of your price. If your price is confirmed as correct, the debit notes will be repaid. *Please note as per Lidl Policy the invoice price should reflect the price agreed for the point that the goods are received by a Lidl Warehouse. We also do not accept Credit Notes.* Please update your system urgently !!! @Louise Vaughan<mailto:Louise.Vaughan1@lidl.ie> could you please clarify with the supplier why still charging us incorrectly ? Please let me know if you need anything from my side. Thank you and wish you a lovely day,

Confidentiality: The foregoing communication and any attachment(s) are intended only for the addressee and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient, please be advised that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication or its attachment(s) is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication by error, please notify us immediately and destroy the material in its entirety, whether electronic or hard copy. P Kindly consider not to print this e-mail unless you really need to.

Subject: Bestellung der ALDI Suisse AG - Perlen (10743/331322)
Claim: 929
TextBody: Dear Mya san, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 46648. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. As the full batch code is not available, unfortunately, we are not able to do a targeted and in depth investigation. That being said, I have forwarded this case to the Packing Engineer of Tilburg and he has the same reaction as I had: he has no idea whatsoever how this could have happened if there is no empty bag in the box. What we do know, is that a manual intervention must have happened at some point. Indeed, our packing process is fully automated: Weighing of the fries Foil is unwinded, gets a bag stamp, foil is formed into a bag (cut and sealed at the bottom and at the back) Fries fall into the bag and bag is sealed and cut on top Bag goes through the metal detector Bag is weighed Bags fall into the box Box is closed Box is weighed Box gets a box label So there are a lot of steps (and there is plenty of physical space) between the "loose" fries falling into the bag and the box being closed. We are therefore very confident that this is a peculiar and isolated case. I remain at your disposal for any further information,

Subject: Introduction — ICECO Trade
TextBody: Good day, I hope this email finds you well. My name is Kristina, I am the Commerce Manager of ICECO Trade, a Lithuania-based company. We came across your webpage and would like to obtain more information about your products. We are currently looking to expand our assortment for retail to potato products like croquets and similar. As you mentioned that you have a selected range of in-house brands, maybe you have a catalog to share it? Also allow me to provide a brief about ICECO Trade. Our company is part of the ICECO group of companies, which includes an ice cream factory and a fish production factory. Sending a short introduction presentation to our company. In addition to our production facilities, we also collaborate with partner companies from Europe, representing (distributing) their products in the Baltic countries (Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia) with ICECO Trade team. As a producer’s origin, ICECO group of companies has established strong contacts and trust with major retail chains in our region, allowing us to effectively distribute not only our fish and ice cream products, but including our partners brands we represent. Furthermore, we have a very strong presence in the traditional trade market (TT) in Lithuania, with more than 800 clients. Thank you for your time, and I look forward to your response. Pagarbiai /

Subject: Visit Report - Asda Cheesy Mash 1st Production
TextBody: Hi Marlies, Thank you for your time and hospitality during last week’s 1st production visit for Asda Cheesy Mash. Please also pass on our thanks to Fien. Please find attached my visit report. All the actions raised and discussed are detailed in the report, some of which are already marked as completed. Please can you come back to me on the outstanding points and confirm the actions that will be taken to address the areas for improvement observed during the factory tour? Please come back to me on these points by Friday 27th September at the latest. Please let me know if you have any questions, or if there are any points noted within the report that you wish to discuss further. Many thanks, Dan

Subject: WE ARE INTERESTED TO PURCHASE / IMPORT / DISTRIBUTE YOUR PRODUCTS
TextBody: Dear Sir / Mr. / Mrs, Hope this mail meets you well and in good condition. How are you today and i hope everything is going well at your side too ?? Our company "(GROUP INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS TRADE)" is a legally registered company under the trade approved license of the Benin Chamber of Commerce and industry. We are also a well established company here in Benin republic and we are engaged in the legal importation and authorized distribution of General Commerce Goods and Products within the business / trade territories of Benin republic and other related west African countries where we already have our distribution networks and our legal trade channels in the west African regions. We got your company trade details through our trade sourcing agent as one of the reliable exporter and reputable supplier from your region and presently we are looking forward to build and to establish a very strong, much beneficial and much more profitable and continuous business co-operation with a reliable manufacturers, exporters or suppliers of FOOD & FOOD PRODUCTS, BEVERAGES PRODUCTS, CONFECTIONERY PRODUCTS, DIARY PRODUCTS, HEALTH & WELLNESS PRODUCTS, PHARMA & HERBAL PRODUCTS, ORGANIC & BIO-ORGANIC PRODUCTS, AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTS AND OTHER RELATED PRODUCTS and we are contacting you now, because we strongly believe to work directly with you and as we sincerely trust that your company is competent enough to handle the continuous supplies of your available PRODUCTS OFFER to my company for our continuous purchase, for our continuous importation and also for our continuous distribution of your products into our country here in Benin and also to other related west African countries in good fate and on a regular basis. Meanwhile, it is in your position as the products manufacturer / supplier to give us the list of your AVAILABLE PRODUCTS OFFER and also give us the CURRENT PRICE QUOTATION of your available products for our quick review and for our quick evaluation of your products prices with my company's board of directors and falso or our immediate order placement proceedings. Therefore, it is very much important for you to give us the list of your AVAILABLE PRODUCTS OFFER and also give us the CURRENT PRICE QUOTATION of your available PRODUCTS OFFER for our quick review and our quick evaluation of your PRODUCTS PRICES and also to enable us to proceed ahead further with our order placement and total order quantity demands for your products accordingly. We hope to receive your response and your comments as soon as possible about our request, and because we strongly believe that your products will SALE VERY GREATLY here in our country and other related west African countries where we have our distribution networks and we want to build a solid business relationship with your company. Thanks in advance as we look forward to your urgent and positive response for our future business establishment with our both companies. Regards Mr. Victor Uguru . (Director) Company: GROUP INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS TRADE Other Name: (Also Knows As) GROUP INTER SARL) Official Head Office Address:- Carre 61, Lot 486, Yagbe COTONOU - Benin Republic Direct Telephone Contact: +229 62349258 Direct E-mail: victor.uguru.ceo@gmail.com<mailto:victor.uguru.ceo@gmail.com> Other Email 2: contact.s.s.inter@gmail.com<mailto:contact.s.s.inter@gmail.com>

TextBody: Dear Supplier We are preparing some changes to below product/artwork(s). Please accept and confirm the assortment and time schedule. Products delivered in incorrect packaging to the countries, will result in a re-call of the products, at the supplier's expense. See attached file. Please make sure to fill in "Estimated first loading (week)" (Yellow column) before deadline 09/09/2024. skin on 500 gram 7340191164802 37340191164803 7340191164802 37340191164803 4 2024-51 Product update CT140610 Process and timing: See attached process flow and pay attention to deadlines to avoid delay in the artwork process and ultimately the launch date. 1-2 weeks ahead of planned final artwork our Labeling department will send a PDF draft of the artwork for supplier proof. We expect there will be no furher changes from your side after the supplier proof. After receiving the final artwork (printable file) from our Graphic department, return a PDF file from your printer for our approval. Subject: Palaikymo akcijos RIMI preliminarūs užsakymai/RIMI promotional sales preliminary orders
TextBody: Šis elektroninis laiškas išsiųstas automatiškai Laba diena, Siunčiame artėjančios mėnesio arba savaitinės akcijos preliminarius Jūsų tiekiamų prekių UAB "RIMI Lietuva" užsakymų kiekius. Atkreipkite dėmesį: "m_" - reiškia mėnesio akciją "w_" - reiškia savaitės akciją Norime pabrėžti, kad tai nėra šalių sutartas kiekis, o informacinio pobūdžio prognozė skirta planuoti gamybinius ar tiekimo pajėgumus. Visą detalią informaciją apie numatomus pardavimus akcijos metu rasite prisegtuke. Tikimės, kad ši informacija padės Jums teisingai suplanuoti išvežimus ir taip užtikrinsime aukščiausią prekių prieinamumo lygį pirkėjams (On shelf availability). Jeigu manote, kad negalėsite užtikrinti šio kiekio prašome atsakyti į laišką nurodant tikslią prekę, numatomą kiekį ir priežastį, kad galėtume bendradarbiaudami rasti tinkamiausią sprendimą. Jei manote, kad galėsite užtikrinti nurodytą kiekį, atsakyme parašykite "Sutinkame". RIMI Lietuva Tiekimo skyrius ------------------------------------------------------------ This email was generated automatically Good day, UAB "RIMI Lietuva" would like to inform you about preliminary quantities for campaign deliveries. Please, note that these quantities are not binding or agreed between the parties, this is only an informative forecast, to help you with planning production and supply capability. You can find all the details about expected sales during the campaign in the attached PDF document. We hope that this information will help you to plan and to ensure the highest level of availability of goods to our customers (on shelf availability). Please note that: "m_" - means monthly promotion "w_" - means weekly promotion If you feel that you will not be able to deliver the forecasted quantities, please respond to this letter stating the expected possible delivery and the reason for not being able to fulfill the requested quantities, so that we can find the best solution for collaboration. If you feel that you are able to ensure the delivery of the forecasted quantity, simply reply to this email with the text: AGREE RIMI Lietuva Supply Chain Department PRIVACY NOTICE: Your privacy is important for us at RIMI. We are transparent with how we collect and process any personal data that you share with us. More detailed information on how we process your personal data can be found at Privacy section in RIMI’s home page. Latvia <https://www.rimi.lv/privatuma-politika> Lithuania<https://www.rimi.lt/privatumo-politika> Estonia <https://www.rimi.ee/privaatsuspoliitika> ATTENTION: This e-mail may contain confidential information that is intended solely for the addressee. If you are not the intended recipient, you should delete this message and are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, or distribution of this message, or the taking of any action based on it, is strictly prohibited.

Subject: Referenz #GeVo2003844088: Anliegen-Nr.: 2003838898, [ Beschwerde ] GUT&GÜNSTIG, GUT&GÜNSTIG Rösti-Ecken 750g, Agristo NV, 18.6.2026, LOT D02524171 19:41,
TextBody: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, vielen Dank, dass Sie uns auf diese Angelegenheit aufmerksam gemacht haben. Wir haben ihn umgehend in unserem System unter der Ticketnummer 46662 registriert. Es tut uns leid zu hören, dass Ihr Kunde mit der Qualität dieser Charge nicht zufrieden war. Die Qualität unserer Produkte ist für uns von größter Bedeutung, und wir bemühen uns, diese Angelegenheit zu klären. Informationen zur Charge: Chargencode : D02524171 19:41 Produktionstag : 19/6/2024 Es besteht ein vollständiges Qualitätssicherungssystem, und die Grundsätze des HACCP-Konzepts werden angewandt. Dazu gehört ein umfassendes Überwachungssystem für die Produktionslinie. Die fertigen Produkte selbst werden alle 60 Minuten beprobt und auf ihre Qualität, einschließlich der Konsistenz, untersucht. Über diese und alle anderen Kontrollen werden vollständige Aufzeichnungen geführt. Auf der Grundlage des Chargencodes haben wir eine gründliche Untersuchung unserer Produktionsaufzeichnungen und Qualitätsdokumente für diese spezielle Charge durchgeführt. Es wurden keine Bemerkungen zur Textur gemacht. Die stündlichen Kontrollen waren in Ordnung. Außerdem wurden die empfohlenen Kochanleitungen für jedes Produkt nach umfangreichen Untersuchungen und Tests sorgfältig erstellt. Je nach verwendetem Gerät und Einstellungen kann das Ergebnis jedoch unterschiedlich ausfallen. Wir entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten, die Ihnen möglicherweise entstanden sind. Sollten Sie weitere Bedenken haben, zögern Sie bitte nicht, uns erneut zu kontaktieren. Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Jana Vandewalle Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 53 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Journey of Flavors with Natural Seasonings from Türkiye
TextBody: Dear Authorities, We supply our customers with high-quality and reliable products in international markets under competitive terms, and we continuously strive for 100% customer satisfaction. You can find high-quality, healthy, and fresh products from the groups listed below, sourced from Türkiye for your esteemed company. Our product groups: 1. Herbs: Laurel, oregano, sage, rosemary, thyme, savory, parsley, basil, spearmint, peppermint, marjoram 2. Seeds: Cumin, aniseed, coriander, fennel, blue poppy 3. Specialties: Bouquet-garni, thyme on branch, saffron, sumac, Aleppo/Maraş pepper, isot/Urfa pepper, paprika, bird’s eye chili, chili rings, chili pepper, juniper berries, cinnamon sticks, cloves, nutmeg, star aniseed, long pepper, timut pepper, cubeb pepper 4. Blends: Herbes de Provence, Italian seasoning, curry mix, garlic salt mix, pepper salt mix 5. Oils: Oregano oil, laurel leaf oil We would be glad to start a collaboration and establish a strong business relationship with you. Please feel free to request any products you need and do not hesitate to contact us with any questions or for price inquiries.

Subject: FB in potato bag
TextBody: Hi Dorothee, Hope you are well. Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 47596. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : D06 24 237 23:18 Packing day : 24/08/2024 We can identify this dark blue plastic as part of our production equipment. We have already completed a detailed interim investigation as we had spotted and isolated stock when we were notified of the damage (it has come from a conveyor that was damaged and is checked weekly as part of regular factory machinery checks). However this piece has clearly come from stock that was beyond the time zone that was isolated. We believed we had isolated the stock, so this should not be widespread. Also, viewing the size and color of the foreign object, this is clearly visible and thus does not pose any danger with regards to food safety. I can confirm that all necessary repairs have been carried out, so we can rule out that this will happen again. We sincerely apologize for this incident and remain at your disposal for any further information.

Subject: Parsnips - Crop / Harvest Summary
TextBody: Good afternoon, We have had some questions from our retail customers around parsnips and wondered if you could provide me with a comprehensive overview of the parsnip season please – what are the key timings of the season (when planted, when harvested, and when the switch between old/new season typically happens), what the current parsnip season is looking like based on recent weather conditions (parsnip quality, size etc), and any specific concerns or challenges around the parsnip crop? It would be greatly appreciated if you could come back to me on this by midday tomorrow. Apologies for the short notice. Many thanks Dan

Stay safe, be blessed.

Just a reminder to remove any mention of Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

Subject: Profitable Partnership
TextBody: Hello I know it's an unconventional way of reaching out to you but it's for a good cause. I'm Donald, a Research Assistant of the Research and Development Department working at one of the leading Bio Pharmaceutical Companies here in England. I'm looking for a reliable business person in your region to represent my company in sourcing some of our basic raw material used in the manufacturing of high quality Anti-Viral Vaccines, Cancer treatment and other lifesaving Pharmaceutical Products. This may not be your area of specialization but it will be another income generating business out of your specialty. This is because Our company is yet to locate any seller to buy from, however, I have been able to discover a local dealer who can supply us with this product. He is selling at a cheap rate , which is far cheaper than our previous purchases. I will give you more specific profit details when I receive feedback from you if you are interested.

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 04.09.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 04.09.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Therefore, they judged frozen. I’ll notice you if additional information available. 小田 隆史 (TAKAFUMI ODA) ┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏┏ 株式会社神戸物産 KOBE BUSSAN CO.,LTD. Subject: Carton quality SC41213
TextBody: Hi Ashley, Sorry to hear there is still an issue with the boxes. This order has indeed been produced with our strongest box UBX 250 EB. According to Michelle this is the thickest boxes we currently have available to us. Maybe adding foil around the stacked boxes will help to keep them upright when stacking them. We will check internally if there is something else we could do to improve on the quality of the boxes to suit the moist Taiwanese climate, but on the short term I'm afraid we are out of options regarding the boxes being used.

Subject: Anuga 2025: Secure Your Hotel Accommodation Today!
TextBody: Dear Exhibitors, Are you still looking for hotel rooms for Anuga in Cologne? We offer a selection of 2- to 5-star hotels with excellent service. Here are some of our offers: 1. Pullman Hotel Cologne **** - Address: Helenenstraße 14, 50667 Cologne - Price: - €469.00 per Superior room per night including breakfast (single occupancy) - €489.00 per Superior room per night including breakfast (double occupancy) - €509.00 per Deluxe room per night including breakfast (single occupancy) - €540.00 per Deluxe room per night including breakfast (double occupancy) - Public transportation: 21 minutes to the fair with tram line 9 - Direct connection - 3 stops to the fair 2. B&B Hotel Cologne City ** - Address: Barbarossaplatz 4A, 50674 Cologne - Price: - €339.00 per single room per night including breakfast - €359.00 per double room per night including breakfast (double occupancy) - Public transportation: 32 minutes to the fair with tram line 1 - Direct connection - 8 stops to the fair 3. B&B Hotel Cologne Ehrenfeld ** - Address: Venloer Str. 385, 50825 Cologne - Price: - €339.00 per single room per night including breakfast - €359.00 per double room per night including breakfast (double occupancy) - Public transportation: 26 minutes to the fair with the S-Bahn - Direct connection - 4 stops to the fair 4. B&B Hotel Cologne West ** - Address: Max-Planck-Straße 46, 50858 Cologne - Price: - €292.00 per single room per night including breakfast - €304.00 per double room per night including breakfast (double occupancy) - €326.00 per twin room per night including breakfast (double occupancy) - Public transportation: 53 minutes by public transport - By car: 21 minutes 5. Delta Hotel by Marriott Leverkusen **** - Address: Am Büchelter Hof 11, 51373 Leverkusen - Price: - €428.00 per Delta Classic per night including breakfast (single occupancy) - €458.00 per Delta Classic per night including breakfast (double occupancy) - Public transportation: 28 minutes to the fair by train - Direct connection - 2 stops to the fair For a customized offer and further details, please contact us. We look forward to your inquiry! Mit freundlichen Gruessen | With

Subject: Packing list / customs 4800056467
TextBody: Good morning Samuel, Order 4800056467 has been loaded in Nazareth. Please find the packing list attached. Please inform me when the customs are arrange, so that I can release the truck and papers. Just for your information, the truck arrived 08:16. The appointment was booked at 13:00, so almost 5 hours to early. My colleagues in Nazareth loaded him, because they had time left. But this will not be possible everytime. Please inform the haulier, that this is more the exception than the rule.

Subject: New Foodstuffs Order 05.09
TextBody: Hi Grace, I have been informed by production that we had a bad run on the mash line and we have the below shortages for Foodstuffs: 4901000430: 1 pallet of mash short - can we replace with 1 pallet of plain gratin/spinach gratin instead? We could raise order 4901003727 (see below) with one pallet of mash and lower the gratin SKU so that the numbers of pallets ordered on each SKU remain the same. 4901003727: new cargo ready will be 04/11 instead of 21/10. Production is in week 43, but we require 1 week extra for the lab tests, so loading is only possible as of week 45. I have asked production planning if we can have an earlier solution, but I doubt this will be possible for mashed potatoes. Please let me know how to update order 490100430 and if they want to balance order 4901003727. I'll inform Embassy Freight about the new cargo ready for 490100430. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Subject: POTATO FLAKES BIG BAG CLAIM - PROMOLAC
TextBody: Good morning to all, We have found a big bag with a finer/smaller flakes size than other big bags delivered. Please see attached photos. This means that it cannot be packaged by machine as usual. It has been necessary to modify our entire process to be able to use it, with everything that entails, more time, people ... The affected batch is: HB1 24115 05:46. Please review what may have happened and give us quick response and any compensation that you consider. Many thanks, Esther Soler Compres ATENCIÓ: Recordin reservar hora de descarrega per 10 o mes palets amb un mínim de 24h. d'antel.lació. ATENCIÓN: Recuerden reservar hora de descarga para 10 o más palets con un minimo de 24h de antelación. ATTENTION: Remmember to book unloading slot for 10 or more pallets with 24h in advance. [cid:image001.png@01DAFF70.DFAB3390] Pol. Ind. Qualsevol revelació, ús o reenviament no autoritzat, complet o en part, està prohibit. Si ha rebut aquest missatge per equivocació, notifiqui-ho immediatament a la persona que ho ha enviat i esborri el missatge original juntament amb els seus fitxers annexos sense llegir-lo ni gravar-lo, total o parcialment. Este mensaje electrónico está dirigido únicamente a la(s) dirección(es) indicadas anteriormente; el carácter confidencial, personal e intransferible del mismo está protegido legalmente. Gracias."
