Subject: POTATO FLAKES BIG BAG CLAIM - PROMOLAC
TextBody: 96 Agristo Agristo | 5/09/2024 Dear, Thank you for informing us about the below issue. Your complaint has been registered in our system as ticket: 00047793. To ensure efficient communication, kindly use this email thread for further correspondence regarding this matter.

Subject: About changing destination
TextBody: Dear Pieter san, Good morning! This request is not confirmed by our customer yet but is it possible to change POD of following 2 orders from OSAKA➡HAKATA at this timing?? If we could change, let me know the POD adjustment cost too? 12140594xx23 Osaka➡Hakata 12140605xx23 Osaka➡Hakata

Subject: Rappel : NOUVELLE COMMANDE OA 1026992 // CDE 1015655
TextBody: Naema LATCHIMY souhaite rappeler le message « NOUVELLE COMMANDE OA 1026992 // CDE 1015655 ». ----------------------------- Disclaimer ------------------------------ --- Ce message ainsi que les éventuelles pièces jointes constituent une correspondance privée et confidentielle à l'attention exclusive du destinataire désigné ci-dessus. Si vous n'êtes pas le destinataire du présent message ou une personne susceptible de pouvoir le lui délivrer, il vous est signifié que toute divulgation, distribution ou copie, totale ou partielle, sur un quelconque support de cette transmission est strictement interdite. Si vous avez recu ce message par erreur, nous vous remercions d'en informer l'expéditeur par téléphone ou de lui retourner le présent message, puis d'effacer immédiatement ce message de votre systeme. Tout message électronique est susceptible d'altération. Le "groupement des Mousquetaires" décline toute responsabilité au titre de ce message s'il a été altéré, déformé ou falsifié.--- --- This e-mail and any attachments is a confidential correspondence intended only for use of the individual or entity named above. If you are not the intended recipient or the agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, distribution or copying, either whole or partial, in any medium of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication by mistake, please notify the sender by phone or by replying this message, and then delete this message from your system. E-mails are susceptible of alteration. The "Mousquetaires' group" shall not therefore be liable for the message if altered, changed or falsified.--- -----------------------------------------------------------------------

Subject: New 2 stop PO's - Aug 29
TextBody: Hi Catherine Thank you for the extensive overview. I have adapted the PO's where necessary. For some PO's the loading sequence didn't come through at all, for others they all came through on loading sequence '1'. Very strange because I suppose all orders are send through the same way Only these 3 PO's: 759718 - 759719 - 759720 are not (yet) in our system I'll check again later today because sometimes, they need a bit of extra time. I'll let you know if they haven't come through yet by this afternoon.

Subject: PO 758734: loaded with 1 pal less
TextBody: Good morning Catherine I hope you are doing well. I wanted to notify you that PO 758734 for Restaurant Depot was loaded with 1 pal of 307227 BIG Z09 2,27 1 C80V2 ( BIG C - CLEAR COATED FRENCH FRIES) less. There was an issue with the crane which got the pallet stuck and prevented it from being loaded. I do apologize for the incovenience! Do let me know if you have any additional questions or remarks on this,

Subject: Technical Visit/Training with Agristo
TextBody: Dear Maries, I hope this message finds you well. As we discussed earlier, we have been discussing internally and would like to arrange a technical session with Agristo focused on our French Fries products. Our objective is to conduct a comprehensive technical analysis of our products, aligning our knowledge with Agristo's expertise to ensure we are "speaking the same language" and fully aligned on technical specifications. Abrar (Sensory Specialist) and I (R&D), from BRF, plan to attend it and for this session, we have availability on the last week of September and/or the first week of October (because Abrar got just a month of visa). Could you please confirm if you and your technical team are available for this visit? As discussed, I added below a proposal agenda, but it is just to have an idea about our expectation, so we can arrange accordingly and together after session and date confirmation. Day 1: Theory and Process Overview * Session Overview: Introduction and objectives of the technical session. * Market Insights: Evolution of French fries in the global market, current trends, and consumer preferences. * Variety of Raw Materials: Types of potatoes used for French fries and their impact on texture, flavor, and cooking quality. * Processes: Cutting methods, sizes, blanching, pre-frying and battered processes. * Cooking Methods: Deep frying, air frying, and oven baking techniques. * Packaging: Materials and process. * Shelf life: Factors affecting shelf life and storage and shelf-life study. * Specifications: Creation and the rationale behind the attributes. * Defects: the most common defects on French fries, the way to avoid it and strategy to work on it. Day 2: Factory Visit and Evaluation * Factory Tour: Observation of equipment and technology used and the real life of the process and check the technical process to release production. * Product Evaluation: Sensory and technical assessment of our French fries SKUs, comparing them to our specifications (deep dive on the methods of evaluation and parameters). Day 3: Continued Evaluation * Detailed Analysis: Continued sensory and technical evaluation of our French Fries SKUs, checking all parameters as per our specifications. * Innovation: Agristo can show us the new products available. * Conclusion: Discuss about the session and feedback. Please, let us know your availability and if there are any adjustments or additional details required. Looking forward to your response.

Click on the link to open the communication: https://sim-info.com/sim/communication/details.aspx?id=58529&hk=27CE5AA82E8AA0D62900373A86F6682B42F2E349 Created by: Productspecificaties Sophie Status: Open Subject: Productspecification check 5-9-2024 11:57:47 Productspecificaties Sophie Dear Supplier, You are invited to update the product specifications below. The status of the specifications has been changed to ‘re-check by supplier’. As the product specifications are part of the purchase agreement, they must be entered before delivery to Jumbo Supermarkets takes place. Please fully check the accuracy of the specifications. If changes are necessary, please e-mail the agency to whom Jumbo has outsourced the specification check. The agency in question can be found at the page general in the field “responsible contact person PM”. For changes in the packaging specifications, please send an email to jumbo@volkers.nl. In case the data are still up to date, you can make a comment in the specification that all data are still correct. Then, you can submit the specification by changing the status to “in revision by client”. In order to avoid delays later in the private label process, the deadline for completion of the entire SIM process is 22 working days (in case of more than 5 specifications, then 27 working days). Please note, this is the deadline for total completion of the specification. This term also includes your initial check of the specification, opening the relevant pages of the specification, the specification check of the agencies and any additions to the specification(s) as a result of this check. It is therefore of great importance that you check the accuracy of the specifications as soon as possible and undertake action in case necessary. You will soon be contacted by the agency to which Jumbo has outsourced the specifications control about the start of the SIM process. Each set of specifications comprises two parts, each with a separate status: - Quality specification (tabs: supply chain to tasks) – Jumbo quality assurance department can be contacted at productspecificaties@jumbo.com - Packaging Specification (Printing Specifications tab) – Contact person: Verpakking printing, jumbo@volkers.nl The product specification(s) can be submitted for verification by changing the status of the quality specifications and/or packaging specifications to ‘in revision by client’. You can find the protocols that describe how to enter the specifications on the homepage, in the section 'Your Client’s Reference'.

I do really apologise for the inconvenience and can assure you this won't happen again. Subject: New communication from SIM Supplier Portal (Jumbo : Agristo NV) #ID-K4BDrs6b
TextBody: A new communication has been added to the SIM Supplier Portal. Click on the link to open the communication: https://sim-info.com/sim/communication/details.aspx?id=58529&hk=27CE5AA82E8AA0D62900373A86F6682B42F2E349 Created by: Productspecificaties Sophie Status: Open Subject: Productspecification check 5-9-2024 11:57:47 Productspecificaties Sophie Dear Supplier, You are invited to update the product specifications below. The status of the specifications has been changed to ‘re-check by supplier’. As the product specifications are part of the purchase agreement, they must be entered before delivery to Jumbo Supermarkets takes place. Please fully check the accuracy of the specifications. If changes are necessary, please e-mail the agency to whom Jumbo has outsourced the specification check. The agency in question can be found at the page general in the field “responsible contact person PM”. For changes in the packaging specifications, please send an email to jumbo@volkers.nl. In case the data are still up to date, you can make a comment in the specification that all data are still correct. Then, you can submit the specification by changing the status to “in revision by client”. In order to avoid delays later in the private label process, the deadline for completion of the entire SIM process is 22 working days (in case of more than 5 specifications, then 27 working days). Please note, this is the deadline for total completion of the specification. This term also includes your initial check of the specification, opening the relevant pages of the specification, the specification check of the agencies and any additions to the specification(s) as a result of this check. It is therefore of great importance that you check the accuracy of the specifications as soon as possible and undertake action in case necessary. You will soon be contacted by the agency to which Jumbo has outsourced the specifications control about the start of the SIM process. Each set of specifications comprises two parts, each with a separate status: - Quality specification (tabs: supply chain to tasks) – Jumbo quality assurance department can be contacted at productspecificaties@jumbo.com - Packaging Specification (Printing Specifications tab) – Contact person: Verpakking printing, jumbo@volkers.nl The product specification(s) can be submitted for verification by changing the status of the quality specifications and/or packaging specifications to ‘in revision by client’. You can find the protocols that describe how to enter the specifications on the homepage, in the section 'Your Client’s Reference'.

Subject: FP049527
TextBody: Hi Steve, I hope you are well. Concerning the VG0045 on this order, Due to particulars with it being the first packing run of this bag size we ran two pallets short for this order. Due to the delay caused by this problem Flanders have advised they will need to deliver the stock they have loaded on Saturday morning. Will you have enough stock for your own production or do you need the stock to be sent to you asap? Please let me know what i can do to help. I do really apologise for the inconvenience and can assure you this won't happen again. Many thanks, Beau Beau Taylor Customer Service Agristo P +441 244 562 128 thread::RU1gss9SHNyzPMv3EmgBonQ::

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Si no desea seguir recibiendo comunicaciones a través de esta vía o si desea ejercitar sus derechos de acceso, rectificación, puede hacerlo enviando una solicitud a la dirección de correo emisora indicando en el asunto “Protección de datos”. Los datos personales se conservarán los plazos necesarios y/o mientras mantenga su consentimiento. La legitimación del tratamiento de los datos personales se basa en el cumplimiento de obligaciones legales contractuales o en el consentimiento dado para hacerlo. Subject: Center Leclerc Gaillot Distribution B2B COOPERATION...
TextBody: Dear Madam/Sir, Center Leclerc Gaillot Distribution is a distributor and hypermarket of the group E LECLERC www.e-leclerc.com<https://deref-mail.com/mail/client/vAmaXmw9Ijk/dereferrer/?redirectUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.e-leclerc.com> Established in SAINT-PRIEST (69800). Centre Leclerc GAILLOT DISTRIBUTION, is a simplified joint stock company, we have been in business for 46 years. Based in SAINT-PRIEST (69800). After consulting the profile and the products of your company, in which we are really very interested with the intention of introducing them to our stores in order to establish a long fruitful business cooperation in a mutual commitment. Could you send us your catalogue and price list in order to specify which ones we would need first. We are expected to have a long term business relationship as a large hypermarket chain to put you in our book as a benchmark supplier. We would like to know more about your company. Pending a favourable response. We thank you in advance.

Subject: Pricelist Sep-Nov
TextBody: Dear Zaur, Thanks for catching up this week. As explained the new early crop potatoes are currently in our favor. They are coming it at good availability and quality. We can transfer this benefit to you and reduce our prices for September-November loadings. The main crop will be harvested in October/November, so by that time we will know the final yield for the new season and the next pricing. We need a few more weeks of good mix between sunshine and rain. @Alexia Lacombe <mailto:Alexia.Lacombe@agristo.com> can you apply the new pricing already for all orders to be shipped in September please? Thank you. We look forward to grow the business with you Zaur!

Subject: Purchase Order No PUR976112 from JJ Food Service Limited
TextBody: Please find attached our purchase order PUR976112 . The purchase order can be confirmed by clicking on the following link and using the below details. Please be aware that the Vendor Self Service Portal (VSS) is not compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) or older versions. You will need to use an up-to-date browser to use our portal such as Chrome, Safari, Edge and Firefox. https://vss.jjfoodservice.com/login/PUR976112/860197 Purchase order : PUR976112 PIN: 860197 Please be aware that Fraudsters are using the name JJ Food Service to fraudulently source goods.Suppliers to JJ Food Service be especially aware. * JJ Food Service will never order goods without a period of negotiation and a formal trading agreement would be issued requiring you to supply product details etc. * Never send goods if the address is different to our published distribution sites. * Only dispatch upon receipt of a formal order and be aware that we do not collect our orders from your premises. * Only dispatch if formal confirmation of your order is sent, after using the recognised booking-in procedure, which will be given to you via the JJ Purchasing team. If in any doubt please bring to our urgent attention. Contact: 00 44 1992 701710 P.S. To open the attached file, Adobe Acrobat Reader version 7 or greater must be installed on the system. Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: Agristo - loss of credit insurance
TextBody: Dear Liesbeth, Kindly take note that the payment delay is due to issue from your side in which Agristo also has taken longer time to revert and update us on the status even though several reminders have been sent. We unable to proceed for the payment until your team provide clear clarification to us. In addition, this matter has been clearly mentioned by my colleague in attached email. And again, no reply from your side. Therefore, we unable to accept on the payment terms. Thank you, Nana From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: Thursday, September 5, 2024 8:17 PM To: Siti Nasiha Sakina binti Zainal Abidin <sakina.zainal@mamee.com.my>; Azimah Binti Basiran <azimah.basiran@mamee.com.my> Cc: jona.franco@agristo.com Subject: Agristo - loss of credit insurance Good aftternoon I'm sorry to inform you that, since our invoices 90591160 and 90597913 were paid with too long delay, we lost credit insurance on your company. For future orders the payment terms will have to be prepayment.

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: Thursday, September 5, 2024 2:17 PM To: Brown, Amy <Amy.Brown@nomadfoods.com>; Lewis, Katie <Katie.Lewis@nomadfoods.com>; Coggin, Vikki <Vikki.Coggin@nomadfoods.com>; Linwood, Mark <mark.linwood@nomadfoods.com> Subject: Birds Eye UK / Ireland outer cases CAUTION: This email originated from outside our organisation. Do not open attachments or click links, unless this email comes from a known sender and you know the content is safe. Hi all, As agreed during our call, I send you enclosed an overview of all articles that go both to Birds Eye UK and to Birds Eye Ireland (in 2024 YTD). By clicking on the followig link, you can download the PDF of the artwork of the outer box of these articles: https://we.tl/t-JTcowMGEnq<https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwe.tl%2ft-JTcowMGEnq&c=E,1,_C62FTmLz_-kv1guIpkRBPKRgTsbTTjm5mqsrYOASePE-rz4QCbA8Qo2sQS9IlP-ZKvhyDcrKsJMcozeocsXD25J1t9y6HrgLlosXIgku8jCuBstkxa1&typo=1> After checking myself, I see that on some boxes both the UK and Ireland codes are mentioned, whereas on others, it is only the UK code that is mentioned. I have highlighted the code(s) that is (are) mentioned on each box in green on the article overview enclosed. If there is anything else I can do to help you out, let me know.

If in any doubt please bring to our urgent attention. Contact: 00 44 1992 701710 P.S. To open the attached file, Adobe Acrobat Reader version 7 or greater must be installed on the system. Subject: New Coles Orders 04.09
TextBody: Hi Craig, Grace, I have just discussed this with Melissa and we will not be able to follow this request from Coles. For September we had a Forecast of 60 tons and we have received orders for 194 tons... That's just not possible unfortunately. Our mash lines are already full, so taking this additional volume in such short notice is not possible. And even if we would have the capacity, we don't understand the strategy behind this ordering. A pipefill does not make sence (as you said yourself) as we have been supplying this product already, it's just branded differently... We will have to spread out the newly received orders until October, maybe even November... I have now updated the 4 new orders as below, but still under caution. Any new orders for the mash will have to be for November... No more orders for September nor October can be accepted for the mash. Sales document Customer Reference Name of the ship-to party Required Deliv. Date 476322 44807673 GROCERY HOLDINGS PTY LTD 23/09/2024 476319 44848929 GROCERY HOLDINGS PTY LTD 7/10/2024 476320 44790576 GROCERY HOLDINGS PTY LTD 7/10/2024 476321 44807638 GROCERY HOLDINGS PTY LTD 7/10/2024 Please make sure that both Coles and Ceva are informed.

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: MERCADONA: qtty per pallet differences
TextBody: Hello, Felien is currently enjoying some vacation, but I would be glad to assist you further. Do I understand it correctly, that when receiving the 'Batas em cubos' the lower layer of the pallet contained some Sweet Potato boxes? Would you be able to share some additional data such as lotcode or order number? As based on this information only, I am not able to investigate what would possibly have gone wrong. Thank you in advance, and already our apologies. Michèle Vandenbroucke Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Claims [claims@agristo.com] Sent: 3/09/2024 09:09 To: gggasca@mercadona.es Subject: Agristo | Your complaint has been registered (00047143) Agristo | 3/09/2024 Dear, Thank you for informing us about the below issue. Your complaint has been registered in our system as ticket: 00047143. To ensure efficient communication, kindly use this email thread for further correspondence regarding this matter.

Subject: Harvest Fine Foods Ltd - Vat Number Change
TextBody: 05/09/24 To All Valued Suppliers, Subject: Change of VAT Number We hope this letter finds you well. We are writing to inform you of a change in our VAT number, effective immediately. Please update your records accordingly to ensure accurate processing of invoices and payments. New VAT Number: 643 9946 92 Old VAT Number: 423 5491 60 We kindly ask that all future invoices and documents reflect this updated VAT number. Additionally, please ensure that our business delivery address is correct in your records: Harvest Fine Foods Ltd Units 6-9 Brunel Road, South Hampshire Industrial Park, Totton, Southampton, SO40 3SA If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us by replying to this email. Thank you for your attention to this matter and for your continued partnership. Yours faithfully, Phoebe Monk Finance Manager Harvest Fine Foods Ltd ________________________________ Harvest Units 6-9 South Hampshire Industrial Park, Brunel Road, Totton, Southampton SO40 3SA Co reg Number: 04153804, VAT Number 643 9946 92, Registered Office: 814 Leigh Road, Slough, England, SL1 4BD General Disclaimer: This e-mail is for the use of the intended recipient(s) only. If you have received this e-mail in error, please notify the sender immediately and then delete it. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not use or disclose or distribute this e-mail without the author's prior consent. We have taken precautions to minimise the risk of transmitting software viruses but we advise you to carry out your own virus checks on any attachment to this message. We cannot accept liability for any loss or damage caused by software viruses. Product Information Disclaimer: As a supplier of manufactured goods, we can only guarantee to pass on product nutritional and allergen data received by us from the manufacturer or supplier. Whilst every effort is made to keep the product information accurate and up to date, please be aware that product manufacturers are constantly changing recipes and this information may take some time to be reflected on the website. The information provided by Harvest Fine Foods is a guide but we advise you to always read the labels regularly and you must check for updates on our online ordering system.

TextBody: See you in Nov 18-20, Shanghai If you cannot read this e-mail properly, please click here. Website News >Visitor Pre-reg< Booth Application swop 2024 Innovative Packaging Navigation: Unveiling a Unique "Buyer-Centric" Approach to Visiting and Procurement 【swop 2024】 Premiering: A Revolutionary Sourcing Experience! Addressing packaging buyers' pain points with innovative solutions in equipment, materials, and finished products. - Pre-Reg Now - 01│ Packaging Container and Utensil Production Navigation Zeroing in on cutting-edge packaging equipment, premium packaging materials, and groundbreaking technologies One-stop showcase: Production equipment for packaging containers - bottles, cups, pouches, boxes, and more • Plastic Packaging / Container Production Equipment Zone • Automated Hard Plastic Packaging Integrated Solution Showcase • Paper-Plastic Utensil Production Equipment Collection Notable Exhibitors include: HAITIAN, Chen Hsong, FCS, LISONG, JWELL, LIUZHOU JINGYE, HUAYAN, ONGO, YUMING, MALEX, ZHENGXIN, Beiguo, ZHONGFENG, FEIJIANG, JOYREAP, LONGER and many more. Hot Packaging Materials Showcase: Featuring a wide range of eco-friendly and functional packaging materials, including: #Bioplastics #RecycledPlastics #Degradable #NewMaterials #HeatResistant #HighStrength #PaperPlastic and more Notable Exhibitors include: HOME-LINK, Hua Wei, Royal, JEA, Yu Ming Jie, PULAIKE HONGMEI, MALION, REO-ECO, ICOLOR, Biopoly, Shangaosen, YICAIHONGXIANG, nuochenmtec, Jinke, Yongteng, Changhong and more Following event will be held concurrently: “Focusing on Material Innovation, Collaborating on Green Packaging - Advanced Packaging Materials Launch Conference for the Plastics Industry” SGS Experts x EU《Packaging and Packaging Waste Regulation》 Boosting Product Competitiveness through Cutting-Edge Technologies Shaping the Future of Sustainable Packaging Comprehensive Guide to Global Market Expansion for Businesses － Pre-register Now－ 02│ Digital, Intelligent & Automated Packaging Line Solutions Roadmap Targeting Pain Points in Primary and Secondary Automation Targeting the pain points of intelligent primary and secondary packaging production for buyers, swop 2024 presents the "Digital + Intelligent Automated Packaging Line Navigation"! Discover solutions for highly efficient automation, lightweight flexibility, and precise intelligent production scheduling. • Difficulties in tracing product production, transportation, and supply chain? • Challenges in real-time monitoring of packaging integrity • Need to improve packaging efficiency? And 7 other major pain points... Notable Exhibitors include: Youngsun, Hualian, WUHAN RENTIAN, ZHONG YA, Eiahe, brother, GURKI, SDWPackaging, XINGLU, High Dream, YUEDONG, DONGPING JUNCHUAN, DAHE, DAJIANG, Soontrue, RESURE, Acepack, LITAI, BOHUI, HAOMINGDA and more. 03│Spotlight on Shelf-Dominating Packaging: Trends in Fast-Moving Consumer Goods Discover fresh elements to elevate your brand Introducing the Stunning New "FMCG Theme Pavilion"! Delve into cutting-edge packaging design concepts, focusing on key factors like user experience, visual appeal, and sustainability trends - all from the consumer's perspective. Specially Featuring 4 Major Special Lines: • Food and Beverage • Takeout and Restaurant • Cosmetics • Eco-Friendly Notable Exhibitors include: Xintianli, ZLONE, JINQIU, Kaida, WEIYA, YUEHUI, Senqi, Jielong, GOLDSTONE, TIMES, Daman, MINGFENG, TED, HUJIANG, Yongsheng, HAOYU, HUASHUO, RIZONE, wanqi, SHENZHIBAO, GREEN, ZHENGDEXIANG, Henglian, Supreme, JIXIANG, YNB, Sinhong, HUAZHI, GloryBest and more. － Get Your FREE TICKET Today－ Six Highlights Unveil the Grand Event, Showcasing Cutting-edge Technologies and Development Trends in the Packaging Industry ● New Tech, Energy Saving, Stable: Packaging Container / Utensil Production Line ● Digital + Intelligent: Automated Packaging Line ● Food Processing and Intelligent Manufacturing ● Green, Functional, Compliant: Packaging Materials Hub ● Design, Functions, ESG: FMGC Packaging Showcase ● Recyclable & Lightweight: FMCG E-Commerce Logistics Packaging Supporting Media More Media Partners Follow Us About swop 2024 swop 2024 will be held from November 18 to 20, 2024, at the Shanghai New International Expo Center. swop 2024 will cover end-use sectors including food, beverages, confectionery, baking, pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, non-food consumer goods, and industrial products. It aims to integrate the entire packaging industry chain from packaging machinery to packaging materials, and packaging printing to packaging design. As a member of the global leading packaging exhibition alliance, interpack, and as one of the influential exhibitions in the packaging industry, the Shanghai World of Packaging (swop) is dedicated to providing the packaging industry with a broad perspective and showcasing international trends in packaging. We aim to facilitate the practical application of innovative ideas and help packaging professionals become efficient practitioners. Messe Düsseldorf (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. Subject: Proposal for Cooperation in Supplying Qualified Personnel
TextBody: Good day. I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to propose a mutually beneficial cooperation between our companies. We specialize in providing highly qualified personnel across various industries, including construction, welding, manufacturing, agriculture, and other sectors where skilled labor is essential. Our Proposal: We can offer you a reliable and consistent supply of skilled workers tailored to your specific needs. Our extensive pool of professionals includes, but is not limited to: Construction Workers: From general laborers to specialized trades such as electricians, carpenters, and plumbers. Welders: Certified welders with experience in various techniques, ensuring high-quality results in any project. Industrial Workers: Qualified personnel for manufacturing and production lines, including machine operators and maintenance staff. Agricultural Workers: Skilled laborers for planting, harvesting, and other agricultural activities, ensuring efficiency and productivity. Why Choose Us? Quality Assurance: We thoroughly vet all candidates to ensure they meet the highest standards of skill and reliability. Flexibility: Whether you need temporary, seasonal, or permanent staff, we can provide the right solution to fit your needs. Efficiency: Our streamlined process allows for quick placement, minimizing any disruption to your operations. Next Steps: We would be delighted to discuss this proposal further and explore how we can best serve your staffing needs. I am available at your earliest convenience for a meeting or a call to discuss the specifics and tailor our services to your requirements. Thank you for considering this proposal. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you and contribute to the success of your business. You can contact us at +48797167193 email: welesasp.zo.o@gmail.com

Subject: FAQ on GACC Registration Number
TextBody: Hello, We have helped hundreds of oversea food manufacturers to complete GACC registration, but many enterprises still have questions regarding GACC registration, so we prepare a few frequently asked questions for your reference. 1, If we don’t have GACC registration number, can we export food products to China? A, No, you should have GACC number first, or China Customs will reject your shipment. 2, We have different manufacture plants, should we register one number or different numbers? A, Different numbers. Each plant should have their own specific number. 3, Can we add new products for GACC registration? A, Yes, if you have new products to China, you can add the products in the system. 4, If can modify company information after registration? A, Yes, but production site is relocated, the legal representative is changed, or the registration number granted by your country (region) is changed, you should apply a new registration number. 5, How long is the validity period of this registration number and if can renew? A, 5 years, the registration should be renewed in 3 - 6 month before expiration. If you have more questions, don’t hesitate to contact us. One-Stop Consultation has been dedicated to providing professional certification and registration consulting for more than 11 years and we have a professional team with good knowledge of Chinese registration and certification. We have already provided service to 1000+ domestic and overseas customers with success rate of 100%! Best wishes Jane Wang 北京环资伟业管理咨询有限公司 Beijing One-Stop Consultation Co., Ltd. 电话/Tel: 0086-13671359868 (同微信） WhatsApp: +86-17600330769 邮件/E-mail: info@onestop-consultation.com 网址/Website: www.onestop-consultation.com

Subject: Precisely Connect Quality Suppliers in Global Plastics & Rubber Network (Ref:202447962)
TextBody: If you cannot read this e-mail properly, please click here. 繁體中文 | 简体中文 In today’s globalized marketplace, connecting with overseas suppliers has never been easier. By leveraging the unique regional advantages of various markets, your business can discover cost-effective plastics and rubber technologies while gaining access to innovative solutions that align with the specific needs of your target markets. CPS+ eMarketplace facilitates these connections, empowering you to optimize your supply chain and enhance your competitive edge. Scroll down to see CPS+ eMarketplace's global industrial network. Latest Events See you in Taiwan! CPS+ eMarketplace will be joining TaipeiPLAS 2024 from September 24 to 28, 2024. We will bring you over 5,000 "Innovative Materials", "Advanced Manufacturing" and "Circular Economy" related technologies, and showcase our platform's global sourcing strengths and precise business matching services for you. Visit our booth N1030 on 4/F to experience and receive your FREE gift! Hosted by MATSUI MFG. CO., LTD., sponsored by The Association of Green Molding Solutions, and co-organized by Adsale Exhibition Services Co., Ltd., the Green Molding Webinar Week had invited 14 leading companies in the field of green molding to bring 24 inspiring webinars. From cutting-edge technology analysis to practical case studies, the webinar provided a multi-faceted examination of the key technologies for achieving green molding. Watch Webinar Replay Latest Cooperating Partners Click Here ＃China China Plastics Processing Industry Association (CPPIA) CPPIA is a nationwide, non-profit organization that represents the plastics processing industry in China. It is a voluntary association comprising enterprises, institutions, social groups, research institutes, universities, and individuals engaged in plastics processing and related industries. Click Here ＃India The Plastics Export Promotion Council (PLEXCONCIL) PLEXCONCIL is a non-profit organisation established by the Ministry of Commerce & Industry, Department of Commerce, Government of India in 1955. It was one of several Export Promotion Councils (EPCs) launched by the Government to project India's image abroad as a reliable supplier of high quality products in order to give a boost to the country’s exports. PLEXCONCIL is the apex body of the plastics industry in India and represents over 2,500 exporters who manufacture/trade in plastics products ranging from plastics raw materials to semi-finished and finished items. Click Here ＃Malaysia Plixstar Located in Malaysia, Plixstar is a one-stop solution for mid-tiers and SMEs, offering an online circular marketplace for sustainable materials supply and demand matchmaking. Through Plixstar, businesses can effortlessly connect with Malaysia’s suppliers or customers online, increasing the efficiency of their business matchmaking. Industry Analysis – Global Market Trends Italian Plastics Machinery Production Value Surges to Record in 2023 The overall performance of Italian plastics and rubber processing machinery manufacturers goes well in 2023. The machinery production value has likely reached a record high in exceeding 4.8 billion and at least 3% increase compared to 2022. Subject: interest in buying your product
TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: please confirm 2 more loads to Manzanillo for RJ Adams
TextBody: Dear Beau and Alexia, Can you please confirm for me 2 containers of 10/10 Kingdom of the Potato A grade fries on CIF Manzanillo: one to sail around October 3rd, the other to sail around October 17th. Give me little more time to work on the Veracruz loads, please. Thank you! Zaur From: Beau Declerck <Beau.Declerck@agristo.com> Sent: Thursday, September 5, 2024 2:00 AM To: Zaur Chinokaev <ZChinokaev@rjadams.com> Cc: Alexia Lacombe <Alexia.Lacombe@agristo.com> Subject: Pricelist Sep-Nov Dear Zaur, Thanks for catching up this week. As explained the new early crop potatoes are currently in our favor. They are coming it at good availability and quality. We can transfer this benefit to you and reduce our prices for September-November loadings. The main crop will be harvested in October/November, so by that time we will know the final yield for the new season and the next pricing. We need a few more weeks of good mix between sunshine and rain. @Alexia Lacombe <mailto:Alexia.Lacombe@agristo.com> can you apply the new pricing already for all orders to be shipped in September please? Thank you. We look forward to grow the business with you Zaur!

Subject: Offene Bestellung Agristo
TextBody: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, Sie befinden sich mit u. s. Aufträgen in Verzug! Wir erwarten hierzu bis heute 12:00 Uhr eine Stellungnahme und den Nachliefertermin. Die Rückmeldung ist in der angehängten Datei vorzunehmen (Spalte Y und Z) und an alle Personen im Verteiler zurück zu melden. Ebenso sind umgehend Maßnahmen zu ergreifen um eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung unserer Läger zukünftig sicherzustellen. Grundsätzlich möchten wir nochmals darauf hinweisen, dass wir auf eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung angewiesen sind, um den hohen Anspruch unserer Kunden gerecht zu werden. Die Bestellungen gehen mit entsprechendem Vorlauf bei Ihnen ein. Sollte es im Falle von höherer Gewalt zu Verschiebungen und / oder Kürzungen kommen, so haben die Nachlieferungen am nächsten Werktag zu erfolgen. Der Nachliefertermin ist mit der jeweiligen Disposition abzustimmen. Die Disposition als auch der Einkauf sind hierzu vorab proaktiv zu informieren. Mit freundlichen Grüßen Netto Marken-Discount Stiftung & Co. KG Industriepark Ponholz 1 93142 Maxhütte-Haidhof Lucas Konieczny Sachbearbeiter Einkauf TKK _____________________________________ Tel.: 09471 320-8429 Fax: 09471 320-6737 Mail: lucas.konieczny@netto-online.de<mailto:lucas.konieczny@netto-online.de> Internet: www.netto-online.de<http://www.netto-online.de/> Weitere Angabe zu unserem Unternehmen finden Sie unter: http://www.netto-online.de/impressum [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_facebook_2.png] <https://de-de.facebook.com/nettomarkendiscount/> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_instagram_2.png] <https://www.instagram.com/netto_marken_discount/> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_youtube_2.png] <https://www.youtube.com/user/nettotv> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_pinterest_2.png] <https://www.pinterest.de/netto_marken_discount/> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_tiktok_2.png] <https://www.tiktok.com/@netto_marken_discount> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_linkedin_2.png] <https://de.linkedin.com/company/netto-marken-discount> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_xing_2.png] <https://www.xing.com/pages/nettomarkendiscount>

Subject: Anuga
TextBody: Добрый день Скоро начинается ваша выставка Anuga<https://cgn.perevodov.info/exp/anuga>. Пожалуйста лишний раз напомните участникам, что мы предоставляем переводчиков любых языков в любой стране и городе. Помогаем с апостилированием и консульской легализацией. Оплату принимаем на счета в США, России, Грузии, Казахстане и т.д. Хотели бы разместить информацию об этом в разделе "Для участников" на сайте выставки. О нас и переводчиках — perevodov.info/exp Спасибо! Brauchen Sie Übersetzer? Wir bieten Übersetzer für alle Sprachen in jedem Land und jeder Stadt an. Wir helfen bei der Apostillierung und konsularischen Legalisierung. Wir akzeptieren die Zahlung auf Konten in den USA, Russland, Georgien, Kasachstan usw. TextBody: [https://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/op/sh/WCPxRrf2SE93USHfDWaz0PrFqAWXxDU2/-p8nO3ScnsYe] View in browser<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/mr/sh/WCPxRrNLV1Ltv55AruyIAasVmxwjF9Xu/xTd6xTMCGD-T> [Sendinblue]<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ6uveJz9XDbO3ESqK3lwX7di/6_JYmvHFdb1R> PALLETS FOR DAIRIES<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ72iiMCPtJ53oycdSqf3mpFq/JCDCvQzt-ydm> MEAT HOOKS<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7AVmOPgFOYjaimQbdYB2Wry/igAArkM6CI9f> COLD ROOMS<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7IIqQcwbU2PMSwDkQRIIEU6/vAPRYpxgoKKe> RIPENING PP PLASTIC FOR CHEESE MATURING mold of our productions [https://img.newsletter.avioincar.it/im/sh/fUcAHxaQMJ7v.jpg?u=92pJLo34vnrQtbCnsHX8YOyRNbnCQf5QUzK]<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7Q5uSqCxZW58D60tDKPXw6E/3k8zuTUhVHpm> Stackable grid in polypropylene for food (cheese) [https://img.newsletter.avioincar.it/im/sh/P363HUONd6eh.jpg?u=92pJLo34vnrQtizruUnUdseD7laLDYCgCbS]<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7XsyV3TJezktxFo20DWndiM/wZrTk9z-ZLBV> [https://img.newsletter.avioincar.it/im/sh/HUNeKviLINPJ.jpg?u=92pJLo34vnrQtqmvwi3qjMJyrvNU0RJvuDa]<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7fg2XGjfkTQfhPbAn6e3LKU/0iqKrjT9YOKB> Pp plastic shelves for cheese maturing Product Details ›<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7nT6ZU01px6RRZOJZzlJ2wc/axybHtVDzYiW> Production system: injection molding resistance to operating temperatures: -30, + 80 °C Suitable for food contact: all food-grade polypropylene grills are made with certified raw materials and are suitable for contact with foodstuffs, in compliance with the regulations and directives and the national ministerial decree. Uses: for salting, drying and maturing cheeses. Recommended for cheeses such as caprini, caciotte, gouda, tomini, muffettato, cascaval, pecorino toscano, pecorino sardo. The surface grilling allows the form a considerable aeration allowing fewer turning and less mold formation. Euro pallett: allows easy and comfortable maneuverability inside the cells and storage and seasoning and salting. Washing: PP articles are recommended to be washed with 1/2% chlorinated basic solutions, or acid solutions always at 1/2%. it is also advisable not to use solutions with nitric acid, because over time the quality of the plastic material deteriorates. [https://img.newsletter.avioincar.it/im/sh/rCezEyTW7Vny.png?u=92pJLo34vnrQtyZzyvKCopzkc5AcnKRBbpi]<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7vGAbhGNvQmDBjBSMssYkYk/jmOLl418JFz4> [https://img.newsletter.avioincar.it/im/sh/Lu0RFab1whII.png?u=92pJLo34vnrQu6N418aYuJfWMExlaDYRJRq] SHELVING FOR COLD ROOMS Suitable for storage in cold rooms and product pantries, with perforated polypropylene boards, thus allowing for product ventilation. Vedi prodotto ›<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ833EduWk0uRyvsyb9lzoSAs/EPY2CldCGuNr> [https://img.newsletter.avioincar.it/im/sh/beqayo-XQ0My.png?u=92pJLo34vnrQuEA83LquznLI6OkuN6fh13y] STAINLESS STEEL PALLET WITH WOODEN BOARDS uitable for ageing, smoking and resting various cheese and dairy products. - 304 tubular stainless steel structure - Round or rectangular shaped boards - Trolley or floor pallet version with legs - Cheese holder pallets can be stacked Vedi prodotto ›<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ4yaodBJmGlfYElxT596i93Gb4/sjbZhMBXsm5W> [https://img.newsletter.avioincar.it/im/sh/c_-kMjsDtkzQ.png?u=92pJLo34vnrQuLxC5Z7H5H13qYY39zmwig6] About US We are a company active in Trentino since 1998 .We manufacture equipment in steel and plastic such as carts , pallets racks hooks etc.. Read more ›<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ4z6zDqSXnyI4huXtzQyI5tM26/mfq4UR89u6PC> Avioincar Via Sabbioni 8 38063 Avio, ITALY info@avioincar.it [Facebook]<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ4zd9oVbJLAubB38Ktips2jRT8/5_RG9dD52uJa> [LinkedIn]<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ509KPAk4sNX7eBilo0hRzZWuA/_bibHbThiKBo> [YouTube]<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ50fUzpsqPa9e7KJCiIZ1wPcLC/9LJjiyq0s7c7> This email was sent to sales@agristo.com Unsubscribe here<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/un/sh/WCPxRrWByckThlgQ2imdaVMsoZEdbBVy/LLjmcew15_Xp> Inviato da [SendinBlue]<http://r.newsletter.avioincar.it/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ51BfaV1bwmmAaStdcaQbtFhmE/-9yRW-Qyit80> Mauris commodo massa tortor, u sit amet,consectetur adipisicing Nunc fermentum neque quam, sodales eleifend elit imperdiet vitae. Fabricante de pruebas rapidas de HCG y LH. Z14-Z19
TextBody: Hola querido amigo, Aquí está Gao de China Tianjin Recare Co.Ltd. Como fabricante de pruebas de embarazo y pruebas de ovulación, tenemos 25 años de experiencia en producción en China. La prueba de embarazo y la prueba de ovulación suministradas por Recare tienen certificaciones internacionales CE0123, ISO13485 e ISO9001. Tenemos marcas que hemos sido OEM para los clientes y siempre nos ganamos la confianza de los clientes con nuestra altísima calidad. El kit de prueba tiene diferentes sensibilidades: 25 miu y 10 miu. Tenemos una amplia gama de modelos para que los clientes elijan, como tiras de 2,5 mm/3,0 mm/4,0 mm, casete mini/3,0 mm/4,0 mm de 3,0 mm y midstream de 5,5 mm/6,0 mm. Nuestras pruebas de embarazo y pruebas de ovulación son muy apreciadas por su buen precio y alta calidad en países europeos, Medio Oriente, América del Sur y África. Solución de paquete: Caja con tu logo Bolsa con tu logo Caja con su logo Según las necesidades del cliente. ¿Le gustaría realizar un pedido de muestra para comprobar su mercado local y comprobar nuestra calidad? En caso afirmativo, me gustaría ayudarle a solicitar muestras gratuitas, solo pagando el costo de envío. Si está interesado en el kit de prueba, no dude en ponerse en contacto conmigo. Le deseamos éxito en su negocio. Atentamente, Gao Gracias de antemano. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hi friend, Here is Gao from China Tianjin Recare Co.Ltd, As a pregnancy test and ovulation test manufacturer, we have 25 years of production experience in China. The pregnancy test and ovulation test supplied by Recare have CE0123, ISO13485, and ISO9001, international certifications, We have brands that we have been OEMing for customers, and always won the trust of customers with our super high quality. The test kit has different sensitivities: 25miu and 10miu. We have a wide range of models for customers to choose from, like 2.5mm/3.0mm/4.0mm strips, 3.0mm mini/3.0mm/4.0mm cassette, and 5.5mm/6.0mm midstream. Our pregnancy test and ovulation tests are highly regarded for their good price and high quality in European countries, the Middle East, and South America, Africa countries. Package solution: Box with your logo Bag with your logo Carton with your logo According to customer's needs. Would you like to place a sample order to check your market in local and check our quality? If yes, I would like to help you apply for free samples, just paying the shipping cost. If you are interested in the test kit, please feel free to contact me. We wish you success in your business.

Subject: Eindjaarsluiting 2024 - 05569 AGRISTO NV
TextBody: Opvragen sluitingsdagen eindejaar 2024 05569 AGRISTO NV Beste leverancier, Om onze klanten het hele jaar door een optimale beschikbaarheid van uw goederen te garanderen, vragen wij u om ons uw sluitingen (oktober - januari) mee te delen. Wij verzoeken u het onlineformulier in te vullen via de onderstaande link. Ook als u geen sluitingsdagen hebt gepland, kunt u deze link volgen, u zult het ons snel kunnen vertellen. Eindjaar 2024 - Colruyt Group In januari krijgt u opnieuw een brief toegestuurd met betrekking tot uw zomerverlof (mei-september). Het is dus niet nodig om ons te informeren over uw zomerverlof 2025. Gelieve voor elke verlofperiode de bestel- en leverdata van de laatste mogelijke levering vóór en de eerste mogelijke levering na de sluitingsperiode te vermelden. Feestdagen Hieronder vindt u een overzicht van de feestdagen in België. Onze distributiecentra zijn gesloten op volgende data. Indien er voor u andere feestdagen van toepassing zijn, gelieve die dan te vermelden. 01/11/2024 Toussaint Allerheiligen All Saints' Day 11/11/2024 Armistice Wapenstilstand Armistice Day 25/12/2024 Noel Kerstmis Christmas Day 01/01/2025 Nouvel an Nieuwjaar New Year's Day Alvast bedankt voor uw medewerking. Met vriendelijke groet, Centraal Stockbeheer - besteldienst csb@colruyt.be tel +32 2 363 55 45 Colruyt Laagste Prijzen Edingensesteenweg 196 - 1500 Halle www.colruyt.be

Subject: Proposal for cooperation between Agristo & Van Gillern Ltd.
TextBody: To whom it may concern, My name is Adam Gillern, and I am a Junior Sales Representative at Van Gillern Ltd., Kamenice, Czech Republic. Our company specializes in the production of PE films and plastic packaging materials. According to my official information, you are a manufacturer of fries, potato specialties and mashed potatoes, which you package for sale. We would like to offer and supply you with the necessary packaging material made from PE or BOPP film. The film is produced according to your wishes, printed, and delivered flexibly. All details for production and printing can be discussed and determined together. I would also like to tell you that we have recently tested our new five-layer film in a thickness of 70mi, which has met with a positive response from customers due to the reduction in packaging weight and, of course, price. For your information: In the field of manufacturing this packaging material, we have many years of practice and experience. We supply these packaging materials to Western and Central Europe. We are a family-owned company, and the satisfaction of our customers has been, is, and always will be our goal. We propose discussing future cooperation in a personal meeting to clarify all technical and commercial terms. I would be very pleased to hear from you soon.

Subject: Kapotte naad vlaamse friet
TextBody: Beste, Wij hebben onderstaande goed ontvangen. Bij het bekijken van de foto lijkt mij dit eerder dat de sealing is doorgebrand. Er zit altijd een tolerantie op de machine van 15°C warmer of lager, wat betekent dat het kan zijn dat de zakken die je hebt ontvangen dicht bij de tolerantie van +15°C waren geseald en te warm waren waardoor er op sommige plaatsen de folie is "verbrand". Dat ter zijde zullen we meer visuele controle doen op de zakken. Met vriendelijke groet, Evelien Cremers Evelien Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Voncken, Matisse [matisse.voncken@jumbo.com] Sent: 5/09/2024 11:42 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Kapotte naad vlaamse friet Goedemorgen, We krijgen meldingen van zakken waarvan de naad kapot is. Kunnen jullie hier intern naar kijken! We moeten dit in de toekomst voorkomen! Met vriendelijke groet /

Subject: Offene Bestellung Agristo
TextBody: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, wir hatten diese Artikeln nicht auf Lager für diese Bestellungen. Bitte senden Sie eine neue Bestellung, wenn Sie diese Waren noch erhalten möchten. Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Service Agristo nv Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 8710 Wielsbeke Belgium --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Konieczny Lucas [lucas.konieczny@netto-online.de] Sent: 6/09/2024 09:09 To: service@agristo.com Cc: vitali.schaefer@netto-online.de; brunner.lisa@netto-online.de Subject: Offene Bestellung Agristo Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, Sie befinden sich mit u. s. Aufträgen in Verzug! Wir erwarten hierzu bis heute 12:00 Uhr eine Stellungnahme und den Nachliefertermin. Die Rückmeldung ist in der angehängten Datei vorzunehmen (Spalte Y und Z) und an alle Personen im Verteiler zurück zu melden. Ebenso sind umgehend Maßnahmen zu ergreifen um eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung unserer Läger zukünftig sicherzustellen. Grundsätzlich möchten wir nochmals darauf hinweisen, dass wir auf eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung angewiesen sind, um den hohen Anspruch unserer Kunden gerecht zu werden. Die Bestellungen gehen mit entsprechendem Vorlauf bei Ihnen ein. Sollte es im Falle von höherer Gewalt zu Verschiebungen und / oder Kürzungen kommen, so haben die Nachlieferungen am nächsten Werktag zu erfolgen. Der Nachliefertermin ist mit der jeweiligen Disposition abzustimmen. Die Disposition als auch der Einkauf sind hierzu vorab proaktiv zu informieren. Mit freundlichen Grüßen Netto Marken-Discount Stiftung & Co. KG Industriepark Ponholz 1 93142 Maxhütte-Haidhof Lucas Konieczny Sachbearbeiter Einkauf TKK _____________________________________ Tel.: 09471 320-8429 Fax: 09471 320-6737 Mail: lucas.konieczny@netto-online.de Internet: www.netto-online.de Weitere Angabe zu unserem Unternehmen finden Sie unter: http://www.netto-online.de/impressum thread::WKhMsDE1F82Tunz_UCP2QXQ::

Subject: PO: 4508441030
TextBody: Hi Lucie, Before we take any further steps to invoice these cases, I'd like to figure out what happened here exactly. It's strange that there were extra cases on this load. If I'm not mistaken, you're talking about PO 4508428131? There were already 2 pallets (=120 cases) on this load. You've received 220 cases in total of the roast potatoes then? Do you maybe have a CMR or something to confirm this? Were you missing another product on the delivery? Subject: Proposal for cooperation between Agristo & Van Gillern Ltd.
TextBody: To whom it may concern, My name is Adam Gillern, and I am a Junior Sales Representative at Van Gillern Ltd., Kamenice, Czech Republic. Our company specializes in the production of PE films and plastic packaging materials. According to my official information, you are a manufacturer of fries, potato specialties and mashed potatoes, which you package for sale. We would like to offer and supply you with the necessary packaging material made from PE or BOPP film. The film is produced according to your wishes, printed, and delivered flexibly. All details for production and printing can be discussed and determined together. I would also like to tell you that we have recently tested our new five-layer film in a thickness of 70mi, which has met with a positive response from customers due to the reduction in packaging weight and, of course, price. For your information: In the field of manufacturing this packaging material, we have many years of practice and experience. We supply these packaging materials to Western and Central Europe. We are a family-owned company, and the satisfaction of our customers has been, is, and always will be our goal. We propose discussing future cooperation in a personal meeting to clarify all technical and commercial terms. I would be very pleased to hear from you soon.

Subject: Africa Food Expo 2024
TextBody: Dear Sir/Madam, We are pleased to inform you that the "Africa Food 2024" exhibition, initially scheduled from October 10th to 12th 2024, will be postponed to December 12th to 14th 2024, due to unforeseen logistical reasons. This three-day event aims to bring together key players in the food and beverage industry. Due to its geographical position, Tunisia plays a central role as a gateway for trade exchanges. "Africa Food 2024" will serve as both a physical and virtual platform, facilitating international meetings between renowned producers and major distributors in Tunisia. Alongside the exhibition, there will be a best pizza contest, tasting sessions, interactive live cooking demonstrations, workshops, and conferences hosted by renowned experts. We apologize for any inconvenience this change may cause and look forward to welcoming you on the new dates for an exceptional event. Yours Sincerely, Sales & Marketing Department Oumaima Belhaj IFE -Tunisia Mobile : (+216) 27 282 007

Subject: Difference in counting QC
TextBody: Hi all, By means of this e-mail, I am coming back on the difference between % by count and % by weight in the counting of length and defects by our QC. Below you can find an example of both ways of counting: Suppose you have 2 chips, length 52mm and 102mm. % by count: <100: 50% >100: 50% % by weight: <100: 33% (52 / 154 * 100) >100: 66% (102 / 154 * 100) Due to the shape of the chips, the weight percentage that we show will be fairly close to the actual weight. Now when does what way of counting apply? This actually follows the 'terminology' of the market where most of the volume of a certain recipe goes to. % by count is mostly used for Foodservice, whereas % by weight is mostly used for retail. I remain at your disposal for any further information,

Subject: 900gPB: 1kg bag contamination
TextBody: Dear Pieter san, Good morning. Today, we were informed that 1kg KOHYO PB bag is contaminated in 900gPB. To be specific, the box itself is 900g PB but the products are 1kg PB according to our customer’s report. We will need to check how many of 1kg bags are contaminated with them and other detailed information. However, the customer is quite worried about what if this error is widespread since the products are sold at retail drug store here. Therefore, could you please kindly check that are there any issue occurred during production from the records??? The expiry date and lot code are as follow. 2026. 03.15 G042407812:06 Will come back to you asap once I receive the detailed information.

Subject: Inkooporder D24-02068
TextBody: J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als "AHV"), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopie?n van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopie?n daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as "GCT") including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confi?es, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont r?gis de mani?re exclusive par le droit n?erlandais et nos Conditions G?n?rales (nomm?es dessous aussi "CG "), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive ? l'article 4.3 (arbitrage ? La Haye Pays-Bas conform?ment au r?glement d'arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont ?t? d?pos?es au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, d?pendance ? Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut ?tre pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut ?tre gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent ?tre gratuitement t?l?charg?es ? partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l'application des conditions g?n?rales de notre cocontractant, ? moins que nous en ayons formellement accept? l'application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las ?rdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicaci?n exclusiva el derecho holand?s y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cl?usula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ah? incluida (art?culo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretar?a Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Adem?s, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicaci?n de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

Subject: NEW Market Services
TextBody: I trust this email finds you well, I wanted to introduce you to Businesses Work, a company passionate about connecting brands with UK retailers and driving sales growth. We specialise in helping businesses grow by opening new customer channels in both the UK and Australia. Our clients describe BWL as 'knowledgeable', 'experienced', and 'results-driven'. We adapt quickly to align with your strategy, offering a flexible and tailored approach. We combine our traditional sales process with a new and innovative way of gaining the maximum exposure for your brand. While we provide a premium service, we ensure exceptional value by delivering measurable results. We work transparently, involving you in every step of our journey. Though success isn't guaranteed, our passion and expertise maximise your product's exposure to our customers. Let me know if you have questions or would like to schedule an introductory meeting. [cid:image001.png@01DB0043.264693D0][cid:image002.png@01DB0043.878FF910] [cid:image003.png@01DB0043.878FF910] [cid:image004.png@01DB0043.878FF910]

Subject: PLMA_Inquiry About Your  Products
TextBody: Dear Sir/Madam, I hope this email finds you well. My name is Dimitris Sarris, and I had the pleasure of visiting your impressive booth at the PLMA. I was very impressed by the quality of your products and the professionalism of your company. I am particular interested in exploring your full range of products and would appreciate it if you could provide me with the following information: 1. Interested for your own label. 2. Pricing information. 3. Availability and lead times for delivery. 4. Warranty and after-sales service details. 5. Any promotional materials or brochures you can share. 6. Sticker (ingredients etc.) on product in Greek language. About us: OSKY Supermarket Group is a leading retail chain in Cyprus with a longstanding legacy of over 50 years. At OSKY, we are always keen on fostering mutually beneficial partnerships and exploring new avenues for collaboration. As the 5th largest retailer in Cyprus, OSKY plays a crucial role in the country's retail sector. Our significant yearly revenue of €105 million underscores our financial stability and market influence. Thank you very much for your time and assistance. I look forward to your prompt response.

I see, however, that the volume which has been delivered over the last couple of weeks is far above our forecast (yellow = delivered / red = open order / blue line = forecast): Should we increase our forecast going forward? Can you please let me know what we can do for the open orders? Thank you for your feedback.

Subject: Gulfood 2024 Need to grow sales
TextBody: Hi, I hope all is well with you. I'm getting in touch with you to see if you'd be interested in acquiring the visitor and exhibitor contact lists from GULFOOD 2024 to boost your sales, revenue, and brand visibility. we are providing the list of attendees and exhibitors at a very affordable price Trade Event Details: Date: February 19TH – 23RD, 2024 Venue: Dubai Expo Center Visitor and exhibitor Count: 94397 and 5483, 193 countries. Every contact comes with the following information: - Business name, Website, Contact Name, Job title, Phone number, Fax number, Physical Address, Company Size, Email Address, industry, revenue, employee size, etc.! Could you email me if you're interested in purchasing the database so I can respond with pricing and other details as soon as possible? Your comment is anxiously anticipated. Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: Proposal for Cooperation in Supplying Qualified Personnel
TextBody: Good day. I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to propose a mutually beneficial cooperation between our companies. We specialize in providing highly qualified personnel across various industries, including construction, welding, manufacturing, agriculture, and other sectors where skilled labor is essential. Our Proposal: We can offer you a reliable and consistent supply of skilled workers tailored to your specific needs. Our extensive pool of professionals includes, but is not limited to: Construction Workers: From general laborers to specialized trades such as electricians, carpenters, and plumbers. Welders: Certified welders with experience in various techniques, ensuring high-quality results in any project. Industrial Workers: Qualified personnel for manufacturing and production lines, including machine operators and maintenance staff. Agricultural Workers: Skilled laborers for planting, harvesting, and other agricultural activities, ensuring efficiency and productivity. Why Choose Us? Quality Assurance: We thoroughly vet all candidates to ensure they meet the highest standards of skill and reliability. Flexibility: Whether you need temporary, seasonal, or permanent staff, we can provide the right solution to fit your needs. Efficiency: Our streamlined process allows for quick placement, minimizing any disruption to your operations. Next Steps: We would be delighted to discuss this proposal further and explore how we can best serve your staffing needs. I am available at your earliest convenience for a meeting or a call to discuss the specifics and tailor our services to your requirements. Thank you for considering this proposal. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you and contribute to the success of your business. You can contact us at +48797167193 email: welesasp.zo.o@gmail.com

Subject: Delivery Operations - Redstar
TextBody: Good morning/ afternoon, We would like to inform you of an immediate change in our delivery operations which we would like your co-operation with. Any deliveries made to us from now on in a temperature-controlled vehicle need to have a temperature record reading printed out from the driver's vehicle which then needs to be stapled to a delivery note. If your drivers don't have this facility, then we require an email sent to us at sales@redstarfoodservice.co.uk<mailto:sales@redstarfoodservice.co.uk> with the above information included. This is to comply with health and safety regulations. Please inform your drivers or if you use a transport company, please inform them. Thank you for your understanding in this matter.
