Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: colour preprinted carton rubs off
TextBody: Hello Regine, I do apologize for missing your call. I tried to return your call but was unable to get in contact with you as well. Please do give me a call back when you get a chance. I would like to thank you for providing me with the breakdown of orders that will ship with the old colour formula vs. the new colour formula. I do hope that there is a noticeable difference. I will have Kevin inspect the shipment on Agristo 329. I will let you know what he discovers. I also look forward to hearing about your findings after you inspect the box yourself. I would like to thank you for trying to solve this problem expeditiously. Best, David Phillips On Sep 2, 2024, at 9:42 AM, Regine Legein <Regine.Legein@agristo.com> wrote: Hi David, I tried to call you about the boxes with color rubbing off. Next week, we will have new boxes with amended ink formula (more wax so color should not rub off anymore) available in production. This is the overview of your open orders: <image001.png> Based on the loading date, this means that products from orders 324B and 327 and 328 will be the last ones loaded with boxes with color rubbing off. The following order (329 for loading 16/09) will be with the new boxes with amended color formula. From next week’s productions, I will keep a few boxes aside so I can check the color after boxes come out of the freezer and are put in an area with room temperature, and check if the ink holds. I will inform you of my findings. I hope that this ink holds, which means the problem has been solved.

Subject: Reno: Pompin & noisettes
TextBody: Hi Marlies, Please find attached the latest communication. We went through the brief with Michele so some changes might have been made afterwards which will not be reflected in the attachment. * Latest feedback on kitchen samples: decrease amount of curcuma, bc too yellow. Blistering & bursting in airfryer and deepfryer. * Proposal at that time was to implement the curcuma in the line trial, since the blistering/bursting was better to handle in a line trial. However, happy to revisit the approach. Would you be able to check the status and way forward with your colleagues? Thanks a lot.

Subject: Iceland Opal Artwork Alert:13474, Mini Roasts - Iceland Product Kick Off Email
TextBody: ​Dear Generic Artwork (Agristo), The following product has been signed off and will be launching in Iceland in Cycle 1, Phase 1. Cycle Year 2025. Name of Product: Mini Roasts Weight: All design, artwork and colour separation are managed by the Jupiter Prestige Team for Iceland. Jupiter Prestige will provide approved, repro-ready files to your printer and under no circumstances can any alterations be made to these files. Ashleigh Cordeiro will be responsible for the co-ordination and delivery of your artwork. Please contact Ashleigh Cordeiro within 2 working days of receipt of this email with your planned critical path dates including FTP deadline dates to enable correct prioritisation of your lines. Before artwork can begin you will be required to provide the following: 1. Product Specification & Cooking / Re-heating / Defrosting instructions - must be submitted via Igloo to SGS for approval. Please note, once submitted to SGS, the standard turnaround time for the specification to be approved is 2 weeks. It is your responsibility to ensure the spec is approved 2 weeks prior to FTP date or 1 week under fast track timings. 2. Packaging Specification & Cutter Guides - Igloo - Product specification must be submitted via Igloo with cutter guide files in AI and PDF format for all printer components including printer details. Submitted details must match those agreed with your Packaging Technologist Mark Armstrong during the development process. Iceland / Jupiter Prestige will be responsible for approving this information. Opal - Cutter guides are an essential requirement for design creation so these should follow Gate 3 approval. You will receive a task to upload cutter guides directly into Opal and these will go through a technical approval process with Jupiter Prestige - please refer to the Gold Standard Cutter Guide document on both Igloo and Opal for the cutter guide requirements. 3. Photography samples (if required) - must be submitted to Iceland Photography Studio and must be the minimum number of samples requested, clearly labelled for photography with cooking guides included (if applicable). Please contact Lauren Richardson lauren.richardson@iceland.co.uk for details. These are required for design creation so should follow Gate 3 approval. Only once all of the above is completed and approved, Iceland will be able commence artwork production via Jupiter Prestige. Please note the standard turnaround time of artwork delivery from point of briefing to FTP, is 2 weeks. Please see timeline expectations for your tasks associated to the artwork process: Week 1 Upload cutters to OPAL Raise spec submitting product, packaging and cooking tabs for SGS review Send samples for photography Submit New Line Form (NLF) Week 2-3 Work with SGS to ensure that your spec is approved by the end of week 3 ready for artwork Week 3 - Attribute Panel Week 5 -6 Review artwork in a timely manner (maximum 2 days for standard CP and 1 day for fast track CP), ensuring only necessary amends associated to your remit are requested. Please resolve any questions offline and only add instructions to OPAL. Week 7 Following file release, work with your printer to ensure on time and correct packaging delivery If these steps are not managed, within specified timeframes, then FTP dates will be affected. Finally, please note, ahead of your FTP, a quality attribute panel must be conducted at Iceland to sign off the physical parameters of the factory trial product and ensure back of pack information matches the product attributes. Please engage with a member of the Iceland Innovation Kitchen team to get this booked in prior to FTP. For further information regarding Iceland timeframes for design, specification approval and artwork production, please refer to Igloo / Opal and review the 'Iceland Artwork Critical Path Overview'. If you have any queries, please contact the team directly.

Subject: Africa Food Expo 2024
TextBody: Bonjour Madame/Monsieur, Nous avons le plaisir de vous informer que le Salon « Africa Food 2024 » prévu du 10, 11 & 12 octobre 2024 sera reporté du 12, 13 & 14 Décembre 2024 , pour des raisons logistiques imprévues. Cet événement s’étalant sur trois jours a pour objectif de réunir les acteurs clés de l’industrie agroalimentaire et des boissons. De part sa position géographique, la Tunisie joue un rôle central en tant que porte d’entrée pour les échanges commerciaux. « Africa-Food 2024 » servira de plateforme à la fois physique et virtuelle facilitant ainsi les rencontres internationales entre les producteurs de renom et les principaux distributeurs en Tunisie. En marge du salon, un concours de la meilleure pizza, des sessions de dégustation, des démonstrations interactives de cuisine en direct, des ateliers et des conférences animés par des experts de renommée seront organisés. Nous nous réjouissons de vous accueillir à cette nouvelle date pour un événement exceptionnel. Dans l’espoir d’une réponse favorable, Veuillez agréer l’expression de nos sentiments déférents. Département Commercial & Marketing IFE Tunisia Oumaima Belhaj Mobile / WhatsApp : (+216) 27 282 007

Subject: art 294271 PDT roti patatas bravas 2,5KGx4/10KG
TextBody: Bonjour, L'article 294271 est un article MTO (Make To Order). Nous devons donc recevoir une commande de votre part avant de produire cet article. Normalement, nous devons recevoir la commande au cours de la semaine A, de sorte que nos planificateurs peuvent programmer cet article au cours de la semaine B, pour le produire au cours de la semaine C et le charger au cours de la semaine D. Le prix est maintenant 1,144 eur/kg. Vous pouvez envoyer à service@agristo.com à l'avenir. Cordialement, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: DUPHIL Sylvie [sy.duphil@passionfroid.fr] Sent: 6/09/2024 10:15 To: Zoe.Feys@agristo.com Cc: m.ubaud@passionfroid.fr Subject: art 294271 PDT roti patatas bravas 2,5KGx4/10KG Bonjour Art 294271 PDT roti patatas bravas 2,5KGx4/10KG Pouvez-vs ns communiquer la date de disponibilité de ce produit ? Et ns confirmer le Prix Achat départ, Ns vs en remercions par avance Cordialement Sylvie DUPHIL Approvisionneuse Surgelés Passion Froid Sud-Ouest 3 rue Newton - 33370 - TRESSES Tél : 05 57 35 79 73 Fax : 05 57 35 79 74 sy.duphil@passionfroid.fr www.passionfroid.fr thread::QVZbo357HKSX4f-5ekxfTnQ::

Subject: Iceland Opal Artwork Alert:13478, Potato Hearts 500g - Iceland Product Kick Off Email
TextBody: ​Dear Generic Artwork (Agristo), The following product has been signed off and will be launching in Iceland in Cycle 1, Phase 1. Cycle Year 2025. Name of Product: Potato Hearts 500g Weight: All design, artwork and colour separation are managed by the Jupiter Prestige Team for Iceland. Jupiter Prestige will provide approved, repro-ready files to your printer and under no circumstances can any alterations be made to these files. Ashleigh Cordeiro will be responsible for the co-ordination and delivery of your artwork. Please contact Ashleigh Cordeiro within 2 working days of receipt of this email with your planned critical path dates including FTP deadline dates to enable correct prioritisation of your lines. Before artwork can begin you will be required to provide the following: 1. Product Specification & Cooking / Re-heating / Defrosting instructions - must be submitted via Igloo to SGS for approval. Please note, once submitted to SGS, the standard turnaround time for the specification to be approved is 2 weeks. It is your responsibility to ensure the spec is approved 2 weeks prior to FTP date or 1 week under fast track timings. 2. Packaging Specification & Cutter Guides - Igloo - Product specification must be submitted via Igloo with cutter guide files in AI and PDF format for all printer components including printer details. Submitted details must match those agreed with your Packaging Technologist Mark Armstrong during the development process. Iceland / Jupiter Prestige will be responsible for approving this information. Opal - Cutter guides are an essential requirement for design creation so these should follow Gate 3 approval. You will receive a task to upload cutter guides directly into Opal and these will go through a technical approval process with Jupiter Prestige - please refer to the Gold Standard Cutter Guide document on both Igloo and Opal for the cutter guide requirements. 3. Photography samples (if required) - must be submitted to Iceland Photography Studio and must be the minimum number of samples requested, clearly labelled for photography with cooking guides included (if applicable). Please contact Lauren Richardson lauren.richardson@iceland.co.uk for details. These are required for design creation so should follow Gate 3 approval. Only once all of the above is completed and approved, Iceland will be able commence artwork production via Jupiter Prestige. Please note the standard turnaround time of artwork delivery from point of briefing to FTP, is 2 weeks. Please see timeline expectations for your tasks associated to the artwork process: Week 1 Upload cutters to OPAL Raise spec submitting product, packaging and cooking tabs for SGS review Send samples for photography Submit New Line Form (NLF) Week 2-3 Work with SGS to ensure that your spec is approved by the end of week 3 ready for artwork Week 3 - Attribute Panel Week 5 -6 Review artwork in a timely manner (maximum 2 days for standard CP and 1 day for fast track CP), ensuring only necessary amends associated to your remit are requested. Please resolve any questions offline and only add instructions to OPAL. Week 7 Following file release, work with your printer to ensure on time and correct packaging delivery If these steps are not managed, within specified timeframes, then FTP dates will be affected. Finally, please note, ahead of your FTP, a quality attribute panel must be conducted at Iceland to sign off the physical parameters of the factory trial product and ensure back of pack information matches the product attributes. Please engage with a member of the Iceland Innovation Kitchen team to get this booked in prior to FTP. For further information regarding Iceland timeframes for design, specification approval and artwork production, please refer to Igloo / Opal and review the 'Iceland Artwork Critical Path Overview'. If you have any queries, please contact the team directly.

Subject: Iceland Opal Artwork Alert:13477, Ridiculously crispy skin on with hop - Iceland Product Kick Off Email
TextBody: ​Dear Generic Artwork (Agristo), The following product has been signed off and will be launching in Iceland in Cycle 1, Phase 1. Cycle Year 2025. Name of Product: Ridiculously crispy skin on with hop Weight: All design, artwork and colour separation are managed by the Jupiter Prestige Team for Iceland. Jupiter Prestige will provide approved, repro-ready files to your printer and under no circumstances can any alterations be made to these files. Ashleigh Cordeiro will be responsible for the co-ordination and delivery of your artwork. Please contact Ashleigh Cordeiro within 2 working days of receipt of this email with your planned critical path dates including FTP deadline dates to enable correct prioritisation of your lines. Before artwork can begin you will be required to provide the following: 1. Product Specification & Cooking / Re-heating / Defrosting instructions - must be submitted via Igloo to SGS for approval. Please note, once submitted to SGS, the standard turnaround time for the specification to be approved is 2 weeks. It is your responsibility to ensure the spec is approved 2 weeks prior to FTP date or 1 week under fast track timings. 2. Packaging Specification & Cutter Guides - Igloo - Product specification must be submitted via Igloo with cutter guide files in AI and PDF format for all printer components including printer details. Submitted details must match those agreed with your Packaging Technologist Mark Armstrong during the development process. Iceland / Jupiter Prestige will be responsible for approving this information. Opal - Cutter guides are an essential requirement for design creation so these should follow Gate 3 approval. You will receive a task to upload cutter guides directly into Opal and these will go through a technical approval process with Jupiter Prestige - please refer to the Gold Standard Cutter Guide document on both Igloo and Opal for the cutter guide requirements. 3. Photography samples (if required) - must be submitted to Iceland Photography Studio and must be the minimum number of samples requested, clearly labelled for photography with cooking guides included (if applicable). Please contact Lauren Richardson lauren.richardson@iceland.co.uk for details. These are required for design creation so should follow Gate 3 approval. Only once all of the above is completed and approved, Iceland will be able commence artwork production via Jupiter Prestige. Please note the standard turnaround time of artwork delivery from point of briefing to FTP, is 2 weeks. Please see timeline expectations for your tasks associated to the artwork process: Week 1 Upload cutters to OPAL Raise spec submitting product, packaging and cooking tabs for SGS review Send samples for photography Submit New Line Form (NLF) Week 2-3 Work with SGS to ensure that your spec is approved by the end of week 3 ready for artwork Week 3 - Attribute Panel Week 5 -6 Review artwork in a timely manner (maximum 2 days for standard CP and 1 day for fast track CP), ensuring only necessary amends associated to your remit are requested. Please resolve any questions offline and only add instructions to OPAL. Week 7 Following file release, work with your printer to ensure on time and correct packaging delivery If these steps are not managed, within specified timeframes, then FTP dates will be affected. Finally, please note, ahead of your FTP, a quality attribute panel must be conducted at Iceland to sign off the physical parameters of the factory trial product and ensure back of pack information matches the product attributes. Please engage with a member of the Iceland Innovation Kitchen team to get this booked in prior to FTP. For further information regarding Iceland timeframes for design, specification approval and artwork production, please refer to Igloo / Opal and review the 'Iceland Artwork Critical Path Overview'. If you have any queries, please contact the team directly.

Please bear in mind that, besides the change in the ingredient list, we will also have to update the nutritional values. Subject: Onderwerp: Controle productspecificaties SIM Jumbo – <Agristo> – <Aardappelpartjes, röstirondjes en aardappelbolletjes>
TextBody: Beste leverancier, In opdracht van Jumbo Supermarkten controleren wij de productspecificaties in SIM. Voor dit project heeft u ook een opstartmail ontvangen via SIM van de afdeling Productspecificaties van Jumbo. Voor onderstaande producten zijn de specificaties voor u opengezet in SIM voor een recheck. 8718452425433 _ Jumbo Aardappelpartjes 8718452793006 _ Jumbo Röstirondjes 8718452793013 _ Jumbo Aardappelbolletjes Ik wil u vragen om mij te laten weten door te reageren op deze email wat er in de specificatie moet worden aangepast. Vervolgens zorg ik dat de juiste tabbladen in SIM worden opengezet. Ik verneem dit graag zo snel mogelijk, maar uiterlijk op 13 september . Ik hoor graag van u of dit gaat lukken. Om geen vertraging verderop in het private label traject op te lopen, is de deadline voor het afronden van het totale SIM traject 22 werkdagen. Let op, dit is de deadline voor totale afronding van SIM. Er zal zo spoedig mogelijk gestart moeten worden met het aanvullen van de specificatie(s). Als u niet degene bent die verantwoordelijk is voor het invullen van de productspecificaties, ontvang ik graag de juiste contactgegevens van de persoon die hier wel verantwoordelijk voor is. Mocht u nog vragen hebben, dan kunt u altijd contact met mij opnemen. ​Met vriendelijke groet / ​

Subject: Delivery Operations - Redstar
TextBody: Hi, Can you please see the request below from Redstar food service. Is this something you would be able to accommodate? Many thanks, Beau Beau Taylor Customer Service Agristo P +441 244 562 128 --------------- Forwarded Message --------------- From: Simon Ford [sales2@redstarfoodservice.co.uk] Sent: 6/09/2024 12:39 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Delivery Operations - Redstar Good morning/ afternoon, We would like to inform you of an immediate change in our delivery operations which we would like your co-operation with. Any deliveries made to us from now on in a temperature-controlled vehicle need to have a temperature record reading printed out from the driver’s vehicle which then needs to be stapled to a delivery note. If your drivers don’t have this facility, then we require an email sent to us at sales@redstarfoodservice.co.uk with the above information included. This is to comply with health and safety regulations. Please inform your drivers or if you use a transport company, please inform them. Thank you for your understanding in this matter.

De informatie in de e-mail en verzonden bestanden is vertrouwelijk en kan voorts aan andere juridische beperkingen onderworpen zijn. Kennisneming van deze e-mail door een ander dan de geadresseerde is niet toegestaan. Een ander dan de geadresseerde kan er geen rechten of aanspraken aan ontlenen. Wij aanvaarden geen enkele aansprakelijkheid van wat voor aard ook jegens derden die handelen of niet handelen op basis van deze informatie. Indien deze e-mail per vergissing bij u terecht is gekomen, verzoeken wij u daarmee zorgvuldig om te gaan, ons direct te informeren, de e-mail van uw computer te verwijderen en eventuele kopieën of uitdraaien daarvan direct te vernietigen. Subject: Order for Rimus Trading Agency LTD from Agristo Nazareth  - Order# 461138 - 1
TextBody: Dear Thank you for reaching out. Please find our answers hereafter: Date goods are ready for collection. 11.09.2024 Opening and Closing times. Trucks cannot be allowed to the site without loading slot, so please confirm when you want to load and we will give you a slot booking. Full loading address and Contact details. See earlier mails Number of pallets, type of packaging, dimensions, and Gross weight. 3 industrial CHEP pallets Type of trailer (Example Canvas, Side / Top Loading / Box / Frigo), including Temperature if required. Green Isle should in fact instruct on all transport requirements, because you load for them on FCA basis. This is temperature controlled goods, -21. Any reference number for collection of shipments. Yes, you need slot booking number to enter the site. You should normally get this from Green Isle, but if you confirm requested time of loading, I will assist with booking loading slot and give loading ref. Any further details which facilitate the loading process, including the type of commodity. Kindly review the below details and inform us with any changes required. incoterm = FCA packing list with details will be given after loading. As requested before, we urgently need all customs details. If you ship the goods directly to Malta, we need point of exit and point of entry to do customs clearance. Awaiting your reply.

Subject: COMMERCIAL COLLABORATION
TextBody: Dear Sir / Madam, We would like to order products with your company and we intend to use them for resale in our stores. Please send us your products catalog and informations about your sales delivery deadlines. Given the amount of stock we order, our payment Policies are 30 days credit terms, so we will send you our financial statements and data for your insurance company to perform a credit check. With the hope that this can be the start of a great and long lasting partnership, I would like to thank you in advance for sending us the informations we have requested.

Subject: Aafaq Project Funding
TextBody: Dear Sir/Madam, Please allow me to introduce myself, I am Mohammed Hisham Ibrahim the Chief Investment Consultant with Aafaq Islamic Finance. We have learned about your company and it's activities through your Chamber of Commerce, and have decided to reach out, to share with you about our project funding program. I'm working under the mandate of Aafaq Islamic Finance to reach out to project owners for project funding collaboration and partnership. Aafaq Islamic Finance is an alternative investment manager focused on growth and value creation across Financial Services, Real Estate, Technology, including Aviation/Aircraft Leasing, Aerospace, Mining, Hospitality, Green Coal, Food, Media & Communication, Renewable energy, Healthcare, Automotive, Technology, Agriculture, Offshore Oil and Gas Services and Infrastructure etc. The company also has a strong track record in capital markets, through its own proprietary credit portfolio as well as offering advisory business collaboration and development strategy services. We bring together and manages a multi-billion dollar portfolio of local, regional, and international investments, which we wish to re-invest through project funding in investment loan to third-party investors, project owners, and general business facilitators on a 4% Loan interest rate per annum on long term investment projects that can generate high ROI within the period of funding same project on a minimum investment fund of $5 Million to $5 Billion USD. Sincere Regards Mohammed Hisham Ibrahim Investment Director Aafaq Islamic Finance P.S.C W: https://aafaq.ae/en A: Sheikh Zayed Rd - Trade Centre DIFC - Dubai P.O. Box 282400, Dubai, U.A.E.

Subject: Dissatisfied delivery service
TextBody: Hi Beau Our latest Order was booked for delivery Friday unfortunately it has been pushed back to Saturday, then suggested Sunday now suggested for Tuesday this is not good enough. We planned this carefully so we will not run out of the products. We will loose customers we promised our customers delivery for Monday. We will need to compensate to our customers for not delivering our promise you or transport company will have to cover our loss! Subject: FOR THE POOR
TextBody: My beloved in Christ, I saw your email address during my research today, I decided to come to this medium because there are people like you who can help me to make a lot of difference in the lives of the poor masses. I think I will start with a proper introduction of myself. I am Rev. Sister Bianca Hendryx, and I served at Cathedral De St Esprit, Istanbul, I am 63 years old and suffering from chronic urinary tract cancer. From all indications, my condition is deteriorating and it is quite obvious that I may not live more than two months after my next surgery in London. My physician told me that I may not live for more than 2 months and I am so scared about it. I have no child of mine since my spiritual obligation does not permit me to marry. But through these wonderful Bible verses, Psalms 119:116 ….Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live, and let me not be ashamed of my hope. Psalms 138: 7 Though I walk during trouble, thou will revive me......psalms 41:1 Blessed is he that is considered the poor, the Lord will deliver him in time of trouble. Two of my favorite verses: Philippians 2:27: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death, but God had mercy on him & that on him only, but on me also, lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow. ( I always say this in my mind) So, I now decided to donate all my life savings, which turned out to be $8,150.000.00. (eight million, one hundred and fifty thousand United States Dollars Only ) to you for humanitarian purposes. by establishing a foundation in your country under my name, to immortalize my name and 40% of this sum would be yours while 60% goes to the project This money is deposited in a reliable bank here in Turkey, Presently, I have informed my Attorney, about my decision to WILLING this fund to you, you are to get back to me immediately if you are interested in carrying out this task so that I will instruct you on how to get in contact with my attorney and my account officer. Lastly, I know I have never met you, but to fulfill this, which borders me most, I prayed and fasted with my spiritual adviser, Rev. Fr. Ediz Derya, and chose your address and my mind tells me to inform you about this, It is also good to let you know that I shall bear the cost of transferring this fund to you, and I hope you act sincerely, please get back to me immediately via my private email address (reverendhendryx@yandex.com)with the following information below. YOUR NAME:………………? YOUR COUNTRY:…………? YOUR PHONE NO:………? OCCUPATION:……………? AGE:……………………………? SEX:……………………… NOTE: I shall bear the cost of transferring this money to you; all I need is your sincerity. God bless you. Sincerely, Rev. Bianca Hendryx

Subject: Quarantined and Spam/Junk Email Report
TextBody: You have 6 new quarantined and Spam/Junk emails over the last 24 hours, which are listed below. Subject: Visit Genting Sustainbiz Expo 2024!
TextBody: 10 - 12 September 2024 I Genting International Convention Centre View this email in your browser<https://mailchi.mp/224a3b98308e/join-the-future-of-sustainable-fb-at-genting-sustainbiz-fb-expo-6414188?e=55bc31c2f3> [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/d86df1a8-2d14-aaed-36b5-b003e7b384f4.png] The wait is almost over! The Genting Sustainbiz Expo 2024 will be kicking off tomorrow and we can’t wait to welcome you to a world of sustainable innovation, inspiring discussions, and powerful connections! Register as Visitor<https://fooddrinksmalaysia.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b419646b3821f071b47d7817c&id=96cc7bd5e6&e=55bc31c2f3> [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/daed87a8-4e0c-2b6c-7f4f-c36bec6dea8e.jpeg] Don’t Miss the Chance to Catch up with the Industry Experts! Seminars are free to attend for all registered trade visitors. Speakers Overview<https://fooddrinksmalaysia.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b419646b3821f071b47d7817c&id=da5c16fbd4&e=55bc31c2f3> [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/bf5f075f-8d82-67b4-6d8a-dbef38409833.jpg] Live Cooking Demo and Food Tasting by Resorts World Genting's Superchef Squad Meet the incredible team of Executive Chefs who bring their unique superpowers and plant-based delights to the table through cooking demonstrations and food tasting sessions. [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/356c0306-4621-7806-7d4b-44baf84ea93c.jpg] Exclusive Discounts and Perks Enjoy exclusive perks such as 10% discounts on selected food and beverage outlets and special rates from our supporting partners to enhance your experience during the expo. [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/eafe9ccd-8366-e32d-cad9-45cc7b7bdadf.jpg] Convenience and Accessibility Commuting is easy with various options<https://fooddrinksmalaysia.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b419646b3821f071b47d7817c&id=85e493406a&e=55bc31c2f3> such as express buses and limousine transfers. Express buses run every 30 minutes from KL Sentral station and other selected destinations from 9 am to 9 pm, with Resorts World Genting limousine transfer options to any destination in Peninsular Malaysia or Singapore for added convenience. For delegates staying at Highlands Hotel, a luxurious Mercedes-Benz hybrid car transfer service is available courtesy of Hap Seng Star. [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/8e44908e-1311-9645-20ac-6e1985a7ab26.jpg] Check out the Admission Policy before visiting the show to ensure a smooth experience! Admission Policy<https://fooddrinksmalaysia.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b419646b3821f071b47d7817c&id=2bac3001ec&e=55bc31c2f3> Join the conversation and be part of the revolutionary sustainability food and beverage industry now. Email us at info.sustainbiz@rwgenting.com<mailto:info.sustainbiz@rwgenting.com> for more details. [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/132413e5-8bcc-414f-aa81-98fdd5d2de8d.png] Copyright (C) 2024 All rights reserved. You are receiving this email because you opted in via our website. Our mailing address is: Comexposium Sdn Bhd D-16-08, Menara Suezcap 1, KL Gateway, No.2, Jalan Kerinchi, Gerbang Kerinchi Lestari Kuala Lumpur, 14 59200 Malaysia Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences<https://fooddrinksmalaysia.us11.list-manage.com/profile?u=b419646b3821f071b47d7817c&id=4ed6710f13&e=55bc31c2f3&c=2f939a9169> or unsubscribe<https://fooddrinksmalaysia.us11.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=b419646b3821f071b47d7817c&id=4ed6710f13&t=b&e=55bc31c2f3&c=2f939a9169>

Subject: Claim : 926 (discoloration)
TextBody: Hello Pieter san. Good morning. Today, we were informed about discoloration which looks like mold to me by our 900g PB customer. Please kindly see the attached photos first. They sent us 2 bags of claim products and the expiry date and lot code are exactly same as one another. I’d like to know whether these black spots/patches are actually mold and can you confirm it just by the photo that I send??? The claim products are kept at our office, and we can send you more pictures if you need it. SKU: shoestring cut 1kgx12 Order no.: 12140226xx23 Expiry Date: 2026/1/21 Lot code: C04 24 023 11:37 Claim : discoloration Your quick response is greatly appreciated since we need to block this batch before the products are reached to end customer if these discolorations are considered mold.

Subject: New Supplier DDL
TextBody: Dear, As a new supplier, we would like to inform you about the delivery procedures applicable at Delhaize, depending on the warehouse where you will be delivering to, via our Guiding Book: delhaizegroup.sharefile<https://delhaizegroup.sharefile.eu/d/s92c1946cbad4775a> For the publication of your product range you will find information in the segment "item creation", also available via delhaizegroup.sharefile.<https://delhaizegroup.sharefile.eu/d/s92c1946cbad4775a> Commercial documents will have to be exchanged electronically. This can be done by means of your integrated EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) or by using our own WEB portal: Edicom Portal. This is a manual solution, which, of course, will be limited to Delhaize, also allows you to generate your SSCC labels. This Edicom Portal is not only the preferred backup solution for your integrated EDI, but also the platform where you can view or download additional information. So, please register on this site if you don’t have an account yet: https://webportal.edicomgroup.com/suppliers/delhaize/registry.htm?tipo=DG The user manual for our web portal can be found on our shared file edicom portal.<https://delhaizegroup.sharefile.eu/d-s30fd4af400f4c8a8> You also need to communicate to us at the latest one hour before the delivery what will be on the truck by means of an electronic delivery note (DESADV/ASN - Despatch Advice/Advanced Shipping Note) with sscc code if you deliver at pallet level. All pallets must be equipped with 2 valid SSCC-labels, see delhaizegroup.sharefile<https://delhaizegroup.sharefile.eu/d/s92c1946cbad4775a> for more info. The reception of the goods can only take place if the DESADV (despatch advice/ASN) is OK. To create a mandatory DESADV (dispatch advice/ASN), you can use your integrated EDI or our Web-Portal. When using uniquely identifiable crate (Delhaize crates), you should be sent a DESADV/ASN at crate level. Attention! This can only be done by using an integrated EDI solution. If in doubt, do not hesitate to contact your commercial contact at Delhaize. In addition, we also expect that all suppliers have booked an appointment first via the internet on our website "C3 Reservations". The order forms (PO or Purchase Order) will be available on this site and on this basis a reservation for delivery can be made within the predetermined time slots. An account will be created after receiving your data. To do this, please complete the Excel file " TO FILL IN.xls " attached, so that we have all the information necessary to carry out these procedures. Upon delivery, the driver must always present himself through the QR-code on the appointment document. If he does not have this document with him, this delivery will be considered as a delivery without appointment and this vehicle may be refused or only unloaded when there is time and a place to do so. If you have more specific questions, do not hesitate to contact us on our general number +32 (0) 2 412 95 95 or via the general mail address edisupport@delhaize.be.<mailto:ediservices@delhaize.be> Last but not least is the issue of invoicing. In line with the orders, we also want you to use E-invoicing, either via the Delhaize Portal or via an integrated EDI solution. This Delhaize portal is the same as mentioned above. The manual for invoicing can also be found on the shared file edicom portal.<https://delhaizegroup.sharefile.eu/d-s30fd4af400f4c8a8> Why E-Invoicing?: Invoices performed by E-invoicing will be integrated automatically in our systems and will guarantee an automatic Invoice matching and payment, on the due date! Contact details Accounting: Technical EDI Invoice issues: edisupport@delhaize.be<mailto:edisupport@delhaize.be> 02/412 95 95 Outstanding invoices: Helpdesk_supplier_invoices@delhaize.be <mailto:Helpdesk_supplier_invoices@delhaize.be > 02/412 21 11 Payment advice: payment_service@delhaize.be<mailto:payment_service@delhaize.be> Met vriendelijke groeten, Cordialement,

Subject: Free Sale Colombia - Ritchie, Capitaine en Mondelle
TextBody: Goedemorgen Richard, Ik zal stilaan een nieuwe rol opnemen en de free sales niet meer zelf aanvragen, Maarten zal dit in de toekomst zelf mogen doen, maar ik assisteer hem nu nog even. Mag ik juist nog vragen waarom u 3 aparte documenten wil? We kunnen de producten met de verschillende merken toch allemaal op hetzelfde free sales document vermelden? Om de free sales te kunnen aanvragen zou ik ons de artikel nummers of EAN codes kunnen geven zodat we kunnen kijken of we bepaalde free sales kunnen hergebruiken en anders zeker voor de juiste producten de free sales opmaken? De free sales in Colombia is namelijk 5 jaar geldig en ik zag dat we voor Ritchie in onderstaande producten nog een geldige free sales hadden: HF artikel klantartikel grouped description productie ingredienten 300159 305552 RIT F10 1,0 2 I120NL 2000143 RITCHIE FRENCH FRIES Tilburg, Netherlands Potatoes, Palm oil. 302404 311908 RIT CRC 2,5 2 I120BE 2000318 RITCHIE FRENCH FRIES Harelbeke, Belgium Potatoes, Palm oil. 300005 313728 RIT ALL 2,5 1 I108BE Wielsbeke, Belgium Potatoes, Palm oil. In bijlage vindt u de Belgische geapostilleerde free sales voor de Ritchie producten, die zou u moeten kunnen hergebruiken door de klant te vragen of ze met het digitale document kunnen werken. De apostille van het document kan ook op https://legalweb.diplomatie.be/ worden aangevraagd. Als je hier het legalisatienummer (230926553868) en de datum (18/09/2023) invult, verschijnt het document waarop de apostille is verleend. Dit is de officiële site van de Belgische overheidsdiplomatie. Het origineel is destijds al doorgestuurd naar de autoriteiten van Colombia bij de aanvraag van uw vorige klant, dus zij zouden het origineel al moeten hebben. Ik kijk uit naar uw feedback. Met vriendelijke groeten, Mercedes D'hoker Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 63 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Richard Kettering [richard.kettering@mondialfoods.nl] Sent: 6/09/2024 20:19 To: Regine.Legein@agristo.com; Maarten.Bonte@agristo.com; Mercedes.Dhoker@agristo.com Cc: jurgen.nijboer@mondialfoods.nl Subject: Free Sale Colombia Bon tardi, Kunnen jullie mij ook helpen met de Free Sale certificates voor Colombia? Hier moet het merk wel vernoemd worden. Gaarne voor Ritchie, Capitaine en Mondelle. 3 aparte dus. Zie de draft graag tegemoet. Ik wacht op antwoord voor de andere FSC. Kom hier z.s.m. op terug. Plezant weekend!! ​

TextBody: Good morning Zoeb, hope you are doing fine? As we are finalizing our data for the first production, we are sending you the labels for your approval on the Sidewinder® Fries. The labels will be printed during production onto the bag or label will be added to the carton box. Could you please check if the below labels would suit you? Or please advise if additional infromation should be added? Expiry period is 24 months, calculated from the production date. BAG -2.25kg OUTER CASE - 4 x 2.25kg We are scheduling the first production for these Sidewinder® Fries to take place in W39, within 2 weeks. So we would be happy to receive your feedback/approval asap.

Subject: Increase Your ROI at SIAL 2024 with Dékuple
TextBody: Dear AGRISTO nv Team, As you prepare for the SIAL in Paris this October, consider how Dékuple can elevate your brand and increase your ROI. We specialize in organizing exclusive side events: lunches, dinners, and receptions at premium restaurants or private venues. Do you want to meet the right partners or clients? -Share your ideal persona with us, and we’ll handle the invitation process. -We take care of all event details so you can focus on showcasing your company. Do you plan to present new products or innovations to press, partners, or clients in a private setting？ -We can privatize venues and organize a complete reception tailored to needs. -Provide us with a list of expected invitees, and we’ll manage the rest. Ready to make a significant impact at SIAL 2024 in Paris? Let’s connect. For more information, visit www.dekuple.com or reach out to us at contact@dekuple.cn.

Subject: D&B Finance Analytics - Nieuws en waarschuwingen
TextBody: D&B Finance Analytics Datum 09/09/2024 Tijd 06:20 AM D&B Finance Analytics WAARSCHUWINGEN In deze e-mail Inbox Waarschuwingen Totaal Waarschuwingen 1 (1 Bedrijven) Informatief 1 Opwaartse trends 0 Ernstige voorvallen 0 Neerwaartse trends 0 De ernst van de waarschuwing wordt bepaald door het algemene gebeurtenistype. Dit kan betekenen dat in sommige gevallen een gebeurtenis verandering zowel negatief als positief kan zijn. Bekijk altijd de volledige details van elke gebeurtenis voordat u actie onderneemt. De door D&B verstrekte ernst classificatie, positief/negatief en gebeurtenis beschrijving worden te goeder trouw verstrekt en kunnen er niet tegen D&B worden gebruikt. Subject: Rimi PO/ 4572356561/4572356558/AGRISTO NV
TextBody: Hello, Dear Business Partner, In attachment, you will find orders from Rimi Baltic Group. We kindly ask you to provide requested information within 24 hours after receiving the order and respond to all receivers of this message. RELEASE TERMS 6.1. The Parties agree about lead time in the Specification A hereto. 6.2. The Seller is obliged to inform the Buyer regarding the fastest possible time, when the Goods are ready for loading in the Loading place no later within 24 (twenty-four) hours after receiving of the Order from the Buyer. 6.3. The Parties agree by e-mail about concrete loading time of the Goods in the Loading place, but always taking into account the Lead Time defined in the Specification A. 6.4. The Seller undertakes to release the Goods to the Buyer not later than within 2 (two) hours from the moment, when the Buyer arrives in the Loading place. 6.5. The Seller shall by e-mail and telephone inform the Buyer of any delays at least 2 (two) Business Days prior to the agreed Goods Release, as stated in Clause 6.3. In that case the Parties shall agree on another time for Goods Release. 6.6. If the Seller fails Goods Release, as well as fails to notify the Buyer of the delay in full accordance with the provisions of Clause 6.5, the Buyer shall be entitled to either propose the Seller another Goods Release time or to reject the Goods. In case of delay due to the fault of the Seller it is liable for any losses incurred by the Buyer. Filled by RIMI Latvia PO number 4572356561 4572356558 Requested loading date 12.09.2024 12.09.2024 Requested delivery date 15.09.2024 15.09.2024 Filled by Supplier Confirmed loading date Reference number Pallets / pallet places Filled by Transport Plate number ETA (estimated time of arrival) Confirmed delivery date

Subject: NEW ORDER PO 84 - PO 90
TextBody: Dear Louise, Hope you had a great weekend ! Referring to the subject, enclosed herewith are the new orders with requested ETA as below. Kindly note that each of these POs must arrive one container per week except for PO 84 and PO 85, where these PO must arrive on the same week but different days; i.e., there must be gap between these two POs' arrival by at least two days. Therefore, stated below are suggested ETA and you may give suggestion of the earliest ETA if the ETAs below is not in favor in terms of the availability of the SKUs. PO ETA PO 84 WK 43 PO 85 WK 43 PO 86 WK 44 PO 87 WK 45 PO 88 WK 46 PO 89 WK 47 PO 90 WK 48 Note : Diwali festive season falls on Week 44, hence might need at least 2 containers before Week 44 to avoid any complications in terms of the availability of officers at port side which might effect clearance process.

Subject: First Production run - ASDA Cheesy Mash
TextBody: I am travelling and on a site visit on Mon 9th Sept and Tues 10th Sept. During this time I will be accessing emails intermittently and I will respond as soon as possible. If your query is urgent please contact me on my mobile (+44 78813 38652). Alternatively, please contact a member of the Fullers Foods technical team - technical@fullersfoodsplc.com<mailto:technical@fullersfoodsplc.com>. Many thanks, Dan

Subject: Visit Report - Asda Cheesy Mash 1st Production
TextBody: Hi Daniel, see below the feedback I got from Fien: 1. Fien will discuss this with the quality manager now she is back from holiday. For now, the weight of the TU2 bags remains the same. 2. An Ultimo report has been created for this (400239). This means our maintenance has this in their todo list to fix. 3. Communication was done via email to everyone in the plant. 4. External technicians must sign upon arrival, acknowledging that they are aware of the hygiene rules we have in place at Agristo (this includes managing their equipment and not leaving anything behind). We also have checklists to ensure that nothing is left behind after each intervention. QC conducts a walk through during each shift to check for any stray materials. 5. We are reviewing the procedures for the Chemical bottles at each site and considering possible adjustments. However, no concrete decision has been made yet, so it’s still ‘in progress.’ 8. Certificate: will send this over once I have received it from quality team. 10.11. Waiting on final QAS from Daniel Please do note hesitate in case of further questions.

Subject: Invitation to Participate in Emirates Airline's Projects
TextBody: Dear Sir/Ma, We are thrilled to extend a formal invitation to your esteemed organization to partake in the vendor registration and partnership program for the highly anticipated Emirates Airlines 2024/2025 projects. This is a remarkable opportunity for your company to showcase its capabilities and establish a valuable partnership with one of the leading airlines in the industry. Should your company be interested in participating, kindly confirm your interest at your earliest convenience. Subsequently, we will swiftly provide you with all the requisite documentation, including the Vendor Questionnaire form and Policy Assessment Letter. We look forward to the possibility of collaborating with your organization and leveraging your expertise to deliver exceptional results for these prestigious projects.

Subject: NOMAD FOODS EUROPE - NOTIFICATION OF COMPLAINT - Case Number: 00490688
TextBody: Hi Agristo team, I hope you are doing well. Please find attached photos of what consumer claims they found embedded in their roast potato, we believe this is just a root, however, we are not 100% certain. Please may we ask you to have a look at the photos attached. We have requested more photos from the consumer. We are reluctant to to get this back, due to the fact it could deteriorate in transit. Bedankt voor je hulp, Met vriendelijke groeten, Sean NOMAD FOODS EUROPE - NOTIFICATION OF COMPLAINT CASE REFERENCE NUMBER: 00490688 ADVISOR NAME: Dukagjin Binakaj DATE SAMPLE RECEIVED: 06/09/2024 PRODUCT NAME: Duck Fat Roast Potatoes 700g ARTICLE CODE: BATCH CODE: 4116C080BJ BEST BEFORE DATE: 31/01/2026 BATCH TIME: 08:36 SUBJECT PHOTOS, BATCH/Cx claims Worm?possible potato root, size unknown/Embedded/ 1 pack/ Unhappy: Worm IN WHAT PART OF THE PRODUCT WAS THE FOREIGN BODY FOUND : * Embedded in the product FACTORY ACTION: * ID THIS SECTION IS TO BE COMPLETED BY FACTORY QA PERSON COMPLETING INVESTIGATION: DATE FOREIGN BODY RECEIVED AT FACTORY: DATE REPORT COMPLETED: IDENTITY OF THE FOREIGN MATERIAL: (size, shape, organic or not, etc.) LIKELY ORIGIN OF THE FOREIGN BODY: WHAT PRECAUTIONS ARE IN PLACE TO TRY TO PREVENT THIS TYPE OF COMPLAINT? Subject: Seguimiento y cálculo de nivel de servicio SCOT
TextBody: Estimado proveedor, Desde Makro estamos dando mucha importancia y poniendo foco al nivel de servicio recibido y para ello disponemos de la herramienta SCOT con la que realizamos cálculo de nivel de servicio de todos los proveedores. Como recordatorio, les informamos que el nivel de servicio que se registra en SCOT quedará cerrado el día 12 de cada mes siguiente al calculado sin posibilidad de corrección posterior pudiendo acarrear compensaciones económicas por nivel de servicio si fuera el caso. Por ello les animamos a realizar de manera semanal o quincenal seguimiento de nivel de servicio y asignar los motivos en SCOT en las posibles incidencias que aparezcan en el periodo seleccionado. En caso de no tener acceso poneros en contacto con Miguel.Rufilanchas@makro.es y os ayudará con ello. En caso de ya tener acceso adjunto guía de uso. Una vez dentro de SCOT cualquier duda en cuanto asignaciones de motivos pueden ponerse en contacto conmigo en victor.matellano@makro.es . Tengan en cuentan que los Root Cause del 1 al 16 son responsabilidad del proveedor y del 17 en adelante responsabilidad de Makro. Añadan comentarios y adjunten archivos en caso de ser necesario para clarificar el RC asignado. Muchas gracias por su colaboración. Saludos, Víctor Matellano

Subject: COPY TRANSFER
TextBody: David Soto Rosell

Subject: Fwd: Pacific Valley Foods | Contact Us | Rice
TextBody: Hi John, I have well received the remark about a foreign object (plastic-like) which was found. Could you please clarify if the foreign object was found in the box, or in a hash brown itself? Either way, we are very sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied about the quality of the Pacific Valley Patties. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us. I have registered this complaint in our system under ticket 00048447. Our production process contains a lot of physical and optical elimination steps for foreign objects. Agristo also tries to invest in all new best practice technical solutions to avoid foreign objects. First potatoes go through a stone remover. The stone remover works on centrifugal forces and removes all objects that are heavier than potatoes. After the stone remover there is a water bath to remove all the floating parts (such as plastic) and a hedgehog conveyor to eliminate leafage, the leafage sticks to the pins that come out of the conveyor and are removed that way. After the potatoes are peeled and washed, they go through an optical sorter to eliminate foreign objects. By use of a color camera, foreign bodies, green potatoes and potatoes with heavy defects and diseases are rejected by a mechanical system. After that the potatoes are pumped to the production line where they are cut by means of a water carving knife (this knife will block larger foreign objects). Afterwards, the cut potatoes are checked on the production line by a second optical sorter. In addition to color cameras, this one also has a special scanner that measures density. Plastic, paper or other foreign materials have a different density than potatoes and are intercepted in this way. This optical sorter is tested monthly. Please also note that the Hash Brown pattie is a pre-fried product (180°C) . It seems very unlikely that a piece of plastic can go through the entire production process (with lots of water, knives, a baking oven, …) and end up in a hash brown. It would have been removed in the water bath and or burnt in the baking oven. Would it also be possible to give me more information about the foreign object? What exact material is it made from? Which color has the plastic? Did the customer keep the packaging, so we can look at the best before date or lot code so we can investigate our production records? If possible and thorough investigation is needed, could you please also send it to the following address with reference to ticket 00048447: Agristo Nazareth nv For the attention of Renate Vanderbeken Venecoweg 12 9810 Nazareth Belgium Thank you for your feedback. Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: John Hannah [john@pacificvalleyfoods.com] Sent: 7/09/2024 18:36 To: Melissa.Samyn@agristo.com Cc: Sandrine.VanBockstael@agristo.com Subject: Fwd: Pacific Valley Foods | Contact Us | Rice Dear Melissa, Please see report below from consumer stating they found a piece of plastic inside one of the hashbrowns. We have seen this issue on multiple occasions from USA processors when the forming heads made out of plastic or Teflon can break and pieces can end up inside the hashbrowns. I have asked them for a photo and the production plant code and will forward this along to you. Please let me know if you received any other reports of foreign material or plastic found in your hashbrowns.

Subject: Nieuwe tarieven, meer studenten, het moment om te starten!
TextBody: Matchen met young potentials was nog nooit zo eenvoudig. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ [https://i1.cmail19.com/ei/y/80/790/76D/194342/csfinal/HeaderCompany-NoPicture-9900000000079e3c-9900000000079e3c.png] Nieuwe tarieven, meer studenten?! Beste, Dit academiejaar gaan we voluit voor marktleiderschap! We hebben onze strategie aangescherpt en onze licenties<https://wefynd.cmail19.com/t/y-l-mdhtyty-hrihtyuddr-r/> vernieuwd, zodat je nu voor slechts €240 per jaar al kan genieten van alle voordelen van onze (web)applicatie. Naast continue visibiliteit onder studenten, is het de perfecte manier om jouw vacatures voor starters, stages en studentenjobs in te vullen. Maak bedrijfsprofiel aan<https://wefynd.cmail19.com/t/y-l-mdhtyty-hrihtyuddr-y/> Wat doet We fynd nu weer? Met onze (web)applicatie brengen wij jullie bedrijf, de vacatures en de gewenste doelgroep in kaart. Ons matchingsalgoritme selecteert de studenten die het beste aansluiten bij jullie voorkeuren. Dit zorgt voor verschillende voordelen: * Directe toegang tot een grote database aan recent afgestudeerden, stagiairs en jobstudenten die perfect aansluiten bij wat jullie zoeken. * Een indrukwekkende responsgraad van 82% op onze contactverzoeken. * Meer dan de helft van de studenten beantwoordt de contactverzoeken positief én komt op sollicitatiegesprek. Wist je dat we dit jaar het aantal partnerships met studentenverenigingen hebben verdubbeld? In combinatie met onze vernieuwde marketingstrategie streven we naar een verdrievoudiging van het aantal actieve studenten op ons platform. Wil jij dit jaar het beste talent aantrekken, maak dan nu het bedrijfsaccount aan! Ga nu aan de slag!<https://wefynd.cmail19.com/t/y-l-mdhtyty-hrihtyuddr-j/>

Subject: Fwd: Pacific Valley Foods | Contact Us | Rice
TextBody: Dear Melissa, Please see report below from consumer stating they found a piece of plastic inside one of the hashbrowns. We have seen this issue on multiple occasions from USA processors when the forming heads made out of plastic or Teflon can break and pieces can end up inside the hashbrowns. I have asked them for a photo and the production plant code and will forward this along to you. Please let me know if you received any other reports of foreign material or plastic found in your hashbrowns.

Subject: Request for Quotation - 15 containers Frozen French Fries
TextBody: Dear team, I hope this message finds you well. I am writing on behalf of BEST FRESH FOOD, a leading food supplier operating in Kinshasa, DR Congo. We are currently looking to procure 15 containers of 9x9 frozen French fries and would like to request a quotation for this order. Could you please provide us with the following details: -Pricing for 15 containers of 9x9 frozen French fries. -Information on whether you can export to Matadi Port. -Additional details about the products, including quality specifications and packaging options. We would appreciate it if you could send us this information at your earliest convenience to help us proceed with our planning. Thank you for your assistance. We look forward to your prompt response.

Subject: Re : Mashed potato - Bulgaria
TextBody: Good afternoon, I hope this e-mail finds you well. My name is Atanas Ivanov, representing IVIMPEX LTD. I am reaching out to express my interest in supplying products to the HORECA market in Bulgaria. Our interests include the following products: * Mashed potato with milk powder (0.5, 1 and 3 KG in pouches) * Mashed potato for cold preparation (0.5, 1 and 3 KG in pouches) or another mashed potato that I saw you offer - red Please confirm if transportation of 2/3 pallets can be arranged directly to Sofia, Bulgaria. Looking forward to your response.

Subject: NOMAD FOODS EUROPE - NOTIFICATION OF COMPLAINT - Case Number: 00490688
TextBody: Dear Sean, We have well received your below notification. Having reviewed the production details, we can link the folllowing production: - Agristo Lot: C08 24 116 0836 - Product: Aunt Bessies Special Duck Fat Roast 700g (DU 96017181) - Production date: April 25th 2024 - Production batch: 1203024922 It's a bit difficult to see on the picture, but based on our experience we believe this could indeed be an internal sprout. Also keeping the actual production date in mind (end of April -- end of potato season) it is more likely that sprouts occur. Given the cut size of these Roast Potatoes, it would indeed be possible, that an internal sprout would not be detected by our optical sorters, considering this is completely inside the roast. I confirm there is little point in sending us the FB, on arrival it would be completely mouldy which would not lead to any additional information. However, if you would receive more detailed pictures, please feel free to forward them to our attention. Our apologies for the inconvenience,

TextBody: Goedendag, Bijgevoegd treft u onze inkoopbevestiging. D24-02095 Laden week 40 Bestemming: Kaapverdie Verzendadres: MING investimentos Er komen 2 pallets ingevroren groente van Pasfrost bij Met vriendelijke groet, William Nannes J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Tel: +310226396408 Mobiel: +31610946168 Mail: william@jpb.nl<mailto:william@jpb.nl> J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

Subject: ONLINE LENINGEN
TextBody: MAATWERK ONLINE LENINGEN Wij bieden een compleet scala aan online leningen die zijn afgestemd op uw behoeften, inclusief persoonlijke leningen, hypotheken en consumptieleningen, met bedragen variërend van 5.000 € tot 698.000 €, alles tegen een aantrekkelijke rente van 2 % per jaar. Voor ambitieuzere projecten bieden wij financieringen tot 2 miljoen euro in verschillende sectoren, zoals: Duurzame technologieën en hernieuwbare energie, Innovatie en start-ups, Ecologische landbouw, Woningbouw en infrastructuur, Transport en mobiliteit, en Geavanceerde productie. Geïnteresseerd? Dien uw aanvraag online in via onze website of neem rechtstreeks contact met ons op per e-mail voor meer informatie. E-mail: info@cyrafgroup.com<https://mail.cyrafgroup.com/roundcube14/#NOP> Website: http://cyrafgroup.com/<http://cyrafgroup.com/demande#googtrans(nl)>

Subject: NEW ORDER - AGRISTO HAPPY MARKET PRIVATE LABEL - 2409002209 - ETA MALE TBA
TextBody: Dear Lauren. Hope you are well. Please see attached our CIF Male' order 2409002209 for 1 x 40 reefer palletized load of Agristo French Fries in Private Label for Happy Market. Client requires eta Male': TBA closer to the time of shipping. Please book vessel departing in time to meet above arrival date. Herewith the list of documents we need, please forward draft documents before issuing for our confirmation: Please include our order number 2409002209 on all documents to link them together. * BL - 3 originals & 3 copies * Invoice - 2 originals & 2 copies * Packing List - 2 originals * Certificate of Origin * Health Certificate * Phytosanitary Certificate - to include the net weight and number of cartons * Halaal Certificate Labelling requirements and carton branding: * Manufacturer address to be mentioned on the cartons * Country of origin to be mentioned on primary and secondary packaging * Brand name to be mentioned on the primary and secondary packaging * Expiry date and production date to be mentioned on primary and secondary packaging * Sizes of the goods to be mentioned on the primary and secondary packaging * Name of the goods to be mentioned on the primary and secondary packaging * Ingredients to be mentioned in English Temp recorder to be added. Details are as follows: Shipper: AGRISTO NV RIDDER DE GHELLINCKSTRAAT 9 8710 WIELSBEKE Belgium JOINTLY AND SEVERALLY WITH INDIAN OCEAN EXPORT COMPANY (PTY) LTD 197 SMISO NKWANYANA ROAD DURBAN, MORNINGSIDE 4001 KWA-ZULU NATAL, SOUTH AFRICA NB!! Consignee and Notify Party: Please note new Maldives port Customs rule states that the Consignee & Notify party Company Registration number must be shown on the B/L - the container will not be allowed to clear if this is not reflected. Consignee and Notify Party: HAPPY MARKET TRADING COMPANY PRIVATE LIMITED REG NO: C-12/92 M. NEW PLOT, 20307 AMEENEE MAGU MALE' REP OF MALDIVES TEL: +960 3313523 FAX: +960 3313522 All original documents to be couriered to IOEC, for ATTENTION: Melinda Smith. Please note no documents to go in the container. Please email the packing list as soon as the container is packed and confirm receipt of this order.

Subject: Inkooporder D24-02109
TextBody: J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als "AHV"), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopie?n van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopie?n daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as "GCT") including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confi?es, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont r?gis de mani?re exclusive par le droit n?erlandais et nos Conditions G?n?rales (nomm?es dessous aussi "CG "), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive ? l'article 4.3 (arbitrage ? La Haye Pays-Bas conform?ment au r?glement d'arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont ?t? d?pos?es au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, d?pendance ? Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Subject: Coop Trading Webinar regarding master data (Mandatory) 1 out of 3 possible
TextBody: Dear Coop Trading supplier, In spring Coop Trading launched a new initiative to improve the mater data quality, as our master data at datapools like GS1 often was wrong. In May we invited all our suppliers for a Master data webinar regarding the importance of correct master data. Here we also launched the prototype sample concept, so we can validate the measurements and gross weight of the product. After collecting data for 3 months and validating over 1000 samples, we are ready to make a recap on the process and show our findings regarding validating dimensions and gross weight. These webinars are mandatory for all Coop Trading supplier. Please join one of the 3 webinars: 18th of September 2:30 PM 19th of September 8:30 AM 24th of September 1:00 PM Please press this link to join the session Session 1 out of 3 (18/9)<https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_ZjU5OTQyNTktYTdkNS00ZDc0LTgxMmUtODQ5ODU3N2U0ZTky%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%220c87a07e-d06d-4d2c-9c60-2eb2b858e630%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%221234fd29-62d3-45fb-b3da-64a782b4a770%22%7d> This email is sent to the main contact in Coop Trading's system. You are more than welcome to invite relevant colleagues in your own organization

Subject: Transport en Logistiek met hart voor voeding. Sud-Fresh, Transporteur van het Jaar, is Uw Partner.
TextBody: [https://mcusercontent.com/dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb/images/a6def312-6aaf-268a-d385-d544239c11d5.jpg] [https://mcusercontent.com/dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb/images/f30f50a4-3e62-176a-d5c5-87972ab80c7c.jpeg] U wenst: * Een betrouwbare én flexibele partner die écht naar u luistert? * Een lokale specialist in geconditioneerde voedingsproducten met dekking in de hele BeNeLux? * Ontzorging van uw transport en logistiek zodat u zich kan focussen op uw core-business? Zoek niet verder! Sud-Fresh, Transporteur van het Jaar 2024, staat voor u klaar! [https://mcusercontent.com/dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb/images/7958190d-db4d-c62a-a3e0-f0441de04031.jpg] [https://mcusercontent.com/dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb/images/1e17f0be-2bac-e1bd-1678-82dc0a743dd9.jpeg] Waarom kiezen voor Sud-Fresh? * Meer dan 25 jaar ervaring. * Specialisatie in Transport van vers en diepvries voeding. * Value Added Logistics (stockage, picking) in multitemp omgeving. * Volledige dekking in de BeNeLux. * Flexibel en betrouwbaar: Wij kennen de schommelingen inherent aan de voedingsindustrie. Daarom bieden we flexibele oplossingen die anticiperen op uw veranderende behoeften. * Belgische trots. * 100% eigen opgeleide chauffeurs, vrachtwagens en infrastructuur. * Uw producten zijn onze prioriteit. Wij nodigen u graag uit om onze bekroonde diensten zelf te ervaren! Contacteer ons<mailto:rheylen@sud-fresh.com?subject=Aanvraag%20informatie%20transport%2Flogistiek&body=> Liever telefonisch contact? Bel ons op +32 (0)494/16.66.69 Samen zijn we klaar voor al uw toekomstige logistieke uitdagingen! [https://mcusercontent.com/dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb/images/cdb2974f-441a-386e-a237-4b1b5351fdc1.jpeg] [https://mcusercontent.com/dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb/video_thumbnails_new/b2e1f3a5a9e68c0eb266a5654f63cdc4.png]<https://sud-fresh.us17.list-manage.com/track/click?u=dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb&id=0f94fc84dd&e=25f50033ec> [Website icon]<https://sud-fresh.us17.list-manage.com/track/click?u=dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb&id=cb02acd9e0&e=25f50033ec> [LinkedIn icon]<https://sud-fresh.us17.list-manage.com/track/click?u=dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb&id=78f833b31c&e=25f50033ec> [https://mcusercontent.com/dd01ad36bfb409ce7dc0c9acb/images/af4ed501-e86e-aef5-6f79-b011447fd74a.jpg] Copyright (C) 2024 *|Sud-Fresh|*. Subject: Join us in celebrating a decade of excellence at Gulfood Manufacturing
TextBody: [https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/op/sh/7nVTPddU8lzHnqShIUObmHa2FBUf8TL/rr8tDf1JFLCJ] <https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2nfsTSz6mDZU2BfSfaxGTAO3/5rjP_cqVpiDP> [Header Banner] CELEBRATING A DECADE OF EXCELLENCE: JOIN US FOR A LANDMARK 10th EDITION! In 2024, we proudly mark a decade since Gulfood Manufacturing<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2nfuMSVc5C8iUE1mTlJlFuKZ/YLmuphpWg2WF> opened its doors, and grew into a pivotal platform for the F&B manufacturing industry. Our story extends far beyond this milestone. Expect to see groundbreaking innovations in ingredients from food biofortification to AI driven ingredients, showcasing the latest industry advancements from nanotechnology in packaging to Industry 5.0, gain insights and visionary strategies from global experts on risk and tech investment, and drive business growth to achieve competitive advantage in the industry. This year, Gulfood Manufacturing<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2nfwFS27OAhwwGO6HvgG2eH5/cV0X8mbYUCl9> <https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2nfy8RYch9HBOIkQ662kpODb/kMllGWETZwqf> returns bigger than ever with a powerful presence of over 2,500 global companies spanning 72 countries across 19 halls. We invite you to be part of our landmark 10th anniversary edition, taking place from 5 - 7 November 2024 at the Dubai World Trade Centre. Don't miss your chance to be a part of this milestone celebration and extend the legacy of this industry-leading event. The food manufacturing revolution is underway— are you ready to evolve with it? REGISTER TO VISIT<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng01R5807qPqL6juGPFc8A7/D2FiZWbFZmIh> *Free for trade professionals TOP TRENDS IN 2024 2024 is ushering in evolving trends in global food production preferences, marked by a notable shift towards consumer customisation, food biofortification technologies, smart supply chains, nanotechnology in packaging, enhancing food packing automation, investment towards supply chain resilience, diversifying sourcing strategies, implementing risk management and tech investment - essential to commercial profitability. Maximising operational efficiencies and embracing the vision of Industry 5.0 to improve the quality, safety, and sustainability of food production and consumption. [https://5osld.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/jY9qDoxz8peI.png?u=2BpAyz2gMiWnceUiNOn5f0O4vEqwqDM7KV] INDUSTRY 5.0 IN FOOD & BEVERAGE Understand how Industry 5.0 integrates AI, automation, and IoT to improve food production quality, safety, and sustainability. PRECISION FERMENTATION FOR ADDED NUTRITION See how precision fermentation is transforming the production of animal proteins without animals, with the market expected to grow significantly by 2030. [https://5osld.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/nua1xdsq6kfN.png?u=2BpAyz2gMiWncgNhtu64EEq7HYf7Ci8rH1] [https://5osld.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/IRNDaBCku-Fb.png?u=2BpAyz2gMiWnciGhQPP2nTI9dsTHZCvbDX] PRODUCTION LINES OF THE FUTURE Explore the future of food production with automation, IoT, AI, 3D printing for customised food products, and blockchain for transparency and traceability. DRIVEN INGREDIENT DISCOVERY Explore how AI is revolutionising ingredient discovery, and identifying new components to enhance food products. [https://5osld.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/7Z1yBRVmZWU4.png?u=2BpAyz2gMiWnck9gwui1MhkC0CHRvhiLA3] [https://5osld.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/ws1NZrR5WW4i.png?u=2BpAyz2gMiWncm2gTQ0zvwCEMW5cICV56Z] NANOTECHNOLOGY IN PACKAGING Experience nanotechnology-enhanced packaging that improves food safety, quality, and shelf life with antimicrobial protection and real-time condition monitoring. SMART SUPPLY CHAINS Learn about smart systems, sensors, and distributed production models enhancing efficiency, reducing transportation costs, and ensuring a resilient supply chain. [https://5osld.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/FYIDJ3go3Hrs.png?u=2BpAyz2gMiWncnvfzvJyVAeGiptmehHp35] [https://5osld.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/-wIPOG4iM05R.png?u=2BpAyz2gMiWncpofWQcx4P6J59hx1C4Yzb] * Processing and packaging giants like Tetra Pak, GEA, Krones, Husky, Sidel, Ishida, TNA, SIG, Rieckermann, Heat & Control will be showcasing some of the latest solutions in processing and packaging, including some never-seen-before global launches. * Apical, Cargill, Givaudan, Wilmar, Kerry, Dohler, Orkila, Fanar, IFFCO, IFF, Takasago, and many others will be showcasing some of the latest innovations in functional and non-functional ingredients. * Gain visionary insights from global experts at the FoodTech Summit, where you'll uncover the future of food production and transformative technologies. * Network with key decision-makers through an exclusive, results-oriented Connexions meetings programme designed to drive your business forward. * Shine in the spotlight and witness groundbreaking innovations – at the prestigious Gulfood Manufacturing Industry Excellence Awards. REGISTER TO VISIT<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng1uQbdJ6PeINT3iQlkOs6d/8EtVPxTvGVCV> [GFM 2024]<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng3nQ88c4yskPpNWb8FBc39/kw-47MED2E0k> QUICK LINKS → Event website<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng5gPedv3Y7CSBhKlUjyLzf/MlwSpp7vHu9X> → Register Now<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng7ZPB9E27LeUY18vrEl5wB/7SiZD-pHyE9p> → <https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng9SOheX0ga6WuKx6DjXpsh/x7_cG7sNxrHe> Show Features<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ6vLwtrnBhiBplgfo1qi7ynT/wbPFQKDsz_Di> #GulfoodManufacturing [Logo]<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7390w53XnBrbVqSwojpNgPb/f0EI47Y9kIKt> ASIA & Middle East FOOD TRADE Journal<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7Aw4yIJtsfXNG0G5bcwdO1j/ckZWJz-WUCIO> Published by Pan Media Matrix, Trivandrum 695004, India. Licensed from J.Latka Verlag GmbH, Europaplatz 2, 10557 Berlin, Germany +914712555755<tel:+914712555755> | info@ameft.com<mailto:info@ameft.com?utm_source=sendinblue&utm_campaign=GEA%20NL01%2018Apr&utm_medium=email> [Facebook]<https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7Ij90VaFy9D90A3EOW3t5dr/g898Z962rAiK> [LinkedIn] <https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7QWD2iqc3csukJqNBPB8nFz/HT5lYT-veoWR> [Twitter] <https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7YJH4w6y96YgUTdVyIIOUs7/m2xzl-c_Bvyu> [Telegram] <https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7g6L79NKEaESEdQelBPeCUF/hzAPeJOaueus> [Threads] <https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7ntP9MdgK3uDynDnY4Wtu6N/orqc8pTidmRR> [Instagram] <https://5osld.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7vgTBZu2PXZzix0wKxe9biV/6_mOqS60LVwD> This email was sent to sales@agristo.com This email message was sent to you because you have subscribed to our newsletter.
