Subject: 【IEコラム：Vol.4】IE手法を正しく理解して活用しよう
TextBody: 画像が表示されない場合はこちらをクリック<http://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/es?s=1673224453&e=1201201&elqTrackId=20f49e6a7ff34e609f310c9929b85f0e&elq=1bb4fb6c5e294a14bfb23275ee669bba&elqaid=37297&elqat=1&elqak=8AF5C633089F04EC0216DCFF604675D18D25AB0E6691A0F1C63431CCEE76373616BA> [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/{5a6ff22d-9a06-49b5-943e-e00a5f7cd3bd}_img-logo.gif] IE（Industrial Engineering）コラム Vol.4 【第4回】IEの重要性を考える：IE手法を正しく理解して活用しよう IEには色々な場面に応じて使用できる手法が確立されています。 これらの手法はIEという言葉を知らなくても既に見聞きしたことがあるものも多いと思います。 しかし、それらの手法における目的や手順を改めて理解していただくことで、今まで誤った手法で行っていた、あるいはこれまでに気が付かなかった問題に気付くことができるようになります。 たとえばタイムスタディという手法がありますが、これは単純に作業時間を測定すれば良いというものではありません。 対象となる作業の作業手順をどのように設定するのか、作業時間はどのように決定すれば良いのか等々、この手法を正しく活用するには知っておくべきポイントがあるのです。 このようにIE手法の活用のポイントを正しく理解し、自らの現場に適用することで、新たな問題が発見でき、よりよい現場づくりに向けた問題解決のスタートがきれることと思います。 また本稿以降も継続的にIE手法を正しく理解して活用するためのポイントなど情報発信していきます。 次回はタイムスタディ手法や標準時間に関してのコラムとなります。 執筆者：(株)日本能率協会コンサルティング 角田 賢司（敬称略） IE士資格取得講座 [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/%7B4d1aaadc-15f2-4675-a896-dbd9712c7f7b%7D_seisan-pro_logo.png]<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729737297240910%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC4%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=5372&elqTrackId=49C3E1303070F83E68EE7EE3C15480A0&elq=1bb4fb6c5e294a14bfb23275ee669bba&elqaid=37297&elqat=1&elqak=8AF5C845C1C486001876E4B31EBD4831E21AAB0E6691A0F1C63431CCEE76373616BA> 10月7日（月）より開講します！ 生産性改善・サプライチェーン強化・製造DX導入 原点は “IE” です！ 現場が解る、現場の課題解決ができる、IEのプロ『IE士』育成をお勧めします！ 本コースの詳細はこちら<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729737297240910%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC4%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=5372&elqTrackId=70040E651FFC15A85CF3B04E43F3F7D2&elq=1bb4fb6c5e294a14bfb23275ee669bba&elqaid=37297&elqat=1&elqak=8AF532F9BA9C49F5D28C3F698DE8234178A0AB0E6691A0F1C63431CCEE76373616BA> お申込みはこちら<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729737297240910%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC4%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=2104&elqTrackId=2D7168C45FD869D504EC0C53B0FAE609&elq=1bb4fb6c5e294a14bfb23275ee669bba&elqaid=37297&elqat=1&elqak=8AF51B1E1339480436B777F64FE1ECA40CB5AB0E6691A0F1C63431CCEE76373616BA> 『IE士資格』取得ができるのは、生産革新プロフェッショナルコースだけ 50年に渡る開催実績と750名以上のIE士を輩出してきた伝統あるコースです。 会 期： 2024年10月7日（月）～12月13日（金） 全7回 参加方法： 会場参加 および オンラインLIVE受講 の組み合わせ 参加費用： 日本能率協会法人会員：693,000円/人 会員外：748,000円/人（以上税込） 参加対象： ●生産・製造部門のマネジャー、リーダーとその候補者 ●社内研修講師、ものづくり教育担当 受講者（IE士）の声はこちら<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729737297240910%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC4%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=23672&elqTrackId=6E42A159DDF0D26651470387E97A3C93&elq=1bb4fb6c5e294a14bfb23275ee669bba&elqaid=37297&elqat=1&elqak=8AF5066FF690B1FC47C3F05F430379DACEBCAB0E6691A0F1C63431CCEE76373616BA> Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 09.09.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 09.09.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: Coop Trading Webinar regarding master data (Mandatory) 2 out of 3 possible
TextBody: Dear Coop Trading supplier, In spring Coop Trading launched a new initiative to improve the mater data quality, as our master data at datapools like GS1 often was wrong. In May we invited all our suppliers for a Master data webinar regarding the importance of correct master data. Here we also launched the prototype sample concept, so we can validate the measurements and gross weight of the product. After collecting data for 3 months and validating over 1000 samples, we are ready to make a recap on the process and show our findings regarding validating dimensions and gross weight. These webinars are mandatory for all Coop Trading supplier. Please join one of the 3 webinars: 18th of September 2:30 PM 19th of September 8:30 AM 24th of September 1:00 PM Please press this link to join the session Session 2 out of 3 (19/9)<https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_Mjc3YTg5NWYtZTMwNy00ZGY0LWIyMjQtYzc1YTI4YzQwODg0%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%220c87a07e-d06d-4d2c-9c60-2eb2b858e630%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%221234fd29-62d3-45fb-b3da-64a782b4a770%22%7d> This email is sent to the main contact in Coop Trading's system. You are more than welcome to invite relevant colleagues in your own organization

Subject: Handle Shipments in China
TextBody: Greetings! I am Samantha of the transportation company Neptune Logistics. We are glad to offer you round-trip transportation services from China to European countries including Germany, Italy, UK, Spain, and France. Our advantages: - 22 years of experience in international transportation - Own more than 20,000 containers. - Multiple modes of transportation: road, rail, sea, LCL, and oversized cargo. - Additional services: customs clearance, warehousing services. Glad to offer you our routes: China -- Germany/Italy/UK/Spain/France -- China Anything you need, just let me know! ________________________________

Subject: Gulfood 2025-Exhibitions Stand Contractor (Free Design & Best Offer)
TextBody: Dear Sir/Ma'am, Good Day to you and hope this email finds you well. We are happy to introduce ourselves as one of the leading exhibition stand fabricators located in Dubai, extending its services across the Middle East, India, China and Germany. We are one among the top recommended contractors by all the major exhibition venues and organizers across the UAE. We have successfully delivered hundreds of projects over the past decade – coupled with professional and world-class service. Hundred Exhibitions provide turnkey solutions for its customers so that they can have total peace of mind and hand over all the process to our professional team. From 3D designing to technical drawings, from digital printing to signage and branding, from furniture arrangements to Audio – Video solutions, from submission of forms to coordination with the organizers – we are a single point of contact. KEY FEATURES: • Vast experience in the industry – more than 14 years • Free 3D designs suitable for any budget • Well experienced technical and design team • In-house production unit with state of the art machinery • In-house digital graphics printing & signage unit • Dedicated account managers for each client • Turnkey solutions for exhibitions. If you have any requirements for The GULFOOD 2025 please let us know so that we can provide you a free design proposal. Apart from our expertise in Exhibition stands, we cater to all requirements from Kiosks, Interiors, Fit- outs & Graphics. Subject: Offene Bestellungen Agristo
TextBody: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, Sie befinden sich mit u. s. Aufträgen in Verzug! Wir erwarten hierzu bis heute 13:00 Uhr eine Stellungnahme und den Nachliefertermin. Die Rückmeldung ist in der angehängten Datei vorzunehmen (Spalte Y und Z) und an alle Personen im Verteiler zurück zu melden. Ebenso sind umgehend Maßnahmen zu ergreifen um eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung unserer Läger zukünftig sicherzustellen. Grundsätzlich möchten wir nochmals darauf hinweisen, dass wir auf eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung angewiesen sind, um den hohen Anspruch unserer Kunden gerecht zu werden. Die Bestellungen gehen mit entsprechendem Vorlauf bei Ihnen ein. Sollte es im Falle von höherer Gewalt zu Verschiebungen und / oder Kürzungen kommen, so haben die Nachlieferungen am nächsten Werktag zu erfolgen. Der Nachliefertermin ist mit der jeweiligen Disposition abzustimmen. Die Disposition als auch der Einkauf sind hierzu vorab proaktiv zu informieren. Mit freundlichen Grüßen Netto Marken-Discount Stiftung & Co. Subject: Sadia Skin on chips - orders
TextBody: Hi Ali, Could you please explain why the demand for this product is so high? Is it becoming more popular? The current forecast in our system is much lower, which is why we can only produce 33 pallets over the weekend. (we only have 39ton of product ) We can now cover the below orders 2040926 2040988 2040930 We will need to push the others back. I'm checking with planning to determine the earliest possible production week and will update you shortly. In the meantime, if you could provide an explanation and a more accurate forecast, it would help me make a stronger case for the urgency. Thank you!

Subject: Private Label Partnership for Fries
TextBody: Dear Peter, I hope this email finds you well. I would like to introduce you to Foody Food, a well-established distribution company in Saudi Arabia, specializing in high-quality frozen food products. We hold a market share of over 4,000 tonnes of fries and appetisers in the Saudi market, catering to both retail and HORECA sectors. Given our strong presence and experience, we are looking to explore a private label partnership with your company for fries. We believe this collaboration could be highly beneficial for both of us. Additionally, could you kindly provide a quoted price for the private label fries? This will help us evaluate and move forward with our discussions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Subject: Rosti onion - check on nutrition
TextBody: Hi Marlies, I hope you’re well. I’ve reviewed the specification of the rosti onion with Ellen and encounter a challenge. The project stands for cleaner and simplified recipe, however the nutrition now decreases. (cf. below mostly for fat and salt) As you may know we have in our policy to never decrease nutrition. Additionally the product per portion becomes below our guideline for salt (max 0.9gsalt/portion) while it was meeting it before. Could you have a look and check what happen and how we could amend it? Many thanks for your support, Anne Anne Legies RDQ Manager Belgium Iglo Belgium NV Techno Centre - Building C | Humaniteitslaan 235 | 1620 Drogenbos | Brussel BTW BE 0884.248.931 | RPR Brussel Phone: +32 23529268 <tel:+32 23529268> Mobile: +32 473567425 <tel:+32 473567425> Fax: email: Anne.Legies@nomadfoods.com <mailto:Anne.Legies@nomadfoods.com> Website: www.nomadfoods.com <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/r02/___http://www.nomadfoods.com/___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjA2ZWE3NThjMWRmNDQ0ZWJhYjU2YTUzOTU1NGU4N2RhOjc6NzBhMjoxOTJkNDhkYzE1OTRhMTRhMWI0MmFjZDI1ODVjZGE0YTE5ZWMxNzE5YjkwMzU2N2UzNTkxZWQ3NmRmZTU4ZDU1Omg6VDpO> P THINK BEFORE YOU PRINT: Before printing e-mails, think whether it is really necessary. Subject: Increase Your ROI at SIAL 2024 with Dékuple
TextBody: Dear AGRISTO NV Team, As you prepare for the SIAL in Paris this October, consider how Dékuple can elevate your brand and increase your ROI. We specialize in organizing exclusive side events: lunches, dinners, and receptions at premium restaurants or private venues. Do you want to meet the right partners or clients? -Share your ideal persona with us, and we’ll handle the invitation process. -We take care of all event details so you can focus on showcasing your company. Do you plan to present new products or innovations to press, partners, or clients in a private setting？ -We can privatize venues and organize a complete reception tailored to needs. -Provide us with a list of expected invitees, and we’ll manage the rest. Ready to make a significant impact at SIAL 2024 in Paris? Let’s connect. For more information, visit www.dekuple.com or reach out to us at contact@dekuple.cn.

Subject: Non Hasbro Production
TextBody: Hi Angela, As this was a soft changeover, during the production run of 03. July we have gradually swictched from the Hasbro pack to the NON Hasbro pack. These packs have Best Before date : 07/2026 In the attached excel you can find an overview of the concerned pallets. - pallets in black are still with the Hasbro pack - pallets marked in green are the NON Hasbro pack A distinction could be made based on the lotcode (data in column N). Lotcodes starting with G22 + G23 have the Non Hasbro Pack. The following production took place on the 3th August (BBE 08/2026 ) and are of cours all without the Hasbro flash on pack. Hope this helps, Pieter Lapierre Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Garwell, Rebecca [rebecca.garwell@birdseye.co.uk] Sent: 10/09/2024 10:29 To: michele.vandenbroucke@agristo.com; service@agristo.com Cc: angela.hunkins@birdseye.co.uk Subject: Non Hasbro Production Hi Michele, Please could you let me know which batch the non Hasbro film has been used on the 96020578 / 314633 Thank you

Subject: Uganda Trade Fair
TextBody: BIGGEST TRADE FAIR OF UGANDA [none] 500 companies are participating from 18 countries It is indeed our great pleasure to invite your esteemed company to visit the forthcoming 30th UGANDA TRADE FAIR an annual Int'l Trade Fair on all kinds of General, FMCG, Consumer & Industrial Products, Machinery & Equipments etc.. to be held at Lugogo FAIR Grounds, starting from 4 - 8 October 2024, Kampala - Uganda 2nd Biggest Export market for International Companies in East Africa after "KENYA" BE THERE AT 30th UGANDA TRADE FAIR 30th Uganda Int'l Trade Fair, has received strong endorsement from the Ministry of Trade & Industry, Various Government Departments, Key Importing Associations and Foreign Trade & Commercial offices. For 5 days you will have direct access to meet over 500 companies, quality attendees and a buyer profile unmatched by any other industry event. With over 50 million population, Uganda is a excellent & highly potential market for your products and we strongly suggest you to take part at the biggest and largest trade FAIR of Uganda. Last Year Statistics <https://expoinafrica.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=18c29007520d18783148226d7&id=7afe43f0c7&e=7d1ba1e782> Photo Gallery <https://expoinafrica.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=18c29007520d18783148226d7&id=1f30f9ade9&e=7d1ba1e782> Participant's List <https://expoinafrica.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=18c29007520d18783148226d7&id=b59a58dd07&e=7d1ba1e782> We Have Designed Economical Packages for UAE Companies: EXHIBITOR PACKAGE * 9 sq.m (3m x 3m) octanorom shell stand include 2 chairs, 1 table, 2 spotlights, 1 twin power socket, * Brief company listing in ofﬁcial FAIR catalogue. * 7 Days / 6 Nights 5***** Hotel Accommodation including daily buﬀet breakfast, all room taxes & VAT * Business VISA for Uganda. * Return Air ticket on economy class to (Dubai - Kampala - Dubai) Uganda. Emirates Airline * Airport Picks up & drop, * Daily Transportation from hotel - expo center & back. * 1 Local stand assistant Girl for 5 days during the FAIR. * 100 Companies data of Uganda will be provided. Cost of Above Package: Option # 1: One Person with Single Room AED 24,500 Option # 2: Two Persons with One Double Room AED 31,500 Option # 3: Two Persons with Two Single Rooms AED 36,500 TRADE VISITOR PACKAGE: * 5 Days / 4 Nights 5***** Hotel Accommodation including daily buﬀet breakfast, all room taxes & VAT * Business VISA for Uganda. * Return Air ticket on economy class to (Dubai - Kampala - Dubai) Uganda. Emirates Airline * Airport Picks up & drop, * Daily Transportation from hotel - expo center & back. * Expo entry pass will be provided Cost of Above Package: Option # 1: One Person with Single Room AED 7,000 Option # 2: Two Persons with One Double Room AED 12,000 Register now for 30th Uganda Trade Fair and secure your business success in Uganda Market before it's too late. Download Booking Form <https://expoinafrica.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=18c29007520d18783148226d7&id=a0a3a5d59c&e=7d1ba1e782> Uganda Trade Fair - A Geat Business Perspective: * Uganda Trade FAIR offers excellent opportunities for generating new business, enhancing existing contacts & opening up new markets and sales channels. * Uganda Trade FAIR gives you everything you need to attract new customers & target groups. * Don't miss the opportunity to expend your share of the market. * Excellent contacts, substantial sales & great opportunities for presenting your products. * This 5 Days FAIR let you concentrate on the essentials. * Uganda Trade FAIR offers you the ideal time frame for your trade FAIR success. Why to Invest in Uganda? * Access one of the fastest growing regions in the world. * Uganda is the most open country in the region for Foreign Direct Investment (FDI). * Uganda offers the lowest cost workforce in the region and labor costs are forecast to grow more slowly than other EAC country. * Uganda has several unexploited mineral deposits & tourism opportunities. * Uganda and the East African region are growing steadily in both population and GDP. * A strong natural resource base and a commitment to the private sector by the government. * A predictable investment environment. * Uganda Investment Authority (UIA) is the agency mandated with promoting investment opportunities in Uganda. * Uganda Investment Authority (UIA) provides Aftercare services for investors that have already set up in the country. For booking & any info kindly contact: [none] Mr. Inaam Salman Project Director INEXPO GROUP IN EXHIBITION ORG & MGMT LLC Dubai - UAE Mob: +971-55-5506187 (whatsapp)

Subject: Offene Bestellungen Agristo
TextBody: Hallo, wir bitten um Rückmeldung, Mit freundlichen Grüßen Netto Marken-Discount Stiftung & Co. KG Industriepark Ponholz 1 93142 Maxhütte-Haidhof Lucas Konieczny Sachbearbeiter Einkauf TKK _____________________________________ Tel.: 09471 320-8583 Fax: 09471 320-6737 Mail: lucas.konieczny@netto-online.de<mailto:lucas.konieczny@netto-online.de> Internet: www.netto-online.de<http://www.netto-online.de/> Weitere Angabe zu unserem Unternehmen finden Sie unter: http://www.netto-online.de/impressum Von: Konieczny Lucas Gesendet: Dienstag, 10. September 2024 10:25 An: 'service@agristo.com' <service@agristo.com> Cc: Harant Ursula <Ursula.Harant@Netto-online.de>; Schaefer Vitali <Vitali.Schaefer@Netto-online.de>; Brunner Lisa Einkauf <Brunner.Lisa@netto-online.de> Betreff: Offene Bestellungen Agristo Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, Sie befinden sich mit u. s. Aufträgen in Verzug! Wir erwarten hierzu bis heute 13:00 Uhr eine Stellungnahme und den Nachliefertermin. Die Rückmeldung ist in der angehängten Datei vorzunehmen (Spalte Y und Z) und an alle Personen im Verteiler zurück zu melden. Ebenso sind umgehend Maßnahmen zu ergreifen um eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung unserer Läger zukünftig sicherzustellen. Grundsätzlich möchten wir nochmals darauf hinweisen, dass wir auf eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung angewiesen sind, um den hohen Anspruch unserer Kunden gerecht zu werden. Die Bestellungen gehen mit entsprechendem Vorlauf bei Ihnen ein. Sollte es im Falle von höherer Gewalt zu Verschiebungen und / oder Kürzungen kommen, so haben die Nachlieferungen am nächsten Werktag zu erfolgen. Der Nachliefertermin ist mit der jeweiligen Disposition abzustimmen. Die Disposition als auch der Einkauf sind hierzu vorab proaktiv zu informieren. Mit freundlichen Grüßen Netto Marken-Discount Stiftung & Co. KG Industriepark Ponholz 1 93142 Maxhütte-Haidhof Lucas Konieczny Sachbearbeiter Einkauf TKK _____________________________________ Tel.: 09471 320-8583 Fax: 09471 320-6737 Mail: lucas.konieczny@netto-online.de<mailto:lucas.konieczny@netto-online.de> Internet: www.netto-online.de<http://www.netto-online.de/> Weitere Angabe zu unserem Unternehmen finden Sie unter: http://www.netto-online.de/impressum

Subject: 61421/ CORTE FINO
TextBody: Buenos días, En lugar de tocar estos pedidos, podemos anular el pedido de Alcover 04224988, que contiene 30 palets y el pico que os falta, lo sustituimos en el pedido 04247935 por 61405 Patata corte grueso. Ruego me confirméis el movimiento y me digáis como queda el pedido 04247935. Un saludo, Elixabete Sevillano División Ejecución Aprovisionamiento Secos Área Congelado Tel.: 683 483 414 / Ext: 20135 Correo: esevilla@mercadona.es<mailto:esevilla@mercadona.es> De: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com<mailto:service@agristo.com>> Enviado el: martes, 10 de septiembre de 2024 10:50 Para: Celia Blasco Garcia <ceblasco@mercadona.es<mailto:ceblasco@mercadona.es>> CC: Guillermo Ricardo Gasca Oros <gggasca@mercadona.es<mailto:gggasca@mercadona.es>> Asunto: 61421/ CORTE FINO Buenos días Celia, Por el momento nos quedan 15 pallets de la ref. 61421/ CORTE FINO. La nueva producción está prevista esta semana, pero tenemos que esperar hasta que los palets alcancen la temperatura adecuada, por lo que no volveremos a tener stock hasta el martes 17/09. Esto significa lo siguiente: -04207149 para cargar 11/09 --> Ok, tenemos todo el stock (8 pallets) -04228929 para cargar 12/09 --> Nos falta 1 pallet de la ref. 61421 (tenemos 7 pallets) -04228720 para cargar 13/09 --> Nos faltan 9 pallets de la ref. 61421 -04230415 para cargar 13/09 --> Nos faltan 8 pallets de la ref. 61421 -04236978 para cargar 13/09 --> Nos faltan 4 pallets de la ref. 61421 -04247935 para cargar 16/09 --> Nos faltan 11 pallets de la ref. 61421. Disculpen las molestias. Puede enviarnos cambios para estos pedidos? Un saludo, Zoë [image] Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 thread::ydOToEXPGQudIw7wBOYYtXQ::

Subject: Verladingen vlokkenorders
TextBody: Goede namiddag Erwin, Mijn collega's van op de laadkaaien hebben mij gevraagd of jullie aan jullie chauffeurs willen laten weten dat als ze vlokkenorders komen laden ze zich rechtstreeks moeten aanmelden aan onze receptie van goederen en diensten. Blijkbaar melden de chauffeurs zich nu aan aan de grote expeditie (waar diepvriesorders geladen worden) en moeten mijn collega's de chauffeurs dan doorsturen naar goederen en diensten. Kan u aan uw transporteur vragen om zich vanaf nu onmiddellijk aan te melden bij onze receptie van goederen en diensten in Wielsbeke? Alvast bedankt! Met vriendelijke groeten, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 thread::W_lJhoJLGC-8Fd2zRl1fd3Q::

Subject: 61421/ CORTE FINO
TextBody: Buenas tardes, No tenemos el pedido 04224988 en nuestro sistema. Está seguro de haber enviado este pedido? Un saludo, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Elixabete Sevillano Camio [esevilla@mercadona.es] Sent: 10/09/2024 13:39 To: service@agristo.com Cc: gggasca@mercadona.es Subject: RV: 61421/ CORTE FINO Buenos días, En lugar de tocar estos pedidos, podemos anular el pedido de Alcover 04224988, que contiene 30 palets y el pico que os falta, lo sustituimos en el pedido 04247935 por 61405 Patata corte grueso. Ruego me confirméis el movimiento y me digáis como queda el pedido 04247935. Un saludo, Elixabete Sevillano División Ejecución Aprovisionamiento Secos Área Congelado Tel.: 683 483 414 / Ext: 20135 Correo: esevilla@mercadona.es De: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Enviado el: martes, 10 de septiembre de 2024 10:50 Para: Celia Blasco Garcia <ceblasco@mercadona.es> CC: Guillermo Ricardo Gasca Oros <gggasca@mercadona.es> Asunto: 61421/ CORTE FINO Buenos días Celia, Por el momento nos quedan 15 pallets de la ref. 61421/ CORTE FINO. La nueva producción está prevista esta semana, pero tenemos que esperar hasta que los palets alcancen la temperatura adecuada, por lo que no volveremos a tener stock hasta el martes 17/09. Esto significa lo siguiente: -04207149 para cargar 11/09 --> Ok, tenemos todo el stock (8 pallets) -04228929 para cargar 12/09 --> Nos falta 1 pallet de la ref. 61421 (tenemos 7 pallets) -04228720 para cargar 13/09 --> Nos faltan 9 pallets de la ref. 61421 -04230415 para cargar 13/09 --> Nos faltan 8 pallets de la ref. 61421 -04236978 para cargar 13/09 --> Nos faltan 4 pallets de la ref. 61421 -04247935 para cargar 16/09 --> Nos faltan 11 pallets de la ref. 61421. Disculpen las molestias. Puede enviarnos cambios para estos pedidos? Un saludo, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 thread::ydOToEXPGQudIw7wBOYYtXQ::

Subject: REJECTION 0 COLLECTION - RA481 - Agristo - Sysco Essential Roasting Potatoes  2.5kg - 4625 - BP10
TextBody: Dear , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00047029. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : Production day : 23/04/2024 Packaging day: 23/04/2024 The whole potatoes present in the roast potato bag can be explained due to our cutting process. The smallest potatoes are cut in half with waterknives, whereas the bigger potatoes are quartered by another machine called Finis. The Finis machines are rotating 'cups' that scoop up a potato, every cup is closed with a blue plastic band that is attached at 3 points on that cup. We can exclude the problem being with the waterknife. There are halved potatoes present in the end product, meaning that the knife was present, and the whole potatoes we see in the pictures are too big to pass the waterknives without being cut. This means the problem would be at the Finis machines. As just explained: the cups scooping up the potatoes are closed with a blue plastic band, and as it is made of plastic, sometimes it gets stretched out too much, resulting in a not firmly closed cup. When the cup is not tightly closed, the potato is not centered, and it is missed by the knife, resulting in a whole potato ending up in the end product. Another possibility is that the cup scoops up 2 potatoes, and the knife passes in the center, so in between the 2 potatoes. The instructions for quality control at the line is that whenever they see a whole potato in the end product, they need to register this and check all those cups to see if there are cups that do not fully close, and then they have to replace the band. Those machines have 2500 bands, so it might happen that a whole potato passes and ends up in the end product before the band has been replaced. And there is no solution to avoid that the cups scoop up 2 potatoes at the same time, however, this chance is minimal. So we cannot avoid a whole potato ending up in the end product, but the possibility is kept at a minimum due to the controls in production. I hope to have fully answered your complaint with this information. Should you require any further information or assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Subject: Order 12110486xx23
TextBody: Dear Mya san, I regret to inform you that the order referenced in the subject was unable to depart the port and be shipped to Japan last week. Although we had completed loading on our end, we were subsequently informed by our shipping partner that the container had sustained damage. Upon further investigation, it was revealed that the goods were defrosted due to this container damage. As product quality is of the utmost importance to us, we have made the decision not to take any risks and have arranged for the goods to be destroyed. Please find the credit note attached, as the invoice (90629369) was already issued when the goods were initially loaded at our premises. We would like to assure you that this specific order will be reloaded with new product and is scheduled for shipment on the 26th of September. Thank you for your understanding, and please do not hesitate to contact me should you have any further questions.

TextBody: Dear Supplier, For this PO we have 25 pallets in our transport system. You have confirmed 24 pallets and 24 pallet places ready for pick up. Unfortunately, we cannot book the shipment until the number of pallets matches in our system, and therefore we kindly ask you to do one of the following two options together with Supply Chain Planner or our department for master data, Masterdata Artikler: 1) Supply Chain Planner corrects the order based on any order corrections you have sent to Coop 2) Masterdata Artikler corrects the master data so that the order will be correct; what is the correct master data and why do we not have the correct master data in our system cf. Appendix 3? Please forward the master data changes to Supply Chain Planner, who forward it to Masterdata Artikler. Thank you in advance. Med venlig hilsen /

Subject: Gratis Stroohm Webinar  Openbaar Instellen van Thuislaadpunten  Administratieve en Fiscale Aspecten ⚡
TextBody: [Afbeelding met boom, buitenshuis Automatisch gegenereerde beschrijving] GRATIS WEBINAR 📅 Openbaar Instellen van Thuislaadpunten 🏠 Administratieve en Fiscale Aspecten ⚡ 18 september om 12u00 Beste Agristo, Wil je ook leren hoe je op de juiste manier thuislaadpunten kunt delen met gezinsleden en bezoekers? STROOHM nodigt je uit voor onze 📅 GRATIS Webinar volgende week woensdag van 12u00 tot 13u00! Tijdens deze GRATIS Webinar zal Bart Massin, CEO van Stroohm, je begeleiden door de administratieve en fiscale aspecten van het openzetten van je thuislaadpunt voor anderen: 📜 Wat zijn de wettelijke verplichtingen en hoe zorg je dat je voldoet aan de regelgeving? 📊 Hoe bepaal je het beste tarief voor jouw situatie? 📋Hoe regel je de facturatie bij het delen van thuislaadpunten? 🔋Hoe werk je met een tweede meter en wat zijn de voordelen? Schrijf je nu in voor onze GRATIS Webinar volgende week woensdag! Schrijf je vandaag in via de volgende link: Regist Webinar 🔌 Openbaar Instellen van Thuislaadpunten⚡🏠<https://events.teams.microsoft.com/event/f28f9bd8-3a7c-47a6-8f2b-d4f35b048514@116bd611-34f2-4c27-9e09-c4e8e7e29333> We hopen je te zien op 18 september, en kijken ernaar uit om je vragen te beantwoorden. Met vriendelijke groeten, Cordialement,

Subject: 900gPB: 1kg bag contamination
TextBody: Dear Mya san, I'm very sorry to hear that your customer received a box of 900 g Kohyo PB shoestring fries with bags of 1 kg Kohyo PB shoestring fries in them. I registered this claim in our system as case number 48081. Obviously, this should not have happened, so we sincerely apologize for this! Based on my first investigation, I don't believe this issue will be widespread. Both products were packed at the same time, but on a different packing line: the 900 g on packing line 04, and the 1 kg on packing line 06, 07 and 08. Moreover, the packing of the 900 g stopped at the time the box in question (having the 1 kg in them) was packed (around 12:00 on day 078 = 18th of March). I checked the results of the checks that are done every hour on the lay-out / text of the bag and the EAN code and these were all ok. Enclosed you can find these results. The last check that was done was at 11:35 and was still ok. It seems that something went wrong while emptying the packing line 04 of the 900 g. Could you please keep me informed if you have more information? Pictures of the pallet label (if possible), the box label and the batch code on the (1 kg) bags in question would be very helpful. Thank you very much!

TextBody: Hi, Please can you check again with the below as we do not have any MR T chips on the below order number, let me know if it was for any other order: #PR-ORD-0020515 * Mr T Chips x 2.25KG g 8 pal short Thanks Regards [cid:image001.jpg@01DB039B.28DE8ED0] From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: 10 September 2024 15:54 To: Distribution ICS BRADFORD <Distribution@icsukltd.co.uk> Cc: gilles.willaert@agristo.com Subject: Orders ICS - this week Dear, I regret to inform you that we are experiencing some shortages with certain orders scheduled for loading this week. Could you let me know if it would be possible to substitute these items with another product? Please be assured that I am actively following up with the planning team. Products involved: * Texas Coated 7/16 11 x11 Chips x 2.25kg - Production 15/09/2024 - First possible delivery 17/18th of September * Mr T Chips x 2.25KG - Production W 39 - exact production date TBD #PR-ORD-0020379 * Texas Coated 7/16 11 x11 Chips x 2.25kg 1 pal short #PR-ORD-0020515 * Texas Coated 7/16 11 x11 Chips x 2.25kg 3 pal short #PR-ORD-0020515 * Mr T Chips x 2.25KG g 8 pal short #PR-ORD-0020514 * Mr T Chips x 2.25KG g 4 pal short * Texas Coated 7/16 11 x11 Chips x 2.25kg 4 pal short Thank you for your advice.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Julia Lettner Julia LETTNER, MSc Abteilung Qualitätsmanagement - Produktentwicklung Bereich Zentrale Einkaufsorganisation [cid:image001.jpg@01DB03A3.C967B090] SPAR Österreichische Warenhandels-AG Europastraße 3, 5015 Salzburg, Österreich FN 34170 a, LG Salzburg UID-Nr.: ATU 33803701 http://www.spar.at E-Mail: Julia.LETTNER@spar.at<mailto:Julia.LETTNER@spar.at> Telefon: +43 662 4470 23749 Mobil: +43 664 2650548 [Appy Birthday!]<https://www.spar.at/aktionen/gewinnspiele/appy-birthday-gewinnspiel> Sollten Sie diese E-Mail unbeabsichtigt bzw. irrtümlich erhalten haben, so weisen wir Sie darauf hin, dass gemäß § 161 Abs 4 TKG 2021 der Inhalt sowie die Tatsache des Empfangs dieser E-Mail weder aufgezeichnet noch verwertet oder Unbefugten mitgeteilt werden dürfen. Wir ersuchen Sie, die Nachricht von Ihrem System zu löschen und sich mit uns in Verbindung zu setzen. Unter diesem Link finden Sie die Informationen über die Verarbeitung Ihrer personenbezogenen Daten sowie zu Ihren Rechten als betroffene Person: https://www.spar.at/service/datenschutzhinweise If you have received this email accidentally or in error, we point out that, in accordance with § 161 para. 4 TKG 2021 (Telecommunications Act), the contents of this email and the fact of its receipt must not be recorded, exploited or communicated to unauthorized persons. We ask you to delete the message from your system and to contact us. Under this link you will find information about the processing of your personal data and about your rights as a data subject https://www.spar.at/service/datenschutzhinweise Von: LEMBERGER Simone (HZ373PH) <Simone.LEMBERGER@spar.at> Gesendet: Montag, 19. August 2024 13:24 An: service@agristo.com Cc: ENDER Andreas (HZ740) <Andreas.ENDER@spar.at>; ZWETTLER Angelika (HZ373QZ) <Angelika.ZWETTLER@spar.at>; FICHTINGER Daniela (HZ373PZ) <Daniela.FICHTINGER@spar.at>; HABERLEITNER Birgit (HZ373PZ) <Birgit.Haberleitner@spar.at>; HAJDUK Monika (HZ373PH) <Monika.HAJDUK@spar.at>; LAIMER Katharina (HZ373DE) <Katharina.LAIMER@spar.at>; LETTNER Julia (HZ379) <Julia.LETTNER@spar.at>; TRESCHER Markus (HZ373PZ) <Markus.Trescher@spar.at> Betreff: Muster- und Spezifikationsanforderung PJ 2024/0944 ASP SPAR Rösti Hash brown 600g Sehr geehrte Frau Samyn, wir ersuchen Sie höflichst um Mustersendung von 5 Einzelpackungen vom nachfolgenden Artikel: SPAR Rösti Hash brown 600g Wenn Sie die Sendung bitte aufgeteilt an folgende zwei EMPFÄNGERADRESSEN senden könnten, mit der Bitte um Info zum Versand bzw. Mitschicken der Tracking Nummer: * 3 Packungen: SPAR Österreichische Warenhandels-AG – Hauptzentrale Salzburg z.H. Frau Simone Lemberger/Monika Hajduk Europastraße 3 5015 Salzburg * 2 Packungen: SPAR Österreichische Warenhandels AG – Zentrale St. Pölten z.H. Frau Angelika Zwettler Lagergasse 30 3100 St. Pölten Des Weiteren ersuchen wir Sie vorab um Übermittlung folgender QM – relevanter Dokumente per Email: 1. Produktspezifikation / Herstellerspezifikation 1. ausgefülltes Datenerhebungsblatt welches bereits alle für uns relevanten abzuklärenden Punkte beinhaltet (im Anhang auf Deutsch oder Englisch) (es muss nicht zwangsläufig das gesamte Datenerhebungsblatt ausgefüllt werden, es ist ausreichend, wenn Sie alle nicht in Ihrer Spezifikation angeführten Punkte ergänzen) 1. Konformitätserklärung für die Verpackung sowie Bestätigung zur Einhaltung der REACH-Verordnung * sofern zutreffend, bitte um Angabe, ob es sich um rPET (= recyceltes PET) handelt 1. ausgefüllte Betriebsbeschreibung für Eigenmarkenlieferanten (im Anhang auf Deutsch oder Englisch, sofern noch nicht ausgefüllt) 1. wenn erforderlich gültige Zertifikate zu Nachhaltigkeitslogos & Gütezeichen (z.B.: V-Label, Rainforest Alliance, MSC/ASC) Bitte beachten Sie, dass wir ohne die Produktspezifikation / die Informationen zu den abzuklärenden Punkten unsere QM internen Prozesse nicht abschließen können. Erst nach Abschluss unseres Prozessschritts wird der b2b – Prozess für Sie als Lieferant freigeschalten. Bei Fragen können Sie sich gerne jederzeit melden. Vielen Dank im Voraus für Ihre Bemühungen. Mit freundlichen Grüßen Simone LEMBERGER Abteilung Qualitätsmanagement - Produktentwicklung Bereich Zentrale Einkaufsorganisation [cid:image001.jpg@01DB03A3.C967B090] SPAR Österreichische Warenhandels-AG Europastraße 3, 5015 Salzburg, Österreich FN 34170 a, LG Salzburg UID-Nr.: ATU 33803701 http://www.spar.at E-Mail: Simone.LEMBERGER@spar.at<mailto:Simone.LEMBERGER@spar.at> Mobil: +43 664 88748753 [Appy Birthday!]<https://www.spar.at/aktionen/gewinnspiele/appy-birthday-gewinnspiel>

Subject: Automatische Antwort: Due Item List 3117 LIDL DIENSTLEISTUNG 20240910
TextBody: Eingangsbestätigung / Warenbuchhaltung Lidl Dienstleistung GmbH & Co.KG Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, vielen Dank für Ihre Nachricht. Derzeit erreichen uns sehr viele Anfragen. Wir bitten um Nachsicht, dass die Bearbeitung unter den aktuellen Umständen länger dauern kann. Um Ihre Mails schneller zuordnen zu können, verwenden Sie bitte im Betreff immer Ihre 4-stellige Lidl-Lieferantennummer (Sie finden diese rechts oben in Ihren Zahlungsavisen) und Ihren Lieferantennamen. Die Verarbeitung von Rechnungen nimmt einige Tage in Anspruch, daher können Sie Ihre Rechnungen nicht sofort im TAULIA-Portal sehen. Bitte sehen Sie daher unbedingt von Erinnerungsmails ab. Anfragen, die nicht die Lidl Dienstleistung GmbH & Co.KG betreffen, werden unverarbeitet gelöscht. Bitte kontaktieren Sie die anderen Lidl-Unternehmen wie folgt: Buchhaltung Lidl Stiftung: accounting.stiftung@lidl.com / receivables@lidl.com Buchhaltung Lidl Digital: rechnungswesen.LDI@lidl.com Buchhaltung Lidl Export: accounting.lexi@lidl.com Bei Reklamationen zu Preisabweichungen wenden Sie sich bitte direkt an Ihren Ansprechpartner in unserem Einkauf oder per Mail an: EK.ORGA.Preisdifferenzen@lidl.de Vielen Dank für Ihr Verständnis. Warenbuchhaltung Lidl Dienstleistung GmbH & Co.KG ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Confirmation of receipt / accounting dept. of Lidl Dienstleistung GmbH & Co.KG Dear Sirs and Madams, thank you for your message. Currently we do receive a large number of inquiries. We ask for your understanding that processing those may take longer under the current circumstances. To be able to assign your e-mails more quickly, please always use your 4-digit Lidl supplier number in the subject line (you will find this in the top right of your payment advices) and your supplier name. Processing your invoices will take a few days so you will not be able to see your invoices in TAULIA immediately. Please refrain from sending reminder e-mails. Inquiries that do not concern Lidl Dienstleistung GmbH & Co.KG will be deleted unprocessed. Please contact the other Lidl companies as follows: Accounting dept. Lidl Stiftung: accounting.stiftung@lidl.com / receivables@lidl.com Accounting dept. Lidl Digital: rechnungswesen.LDI@lidl.com Accounting dept. Lidl Export: accounting.lexi@lidl.com If you have complaints about price deviations, please speak to your contact person in our purchasing department directly or send an e-mail to: EK.ORGA.Preisdifferenzen@lidl.de Thank you for your understanding. Accounting dept. Lidl Dienstleistung GmbH & Co. KG

Subject: Koffmann Extra Crunchy
TextBody: Hi Sean, To be fully transparent, the Koffmann Le Crunch Extra Crunchy is a recipe we do not produce very often. Ideally, this product is ordered at least 4 weeks in advance. We were lucky that, by coincidence, I could have it added on the production planning of this week (11 pallets), but going forward, we will need to anticipate the need for this article. Could you please send me your forecast on this reference? I will check if it is alligned in our system. Thanks!

Przeanalizujemy zgłoszenie i skontaktujemy się z Państwem tak szybko, jak to możliwe. Odpowiadając na tę wiadomość, prosimy upewnić się, że tytuł maila nie został zmieniony i że znajduje się w nim numer zgłoszenia. W przeciwnym razie zgłoszenie zostanie powielone. Wiadomość została wygenerowana automatycznie. Wszystkie odpowiedzi są automatycznie przesyłane do suppliersupport@lidl.pl. Wszelkie wiadomości w tym temacie prosimy kierować z podaniem numeru zgłoszenia w tytule maila. ------------------------------------------------------------------ Dear supplier, Thank you for reaching out to us. Subject: Photos of the shipments - load
TextBody: Hi All, As per our conversation on WhatsApp, although there are no issues with the load, we are establishing a standard procedure and kindly request photos of the load inside the container, and the thermometer. Could you please implement this procedure for the new shipments? I have been informed that providing photos of each load may not be feasible due to the significant workload involved. In Wielsbeke, the loads are being filmed, and there are plans to do the same in Tilburg in the future. In the meantime, could you please send us the requested photos for Tilburg, where there is no camera? Thanks, -- [https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/mail-sig/AIorK4zD1iq2Fx-m48I_whDaPIl4sBnghXs0ylDX02ZaVVfBQ4dcE387OV03lU1ZdMnTVN2sKOMdbslfDqaY]

Subject: CARTA PRESENTACION // EXPO ANTAD
TextBody: Buen día estimado expositor. En Expo Congresos, nos especializamos en el diseño, producción, montaje de stands para que sus eventos o exposiciones sean de primer nivel, para tal efecto podemos ofrecerles nuestros servicios con diferentes tipos de materiales: "Custom", "Octanorm (aluminio)", o diseños "Híbridos", esto acorde de sus gustos y necesidades. Así mismo, contamos con el servicio de montaje general (institucional) de sus exposiciones en cualquier parte de la república mexicana y algunos puntos en el extranjero. Contamos con instalaciones en Guadalajara, Monterrey, Ciudad de Mexico, Tijuana y Mérida. Extranjero: Oficinas en Panamá, Madrid y Miami. SERVICIOS ADICIONALES INTEGRALES * Stands Institucionales, arcos de entrada, módulos de registro. * Pódiums, backs de patrocinio, directorio general de expositores, etc. * Mobiliario, salas tipo lounge, mesas periqueras, bancos y sillas, iluminación. * Pisos laminados, alfombras, plantas y follaje, pantallas Smart y Led. * Diseño, producción y montaje de Tótems interactivos. * Servicios personalizados y adaptados acorde a las necesidades de su presentación. Hacemos de su conocimiento que hemos desarrollado muy buenas Alianzas Estratégicas Inter-Empresariales con diferentes Comités Organizadores, tales como: * International Automotive Industry Supply Summit * Mexico Industry Supply Chain * Mexicali Supply Expo * Agrobaja * North America Automotive B2b Meeting * Bajamak * Congresos del Aguacate * Entre otros. Subject: Claim : 926 (discoloration)
TextBody: Dear Mya san, I have well received the claim below regarding mold which was found on the 900 g PB shoestring fries with batch code C04 24 023 11:37. I have registered this claim in our system under case number 48291. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied about the quality of this batch. As you know, quality is of utmost importance to us. Based on the picture, I can definitely confirm that this mold. You can see that not only some fries are covered by mold, but all of the fries have a greyish color. Also the fact that a lot of fries are sticking together indicates that the product was thawed for a long period of time and later refrozen. As you know, our products are frozen immediately after pre-frying. The french fries are frozen from 180°C to at least -8°C in about 30 minutes. After packing, the goods go immediately to a cold store which has a temperature of -18°C, where they are stored until they are loaded and transported by deep-freeze transport. They thus never leave the cold chain. Mold formation is impossible with frozen products, so I can assure you that this mold formation couldn't possibly have happened at Agristo. Besides our production process, which makes mold formation impossible, we also have Quality Assurance in place. During production, our quality department checks the product every hour. This examination includes organoleptic tests, during which they also have to taste the product. I have reviewed the quality records of this lot and found no discrepancies in the records. In addition, we have a complete microbiological control plan in place where we do regular checks on our products on different microbiological parameters (mold, yeast, salmonella, listeria, etc.). The checks that were done around the time of production of this batch are all compliant. Are only two bags concerned? When was this reported and where was the product at that time? Do you still have stock of this batch?

Subject: Food and Beverage Magazine Weekly Newsletter
TextBody: View in Browser September 10, 2024 Advertisement If you would like to contribute to F&B Weekly, please contact Lauren Kane, Director & Editor-in-Chief, via email at Lauren.Kane@fbmagazine.com or Michael Politz, Publisher, via email at michael@fb101.com. TOP NEWS Hardee's Announces Finalists of the Annual National Biscuit Baker Competition Hardee's via Food and Beverage Magazine Baking the perfect Hardee's® Made from Scratch™ biscuit is an art that requires a level of craftmanship, passion and technique. Recently, four local Hardee's bakers showcased their master-level skills as they beat out the competition in the semi-finals of the national Hardee's Biscuit Baker Competition. Hardee's announced the four finalists who will move on to compete in the national Biscuit Baker Competition on Thursday, Sept. 19 in Franklin, Tennessee. Read More Ray's Restaurants Takes Novice Wine Drinkers Back to School for Wine Education Ray's Restaurants via Food and Beverage Magazine A nice glass of wine with a delicious meal is the definition of a perfect evening for many wine lovers. However, for newcomers, knowing what to order and how to pair it with food can be daunting. As summer draws to a close, this is the perfect time to refresh wine knowledge. Ashley Kientzle, beverage director for Ray's Restaurants, offers the following lessons to help guests graduate from wine novice to connoisseur. Read More Advertisement FOOD NEWS Omaha Steaks Makes Las Vegas Debut With New Exclusive Partnership With Circa Resort & Casino's Project BBQ Food Truck and the World's Largest Sportsbook Omaha Steaks via Food and Beverage Magazine Omaha Steaks, America's Original Butcher and provider of gourmet steaks and proteins, lands in Las Vegas with a new exclusive partnership at Circa Resort & Casino's Project BBQ food truck. Available now, this first-of-its-kind collaboration brings the unmatched flavor of Omaha Steaks whiskey-marinated steaks to downtown Las Vegas. Read More Brooke's Bites Launches New YouTube Channel, Debuts With Jason Kelce's Favorite Snack Mama Kelce's Cookies — With a Twist Brooke's Bites via Food and Beverage Magazine Brooke Goff's baking and cooking show Brooke's Bites is re-launching a new YouTube channel and to celebrate the menu will feature a 20-episode season that shares the favorite snacks, meals and desserts of some of the biggest names in sports and entertainment. Read More Advertisement Serving up health plan solutions Promoted by United HealthCare Offering a robust health plan may help with recruiting and retaining top talent, boosting employee satisfaction and encouraging healthier behaviors in your staff. With UnitedHealthcare, you’ll find an array of flexible health plan solutions — including wellness and incentive programs. Learn More BEVERAGE Banshee Wines Joins Avril Lavigne's North American Greatest Hits Tour as Official Wine Sponsor Banshee Wines via Food and Beverage Magazine Banshee Wines, a rapidly expanding luxury wine brand in the U.S. and part of the Family-owned Foley Family Wines & Spirits portfolio, has teamed up with eight-time GRAMMY-nominated superstar Avril Lavigne to become the official wine sponsor of her headline North American Greatest Hits tour's second leg. Read More RESTAURANTS Rosa Mexicano Restaurant Group Commemorates Back-to-School With Free Queso and Chips for Educators Rosa Mexicano Restaurant Group via Food and Beverage Magazine Rosa Mexicano, the iconic Mexican restaurant brand, is excited to announce its "Back to School" initiative, offering a special thank-you to teachers nationwide. From Aug. 19 through Sept. 2, educators can enjoy a complimentary queso and chips with any food or drink purchase at any Rosa Mexicano location by simply showing their School ID. Read More Advertisement Promoted by Bunzl Food Packaging Supplies Cleaning & Hygiene Supplies Material Handling Supplies Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) Learn More The Meritage Resort and Spa Officially Opens Napa's Newest Fine Dining Concept, Ember Steak The Meritage Resort and Spa via Food and Beverage Magazine Unveiling California Wine Country's newest fine dining concept, The Meritage Resort and Spa is proud to officially open the doors of the latest addition to its acclaimed and award-winning culinary program, Ember Steak. Rustic and warm like its namesake, the restaurant introduces a contemporary steakhouse inspired by the power of dishes that "kindle" connections between savants and everyday food lovers alike. Read More Dearborn Residents Will Soon Feel 'Thunderstruck' With First Rock N' Roll Sushi Rock N' Roll Sushi via Food and Beverage Magazine Rock N' Roll Sushi will be bringing its fresh take on American-Japanese fusion "higher" up the map when the brand debuts its first location in Michigan. This "epic" opening is planned for the second quarter of 2025 and the Dearborn location will set the stage for Rock N' Roll Sushi's unique dining experience, being the first and only in the entire state. Read More Advertisement Houston TX Hot Chicken Opens 20th Store, Launches Loyalty App and Preps for 75 Locations to Land by 2025 Houston TX Hot Chicken via Food and Beverage Magazine Houston TX Hot Chicken turns three this August and is celebrating with a spread of momentous milestones: HHC's first-ever app launched Aug. 7, its 20th location will open in San Diego on Sept. 21 and it has 300 franchise commitments with a plan to have 75 opened stores by the end of 2025. Read More Natasha Chen Appointed President North America of Barry Callebaut Barry Callebaut via Food and Beverage Magazine Natasha Chen has been appointed President North America of the Barry Callebaut Group, effective Sept. 16. She succeeds Ben De Schryver who has decided to leave the company to pursue other opportunities. Read More Pizza Inn and New Franchise Partner Team Up to Bring Seven New Locations to Egypt Pizza Inn via Food and Beverage Magazine Pizza Inn recently announced a new multi-store Master Franchise Agreement partnership with Al Ruwad Hospitality Services & Restaurants Management Group in Egypt. The first Pizza Inn location is scheduled to open in Cairo, during the fourth quarter of 2024 as part of a seven store agreement. Read More EVENTS IN MOTION Driving to Support the Aarón Sánchez Impact Fund Aarón Sánchez Impact Fund via Food and Beverage Magazine The Aarón Sánchez Impact Fund, a program of Emeril Lagasse Foundation, has announced it will host an adrenaline-packed evening with a star-studded lineup of chefs at SPEEDVEGAS on Saturday, Sept. 28. The 2nd annual Aarón y Amigos presented by Pepsi® will raise funds through admission sales and a stellar live auction line-up at the iconic Las Vegas venue. Subject: Request for Business Relationship - Usha Handicrafts - India
TextBody: Dear Sir/Madam, Greetings... I hope this email finds you well. My name is Avijit, and I am reaching out on behalf of Usha Handicrafts – Kolkata (INDIA), a leading exporter of eco-friendly cotton, Canvas, JUCO & jute bags based in India. We specialize in providing high-quality, sustainable packaging solutions as well as Customized bags to clients worldwide. Our Sales & Marketing Team found your company information from google.com<http://google.com/>. This is our business proposal mail & I am very grateful to you if you forward my request proposal to your relevant Team / Person or your buying department for the further requirements soon. Usha Handicrafts, we have been a trusted name in the industry for 11 years. Our commitment to sustainability and quality has earned us a solid reputation. Our cotton and jute bags are not only environmentally friendly but also durable and stylish, making them the perfect choice for eco-conscious businesses & supplying/exporting a wide range of customised promotional Packaging products like Cotton bags, Jute & JUCO Bags, Cosmetic Bags and pouches, conference bags, Designer bags, Grow & Carry Bag & Gift Articles etc. We would be delighted to discuss your specific requirements and explore potential collaboration opportunities. Please feel free to reach out for more information or to discuss how we can meet your needs. Thank you for considering Usha Handicrafts. We look forward to the possibility of working together. Please find the attachment small presentation of the products for your reference & for more know about our company and products, you can visit our portal www.ushahandicrafts.in<http://www.ushahandicrafts.in/> Many thanks! Have a nice day ahead.

Subject: 22 th international specialized exhibition
TextBody: Hello, . We invite you to take part in the exhibition Choose language. We speak English and 9 other languages English Deutsch Français Español 中文 日本語 Русский Türkçe 한국어 Українська ArmProd EXPO 2024 22th international specialized exhibition Top Event! Superb Review score 4.9 from 18 to 20 of October Karen Demirchyan Complex | Yerevan, Armenia Participate in the exhibition! Sale % * * Special conditions The largest international food exhibition of the republic of ArmProd Expo which became authoritative and with the developed tradition, is one of the main events in which the leading producers, suppliers and distributors of food and drinks annually take part. Leaders of the domestic food industry and the leading Armenian food firms choose this exhibition for presentation of the products and innovative development as the "ArmProd Expo" exhibition promotes effective realization of qualitative food, commercial productivity and finds new approaches and practical decisions for the modern changing market. The "ArmProd Expo" exhibition completely covers the food market of Armenia and is segmented on thematic sections, uniting in a uniform exposition all branches of food and processing industry, and reflects key tendencies of development of domestic and foreign agro-industrial complex. ArmProd Expo sections: Food processing technologies Agricultural machinery and equipment Agricultural technologies Containers and packaging Seeds and saplings Bakery and pastry products Meat products. Poultry. Sausage products Fish and seafood Dairy products. Cheese Grocery. Pasta. Spices Sunflower and vegetable oils Snacks. Nuts. Dried fruits Tea. Coffee. Coffee machines Vegetables. Fruit. Canned vegetables and fruit Canned food. Sauces. Ketchup. Salads Gastronomy. Products for restaurants Frozen food. Convenience food Juice. Water. Soft drinks Alcoholic beverages Healthy food. Natural and organic products Less than 2 months left until the opening Have time to book the best stand! Request more information for participation in the exhibition Special conditions | Sale % * Do not worry. Filling out the form and sending a request doesn't oblige to participate in the exhibition.

Subject: Business opportunity in Mexico
TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. I apolegize for the delay in our reply. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: 2 x Senegal D24-02141 en D24-02142
TextBody: Goedendag, Bijgevoegd treft u onze inkoopbevestiging. D24-02141 – IO24-01388 – week 39 if possible D24-02142 – IO24-01389 - 1 maand na D24-02141 Bestemming: Senegal Verzendadres: Patisen Foodservice Price Moustafa (online meeting 05-09-2024) Met vriendelijke groet, William Nannes J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Tel: +310226396408 Mobiel: +31610946168 Mail: william@jpb.nl<mailto:william@jpb.nl> J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

Subject: Preparatevi per il GASTexpo 2025 – il più grande evento del settore Ho-Re-Ca!
TextBody: Annuncio della Fiera dei Sapori GASTexpo 2025! ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ [https://6414.gast.si/users/6414/images/it_gast.JPG]<https://6414.gast.si/public/get/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/product-2430/image-0/> Preparatevi per il GASTexpo 2025 – il più grande evento del settore Ho-Re-Ca! Gentili signori! Siete pronti per il più grande evento del settore Ho-Re-Ca? Tra il 29 gennaio e il 1° febbraio 2025, il Centro Esposizioni e Congressi di Lubiana si trasforma ancora una volta in un punto di incontro per maestri culinari, innovatori e chiunque voglia conoscere le ultime tendenze e innovazioni nel settore alberghiero e della ristorazione. Perché non dovete farvi sfuggire il GASTexpo 2025? Oltre 500 espositori: Scoprite prodotti e servizi innovativi presentati dai principali fornitori nazionali e internazionali. Opportunità di networking inestimabili: Entrate in contatto con i migliori esperti del settore, fornitori e partner commerciali. Programma educativo: Partecipate a workshop, seminari e presentazioni per conoscere le ultime prassi e tecnologie. Nuove partnership commerciali: L'evento offre un'opportunità ideale per espandere la rete e fare nuovi affari. [https://6414.gast.si/users/6414/images/gast123.JPG]<https://6414.gast.si/public/get/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/product-2431/image-0/> Per i visitatori: Che siate un proprietario di un ristorante, uno chef, un manager di un hotel o un buongustaio, GASTexpo è il posto giusto dove lasciarvi ispirare, vedere i servizi più recenti e gli ingredienti di prim'ordine. Per gli espositori: Mostrate la vostra innovazione e attirate nuovi partner commerciali. Le domande sono già aperte, quindi assicuratevi il vostro spazio espositivo! Presentare una richiesta di esposizione alla fiera<https://6414.gast.si/public/get/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/product-2418/image-0/> Per ulteriori informazioni e iscrizioni visitate il nostro sito Web o contattateci all'indirizzo info@gast.si<mailto:info@gast.si>. Ci vediamo al GASTexpo 2025! Il vostro team GASTexpo! [Fb]<https://6414.gast.si/public/get/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/product-2411/image-0/> [Ig] <https://6414.gast.si/public/get/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/product-2412/image-0/> [In] <https://6414.gast.si/public/get/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/product-2413/image-0/> [Tt] <https://6414.gast.si/public/get/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/product-2414/image-0/> [Yt] <https://6414.gast.si/public/get/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/product-2437/image-0/> CONTATTO<https://6414.gast.si/public/get/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/product-2438/image-0/> Sporočilo ste prejeli na osnovi prejetih poslovnih kontaktov - poslovne vizitke, spletne strani in katalogi, družabna omrežja ali drugih javno dostopnih seznamih. Če ne želite več prejemati naših sporočil, prosim kliknite na ODJAVA<https://6414.gast.si/public/remove/app-6414/user-94400/group-300/category-95876915/lang-it/>.

Subject: Active Specification - Asda Cheesy Mashed Potato 500g
TextBody: Hi Marlies, Please find attached the active spec for the Asda Cheesy Mashed Potato 500g. Please keep a copy of this spec in your files and archive any older versions. Please sign and date the front page to confirm your agreement with the specification at the time of writing. Please return the signed spec by Wednesday 2nd October. After this date it will be assumed that all information is accurate. Please be aware that there's a requirement for annual nutrition analysis to be held on file for this product. The latest certificate we hold on file is dated April 2024, so please ensure a new certificate will be available no later than 12 months after this. If there are any amends that you wish to make, email an annotated version of the spec or a completed version of the specification amend form.

Subject: Business opportunity in Mexico
TextBody: Good morning, AVE Foods is an international trading company based in Mexico, specialised in poultry, pork, beef and French fries mainly. We are also a chicken producer, producing around 550,000 broilers per week with our company Supollo. We have been importing and selling french fries all around Mexico since 2021 now and increasing numbers throughout the year. We have been purchasing from Agristo (through a trading company), Mydibel (direct), Ecofrost (direct) and also american products with McCain. We have had a very good acceptance from Agristo and our main customers wish to work with the Agristo product (through our own brand as well as agristo brand). Nowadays, we would be looking for an annual contract of approximately 1000 tons of French fries (600tons of 3/8 and 400tons of spicy wedges). Also, we are interested in products such as crinkle and coated French fries. As we work with frozen and fresh goods, we have warehouses all around Mexico to keep the product and be able to distribute all over Mexico and increase our sales. You can find HERE<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o9LZvs3lCH8&t=3s> a video of our company to explain a bit who we are and what we do. As we are also in the chicken industry, it is very common in Mexico to eat chicken with french fries so with a portafolio of over 300 customers just in the chicken industry, we can distribute to all of them. On the other hand, we also work with restaurant chains that need constant supply from us. We will be in Belgium early October, would it be possible to plan a visit on October 16th or 17th? Thanks a lot for your time and I am looking forward to hearing from you.

Subject: New WW Orders 01.08
TextBody: Hi Grace, Craig, The production of the Potato Utopia - Crispy Fries 16x600g (PU003CF) from yesterday yielded less pallets than planned. As the cleaning of the lines after a batter run is fixed, they need to stop the run at that given time. We will run short on 1 pallet for order 47736755, requested delivery date 23/09/2024. We will have the pallets available as of 07/10/2024. Do you want me the postpone the order or will you ask WW to replace this one pallet of PU003CF by a different SKU? Alternatively, we can lower the 3 pallets of PU003CF on 47736758 (same requested date of 23/09) from 3 to 2 and add 1 pallet of a different SKU. This way we can keep both loads on 23/07 and both will get at least some PU003CF. Please confirm asap.

Subject: Voorstel voor Samenwerking en Aanvraag Offerte voor Levering van Friet aan het Midden-Oosten
TextBody: Geachte heer/mevrouw, Mijn naam is Emeer Al Badawi, en ik vertegenwoordig E&D Global Traiding B.V. , een toonaangevend bedrijf in de levering van levensmiddelen aan het Midden-Oosten. Onlangs hebben wij ons assortiment uitgebreid en zijn we gestart met de export van friet, niet alleen vanuit Azië, maar ook vanuit Nederland en België. Wij richten ons specifiek op de levering van hoogwaardige 9x9 friet en willen graag beginnen met een initiële afname van 2 containers per 6 weken. Ons doel is om deze afname zo snel mogelijk op te schalen naar 10 containers per maand binnen het komende jaar. We zijn dan ook zeer geïnteresseerd in een efficiënte en strategische samenwerking om deze groei te realiseren. Daarnaast hebben wij de ambitie om een eigen merk te creëren dat zich specifiek richt op de Midden-Oosterse markt. Wij zien uw bedrijf als een ideale partner om dit merk succesvol op te bouwen en te ontwikkelen. We zouden graag willen bespreken hoe we gezamenlijk exclusieve distributieafspraken en contracten kunnen opstellen om deze doelstellingen te bereiken. Graag zouden wij een afspraak willen inplannen om de details van deze mogelijke samenwerking met u te bespreken. Tijdens deze bijeenkomst ontvangen we ook graag uw prijsindicatie voor de levering van de 9x9 friet en bespreken we de mogelijkheden voor ondersteuning bij onze merkambities. Wij zijn ervan overtuigd dat een samenwerking tussen onze bedrijven tot wederzijds succes kan leiden en kijken ernaar uit om de mogelijkheden met u te verkennen. Ik hoor graag van u welke datum en tijd voor u het beste uitkomt voor een gesprek. Met vriendelijke groet, Emeer Al Badawi E&D Global Traiding B.V. 0031-646876467 e_albadawi@hotmail.com

Subject: Informationen zu 90627764 + 90627765, Billa GH + Billa AG, KW33?
TextBody: Hallo Mathias, in der Anlage findest du die Bestellung, die wir am 21. August für Woche 33 erhalten haben. Diese wurde entsprechend in unser System eingegeben. Allerdings haben wir jetzt bemerkt, dass das Dokument selbst auf den 2. Mai 2024 datiert ist. Könnte es sich möglicherweise um ein falsches Dokument handeln, das für Woche 33 weitergeleitet wurde? Bitte lass es uns wissen. Vielen Dank im Voraus und freundlichen Grüße, Service Agristo nv Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 8710 Wielsbeke Belgium --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Mathias Bergauer [mathias.bergauer@tkl.at] Sent: 10/09/2024 14:01 To: service@agristo.com Cc: customerservice@tkl.at Subject: Informationen zu 90627764 + 90627765, Billa GH + Billa AG, KW33? Guten Tag! Bitte um Information zu den Rechnungen 90627764 und 90627765 für Billa GH und Billa AG. Es ist zwar die Woche 33 vermerkt, doch diese passt von den Mengen her nicht zu den Rechnungen. Bitte können Sie uns eventuell den Wochenverkauf, den Sie verwendet haben, uns zusenden? Vielen Dank vorab. Mit freundlichen Grüßen Mathias Bergauer Customer Service TKL Lebensmittel Logistik GmbH Hermann-Gebauer-Straße 3 A-1220 Wien Tel.: +43 (0)1 33165-1376 Fax: +43 (0)1 33165-1389 mathias.bergauer@tkl.at customerservice@tkl.at www.tkl.at "Wir arbeiten ausschließlich aufgrund der Allgemeinen Österreichischen Spediteurbedingungen (AÖSp) in der jeweils neuesten Fassung. Subject: 41165903 Morrisons Quality Complaint - Roast Potatoes 800g 600955
TextBody: Dear Ciara , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00048507. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. There is a complete Quality Assurance system in place and the principles of HACCP are applied. This includes a full monitoring system on the production line. The finished products themselves are sampled every 60 minutes and examined for quality, including odeur and taste. Full records of these and all the other checks are maintained. Since we don't have any further information regarding the batchnumber or production date of the bags, we couldn't conduct a thorough investigation into our production records and quality documents for this specific batch. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: PROBLÈME Commande ARSTO
TextBody: Bonjour, Suite au problème de chargement qu'il y a eu sur la commande ART RESTO ci-dessous, vous trouverez ci-joint la facture de notre transporteur. Merci de nous faire l'avoir de 4 000€ qui concerne le transport ref : 24409726. Dans l'attente de votre confirmation. Cordialement [cid:9a098bbc-92ba-44be-9a18-3de55fdb01f5] SAGLAM DISTRIBUTION Margerie Charlotte SERVICE COMPTABILITÉ Téléphone : 02.43.04.48.89 E-mail : comptabilite.distribution@saglam-france.fr ZA des Avaloirs 53140 Pré en Pail FRANCE www.saglam-distribution.fr<http://www.saglam-distribution.fr> www.saglam-france.fr<http://www.saglam-france.fr> [cid:28c392ee-9de9-4407-8767-978b2740699a]<https://www.linkedin.com/company/saglamfr> [cid:40df1a22-496c-4c16-9cb4-4f1a70952a86] <https://www.facebook.com/groupesaglam> [cid:e172a795-c97c-4e19-ade8-d796c760a6d7] <https://www.instagram.com/saglamdoner/> [cid:6e1486f7-41d3-4f2e-b319-b44eed067004] ________________________________ De : Nansifou Gbadamassi <nansifou@saglam-france.fr> Envoyé : vendredi 30 août 2024 13:58 À : Service Request <service@agristo.com>; Anton Jongbloet <Anton.Jongbloet@agristo.com>; Abdullah SAGLAM <direction.distribution@saglam-france.fr>; Charlotte MARGERIE <comptabilite.distribution@saglam-france.fr> Objet : PROBLÈME Commande ARSTO Bonjour Staf, Pour la commande ARSTO, j'avais commandé des frites LME/NIS. Ref : ARSTO 01 palette 6/6 Présalé LEM/NIS 32 palettes 9/9 Présalé LEM/NIS Mais le client vient de me dire que vous avez chargé seulement des frites MY et il refuse donc sa livraison. Peux-tu vérifier ce qui a été chargé et me faire un retour rapidement stp car le transporteur est toujours sur place et attend mes instructions. Dans l'attente de ton retour. Bien cordialement, Nansifou GBADAMASSI SAGLAM DISTRIBUTION

TextBody: D&B Finance Analytics Datum 09/11/2024 Tijd 08:01 AM D&B Finance Analytics WAARSCHUWINGEN In deze e-mail Inbox Waarschuwingen Totaal Waarschuwingen 2 (2 Bedrijven) Informatief 1 Opwaartse trends 0 Ernstige voorvallen 0 Neerwaartse trends 1 De ernst van de waarschuwing wordt bepaald door het algemene gebeurtenistype. Dit kan betekenen dat in sommige gevallen een gebeurtenis verandering zowel negatief als positief kan zijn. Bekijk altijd de volledige details van elke gebeurtenis voordat u actie onderneemt. De door D&B verstrekte ernst classificatie, positief/negatief en gebeurtenis beschrijving worden te goeder trouw verstrekt en kunnen er niet tegen D&B worden gebruikt. Markem-Imaje B.V. Subject: 41134175 Morrisons FB Complaint - Crinkle Cut Chips 1.2kg 600960
TextBody: Dear Ciara , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00048640. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Given our production process, which includes stone washers, process water, blanchers, fryers, and more, it's highly unlikely that this insect could have traversed our entire production process without being detected and removed. We are confident that any contamination of this nature would have been identified at multiple points during production. Therefore, we suspect that the contamination may have occurred after the frying process. It's possible that an insect entered our production environment and became unintentionally attached to the fries before packaging. It’s important to note that we have a rigorous pest control system to prevent the entry of insects and rodents into the factory environment All doors are strictly required to remain closed at all times, and we consistently monitor and inspect these controls. In order to conduct a further investigation, we need a lotcode and/or production date to check on the production run. If you would receive these data or pictures, please send them so we can re-open the investigation. Unfortunately, it seems that despite our efforts, we failed to prevent contamination in this case, for which we wish to apologize. Should you or your customer require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Subject: Contamination: Black piece of potato
TextBody: Dear Mya san, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 48912. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Batch code: G07 24 076 21:21 Production day: 2024.03.16 After reviewing the picture and description, I believe that the foreign body in question is a clump of fat from the oven. Normally these kind of clumps are removed by the optical sorter after freezing (before packing). It appears that, despite our best efforts, some foreign material may have escaped our monitoring system. Based on the batch code, I traced back the production day of this product to the 16th of March 2024. I have checked our records and there were no anomalies registered from this nature. Our hourly quality checks also do not mention any comment in this regard. As you might remember, we do check the quality of the oil in the baking oven visually every hour. It is quite straightforward: a sample of the oil is taken and visually checked if it is still clean. Next to that, we also check the oil on free fatty acids (at least 1x/day – max. = 1.5%) and polar fraction (every shift = every 8 hours – max. = 25%). I checked the results of these checks and can confirm we were well within tolerance: Free fatty acids: Polar fraction: We also haven’t received any similar complaints. That is why we think this is an isolated incident, for which we would like to apologize. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Certificate of analysis -  Microbiological characteristics
TextBody: Hello team, good afternoon! We have heard form the quality team from Copacol regarding the certificate of analysis and we have a few more revisions to make. Please see below: N = 5 (that we can see on the instructions provided by the regulatory in Brasil) means 5 samples from the same batch. The certificate attached to this email contains 3 different batches: 24171, 24164 and 24172. For each batch, you must provide the result of 5 analyses of each microorganism analyzed. [cid:image002.gif@01DB042F.0AF31B40] The results should be presented like below: Batch 24171 Sample 1 Sample 2 Sample 3 Sample 4 Sample 5 Salmonella/25g absent absent absent absent absent The certificate of the PO 668/24 attached needs to be revised asap, and so need all the sets from now on. We can maintain this rule for all clients, it's not restricted to Copacol, even though the requested was done by them.
