Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: Birds Eye Waffle Fries - cutting
TextBody: Hi, As agreed during today's visit, please find some more information about the cutting process of the waffle fries: The picture below shows you how it works: 1) the potato falls into the cutting machine and makes a turn so that it ends up in position 2 2) in position 2 the potato is in a rotating part which causes it to rotate 90° every time before it reaches a cutting blade 3) Because the potato is rotated 90° every time you get the crossed cutting points This is thus a totally different cutting process than a regular straight cut fry - we call it a "3D" knife, because the potato is cut in multiple directions. Hope this helps.

Subject: Containerless and Lonely in September – Need Some Company!
TextBody: Good day, Hope all is well in your world of shipments and containers! Just wanted to check in because, well... September’s looking a little light on my end. And by light, I mean my containers are feeling lonely and could use some friends. If you have any shipments coming up that need a good home (or a container buddy!), I’d love to share the load. Think of it as helping a friend in need – and a win-win for us both! Looking forward to hearing from you soon and giving my containers the company they deserve. Your insights and experiences are invaluable to us. If you have any feedback, suggestions, or concerns, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at feedback@cargoconvoy.co<mailto:feedback@cargoconvoy.co>

Subject: AG2905
TextBody: Hello, Due to internal organization, I need this shipment to take place in week 41. Please do not ship before that. Our organization requires only 5 containers to arrive each week, and the current schedule is exceeding this amount. Thank you. I indeed confirm this order is currently foreseen to load in the week of 16/09 instead of the earlier forecastes week of 30/09. Please note that adapting the buyer for this order to World Food Brazil, could result in shipping companies refusing these containers, related to earlier legal procedures between World Food and the shipping companies. Could you please check internally and confirm if you would like me to adapt this order? Thank you!

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 11.09.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 11.09.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: ABOUT YOUR FUNDS
TextBody: Attn; Fund Beneficiary I am Mrs Robin Sanders, Former U.S.A Ambassador to Nigeria. With reference to your entitlement fund and inline with the CHANGE OF BENEFICARY'S APPLICATION, signed by Mrs. Glenda F. Ward with your purported authorization. This case has been carefully examined and we have declined Mrs. Ward's application and reported to the security department for appropriate action, as the application lacks regular signature. But Did you ever instruct Mrs Glenda F. Ward to claim your fund worth US$7.000.000? Below is the bank account information provided by Mrs Glenda F. Ward saying that you authorized her to claim your fund that you are terminally ill. BANK NAME: Bank Of America BANK ADDRESS: 20920 Wilshire Blvd Los Angeles, Ca 90024 USA ACCOUNT #: 7054510036 ROUTING #: 842000247 Swift Code: BOFBIUS6S Account Name: Glender F Ward Beneficiary address: 2902 N Beverly Glen Blvd Los Angeles, Ca 90077 USA If you had not authorized the change of your bank account in respect to your outstanding entitlement Payment, therefore notify me immediately as the notification / declaration was supported with a sworn affidavit from Lagos high court ref: ilk /jj/202/k2021, dated 11/09/2024 and signed by Mrs. Glenda Ward who claim and stated in the sworn declaration that you authorized her to claim the said fund on your behalf to a different bank account in the U.S.A as stated above because you were terminally ill and the Doctor who is incharge of your case stated that you will not stay more than one Month before passing away. This development has caused lots of discrepancies in your payment file that is why we had to suspend your payment and prompted to contact you directly before rejuvenating your payment. You have to be rest assured that I will do everything within my capacity to successfully actualize the quick transfer of your fund to any of your nominated bank account. Kindly get back to me as soon as possible so that I will direct you on what to do. Sincerely Yours Dr.Mrs Robin Sanders Fmr. U.S Ambassador

Subject: FR/GB  Pour une main d’œuvre et des jeunes diplômés africains en Afrique - Recherche financement...GB / For a workforce and young African graduates in Africa- Seeking funding...
TextBody: [https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/op/sh/WCPxRrf2SE93T5HOJrpESHr0ZFpa1lxJ/Z2DQDE8rFtIQ] <https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/mr/sh/WCPxRrNLV1Ltti4tyGCXcSsGW3FlJi1B/hI23o9k4dFpj> Français / English below [https://2tvlo.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/sw9wJ-6My8gS.jpg?u=92pJLo34vnrQtTPiT3zso9Y7VRkmj50FLqT] L'accompagnement dans la Croissance Partagée avec l'Afrique pour Prospérer Ensemble... ­ Bonjour, Sommaire de la lettre : 1) Pour une main d’œuvre et des jeunes diplômés africains en Afrique ! 2) Partenariat avec nos ingénieurs agronomes européens 3) Les échanges « Entre tradition et modernité en Afrique » regroupant Agriculture-Agronomie-Elevage-Halieutique-Forêt 4) Recherche de financement 5) Nos publications 6) De quel(s) produit(s) avez-vous besoin ? Je souhaite devenir un nouvel abonné gratuitement.<mailto:contact@croissancepeace.org> La lettre est distribuée à 80 000 lecteurs. Vous pouvez la diffuser aux autorités compétentes. Derniers éditos<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ6uvcwysdYpdV6Sb394ybg6z/Q6Nwo3MlxIuQ> Notre charte<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ72igzC8zeJJGqcOBvy5rNj7/LfjUZ0eWMrlS> 1) Pour une main d’œuvre et des jeunes diplômés africains en Afrique ! Si la volonté des pays africains est de préserver leur potentiel humain, Si la volonté des occidentaux est d’éviter une immigration informelle, Si la volonté des africains et des occidentaux est de contribuer à favoriser le commerce en croissance partagée Alors Croissance PEACE a la solution ! Appliquez notre charte (extraits): La mission que s’est donnée l’ONG Croissance PEACE dès sa fondation est de participer activement aux cotés des africains à la croissance et au développement souverain de l’Afrique, aux plans économique et sociétal. Dans l’équité et le respect des cultures locales africaines, nous sommes animés par la ferme volonté d’apporter une contribution significative au processus de développement de l’Afrique. ….. . Priorité à l’emploi local et à la facilitation pour un management local, formés ; . Transfert de technologies en croissance partagée vers l’Afrique ; . Développement économique, social et environnemental d’une industrie de la transformation ; . Favoriser l’équilibre sur les contrats signés avec les entités étrangères ; . Respect des valeurs sociales, sociétales et culturelles locales ; . Respect du principe de la non-ingérence ; . Donner une image juste de l’Afrique, porteuse de solutions pour le monde ; . Favoriser le commerce intra-africain. Charte complète lien : https://www.croissancepeace.org/notre-charte<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7AVl1PPLjmz2amBKirD75LF/6fXBnXyEoRvK> 2) Partenariat avec nos ingénieurs agronomes européens Nos partenaires, notamment ingénieurs agronomes européens gèrent et développent des projets agricoles, industriels et de construction en Afrique ( Ghana, Congo, Togo, Liberia, Côte d’Ivoire, Sénégal, Nigéria, Guinée, Tanzanie…) Ils ont une expérience depuis plus de 30 ans dans les filières tels que: le riz, le maïs, le maraicher, le blé, le manioc, la mangue, la pastèque, la papaye…) L’activité de nos partenaires a permis une implication dans le développement de l’agriculture. La fourniture d’une large gamme de produits agricoles et de machines pour l’agriculture conventionnelle et biologique, tels que des semences sélectionnées, des engrais et des produits phytosanitaires, des outils à main et des machines agricoles, ainsi que des services d’ingénierie et de conseils avec l’introduction de nouvelles pratiques et technologies permettent d'augmenter la production et la qualité des cultures. Le continent africain dispose d’un grand potentiel économique pour le développement de projets agricoles en raison de l’extension des terres non cultivées. La production de ces friches ainsi que l’utilisation de nouvelles techniques de production agricole favorisent le développement du secteur agricole, la création d’emplois et, par conséquent, la croissance économique des pays. L’application de nouvelles techniques de production agricole permettra d’augmenter la production actuelle et la qualité des cultures à produire, le tout grâce à des professionnels externes qualifiés qui forment à la fois les techniciens et les agriculteurs locaux à ces nouvelles techniques. Intéressé par du partenariat avec des ingénieurs agronomes contact@croissancepeace.org<mailto:contact@croissancepeace.org?subject=Partenariat%20avec%20nos%20ing%C3%A9nieurs%20agronomes%20europ%C3%A9ens> 3) Les échanges Croissance PEACE, « Entre tradition et modernité en Afrique » regroupant Agriculture-Agronomie-Elevage-Halieutique-Forêt, de la conception à la consommation, en anticipant sur les changements climatiques Pour qui ? Pour les exploitants (petits aux gros) dans les domaines de l’Agriculture-Agronomie-Elevage-Halieutique-Forêt, les experts , les fournisseurs de matériel (neufs, occasions), l’ingénierie, la recherche, l’irrigation, l’agroéquipement, l’agroenvironnement, les vendeurs de semences et plants, les vendeurs de produits pour animaux, la santé animalière, les transformateurs, les industriels, la chaîne de distribution, la sécurité alimentaire, les aidants aux contrats, les ministères, les organisations patronales, syndicales et coopératives, chambres d’agriculture, les écoles et universités, les investisseurs…qui travaillent en Afrique. Pour quelles raisons ? L’Afrique détient aujourd’hui 60% des terres non cultivées du monde (FAO) lui assurant un immense potentiel pour le futur de son agriculture qui n’est malheureusement pas encore suffisamment développée. Sa population active qui travaille essentiellement dans le secteur de l’agriculture représente environ 65% et dépend de petits exploitants (souvent des femmes). De plus, riches en matières premières les pays d’Afrique peinent à transformer leurs ressources agricoles sur place en raison de contraintes liées à l’énergie et au manque d’infrastructures routières adaptées. Dans quels buts ? Les acheteurs étrangers préfèrent transformer leurs achats (produits agricoles…) dans leur pays privant ainsi l’Afrique d’une valeur ajoutée conséquente. Il convient, que les populations et les pays africains s’orientent rapidement vers une transformation de leur production locale avant de l’exporter ou de la consommer sur place (Croissance PEACE encourage toutes les initiatives prises dans ce sens depuis sa création). Il est clair que l’Afrique a le premier rôle à jouer dans cette nouvelle orientation et qu’il serait souhaitable qu’elle puisse intensifier ses efforts pour augmenter sa production agricole afin de faire reculer la famine et la pauvreté mais aussi pour que cesse l’importation inutile de certaines denrées alimentaires. Il reste beaucoup à faire, ces changements constitueront un vecteur important de sa croissance. Par ce biais, est créé un socle d’échanges avec des personnes de confiance sur des savoir-faire, des expériences. Ces échanges génèrent des actions bénéfiques pour l’agriculture, l’élevage, la pêche, la pisciculture la forêt en Afrique. Nous soutiendrons activement toute action, initiée et gérée par les africains eux-mêmes. C’est l’intérêt de toutes les parties prenantes d’adopter cette forme de collaboration qui devrait permettre à l’Afrique de nourrir et d’enrichir sa population ainsi que de préserver les ressources pour les générations à venir. Les apports de Croissance PEACE ? La création de ces échanges pour une gestion durable des ressources provenant de la terre et de l’eau en Afrique est proposée par Croissance PEACE. Ils ont pour objet de regrouper « les meilleurs » en Agriculture-Agronomie-Elevage-Pêche-Pisciculture-Forêt pour l’Afrique afin de pouvoir proposer des actions, qui répondent aux besoins et aux attentes des africains. Les échanges Croissance PEACE « Entre tradition et modernité en Afrique » regroupent tous nos frères et sœurs africains quel qu’en soit le pays ainsi que des espagnols, des belges, des luxembourgeois, des anglais, des français, des brésiliens, des turcs, des chinois… Nos larges réseaux internationaux donnent sens à cette action africaine notamment pour le financement de vos projets. En mettant en commun les compétences et les relations de chacun en collaboration avec les africains, ces nouveaux acteurs peuvent contribuer à créer un véritable partenariat basé sur l'échange de connaissances et de compétences et permettre la transmission réciproque de savoirs leur permettant de capitaliser sur leur propre savoir-faire, qui est déjà extrêmement riche et varié. Les échanges Croissance PEACE « Entre tradition et modernité en Afrique » Agriculture-Agronomie-Elevage-Pêche-Pisciculture-Forêt ont pour finalité d’apporter un cadre structurant, des solutions, des partenariats, des partages d’expériences et du financement. En même temps il incite à sortir des idées préconçues et à rechercher des idées innovantes. Nous souhaitons connaitre vos besoins et attentes afin de qualifier les échanges futurs, les propositions, les réunions... Des missions pourront également être organisées en Afrique ou en Europe. Inscriptions <https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7IIp3cfhpGeoKvyTVkKMmxN/XAeyevQJzn5B> Ludovic Emanuely, Président Croissance PEACE 4) Recherche de financement Si vous êtes en quête de financement pour votre projet d’entreprise, vous pouvez bénéficier de notre soutien en nous envoyant votre Business Plan pour étude. Nous évaluerons le potentiel de rentabilité de votre projet. Si votre projet est retenu, alors, nous mettrons en place un protocole d’accompagnement. Pour rappel, les projets que nous accompagnons doivent avoir un besoin de financement minimum d’EUR 10 millions. Formulaire à remplir pour traiter votre demande: www.croissancepeace.org<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7Q5t5pw3ukKa55lcIdRcUZV/S0D4S6lc_7NY> puis Besoins/attentes entreprises puis Financement-Club des investisseurs… Avec mes amitiés, Auguste DAGO Directeur des investissements auguste.dago@croissancepeace.org<mailto:auguste.dago@croissancepeace.org> 5) Nos publications . A Armes égales citoyens ? La stratégie du looser (Intelligence économique) https://www.leseditionsdunet.com/livre/armes-egales-citoyens-la-strategie-du-looser<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7Xsx83CQ0E0LpFYl5WYsCBd/mQl8ccJ2b1OW> . Le Partenariat Privé-Privé Performé Par le Public (6P) avec l’Afrique ; livre encouragé par l’Union Africaine https://www.leseditionsdunet.com/livre/partenariat-prive-prive-performe-par-le-public-le-6p<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7fg1AGSm5hg7ZPLtsPg7tnl/oLSHRFSIdqUj> . L’innovation africaine par les femmes ; seul livre consacré exclusivement sur le sujet https://www.leseditionsdunet.com/livre/linnovation-africaine-par-les-femmes<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7nT5CTj8BBLtJZ92fInNbPt/7-xNWvRxjlXN> 6) De quel (s) produit (s) avez-vous besoin ? Nous sommes parfaitement prêts à vous présenter des offres sérieuses dans les domaines de l’agroalimentaire et des produits manufacturés. L’étendue et la fiabilité éprouvées de notre réseau dans ces domaines nous l’autorisent. Nos industriels et partenaires ont été sélectionnés sur leurs produits, leurs services, leur respect des délais et leur sérieux. Ils sont disponibles pour vous proposer leurs meilleures offres sur le produit ou service que vous recherchez, soit sur un produit déjà existant, soit en l’adaptant à votre marché, soit en le concevant spécifiquement (en accord avec votre cahier des charges). Formulaire à remplir pour traiter votre demande: www.croissancepeace.org<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ7vG9EgzUGf1f3iwBSBudJ21/xLHaDoWF-1uX> puis Besoins/attentes entreprises puis De quels produits avez-vous besoin? … Pensons positif et agissons constructif ! Bien cordialement [https://2tvlo.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/aokgV_HF-EKr.png?u=92pJLo34vnrQtbCmVHGEtdDtFbXvVy7V3Sb] Ludovic EMANUELY President – Croissance PEACE Chede- RC gend- IIIC +33 6 80 26 97 19 (Direct et Whatsapp) www.croissancepeace.org<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/WCPzyXJTZ833DGuFqM8hQnsjKF51t0e9/uK4jFTxFDOKy> ludovic.emanuely@croissancepeace.org<mailto:ludovic.emanuely@croissancepeace.org> ­ [https://2tvlo.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/qgPFXr6n4q3C.jpg?u=92pJLo34vnrQtizqXUWaz6tezlL4IrEkl4j]<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ4yaod9wlzs0mUDpSpsC1B7p4L/sG3BM7P465M9> Shared Growth With Africa to prosper Together .. ­ English Hello, Letter summary: 1) For a workforce and young African graduates in Africa! 2) Partnership with our European agricultural engineers 3) The exchanges "Between tradition and modernity in Africa" ​​bringing together Agriculture-Agronomy-Livestock-Fisheries-Forestry 4) Search for funding 5) Our publications 6) What product(s) do you need? I want to become a new subscriber for free<mailto:contact@croissancepeace.org> The letter is distributed to 80,000 readers. You can distribute it to the competent authorities. Latest editorials<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ4z6zDp5XX4dIxMPtkA3b7xuVN/9NkCsxQxs8eb> Our charter<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ4zd9oUEJ4HFpQV0KeRvB4nzwP/aA-OgbyXEdCC> 1) For a workforce and young African graduates in Africa! If the will of African countries is to preserve their human potential, If the will of Westerners is to avoid informal immigration, If the will of Africans and Westerners is to contribute to promoting trade in shared growth Then Croissance PEACE has the solution! Apply our charter (extracts): The mission of the NGO Croissance PEACE since its foundation is to participate actively alongside Africans in the growth and sovereign development of Africa, economically and societally. With fairness and respect for local African cultures, we are driven by the firm will to make a significant contribution to the process of African development. ….. . Priority to local employment, facilitation for local management; . Shared growth technology transfer to Africa; . Economic, social and environmental development of a processing industry; . Promote balance in contracts signed with entities foreign to the countries; . Respect for local social, societal and cultural values; . Respect for the principle of non-interference; . Give a fair image of Africa, a provider of solutions for the world. . Promoting intra-African trade Full charter link: https://www.croissancepeace.org/notre-charte<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ509KP9N4bTsLtdalYjml1e5NR/I3qGoexR1NGu> 2) Partnership with our European agricultural engineers Our partners, notably European agricultural engineers, manage and develop agricultural, industrial and construction projects in Africa (Ghana, Congo, Togo, Liberia, Ivory Coast, Senegal, Nigeria, Guinea, Tanzania, etc.) .They have experience for more than 30 years in sectors such as: rice, corn, market gardening, wheat, cassava, mango, watermelon, papaya, etc.) The activity of our partners has enabled involvement in the development of agriculture. Providing a wide range of agricultural products and machinery for conventional and organic farming, such as selected seeds, fertilizers and plant protection products, hand tools and agricultural machinery, as well as engineering services and advice with the introduction of new practices and technologies make it possible to increase the production and quality of crops. The African continent has great economic potential for the development of agricultural projects due to the expansion of uncultivated land. The production of these wastelands as well as the use of new agricultural production techniques promote the development of the agricultural sector, the creation of jobs and, consequently, the economic growth of countries. The application of new agricultural production techniques will increase current production and the quality of crops to be produced, all thanks to qualified external professionals who train both technicians and local farmers in these new techniques. Interested in partnership with agricultural engineers: contact@croissancepeace.org<mailto:contact@croissancepeace.org> 3) Croissance PEACE exchanges, “Between tradition and modernity in Africa” bringing together Agriculture-Agronomy-Livestock-Fishing-Fish farming-Forest, from design to consumption, anticipating climate change For who ? For operators (small to large) in the fields of Agriculture-Agronomy-Livestock-Fishing-Pisciculture-Forestry, experts, equipment suppliers (new, used), engineering, research, irrigation, agro-equipment, agri-environment, sellers of seeds and plants, sellers of animal products, animal health, processors, manufacturers, the distribution chain, food safety, helping them with contracts, ministries, employers' organizations, trade unions and cooperatives, chambers of agriculture, schools and universities, investors...who work in Africa. For what reasons ? Africa today holds 60% of the world's uncultivated land (FAO), giving it immense potential for the future of its agriculture, which is unfortunately not yet sufficiently developed. Its active population, which works mainly in the agricultural sector, represents around 65% and depends on small farmers (often women). In addition, rich in raw materials, African countries struggle to transform their agricultural resources on site due to energy constraints and a lack of suitable road infrastructure. For what purposes? Foreign buyers prefer to process their purchases (agricultural products, etc.) in their country, thus depriving Africa of significant added value. It is appropriate that African populations and countries quickly move towards transforming their local production before exporting it or consuming it locally (Croissance PEACE encourages all initiatives taken in this direction since its creation). It is clear that Africa has the leading role to play in this new orientation and that it would be desirable if it could intensify its efforts to increase its agricultural production in order to reduce famine and poverty but also to put an end to the unnecessary importation of certain foodstuffs. There is still much to do, these changes will constitute an important vector of its growth. This creates a basis for exchanges with trusted people on know-how and experiences. These exchanges generate beneficial actions for agriculture, livestock, fishing, fish farming and forestry in Africa. We will actively support any action, initiated and managed by Africans themselves. It is in the interest of all stakeholders to adopt this form of collaboration which should allow Africa to feed and enrich its population as well as preserve resources for generations to come. The contributions of Croissance PEACE? The creation of these exchanges for sustainable management of resources from land and water in Africa is proposed by Croissance PEACE. Their aim is to bring together “the best” in Agriculture-Agronomy-Livestock-Fishing-Fish Farming-Forestry for Africa in order to be able to propose actions that meet the needs and expectations of Africans. The Croissance PEACE exchanges “Between tradition and modernity in Africa” bring together all our African brothers and sisters regardless of the country as well as Spaniards, Belgians, Luxembourgers, English, French, Brazilians, Turks, Chinese… Our large international networks give meaning to this African action, particularly for the financing of your projects. By pooling everyone's skills and relationships in collaboration with Africans, these new actors can contribute to creating a real partnership based on the exchange of knowledge and skills and allow the reciprocal transmission of knowledge allowing them to capitalize on their own know-how, which is already extremely rich and varied. The Croissance PEACE exchanges “Between tradition and modernity in Africa” Agriculture-Agronomy-Livestock-Fishing-Fish farming-Forest aim to provide structuring framework, solutions, partnerships, sharing of experiences and financing. At the same time it encourages people to break away from preconceived ideas and seek innovative ideas. We want to know your needs and expectations in order to qualify future exchanges, proposals and meetings... Missions could also be organized in Africa or Europe. Registrations<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ50fUzoVq8gUsMmBCT1eKyUAoT/oR0s7agsWiIK> Ludovic Emanuely President Croissance PEACE 4) Search for financing If you are looking for financing for your business project, you can benefit from our support by sending us your Business Plan for study. We will assess the profitability potential of your project. If your project is selected, then we will put in place a support protocol. As a reminder, the projects we support must have a minimum financing requirement of EUR 10 million. Form to complete to process your request: www.croissancepeace.org<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ51BfaTebft7OpuldNJVuvKGFV/fZ1E3HqjxUrs> then Business needs/expectations then Financing-Investors Club… My friendships, Auguste DAGO Director of Investments auguste.dago@croissancepeace.org<mailto:auguste.dago@croissancepeace.org> 5) Our publications . A Equal arms citizens? The loser's strategy (Business intelligence) https://www.leseditionsdunet.com/livre/armes-egales-citoyens-la-strategie-du-looser<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ51hqB8nND5jvJ3M4HbNUsALgX/5MbBz23Fj9dJ> . The Private-Private Partnership Performed and Pushed by the Public (6P) with Africa; book encouraged by the African Union https://www.leseditionsdunet.com/livre/partenariat-prive-prive-performe-par-le-public-le-6p<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ52E0lnw8kIMRmBwVBtF4p0R7Z/nXjHEzbt6FyR> . African innovation by women; only book devoted exclusively to the subject https://www.leseditionsdunet.com/livre/linnovation-africaine-par-les-femmes<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ52kBMT4uHUyyFKWw6B6elqWYb/HJUckQ4ClLXU> 6) What product(s) do you need? We are perfectly ready to present you serious offers in the fields of agri-food and manufactured products. The breadth and proven reliability of our network in these areas allows us to do so. Our manufacturers and partners have been selected on the basis of their products, their services, their compliance with deadlines and their seriousness. They are available to offer you their best offers on the product or service you are looking for, either on an already existing product, or by adapting it to your market, or by designing it specifically (in accordance with your specifications). Form to fill out to process your request: www.croissancepeace.org<https://2tvlo.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/28xHLtxYQ53GLx8DfohbUiT7N0SyEigbzd/yMhHDZVS7rbe> then Business needs/expectations then What products do you need? … Think positive and act constructively!

Subject: Reno: Pompin & noisettes
TextBody: Hi Ellen, Anne, Previously, our R&D team proposed an R&D article. One key issue noted form your side was the color of the mash, which appeared too yellow, and the product burst open in the air fryer. Following this, our R&D team suggested a line test with reduced amounts of curcuma, dextrose, and potato flakes. However, this test was postponed due to the high volume of NPDs for Belviva at the time - the project was put on hold for Iglo. In the meantime, our R&D team has continued working on these products, and we now have two active versions that we believe will meet your expectations. Would you like us to include them in the tasting during your visit on October 17th?

Subject: IMPORTANT REQUEST STOP LOADING LOGGER TO TOYOTA
TextBody: Dear Pieter, First of all, Thank you for your time for my visit Agristo. I arrived Japan safe and do some work. I have a request. I still see that we loaded a logger in the container shipped to Toyota in mistake because we are not required. I reported Agristo about it several times already since when Marrtin was PIC. But it still has been done. Can you please talk again to logistics and ask them not to load any logger to the container goes to Toyota please ? Pls let me explain a reason of my request. If we loaded a logger, Toyota cannot proceed import clearance procedure. Because there is no expression about logger on the invoice. The customs never accept to proceed customs clearance procedure without invoice for the logger. So I have been making an invoice with Agristo format to let Toyota proceed the customs clearance. But there is a time I cannot make the invoice due to my business trips and eventually Toyota cannot proceed the customs clearance on time. I want to avoid it. Than you very much. Hagino

Subject: forecast IGLO BelViVa 12_09_2024
TextBody: Hallo, De file in bijlage betreft de zuivere forecast voor alle klanten/week tem eind Q1/2025 Wil zeggen dat de producten in principe 3 weken ervoor moeten klaar staan voor verlading, dus de stock moet echt wel op tijd gemaakt worden. TAB 1 forecast/week, alle klanten behalve Colruyt forecast Colruyt totaal volume waar jullie mee kunnen werken TAB 2 stock op datum van vandaag = donderdagmorgen 12/09 (alle wagens bij jullie geladen tem gisteren 11/09 voor GXO zitten in deze stock verwerkt) Zowel forecast als stock is in kg Ik heb de oude kodes Belgische kroketten 800g Ovenkroketten 16x600g Mini kroketten 16x600g Niet meer vermeld, de stock is zo goed als op Winterkroketten ik heb begrepen dat deze volgende week gemaakt worden in één run. In de vorige versie stond 113 ton in de forecast, nu staat er minder 93 ton, indien mogelijk graag 103 ton maken, zou graag wat buffer hebben. Als het niet meer mogelijk is het oorspronkelijk volume te veranderen dan OK om de 113 ton te maken. 96020661 Ronde kroketten 600g (Jingle balls) Heb begrepen dat productie in W43 zal zijn. Graag begin W43, zodat we dezelfde week nog kunnen laden. Voor einde jaar verkopen wij dit als Jingle balls, vanaf volgend jaar zullen wij dat echt ronde kroketten noemen en zal er ook een ander artwork zijn. Wij zullen geen andere kode hebben, maar veronderstel dat jullie intern een nieuwe kode zullen hebben. 96018640 BelvivaJungleCroquette600g Geen producties meer, alle stock zal worden afgenomen. 96017386 BelvivaPotCroquettes 800g Dank om het volledige volume van 76 ton in W39 te maken, daarna geen producties meer, product gaat eruit na eindejaar. Momenteel zijn we OUT. Dank alvast. Mvg, Marleen Marleen Van Durmen Demand & Supply Planner [cid:Nomad_Foods_LOGORGB-Resized93high_dff506c2-0e22-47e4-abd7-1a687e84ad2d.jpg] [X] Iglo Belgium NV Techno Centre - Building C | Humaniteitslaan 235 | 1620 Drogenbos | Brussel BTW BE 0884.248.931 | RPR Brussel Phone: +32 23529252<tel:+32%2023529252> Mobile: +32 476952269<tel:+32%20476952269> Fax: +32(0)2 352 92 89 email: Marleen.Van-Durmen@iglo.com<mailto:Marleen.Van-Durmen@iglo.com> Website: www.iglo.be<http://www.iglo.be/> P THINK BEFORE YOU PRINT: Before printing e-mails, think whether it is really necessary. Subject: BADA TM-20: Transpalette manuel en acier inoxydable
TextBody: [https://badamh.invionews.net/rsp/pdgois/if/resizex/516,null/rs/content/risorsa_12.png?_d=98B&_c=8f57f63c] BADA TM-20: Transpalette manuel en acier inoxydable [https://badamh.invionews.net/rsp/pdgois/if/resizex/700,null/rs/content/imm-1-tm-20.png?_d=98B&_c=aaf77359] Spécifications de la machine disponibles: • capacité : 2.000 kgs • levage : 115 mm • fourches : 1.150 x 520 mm • galets simple Transpalette manuel en acier inoxydable AISI 304 destiné à la manutention dans des environnements humides et corrosifs où la propreté et l’hygiène sont requises, par exemple dans le secteur agroalimentaire (produits laitiers, transformation de la viande, poisson, saumure, fruits et légumes). Résistant, facile à manipuler et ergonomique, il répond pleinement aux exigences d’hygiène les plus strictes car il peut être assaini par un lavage régulier à haute pression, garantissant ainsi la qualité des aliments dans le processus de production. Unité de levage et composants hydrauliques en acier inoxydable. Roues de direction et galets des fourches en nylon avec revêtement en polyuréthane et roulements en acier inoxydable. 100% acier inoxydable (chassis, gaffels, leviers, tirants) pour une utilisation dans des environnements agressifs et corrosifs. Timon ergonomique et facile à manœuvrer. Bagues en polyamide autolubrifiantes sans entretien pour l’industrie alimentaire. Subject: [Request for confirmation] Claim Report 412076　[597:Agristo(ヘ゛ルキ゛ー)]◆
TextBody: Dear Yuga san, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 48935. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : G31 23 279 20:05 Production day : 2023.10.06 Given our production process, which includes stone washers, process water, blanchers, fryers, and more, it's highly unlikely that this insect could have traversed our entire production process without being detected and removed. We are confident that any contamination of this nature would have been identified at multiple points during production. Therefore, we suspect that the contamination may have occurred after the frying process. It's possible that an insect entered our production environment and became unintentionally attached to the waffle fries before packaging. It’s important to note that we have a rigorous pest control system to prevent the entry of insects and rodents into the factory environment All doors are strictly required to remain closed at all times, and we consistently monitor and inspect these controls Enclosed you can find the results of the investigation that was done and an andswer to your questions. Our quality control results show nothing out of the ordinary. Should you or your customer require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Subject: GIB QAP Report Week 06 - Extra Crispy Crinkle Cut Oven Chips 1st Production
TextBody: Dear Sharon Thank you for informing us about the quality checks that were performed on the Extra Crispy Crinkle Cut Oven Chips (800g). We are sorry to hear that not all checks had a satisfactory result. We manage the quality of each production run very carefully. I looked up the production run results of the lotcode of the bag you have checked and all defects were within spec: Medium defects: max 4/kg allowed - average run 3,18/kg Major defects: max 1/kg allowed: average run 0,03/kg Should the quality of the production run not meet quality requirements, product will be blocked. With the information mentioned above, I believe it was a good run and the QC results related to the tested bag are not representative for the full run. Please find in attachment the filled-in QAP report. Should you have any further questions, do not hesitate to contact me again.

TextBody: Dear Hagino, Glad to hear that you are back in Japan safe and well. I'm sorry to hear that you have received another claim about a temperature logger that was found in a container of Toyota, whereas, indeed, this is not requested and expected by the customer. Please be assured that the setting in our system are correct (no temperature logger is requested for Toyota). However, this is, unfortunately again, due to a human error. I have sent another reminder to the team that is responsible for the loading of the goods. (This time it was Wielsbeke, last time it was Tilburg). Our sincere apologies for this inconvenience.

Subject: Private Label Partnership for Fries
TextBody: Dear Sales Team, I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to follow up on my previous email regarding a potential private label partnership for fries between Foody Food and your company. As a reminder, we are a prominent distribution company in Saudi Arabia with a substantial market share in frozen food products, particularly fries and appetisers, catering to both retail and HORECA sectors. We are eager to explore the possibilities of this collaboration and believe it holds significant benefits for both our companies. Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could provide a quoted price for the private label fries at your earliest convenience. This information is crucial for us to evaluate and proceed with our discussions. Thank you for your attention, and I look forward to your response.

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

New study confirms Peptan’s skin benefits A recent clinical study revealed that Peptan collagen peptide supplementation significantly increased skin density, elasticity, and hydration, while reducing wrinkles.* In the study, 85 Chinese women aged 40 to 65 took 5g of Peptan daily, half of the recommended daily dose, for twelve weeks. They also followed a standardized facial routine, using face cream to reflect real-life beauty practices. Key findings: [Total dermis density] Skin density measured by ultrasound scanning and quantified on a gray-scale (0-255). [clinicla scoring skin elasticity] Skin elasticity clinically scored. [Skin hydration] Skin hydration clinically scored by a dermatology expert. [Wrinckle depth] Depth of crow’s feet wrinkles. Beauty benefits for everyone This study adds to the growing body of evidence supporting Peptan’s skin benefits across different populations. As collagen peptides continue to gain mainstream recognition from healthcare professionals, dermatologists, nutritionists, and influencers, Peptan stands out as a versatile ingredient across diverse ethnicities and skin types. Subject: Invitation Letter to participate in VietFood & Beverage from 6 - 9 November 2024
TextBody: Dear Sirs, We are very glad to invite participating professional exhibition VietFood & Beverage / ProPack 2024 v Event in Hanoi: THE 10TH INTERNATIONAL EXHIBITION ON FOOD & BEVERAGE Time: 6th - 9th November 2024 At: ICE - 91 Tran Hung Dao Str., Dist Hoan Kiem, Hanoi City, Vietnam v Exhibitors can have your flexible choice to participate the event by register one of the followings: . Standard Booth Package: 2,900 USD/ 9 sq.m If you need market information, please contact the email address: vietfood@exevent.com.vn For registration, kindly fulfill the attached registration form and send it back to us by email. v Exhibit Profiles: . Hot beverages: Coffee, Tea, Cocoa . Organic products . WellFood: Non-prescription medicines / OTC. Dietary supplements. Health-food and dietetic products. Functional foods. . Delicatessen products, gourmet food and staple food . Drinks: Non-alcoholic beverages. Beer and mixed beer drinks. Wine and sparkling wine. . Meat, sausage, game and poultry . Fresh convenience food, fresh delicatessen, fish, fruit & vegetables . Dairy products (milk, cheese, etc.) . Bread, baked goods and spreads . Technic and equipment for the food services and catering market . Frozen food and ice cream products . Associations, organisations, trade press, services, IT. Thank you very much for your kind attention.

Goedemorgen Rilana, Ik had laten weten aan uw collega Matisse dat er een tekort was op order 4508138850, maar ik had geen out of office van hem ontvangen, dus ik wist niet dat hij deze week afwezig is. Er is nieuwe productie van de Jumbo Aardappelkroketten voorzien eind deze week tot begin volgende week. Ik zie op onze productieplanning dat de productie zaterdag 14/09 start en doorloopt tot en met maandag 16/09. Er zal dus pas ten vroegste vanaf 17/09 terug voorraad zijn (maar misschien beter om een dag marge te nemen voor als de productie wat vertraging zou oplopen). Van de Jumbo Letters hebben wij geen stock meer en er is ook geen folie meer beschikbaar. Dit artikel wordt gedelist. Subject: It’s a Wrap – Thank You for Making It a Success!
TextBody: Genting Sustainbiz F&B Expo 2024 View this email in your browser<https://mailchi.mp/10839147be07/join-the-future-of-sustainable-fb-at-genting-sustainbiz-fb-expo-6414288?e=55bc31c2f3> [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/1a21d89e-4569-724d-befa-16837995e337.png] We extend our heartfelt thanks to you for being a part of the Genting Sustainbiz F&B Expo 2024. Your participation has made this event an incredible platform. We hope the connections you made and the knowledge you gained will drive positive change in your business and beyond. We are gearing up for the next edition in 2025, with even more top-notch exhibitors and exciting activities. Until next time, thank you for being part of this journey towards a sustainable future! Highlights of Genting Sustainbiz F&B Expo 2024 Opening Ceremony The opening ceremony was graced by the Deputy Minister of Tourism, Arts & Culture Malaysia, YB Khairul Firdaus Akbar Khan, RWG President and Chief Operating Officer, Lee Thiam Kit , Executive Vice President of Sales, Marketing & Public Relations, Spencer Lee, Executive Vice President of Leisure, Hospitality and Lifestyle, Peter Foster. [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/43efab0c-5919-1194-ea49-1ea564c17b02.jpg] [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/958eed54-9c5f-bb1b-82bc-12101eda3762.jpg] Five MoUs Worth RM12 Million Resorts World Genting signed five MoUs: one with Nestlé Malaysia to supply plant-based products for MICE events and F&B outlets; another with Fraser & Neave to use recyclable Tetra Pak-ed mineral water, reducing plastic usage and third with PNH Malaysia to upcycle food waste into items like toothbrushes and cutleries for the resort. The second day the expo began with the signing of an MoU with Farm Fresh, focusing on a joint marketing campaign to promote nutrition and healthy living at Resorts World Genting. Additionally, an agreement with Aqina Trading was established to support B40 farmers by purchasing organically farmed pineapples from Aqina’s Projek Pekoti Timur. These MoUs were witnessed by YB Datuk Chan Foong Hin, Deputy Minister of Plantation and Commodities. [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/0bd5ce18-b782-6d06-0ff0-a6dd5f94a890.jpg] [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/104bb786-c6fb-77e9-b5b0-df70bde3759d.jpg] Resorts World Genting's Superchef Squad Honoured At the event, seven chefs from Resorts World Genting’s Superchef Squad were awarded badges for their significant contributions to the F&B industry. The honours were presented by RWG President & COO, Lee Thiam Kit, with Jennifer Ong, CEO of HAPA Group, and Peter Dewey Foster, RWG Executive Vice President for Leisure, Hospitality & Lifestyle, as witnesses. Additionally, Nestle Malaysia and Resorts World Genting’s Superchef Squad conducted various plant-based and sustainable cooking demonstrations and delectable food tasting sessions. [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/d7ff0ced-f16b-5b7b-310c-0babab08b0f8.jpeg] [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/0f54954a-a32e-a31a-79cf-5f702c66dd13.jpg] [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/6f74b5ca-aade-9583-4982-b0f3e6bb8923.jpg] Panel Discussions on Sustainable Food Trends and Challenges Visitors gained valuable insights from inspiring presentations and participated in panel discussions on sustainable food trends and challenges, moderated by Freda Liu. [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/397c687b-af7d-05e0-69dc-32375097eea8.jpeg] [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/e2f901c4-77d2-78da-fc1e-f4a8ecabb26f.jpeg] Innovative Showcase by Exhibitors The expo showcased innovative concepts in sustainable food production, packaging, food waste management, regenerative agriculture, and eco-friendly equipment. Featured brands included Nestle, Cremer Sustainable Foods, Kimberly-Clark, Gelatomio, World New Energy, Temasek Polytechnic Singapore, Sunway University, Taylor’s University, and Farm Fresh. [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/3381ed5d-d6db-0fa2-9eea-d5f764d0287b.jpeg] [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/3f1b38b7-a3f6-8a65-6879-0ba274a7541a.jpeg] [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/6eceb98a-600e-3fda-b7af-900e56d74d4e.jpg] Thank you for being part of the solution, not pollution. Stay tuned for updates. Visit Website<https://fooddrinksmalaysia.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b419646b3821f071b47d7817c&id=22c46c6bcc&e=55bc31c2f3> [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/aacee1c7-aa96-fad5-bb90-03b35bbebce0.png] Copyright (C) 2024 All rights reserved. You are receiving this email because you opted in via our website. Our mailing address is: Comexposium Sdn Bhd D-16-08, Menara Suezcap 1, KL Gateway, No.2, Jalan Kerinchi, Gerbang Kerinchi Lestari Kuala Lumpur, 14 59200 Malaysia Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences<https://fooddrinksmalaysia.us11.list-manage.com/profile?u=b419646b3821f071b47d7817c&id=4ed6710f13&e=55bc31c2f3&c=32948cf70b> or unsubscribe<https://fooddrinksmalaysia.us11.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=b419646b3821f071b47d7817c&id=4ed6710f13&t=b&e=55bc31c2f3&c=32948cf70b>

Subject: Groupe Dufour - Bevoorrecht beheer van uw afval / Groupe Dufour - Gestion privilégiée de vos déchets
TextBody: Beste, Ik heb helaas nog geen reactie ontvangen op mijn vorige e-mail en daarom neem ik graag nogmaals contact met u op. Ik ben ervan overtuigd dat we door een kort telefonisch gesprek of een afspraak op locatie uw afvalbeheer kunnen optimaliseren. Zou u een geschikt moment kunnen aangeven om in de komende dagen kort telefonisch te overleggen of een afspraak in te plannen? Het hoeft niet langer dan 15 minuten te duren. Alvast bedankt voor uw tijd en ik hoor graag van u. Cordialement, Mvg, [Alternate Text]<https://www.groupe-dufour.com/> [Alternate Text] BUYCK NICOLAS [Alternate Text] Business Development Manager [Alternate Text] 0032 492 13 66 90<tel:0032%20492%2013%2066%2090> [Alternate Text] nbuyck@groupe-dufour.com<mailto:nbuyck@groupe-dufour.com> [Alternate Text] www.groupe-dufour.com<https://www.groupe-dufour.com/> [Alternate Text] MARQUAIN [Alternate Text] Rue Terre à Briques, 18, 7522 MARQUAIN [Alternate Text]<https://www.facebook.com/DufourGroupe> [Alternate Text]<https://fr.linkedin.com/company/groupe-dufour> [Alternate Text] [cid:image006.jpg@01DB050E.E2C84BA0] De : Nicolas Buyck <nbuyck@groupe-dufour.com> Envoyé : vendredi 28 juin 2024 15:00 À : sales@agristo.com Objet : Groupe Dufour - Bevoorrecht beheer van uw afval / Groupe Dufour - Gestion privilégiée de vos déchets Geachte heer of mevrouw, Is het afvalbudget van uw bedrijf een grote post? Waarom komen we dan niet samen? Wij bieden u onze diensten aan om deze kosten te verminderen en de service met betrekking tot dit artikel te optimaliseren. Ik ben Nicolas Buyck, Business Development Manager van de Groep Dufour. Wij bieden u de kans om samen te werken met een familiebedrijf met verschillende vestigingen in België, dat al meer dan 60 jaar gespecialiseerd is in afvalbeheer, ISO-gecertificeerd is en een brede waaier van diensten aanbiedt. Hier is wat informatie over ons bedrijf: Het bedrijf Dufour is een familiebedrijf met meer dan 1000 werknemers, dat al meer dan 100 jaar actief is in verschillende sectoren, met name milieu, heffen, beton, transport, energie en civiele techniek. [cid:image007.png@01DB050E.E2C84BA0] <https://www.dufour.be/fr/> Naast onze vestiging in Marquain beschikken we over een aantal logistieke platforms, zodat we uw bedrijf concurrerende prijzen kunnen bieden: * Seneffe * Moignelée * Vaulx * Pecq * Avelgem Container Terminal (AVCT) Wij zijn een bedrijf met een menselijke dimensie<https://www.dufour.be/fr/avant-propos/les-valeurs/humain.html>. Daarom leggen wij altijd de nadruk op de kwaliteit van de dienstverlening en staan wij altijd klaar om uw verzoeken zo goed mogelijk te beantwoorden. De Groupe Dufour stelt al haar ervaring tot uw dienst om de ophaling, het transport, de sortering en de nuttige toepassing van al uw afval te vergemakkelijken en te optimaliseren<https://www.dufour.be/fr/nos-metiers/environnement.html>, waaronder: * Huishoudelijk afval afkomstig van ophalingen voor rekening van lokale overheden (gemeenten, intercommunales) of van huis-aan-huis selectieve ophaling of containerparken * Industrieel afval afkomstig van bouw- of sloopplaatsen * Afval van uw bedrijfsactiviteit als bedrijf, zelfstandige of handelaar [cid:image008.png@01DB050E.E2C84BA0] Omdat wij voortdurend streven naar verbetering van onze processen, zijn wij ook constant op zoek naar nieuwe apparatuur om meer en meer specifieke stromen te kunnen valoriseren. Ons gloednieuwe sorteercentrum in Froyennes wordt uitgerust met de modernste faciliteiten. Met deze installaties kunnen wij nog verder gaan in de terugwinning van uw afval en een gegarandeerde circulariteit bieden voor uw verschillende afvalstromen, waaronder deze stromen : - Plasticfolie - Hard plastics - Hout - Bioafval - Bouwafval [cid:image009.jpg@01DB050E.E2C84BA0] [cid:image010.jpg@01DB050E.E2C84BA0] ISO 9001, 14001 en 45001 gecertificeerd<https://www.dufour.be/fr/avant-propos/certifications.html>, belooft de groep Dufour u kwaliteit van de dienstverlening, maar ook veiligheid en respect voor het milieu tijdens de werkzaamheden. Voor uw afvalbeheer bieden wij u ook een gloednieuw extranet, waarmee u uw afvalstromen en aanverwante diensten gemakkelijk en nauwkeurig kunt beheren. Wat wij u bieden: Of het nu gaat om snelheid van uitvoering, kwaliteit van dienstverlening of samenwerkingsgemak, wij zijn ervan overtuigd dat wij u een verbetering van uw afvalstromen kunnen bieden. Om al deze redenen en nog veel meer, zou ik graag een professionele ontmoeting met uw bedrijf regelen om deze mogelijke samenwerking te bespreken. Ik wens u een goede dag en hoop dat u deze e-mail met plezier hebt gelezen. Madame, Monsieur, Le budget déchet représente un gros poste dans votre entreprise ? Alors, pourquoi ne pas se rencontrer ? Nous vous offrons nos services pour diminuer ces coûts et pour optimiser le service lié à ce poste. Permettez-moi de me présenter, je suis Nicolas Buyck, Business Development Manager pour le Groupe Dufour. Nous vous proposons de travailler avec une entreprise familiale, possédant plusieurs sites en Belgique, experte dans le déchet depuis de plus de 60 ans, certifiée ISO et proposant une palette de services multiples. Voici quelques informations concernant notre société : L'entreprise Dufour est une entreprise familiale de plus de 1000 collaborateurs, active dans différents secteurs depuis plus de 100 ans, notamment l'environnement, le levage, le béton, le transport, les énergies et le génie civil. [cid:image007.png@01DB050E.E2C84BA0]<https://www.dufour.be/fr/> Outre notre site de Marquain, nous avons à disposition différentes plateformes logistiques afin de pouvoir proposer des offres compétitives à votre entreprise : * Seneffe * Moignelée * Vaulx * Pecq * Terminal à container d'Avelgem Nous sommes une entreprise qui se veut à dimension humaine<https://www.dufour.be/fr/avant-propos/les-valeurs/humain.html>. C'est pourquoi nous mettons toujours l'accent sur la qualité du service et sommes toujours prêts à répondre au mieux à vos demandes. Le Groupe Dufour met toute son expérience à votre service pour faciliter et optimiser la collecte, le transport, le tri et la revalorisation<https://www.dufour.be/fr/nos-metiers/environnement.html> de tous vos déchets, notamment : * Déchets ménagers issus de collectes pour compte de collectivités (communes, intercommunales) ou de collecte sélective en porte-à-porte ou en parcs à containers * Déchets industriels générés lors de chantiers de construction ou de démolition * Déchets usuels de votre activité en tant qu'entreprise, indépendant ou commerçant [cid:image008.png@01DB050E.E2C84BA0] Constamment en quête d'amélioration de nos processus, nous sommes constamment à la recherche de nouveaux équipements pour pouvoir valoriser nous-même (sans sous-traitance) des flux de plus en plus nombreux. Notre tout nouveau centre de tri, situé à Froyennes, sera équipé d'installations à la pointe de la technologie. Ces installations nous permettront d'aller encore plus loin dans la valorisation de vos déchets et de proposer une circularité garantie pour vos différents flux de déchets, notamment pour les flux listés ci-après : * Déchet industriel banal * Plastique film * Plastique dur * Bois * Biodéchets * Déchets de construction [cid:image009.jpg@01DB050E.E2C84BA0] [cid:image010.jpg@01DB050E.E2C84BA0] Certifié ISO 9001, 14001 et 45001<https://www.dufour.be/fr/avant-propos/certifications.html>, le groupe Dufour vous promet la qualité du service, mais également la sécurité et le respect environnemental lors des opérations. Pour la gestion de vos déchets, nous vous proposons également un extranet flambant neuf, vous permettant de gérer avec facilité et précisions vos flux de déchets et les prestations affiliées. Ce que nous vous proposons : Que ce soit au niveau de la rapidité d'exécution, de la qualité du service ou de la facilité de collaboration, nous sommes convaincus de pouvoir vous offrir une amélioration de vos flux de déchets. Pour toutes ces raisons et bien d'autres encore, je souhaiterai convenir d'une entrevue professionnelle avec votre entreprise afin de pouvoir discuter de cette éventuelle collaboration. Je vous souhaite une excellente journée et espère que vous avez accusé bonne lecture de ce mail. Cordialement, Mvg, [Alternate Text]<https://www.groupe-dufour.com/> [Alternate Text] BUYCK NICOLAS [Alternate Text] Business Development Manager [Alternate Text] 0032 492 13 66 90<tel:0032%20492%2013%2066%2090> [Alternate Text] nbuyck@groupe-dufour.com<mailto:nbuyck@groupe-dufour.com> [Alternate Text] www.groupe-dufour.com<https://www.groupe-dufour.com/> [Alternate Text] MARQUAIN [Alternate Text] Rue Terre à Briques, 18, 7522 MARQUAIN [Alternate Text]<https://www.facebook.com/DufourGroupe> [Alternate Text]<https://fr.linkedin.com/company/groupe-dufour> [Alternate Text]
Just seen your text message Beau, That’s fine for Monday.

Subject: Boost Your Impact, Unlock Opportunities at SIAL 2024 with Dékuple
TextBody: Dear Agristo Team, This is Cateleya, Project Manager at Dékuple, a listed data marketing agency with a strong presence in Europe, including Paris. We are contacting you because your company took part in Alimentaria 2023. We believe our services can stimulate your participation and elevate your ROI in SIAL 2024 in Paris. At Dékuple, we help businesses with: - Exclusive Networking Events: Connect with key partners and clients through private lunches or dinners. - Complete Event Coordination: From selecting venues to organizing guest lists, we manage the entire process. - Private Product Launches: Host intimate receptions for new products or key meetings in premium venues. We believe we can help your company boost ROI at SIAL 2024. Would it be possible to schedule a short 30-minute call to discuss how we can support your goals?

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With
Dear customer Please find the documents for your order 24000146 attached. Kindly let us know if everything is approved.

Subject: Information - SAP program
TextBody: Good afternoon to all, I would like to inform you that Ledo Montenegro is introducing a SAP program in its operations, accordingly it is my duty to inform all suppliers that when delivering goods they must provide us with packing lists, invoices and specifications (by e-mail). Most of them have been doing it until now. Please take this seriously so that the system can function in accordance with the regulations that this program requires. The packing list must contain two pieces of information: * Batch (batch or lot) - this is usually related to the date of manufacture but is marked differently by each supplier. * Unique number of the pallet (SSCC code of 18 digits), each pallet has its own number and can not be the same number, no matter how many manufacturers there are. I would like to ask you to respect these requirements and to provide us with the requested information with the next invoice.

Subject: PriceSmart: Vendor Registration Form
TextBody: [http://cdn.mcauto-images-production.sendgrid.net/4e9a2bcca4837315/2ef90ca2-718c-4649-b0ec-ad05fd50ff4a/1920x700.png] Welcome to PriceSmart Dear Vendor Agristo NV, Welcome to the PriceSmart Vendor Registration Process. We are asking that you complete a webform with your information and documentation. Your internal contact has the following instructions for you: Add Agristo service@agristo.com and remove Sophie & Lauren from contacts. Subject: forecast IGLO BelViVa 12_09_2024
TextBody: Hallo Marleen, de winterkroketten zullen pas W40 geproduceerd worden. Mvg, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63 M +32 472 41 34 87 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Van Durmen, Marleen [marleen.van-durmen@iglo.com] Sent: 12/09/2024 09:51 To: demand.planning@agristo.com; lien.dewulf@agristo.com; service@agristo.com Cc: gilles.willaert@agristo.com Subject: forecast IGLO BelViVa 12_09_2024 Hallo, De file in bijlage betreft de zuivere forecast voor alle klanten/week tem eind Q1/2025 Wil zeggen dat de producten in principe 3 weken ervoor moeten klaar staan voor verlading, dus de stock moet echt wel op tijd gemaakt worden. TAB 1 forecast/week, alle klanten behalve Colruyt forecast Colruyt totaal volume waar jullie mee kunnen werken TAB 2 stock op datum van vandaag = donderdagmorgen 12/09 (alle wagens bij jullie geladen tem gisteren 11/09 voor GXO zitten in deze stock verwerkt) Zowel forecast als stock is in kg Ik heb de oude kodes Belgische kroketten 800g Ovenkroketten 16x600g Mini kroketten 16x600g Niet meer vermeld, de stock is zo goed als op Winterkroketten ik heb begrepen dat deze volgende week gemaakt worden in één run. In de vorige versie stond 113 ton in de forecast, nu staat er minder 93 ton, indien mogelijk graag 103 ton maken, zou graag wat buffer hebben. Als het niet meer mogelijk is het oorspronkelijk volume te veranderen dan OK om de 113 ton te maken. 96020661 Ronde kroketten 600g (Jingle balls) Heb begrepen dat productie in W43 zal zijn. Graag begin W43, zodat we dezelfde week nog kunnen laden. Voor einde jaar verkopen wij dit als Jingle balls, vanaf volgend jaar zullen wij dat echt ronde kroketten noemen en zal er ook een ander artwork zijn. Wij zullen geen andere kode hebben, maar veronderstel dat jullie intern een nieuwe kode zullen hebben. 96018640 BelvivaJungleCroquette600g Geen producties meer, alle stock zal worden afgenomen. 96017386 BelvivaPotCroquettes 800g Dank om het volledige volume van 76 ton in W39 te maken, daarna geen producties meer, product gaat eruit na eindejaar. Momenteel zijn we OUT. Dank alvast. Mvg, Marleen Marleen Van Durmen Demand & Supply Planner thread::EVHaD_b1H1igBgWt_tBo23Q::

Subject: MDL Mail-Bestell. 91524995 Lief. 89716
TextBody: Good afternoon, Orders 91524994 an 91524995 are both planned to load next monday 16th september. Our production planners have informed me that new production on steakhouse fries will be ready to load as from 19/9 (was planned to be this weekend) I have 16 pallets left to load, you are asking 19 pallets in each order. I will have to postpone 1 order to loading 19/9 (delivery 20/9 at Hamm), can you let me know which one you prefer? 91524994 has 19 pallets of steakhouse and 11 pallets of croquettes 91524995 has 19 pallets of steakhouse and 11 pallets of super crispy fries I would suggest to keep 1 order on loading date wednesday with 16 pallets of steakhouse fries, 11 pallets of the ordered article in that reference and fill up with 3 pallets of the postponed order. Then I would load 22 pallets of steakhouse with the remaining pallets of the other reference in the other order. Thank you for your instructions. we apologize for the inconvenience.

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: UGANDA INT'L TRADE FAIR OCT 2024
TextBody: To the kind attention: MS. ELYNN MARISSE / MS. SONJA DELEERSNIJDER AGRISTO MIDDLE EAST & NORTH AFRICA DMCC ** AGRISTO NV AGRISTON AG ** DUBAI / BELGIUM / SWITZERLAND Invitation to participate at the 30th UGANDA TRADE FAIR 4 - 8 OCTOBER 2024, KAMPALA - UGANDA Once again, It is indeed our great pleasure to invite you to participate at the forthcoming 30th Uganda Trade Fair' 2024, Biggest & Largest annual International Trade Fair on all kinds of general, FMCG, consumer and industrial products be held from 4 - 8 October 2024 at the Lugogo Show Grounds Hall 1, 2, 3 & 4 located in the centre of Kampala, Uganda. Uganda is the 2nd Biggest Export Market for International Companies in East Africa. WE HAVE DESIGNED SPECIAL PACKAGE FOR INT'LCOMPANIES EXHIBITOR PACKAGE WITH 9 sq.m SHELL STAND Ø 9 sq.m shell stand ( 3m x 3m) with basic furniture such as (2 chairs, 1 Table, 2 Spotlights, 1 Twin Power Socket) Ø Company Name panel with logo on Fascia panel along with Country Flag. Ø Brief Company listing in the official show catalogue Ø 7 Days / 6 Nights 4**** Hotel Accommodation including daily breakfast & all room tax & VAT Ø Business Visa for Uganda. Ø Personnel assistant on arrival at Entebbe Intl Airport. Ø Airport picks up & drop Ø 1 Local Stand assistant Girl for 5 Days during the expo Ø Useful data of major 300 importers of Uganda enable you to send invitation through email / whatsapp to pre-plan your meeting. COST OF ABOVE FULL PACKAGE IS Option 1 - One person with Single room US$ 4,880 Option 2 - Two persons with One Double room US$ 5,650 Option 3 - Two persons with Two Single rooms US$ 6,350 LATEST UPDATE Over 500 Companies are participating from 18 Countries such as AUSTRIA, EGYPT, GHANA, INDIA, INDONESIA, IRAN, KENYA, LEBANON, MALAYSIA, MAURITIUS, MOZAMBIQUE, PAKISTAN, RWANDA, POLAND, SINGAPORE, SOUTH AFRICA, TANZANIA, THAILAND, TURKEY, UAE & UGANDA. we have (5) stands available in the INTERNATIONAL HALL # 1 as Hall No 2, 3 & 4 are fully booked.Kindly note that Stands are limited and booking will be only on first come first serve basis. Kindly fill the Participation Booking Application Form with your require options and email it back to us before 25th of SEPTEMBER. Click here to download the booking form<https://www.exportdir.com/ubfiuae.pdf> In the above link you will find the following useful info such as; * Package Booking Application * Useful Information & Products Profile * Floor Plan with available stand locations for your selection * Last year Participant's list * Photo Gallery enable you to understand how the stands will be look alike. LAST YEAR SUMMARY & STATISTICS Last year show was officially inaugurated by the President of Uganda H.E. Yoweri Kaguta Museveni along with the Minister of Trade & Industry with a massive group of various Ambassadors, Diplomats and Head of Major Government departments. 722 Companies participated from 24 Countries such as Austria, Bahrain, China, Egypt, Ghana, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Iran, Italy, Japan, Jordan, Kenya, Malaysia, Pakistan, Rwanda, Saudi Arabia, Senegal, South Africa, Taiwan, Tanzania, Thailand, Turkey, UAE & Uganda. Total Companies Participated :- 722 Total Countries exhibited :- 24 Total Number of Visitor's :- 22, 576 National Pavilions :- 8 UGANGA EXHIBITORS :- 504 FOREIGN EXHIBITORS :- 218 MAJOR NATIONAL PARTICPATION :- 502 Companies Participated from Uganda 46 Companies Participated from KENYA 35 Companies Participated from EGYPT 24 Companies Participated from ITALY 20 Companies Participated from TAIWAN 19 Companies Participated from INDIA 19 Companies Participated from UAE 10 Companies Participated from PAKISTAN 75% Visitors are from Uganda and between 12-14 % trade buyers will come from Neighbouring countries such as Rwanda, Congo, Djibouti, Somaliland, Sudan, Kenya, Tanzania, Uganda, Morocco, Tunisia, and around 10% visitors will be coming from Saudi Arabia, Oman, India, Kuwait, Italy, Indonesia, Egypt & Turkey. With over 50 Million population, Uganda is become one of the most attractive and potential export markets in East Africa for the Foreign Companies. The Ugandan economy has been escalating regularly. According to our previous experience and market survey, we foresee a tremendous response at the exhibition for all sectors since Uganda imports almost everything. We wish you the very best in your business and look forward to welcome you at Uganda . For any further information, please feel free to contact on my mobile +97155 - 5506187. Thanks &
