Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With

Subject: Agristo anexa UIT

Subject: INQUIRY WITH BAR CODES - HAS BROWNS
TextBody: Dear Elynn, Hope this email gets to you once you return. In the past orders we have been receiving different bar codes for these items: 313931 - MAESTRO ROSTI HASH BROWNS - 10X1KG 314231 - Maestro HASH BROWNS TRIANGLE 52g 4X2.5kg This doesn't work for us because we cannot manage with different bar codes in the warehouse and distribute them to our clients. We need to have a unique bar code for each reference, so far, we have received more than 2 different bar codes this year for the hash browns. I'll be waiting for your comments Saludos/

Subject: Toyota - orders wedges
TextBody: Dear Pieter My apology for my replying not on time. 1 Natural cut ( overview orders wedges xlsx) Can you pls confirm if my understanding correct ? There are 11 containers of Natural cut which are supposed to load under PO11 and PO012. I have asked you to postpone the loading of 11 containers. Finally 2 containers ( 1 Kone, 1 Hakata ) which are in yellow in the attached table has to be shipped. Other 9 containers can be postponed to 4 containers in DEC and 5 containers in JAN 2025 ? 2 Shoestring 300MT ( 【Agristo】 Shipping schedule xlsx) Please allow me to double check with you about shoestring 300MT. 300MT is a part of old contract and we will apply old price. We will produce and ship as follows. As PO13A Time of Production and shipment in Oct 2024. Arrival in Japan ( ETA ) in Dec 2024. KOBE 4 containers ( 80,640kg ) TOKTO 3 containers ( 60,480kg ) S. Total 7 containers ( 141,120kg ) As PO14A Time of Production and shipment in Nov 2024. Arrival in Japan ( ETA ) Jan 2025. KOBE PORT 4 containers ( 80,640kg ) TOKYO PORT 4 containers ( 80,640kg) S. Total 8 containers ( 161,280kg ) Thank you very much for confirming. Hagino From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: Monday, September 9, 2024 11:40 PM To: ax1@mopera.net Cc: melissa.samyn@agristo.com Subject: Toyota - orders wedges Dear Hagino, As agreed during your visit last Friday, I have postponed the loading of the 1 kg Grand Farm natural cut potatoes (wedges) orders to November and December. Enclosed you can find an overview of the new loading dates at Agristo. If there is anything you want to change, do not hesitate to get in touch.

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 12.09.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 12.09.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

TextBody: 96 Agristo Agristo | 13/09/2024 Dear, Thank you for informing us about the below issue. Your complaint has been registered in our system as ticket: 00049399. To ensure efficient communication, kindly use this email thread for further correspondence regarding this matter.

Subject: REQUEST FOR QUOTATION
TextBody: Good Day, I would like to extend an invitation to your company to supply us with the attached product(s).the product we may request may fall out of your scope of work hence we would like you to source the product and supply them to us. Attached to this email is a Request for a Quotation for the product we need. Kindly note this is an urgent once-off tender, therefore we require these components at your earliest convenience, We now await your quotation. Product Unique Code:ADTEKG-MNVBHRT865 Product:ADTEKG-MNVBHRT865 Pump Qty.33 units Deadline for the Submission:19/09/2024 Hope to get your Quotations as soon as possible for Approval. NOTE: send your quotation to : quote@unileverbelgium-nv.com<mailto:quote@unileverbelgium-nv.com> Please we are looking forward to receive your best offer Regards Mr.David Immanuel Sihombing Senior Procurement Manager at Unilever Unilever Belgium N.V. Address: Boulevard de l'Industrie 9, 1070 Anderlecht, Belgium BE 0438.390.312 - Brussel (1070) Tel:+32 3 3320151 Fax: +32 23336333.

Subject: 【Wellness Tokyo 2024】Still Time to Exhibit!
TextBody: ※This email is being sent to those who have exchanged business cards with TSO International in the past at our organized exhibitions and other trade shows, as well as those who have visited us in the past. If this email is not displayed correctly, please click here<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/webmail/511761/2460594857/4859104d102961e553002374ab456e8946742598dfab7f664d635b29ae9482d1> [https://bit.ly/4g3yfSu]<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/en-/7psc69/2460594857/h/QMgP7zgXVAznGyHbLvxD2UqjeHEpm-sy42SdpgeWWKI>​​​ AGRISTO Dear Sophie Selk san, ________________________________ [https://info.tso-int.co.jp/l/511761/2024-06-17/7plqwf/511761/1718679040YGh9sCSF/WellnessTokyo2024_en_4C.png]<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/en-exhibitor-/7psc6h/2460594857/h/QMgP7zgXVAznGyHbLvxD2UqjeHEpm-sy42SdpgeWWKI> 【Date】 NOV. 27th [Wed.] - 29th [Fri.], 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM 【Venue】 TOKYO BIG SIGHT - EAST HALL ________________________________ Wellness Tokyo is now accepting exhibitor applications! [1] Leading health exhibition Wellness Tokyo is Japan's premier health industry exhibition, featuring 400 companies showcasing food, products, and technologies to meet global health demand. [2] Attracting 30,000 key industry figures Wellness Tokyo offers direct sales opportunities through face-to-face interactions with 30,000 health industry visitors. [3] Japan's largest health information exchange platform Wellness Tokyo is the perfect opportunity to network through over 50 events and seminars presented by experts in the growing market of proteins and health-related oils. With only two months remaining until the show, rest assured that even if you apply now, the Show Management Office will provide full support to ensure a smooth exhibition experience! If you have any questions, please contact us at anytime. Subject: PROPOSAL REQUEST TO SERVE YOUR COMPANY PLANTAIN CHIPS FROM GHANA(WEST AFRICA)
TextBody: Dear Sir/Madam, Greetings From Ghana(West Africa).Its an Honor and an opportunity to write this letter. I wish to introduce myself as a Ghanaian and a Diploma Holder in Business Information System Awarded by the Association of Business Executives (United Kingdom). I would like to seek for your permission and approval to introduce you to plantain chips production from Ghana.(West Africa). Plantain chips are a delicious, crispy savoury snack made 3 ways ingredients. Ingredients 2 whole Plantain (unripe but slightly yellow) 1 tsp Salt (season to taste) 1/2 tsp Cayenne Pepper (optional) Vegetable Oil (enough for frying) We also have sweet Plantain Chips in Ghana. Please can you Kindly sign me an order to deliver Fried Plantain chips from Ghana. I can also organize professional fryers that can work in your company or organisation to Fry Plantain Chips for your works, members of your club and also for interested customers from your community. If there is any products you're interested in and its not mentioned above. Kindly let me know if we can be of help. I hope this short mail meets your most favourable considerations. Thank You.

Subject: VRAAG BETREFFENDE ALLERGENEN PROCEDURE
TextBody: Dag Geert, onze reinigingsschema's delen we niet. Als ik die vraag krijg, antwoord ik het volgende, en tot nog toe volstaat dit (zelfs voor mijn meest grondige klant): In production: after a production of a product containing sulphite, there is a cleaning. That cleaning is thoroughly validated. In this case, positive release is not applied. In packing: after a packing of a sulphite containing product, there is a positive release of the next packing run of a product not containing sulphite Mvg, Regine Regine Legein Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 57 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: GEDIMEX / Geert Demeester [gdm@gedimex.com] Sent: 12/09/2024 17:41 To: regine.legein@agristo.com Cc: service@agristo.com Subject: VRAAG BETREFFENDE ALLERGENEN PROCEDURE Hallo Regine, Naar aanleiding van de opgave dat clean label (E471) op dezelfde lijn kan geproduceerd worden als product mét sulfiet, wordt gevraagd welke de maatregelen zijn die genomen worden om te vermijden dat er kruisbesmetting gebeurt. Hebben jullie hier interne documentatie over die naar buiten kan gedeeld worden ? Reinigingsschema denk ik dan…. Mvrgr Geert Geert DEMEESTER Managing director GEDIMEX BV Bergelen 77 B-8560 GULLEGEM Belgium Tel : 32 56 422994 Fax : 32 56 420255 www.gedimex.com ATTENTION : in order to avoid cases of phishing or hacking via internet, we would like to ask you to carefully doublecheck account numbers when receiving or sending payments ! Our bank details have not and will not change unless clearly stated in explicite writing via separate and signed mail. CUIDADO : por fin de evitar casos de phishing (suplantacion de identidad) o hacking via internet, les rogamos sea pagando o recibiendo dineros de bien verificar la exactitud de los datos de las cuentas suyas tal como nuestras ! Nuestra cuenta bancaria no se ha cambiado ni se cambiara sin informarles explicitamente de antemano por carta firmada y sellada. P Kindly consider not to print this e-mail unless you really need to. Confidentiality: The foregoing communication and any attachment(s) are intended only for the addressee and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient, please be advised that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication or its attachment(s) is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication by error, please notify us immediately and destroy the material in its entirety, whether electronic or hard copy. thread::C6M7Bg7AEauPKYxY8ss0gXQ::

Subject: Koffmann's W/C 16th September
TextBody: Hi Sean, Thanks for your orders, well received and registered in our system. Please find my comments below: Order 367911: we are missing 2 pallets Koffmann XXL Fries -> loading tonigh at 8 p.m., production will be on Monday afternoon -> do we load short, do we foresee 2 pallets of anoter article, or do we postpone loading to Monday evening? Order PF-KOFF1650 + order PF-KOFF1642: 26 pallets of Koffmann XXL Fries -> this article will be produced on Monday afternoon -> postponed loading to Tuesday morning. (I am sorry, but it will thus not be possible to deliver PF-KOFF1650 on Monday 16/09.) PF-KOFF1651: we are missing 7 pallets of the Koffmann Roast Potatoes -> I'm checking with planning when it will be produced again. Can you please let me know how you want to proceed. Do we foresee 7 pallets of another article for now? What's the plan with this article moving forward? What volume do we need to foresee on a monthly basis? 6008800: we will miss 1 pallet of MPW Round Hash Browns - this article will be produced again on Friday - can we postpone loading to Friday afternoon? PF-KOFF1661 + PF-KOFF1658 + PF-KOFF1657: we will miss 26 pallets of Koffman Les Pommes Frites on these orders - this article will be produced again on Saturday 21/09 - can we postpone loading to Saturday evening, or Monday morning? Thank you for your feedback.

Subject: [Request for confirmation] Claim Report 412479　[597:Agristo(ヘ゛ルキ゛ー)]
TextBody: Dear person in charge, We received complaint from the customer that FRIES STRAIGHT contained larvae. Since the customer did not return the package, we do not have Expiration date or lot information. The customer said that there were several larvae inside the potato. I have attached an image. Sorry for the lack of information, but could you please answer the following questions? 1. What species of larvae are found in the raw potato? Is it possible that larvae like this are found in the raw potato? 1. In the past, have similar larvae been removed during raw material selection? If similar larvae have been removed, how often are they found? We will answer any missing information. We will try to answer your questions as much as possible. Best regard. Hiroki Hiraga Quality Assurance Department quality-improvement@kobebussan.co.jp ----------------------------- KOBE BUSSAN CO., LTD. 125-1 HIRANO, KAKOGAWA-CHO, KAKOGAWA-CITY HYOGO 675-0063 JAPAN

Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

Subject: Printing South China & Sino-Label 2025: Digital Empowerment for Traditional Industries Smart Printing & Labeling Leads the Future(Ref:202448093)
TextBody: Digital Printing Trends: Pre-Register for Opportunities If you cannot read this e-mail properly, please click here. Name: Company: AGRISTO NV E-news (September 2024) 繁體中文 Printing South China & Sino-Label 2025: Digital Empowerment for Traditional Industries Smart Printing & Labeling Leads the Future Mark your calendars for the premier printing and labeling event in Asia! The South China International Exhibition on Printing Industry (Printing South China) and the China International Exhibition on Label Printing Technology 2025 (Sino-Label) will be held concurrently from March 4-6, 2025, at the China Import and Export Fair Complex (Area A) in Guangzhou, China. Centered around the theme of "Digital, Intelligent, Sustainable", the exhibitions will showcase innovations spanning the entire printing and packaging value chain and end-user applications. Discover the future of label printing with dedicated zones like the "Digitalization and Application" and "RFID Zone", featuring the latest digital printing equipment, RFID technology, anti-counterfeiting solutions, and more. These cutting-edge technologies empower businesses to embrace digital transformation, optimize efficiency, and unlock new levels of productivity. Quick Pre-register in just 30 seconds Theme Zones & Scope of Exhibits More Exhibition Details Past Featured Exhibitors Upcoming Event in Indonesia Exciting News for the Printing Industry! Join us for our groundbreaking conference: "The Next Era of Paper Packaging: Embracing Digitalization and Sustainability." in Indonesia on October 29 to discover how digital advancements and sustainability are revolutionizing the packaging landscape. This is a valuable opportunity to network with industry experts in the region and contribute to shaping a more sustainable future. Stay tuned for more updates! Subject: Regulation Query: RPT79 and the use of E150a
TextBody: Hello Sally, I will forward this to our quality department, but according to the supplier E150a is approved by EU. According to your feedback, I assume you conclude that only the Additives which are listed in group 04.2.6 are allowed. But I am not sure if that interpretation is correct, I believe that below additives need special attention, as only allowed in dried potatoes. As E150a is not mentioned, I assume it is allowed, without remarks, in processed potato products. As soon as I have feedback from our quality department, I will keep you informed.

Subject: Regulation Query: RPT79 and the use of E150a
TextBody: Good afternoon Kathleen, Hope you are well and having a good week so far. I am writing to express my concern regarding our recent specification update to RPT79 small roast potato. I have further reviewed Regulation 1333/2008 on Food Additives (23.12.2020 assimilated attached to email) and 02.06.2024 which is used in the EU harmonised market. For the product group 04.2.6 processed potato products, which RPT79 fits into, the group 2 colour additive E150a Plain Caramel, is not approved for use for in 04.2.6. See below: We require the recipe to be rectified as soon as possible to ensure that RPT79 adheres to the current UK Food Regulations, EU Regulations, and Directives, as well as any additional food laws of the destination country. It is imperative that our products consistently meet these legal standards. If you need any further information, please do not hesitate to get in contact with me.

Subject: Cheesy Potato Swirls 450g (Christmas £1)
TextBody: Hello, I have reviewed the quality tab on the igloo system for 28285 Cheesy Potato Swirls 450g (Christmas £1) and some amends are required. I will reject the quality tab to you now, please can you review my comments below and make any necessary amends before resubmitting within 48 hours. Please could you send me an email to let me know when you have resubmitted it. Thank you. Product Appearance (Before Cooking as Applicable) * Please remove 450gr reference as N/S * Please add further accept photos if possible * Please add "Belt marks up to 2mm" in the accept column if applicable Product Appearance (After Cooking as Applicable) * Please show the Internal appearance with a cross section * Please add ‘or equivalent’ where you mention 70c for 2 mins Aroma * Please add reject any Incorrect/ Off aromas Flavour * Please add reject any Incorrect/ Off flavours Product Presentation in Secondary Pack * Please add a photo to show the outercase Product Presentation in Primary Pack * Please crop the durability area photo as it appears blurred * Please add "Anything that detracts from the acceptable standard" in the reject column Depot QA Checks * Please add a photo for carbon if possible * Please add a check for block welding if applicable * Please add a check for Debris and smearing on outside of outer packaging * Please add a check for Freezer burn / dehydration if applicable * Please add a check for colour Factory Process Standards * Please review typo lenght * Please add a check for deep frozen if applicable * Please consider adding a check for packaging

Subject: MC 2,5kg Duchess Potatoes
TextBody: Beste, Onze excuses voor dit incident. We hebben de klacht onderzocht: De zakken kunnen scheuren wanneer de dimensies van het product niet binnen spec zijn (te hoog, te breed). Dat was nu niet het geval. Bij de controles aan de lijn (bijgevoegd) was het product binnen spec. Uit ons onderzoek komt dat de kartonnen doos die we voor dit product gebruiken te krap is. Zeker wanneer er weinig tijd zit tussen produceren en inpakken (2 dagen in dit geval) en het product weinig gekrompen is in de vriezer. Bij het aandrukken van de doos kan het dan voorvallen dat de zak scheurt. We gaan in de toekomst met grotere dozen werken om herhaling van deze klacht te vermijden. Voor een compensatie verwijs ik u graag door naar onze commercial manager Raf Sels in CC. Vriendelijke groeten, Joris [Pomuni website]<https://www.pomuni.com/> Met Vriendelijke Groeten, Sincères Salutations,

TextBody: Hoi Marleen, het order werd aangepast. Groetjes, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63 M +32 472 41 34 87 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Technical Visit/Training with Agristo
TextBody: Hi Camila, as discussed, do you have any update on when you would be able to come w/c 30/09? (3days) Kind regars, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63 M +32 472 41 34 87 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Camila Amorim [camila.amorim@brf.com] Sent: 5/09/2024 12:13 To: marlies.deketele@agristo.com; service@agristo.com Cc: ohsung.keum@brf.com; muhammad.abrar@brf.com Subject: Technical Visit/Training with Agristo Dear Maries, I hope this message finds you well. As we discussed earlier, we have been discussing internally and would like to arrange a technical session with Agristo focused on our French Fries products. Our objective is to conduct a comprehensive technical analysis of our products, aligning our knowledge with Agristo’s expertise to ensure we are "speaking the same language" and fully aligned on technical specifications. Abrar (Sensory Specialist) and I (R&D), from BRF, plan to attend it and for this session, we have availability on the last week of September and/or the first week of October (because Abrar got just a month of visa). Could you please confirm if you and your technical team are available for this visit? As discussed, I added below a proposal agenda, but it is just to have an idea about our expectation, so we can arrange accordingly and together after session and date confirmation. Day 1: Theory and Process Overview Session Overview: Introduction and objectives of the technical session. Market Insights: Evolution of French fries in the global market, current trends, and consumer preferences. Variety of Raw Materials: Types of potatoes used for French fries and their impact on texture, flavor, and cooking quality. Processes: Cutting methods, sizes, blanching, pre-frying and battered processes. Cooking Methods: Deep frying, air frying, and oven baking techniques. Packaging: Materials and process. Shelf life: Factors affecting shelf life and storage and shelf-life study. Specifications: Creation and the rationale behind the attributes. Defects: the most common defects on French fries, the way to avoid it and strategy to work on it. Day 2: Factory Visit and Evaluation Factory Tour: Observation of equipment and technology used and the real life of the process and check the technical process to release production. Product Evaluation: Sensory and technical assessment of our French fries SKUs, comparing them to our specifications (deep dive on the methods of evaluation and parameters). Day 3: Continued Evaluation Detailed Analysis: Continued sensory and technical evaluation of our French Fries SKUs, checking all parameters as per our specifications. Innovation: Agristo can show us the new products available. Conclusion: Discuss about the session and feedback. Please, let us know your availability and if there are any adjustments or additional details required. Looking forward to your response.

Subject: [Request for confirmation] Claim Report 412479　[597:Agristo(ヘ゛ルキ゛ー)]
TextBody: Dear Hiroki san, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 49420. Given our production process, which includes stone washers, process water, blanchers, fryers, and more, it's impossible that these larvae could have traversed our entire production process without being detected and removed. We are confident that any contamination of this nature would have been identified at multiple points during production. I'm very sorry, but it's impossible that these larvae, especially in the number that is shown on the picture, were inside the potato. Moreover, if they would have been inside the potato, they would not look like this. They look "fresh", not fried or whatsoever. Please also note that we have never received this kind of claim from any customer before. I'm sorry, but it's simply impossible that this can come from Agristo. If you could find out the lotcode (are you fully confident this is Agristo product?), please do not hesitate to let me know.

Subject: BPA Packaging ask - Agristo
TextBody: Dear Agristo, As you may already be aware, the EU is currently planning to introduce new legislation banning all uses of Bisphenol A (BPA) in all food contact materials (FCM) and packaging later this year. We are also aware that the EU is considering similar action on PFAS (Per- and Poly-Flouro Alkyl Substances), but to less clear timescales. Tesco has provided some background information (attached) to aid understanding with this topic. To understand where our products and suppliers might be impacted, we have created a spreadsheet with questions that Tesco are asking. The spreadsheet is split into sections – one on PFAS, one on BPA and a final short question about other FCM – namely: Phthalates Epoxidised Soya Bean Oil (ESBO) Mineral Oil Hydrocarbons (MOAH) Please make sure you complete all sections relevant to you. Could you return the spreadsheet before COP September 25th please. While this data capture concentrates on Tesco products, we would expect that our other retail customers will request this information in the future. As such, where relevant, and if different, please add in detail that can be used for other retailers also.

Subject: NEW VIP REF - Labels
TextBody: Hi everyone, Please we need you to detail the following information: * In the new CERTIFICATE FOR REGISTRATION OF PRODUCT (WVL2024/7001/15268) you declare the same product information that the last certificate (WVL2021/4499/0069) Name of Product: French Fries Nature of Product: Prefried and deepfrozen potato products List of Ingredients: Potaoes , Palm Oil ** Ingredients from potato “coated” according Technical Sheet are : Potatoes (93,3%), Sunflower oil (3,5%), Potato starch, Salt, Dextrine, Rice flour Is that correct despite we´ll import another variety? (check photo below) * Adrees (Wielsbeke) It remains even though it is manufactured in another direction (Tilburg) (check photo below) * How long will take you to process a new Certificate with the correct information? * Bag Ingredients of the “coated” variety will be the same that grade “A” and “B” (check photo below) About EAN code, we need you to create it since the product is yours. We need you to answer those queries because we need to to process our Health Register for “coated” variety (Crispy ready salted straight cut fries) If you are not clear about our requirements, it would be good if we could have a meet with those involved. [cid:image004.png@01DB05EF.97B166B0] [cid:image007.jpg@01DB05FA.46DE0580] [cid:image008.png@01DB05FA.46DE0580] [cid:image001.png@01DB05E9.4A658E50] De: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Enviado el: viernes, 13 de setiembre de 2024 03:56 Para: omar.molina@inversionesliber.com CC: anton.jongbloet@agristo.com Asunto: NEW VIP REF - Labels Dear Omar Please find below the labels for the new reference, I based myself on the other existing items. However please see in yellow, since this item is produded in Tilburg. Probably this number will be different? Can you provide me this one? bag stamp: [cid:image002.png@01DB05E9.4A658E50] outer carton label: [cid:image003.png@01DB05E9.4A658E50] Regarding the EAN codes. As you can see these are currently blank. Will you provide me the EAN's or can I create them myself? KR [image] Michelle Bevernage Technical Sales Officer P +32 496 38 91 92 thread::MqDncxAWHYGJk1p_FwXujXQ::

Subject: Agristo 332 Purchase Order
TextBody: Hi Elynn, Jeroen, good morning😊 I am attaching our purchase order # 1907, representing Agristo 332, which is schedule to sail onboard the vessel, CMA-CGM Fort Fleur D’Epee, on Thursday, October 10th, 2024, and arrive in Kingston, Jamaica on Monday, October 28th , 2024 . We would appreciate if you would send us your order confirmation, confirming shipping details, also, a draft copy or copies, of the EUR.1 Certificates for our review, at your earliest convenience. Just a reminder to remove any mention of Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

Subject: Avis de pénalité n°156240 / DESADV non conforme ou absent
TextBody: A l'attention du Responsable Commercial, Madame, Monsieur, Nous vous rappelons (article 5.2 de l'annexe 5 du contrat d'entreprise de fabrication de produits à marque distributeur souscrit par votre société) que dans le cadre de la démarche de réduction des échanges papier, la gestion des pénalités est assurée sur l'application WEB "Portail Avis Pénalités" accessible via le portail SCAMARK https://www.scamark.com/EXTRA_AVIS_PENALITES/detail/156240/2. Vous trouverez ci-joint l'avis de pénalité n°156240 vous informant d'un manquement constaté au regard de vos obligations contractuelles. Le manquement constaté et documenté sur le Portail Avis Pénalités, a entraîné un préjudice composé de surcoûts et se décomposant comme suit : Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en réception : gestion de l'anomalie, gestion manuelle de la réception, prise de retard sur le planning de réception, ... Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en préparation : perte de temps dans l'activité de préparation, ... Coûts additionnels des expéditions aux magasins : perte de temps dans l'activité d'expédition, ... Coûts additionnels dans les services annexes : traitement administratif de l'anomalie, ... Pour information, l'ensemble de ces surcoûts entraînés par votre manquement a fait l'objet d'une certification par un organisme indépendant. Cet avis est soumis à la procédure de vérification des dysfonctionnements prévue dans le contrat liant nos deux sociétés et qui indique un délai de contestation contractuel de 45 jours à compter de la date d'envoi de l'avis de pénalité. Passé ce délai de 45 jours et après un nouveau délai de 10 jours faisant suite à une relance de notre part, nous considérerons que vous acceptez l'avis de pénalité communiqué, celui-ci faisant alors l'objet d'une note de débit. Nous restons à votre disposition pour échanger sur ces éléments via le portail. Si vous n'êtes pas le bon interlocuteur pour le traitement de ces avis pénalités, veuillez transmettre en mettant adv.penalites@scamark.leclerc en copie et vous assurer que cette personne a bien demandé l'accès au portail. Cordialement Le Service ADV

Subject: Visit Biggest Trade fair of Uganda
TextBody: VISIT - BIGGEST TRADE FAIR OF UGANDA Be a part of Business Delegations going to Uganda [none] 500 companies are participating from 18 countries It is indeed our great pleasure to invite your esteemed company to visit the forthcoming 30th UGANDA TRADE FAIR an annual Int'l Trade Fair on all kinds of General, FMCG, Consumer & Industrial Products, Machinery & Equipments etc.. to be held at Lugogo FAIR Grounds, starting from 4 - 8 October 2024, Kampala - Uganda 2nd Biggest Export market for International Companies in East Africa after "KENYA" BE THERE AT 30th UGANDA TRADE FAIR 30th Uganda Int'l Trade Fair, has received strong endorsement from the Ministry of Trade & Industry, Various Government Departments, Key Importing Associations and Foreign Trade & Commercial offices. For 5 days you will have direct access to meet over 500 companies, quality attendees and a buyer profile unmatched by any other industry event. With over 50 million population, Uganda is a excellent & highly potential market for your products and we strongly suggest you to take part at the biggest and largest trade FAIR of Uganda. We Have Designed Special Trade Visitor Packages for International Companies: Trade Visitor Package * 5 Days / 4 Nights 5***** Hotel Accommodation including daily buﬀet breakfast, all room taxes & VAT * Business VISA for Uganda. * Airport Picks up & drop, * Daily Transportation from hotel - expo center & back. * Expo entry pass will be provided * 100 Companies data of Uganda will be provided. Cost of Above Package: Option # 1: One Person with Single Room US$ 1,350 Option # 2: Two Persons with One Double Room US$ 1,900 Download Booking Form <https://expoinafrica.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=18c29007520d18783148226d7&id=0da39ba2e1&e=7d1ba1e782> Uganda Trade Fair - A Geat Business Perspective: * Uganda Trade FAIR offers excellent opportunities for generating new business, enhancing existing contacts & opening up new markets and sales channels. * Uganda Trade FAIR gives you everything you need to attract new customers & target groups. * Don't miss the opportunity to expend your share of the market. * Excellent contacts, substantial sales & great opportunities for presenting your products. * This 5 Days FAIR let you concentrate on the essentials. * Uganda Trade FAIR offers you the ideal time frame for your trade FAIR success. Why to Invest in Uganda? * Access one of the fastest growing regions in the world. * Uganda is the most open country in the region for Foreign Direct Investment (FDI). * Uganda offers the lowest cost workforce in the region and labor costs are forecast to grow more slowly than other EAC country. * Uganda has several unexploited mineral deposits & tourism opportunities. * Uganda and the East African region are growing steadily in both population and GDP. * A strong natural resource base and a commitment to the private sector by the government. * A predictable investment environment. * Uganda Investment Authority (UIA) is the agency mandated with promoting investment opportunities in Uganda. * Uganda Investment Authority (UIA) provides Aftercare services for investors that have already set up in the country. For booking & any info kindly contact: [none] Mr. Inaam Salman Project Director INEXPO GROUP IN EXHIBITION ORG & MGMT LLC Dubai - UAE Mob: +971-55-5506187 (whatsapp)

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Weekly Email (18.08.2024-14.09.2024)
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store or via our Careline from 18.08.2024 to 14.09.2024, which have been processed and allocated to you. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report shows all the complaints that have been allocated to you since 18.08.2024 and includes changes made to the status of a complaint. You should review this report and make sure that the complaints listed have been allocated correctly. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because some cases will still be being checked by the system at the time that this report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report in the period end report.The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: Private Label Partnership for Fries
TextBody: Dear Sales Team, I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to follow up on my previous email regarding a potential private label partnership for fries between Foody Food and your company. As a reminder, we are a prominent supplier in Saudi Arabia with a substantial market share in frozen food products, particularly fries and appetisers, catering to both retail and HORECA sectors. We are eager to explore the possibilities of this collaboration and believe it holds significant benefits for both our companies. Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could provide a quoted price for the private label fries at your earliest convenience. This information is crucial for us to evaluate and proceed with our discussions. Thank you for your attention, and I look forward to your response.

Subject: Relance pour décision sur Avis N°151105
TextBody: A l'attention du Responsable Commercial, Madame, Monsieur, Nous vous rappelons (article 5.2 de l'annexe 5 du contrat d'entreprise de fabrication de produits à marque distributeur souscrit par votre société) que dans le cadre de la démarche de réduction des échanges papier, la gestion des pénalités est assurée sur l'application WEB "Portail Avis Pénalités" accessible via le portail SCAMARK https://www.scamark.com/EXTRA_AVIS_PENALITES/detail/151105/1. La SCAMARK vous a adressé le 02/08/2024 l'avis de pénalité n°151105 vous informant d'un manquement constaté au regard de vos obligations contractuelles et du montant du préjudice subi. A ce jour, vous n'avez pas donné suite à cet avis. Pour rappel, le manquement constaté et documenté sur le Portail Avis Pénalités, a entraîné un préjudice composé de surcoûts et se décomposant comme suit : Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en réception : gestion des anomalies, décalage du planning de réception, non-optimisation de l'équipe de réception et de l'espace de stockage, ... Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en préparation : retard dans l'activité de préparation, correction du planning de préparation, … Coûts additionnels des expéditions aux magasins : chargement incomplet des camions, livraison supplémentaire, ... Coûts additionnels dans les services annexes : modification du plan de déchargement et des plannings des équipes, envoi de nouvelles commandes, traitement comptable des anomalies, ... Pour information, l'ensemble de ces surcoûts entraînés par votre manquement a fait l'objet d'une certification par un organisme indépendant. Cet avis est soumis à la procédure de vérification des dysfonctionnements prévue dans le contrat liant nos deux sociétés. Nous sommes à votre disposition pour échanger sur ces éléments via le portail. Étant rappelé que vous disposiez d'un délai de contestation contractuel initial de 45 jours à compter de la date d'envoi de l'avis de pénalité, à défaut d'un retour dans les 10 jours, nous considérerons que vous acceptez l'avis de pénalité communiqué, celui-ci faisant alors l'objet d'une note de débit. Si vous n'êtes pas le bon interlocuteur pour le traitement de ces avis pénalités, veuillez transmettre en mettant adv.penalites@scamark.leclerc en copie et vous assurer que cette personne a bien demandé l'accès au portail. Cordialement Le Service ADV

Subject: Relance pour décision sur Avis N°150720
TextBody: A l'attention du Responsable Commercial, Madame, Monsieur, Nous vous rappelons (article 5.2 de l'annexe 5 du contrat d'entreprise de fabrication de produits à marque distributeur souscrit par votre société) que dans le cadre de la démarche de réduction des échanges papier, la gestion des pénalités est assurée sur l'application WEB "Portail Avis Pénalités" accessible via le portail SCAMARK https://www.scamark.com/EXTRA_AVIS_PENALITES/detail/150720/1. La SCAMARK vous a adressé le 02/08/2024 l'avis de pénalité n°150720 vous informant d'un manquement constaté au regard de vos obligations contractuelles et du montant du préjudice subi. A ce jour, vous n'avez pas donné suite à cet avis. Pour rappel, le manquement constaté et documenté sur le Portail Avis Pénalités, a entraîné un préjudice composé de surcoûts et se décomposant comme suit : Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en réception : gestion des anomalies, décalage du planning de réception, non-optimisation de l'équipe de réception et de l'espace de stockage, ... Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en préparation : retard dans l'activité de préparation, correction du planning de préparation, … Coûts additionnels des expéditions aux magasins : chargement incomplet des camions, livraison supplémentaire, ... Coûts additionnels dans les services annexes : modification du plan de déchargement et des plannings des équipes, envoi de nouvelles commandes, traitement comptable des anomalies, ... Pour information, l'ensemble de ces surcoûts entraînés par votre manquement a fait l'objet d'une certification par un organisme indépendant. Cet avis est soumis à la procédure de vérification des dysfonctionnements prévue dans le contrat liant nos deux sociétés. Nous sommes à votre disposition pour échanger sur ces éléments via le portail. Étant rappelé que vous disposiez d'un délai de contestation contractuel initial de 45 jours à compter de la date d'envoi de l'avis de pénalité, à défaut d'un retour dans les 10 jours, nous considérerons que vous acceptez l'avis de pénalité communiqué, celui-ci faisant alors l'objet d'une note de débit. Si vous n'êtes pas le bon interlocuteur pour le traitement de ces avis pénalités, veuillez transmettre en mettant adv.penalites@scamark.leclerc en copie et vous assurer que cette personne a bien demandé l'accès au portail. Cordialement Le Service ADV

Subject: Relance pour décision sur Avis N°151690
TextBody: A l'attention du Responsable Commercial, Madame, Monsieur, Nous vous rappelons (article 5.2 de l'annexe 5 du contrat d'entreprise de fabrication de produits à marque distributeur souscrit par votre société) que dans le cadre de la démarche de réduction des échanges papier, la gestion des pénalités est assurée sur l'application WEB "Portail Avis Pénalités" accessible via le portail SCAMARK https://www.scamark.com/EXTRA_AVIS_PENALITES/detail/151690/1. La SCAMARK vous a adressé le 02/08/2024 l'avis de pénalité n°151690 vous informant d'un manquement constaté au regard de vos obligations contractuelles et du montant du préjudice subi. A ce jour, vous n'avez pas donné suite à cet avis. Pour rappel, le manquement constaté et documenté sur le Portail Avis Pénalités, a entraîné un préjudice composé de surcoûts et se décomposant comme suit : Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en réception : gestion des anomalies, décalage du planning de réception, non-optimisation de l'équipe de réception et de l'espace de stockage, ... Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en préparation : retard dans l'activité de préparation, correction du planning de préparation, … Coûts additionnels des expéditions aux magasins : chargement incomplet des camions, livraison supplémentaire, ... Coûts additionnels dans les services annexes : modification du plan de déchargement et des plannings des équipes, envoi de nouvelles commandes, traitement comptable des anomalies, ... Pour information, l'ensemble de ces surcoûts entraînés par votre manquement a fait l'objet d'une certification par un organisme indépendant. Cet avis est soumis à la procédure de vérification des dysfonctionnements prévue dans le contrat liant nos deux sociétés. Nous sommes à votre disposition pour échanger sur ces éléments via le portail. Étant rappelé que vous disposiez d'un délai de contestation contractuel initial de 45 jours à compter de la date d'envoi de l'avis de pénalité, à défaut d'un retour dans les 10 jours, nous considérerons que vous acceptez l'avis de pénalité communiqué, celui-ci faisant alors l'objet d'une note de débit. Si vous n'êtes pas le bon interlocuteur pour le traitement de ces avis pénalités, veuillez transmettre en mettant adv.penalites@scamark.leclerc en copie et vous assurer que cette personne a bien demandé l'accès au portail. Cordialement Le Service ADV

Subject: Prio: Kundenreklamation 107384554
TextBody: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, nachfolgend erhalten Sie eine Kundenanfrage/ -reklamation mit der Bitte um Stellungnahme. Der in der Kundenreklamation angegebene Fremdkörper gibt Anlass zu folgenden Rückfragen: Handelt es sich beim Fund dieses Fremdkörpers, nach Ihren Erkenntnissen, um einen Einzelfall? Wenn nicht, liegt hier ein Sicherheitsproblem vor? Sollte es sich hierbei um ein sicherheitsrelevantes Thema handeln, bitten wir Sie um eine unverzügliche Mitteilung an Hr. R. Seitz unter der Email-Adresse ek_rb@lidl.com. Sofern keine unverzügliche Antwort an die o.g. Email-Adresse erfolgt, gehen wir von keinem sicherheitsrelevanten Thema aus. Den Fremdkörper sowie eventuell fehlende Produktdaten werden unsererseits beim Kunden angefordert und nach Erhalt an Sie weitergeleitet. Die Beantwortung der weiteren Fragen dieses Schreibens sowie ein Statement zu Ihrem Fremdkörpermanagement bleiben davon unberührt. Ihre Stellungnahme an den Kundenservice senden Sie bitte per E-Mail bis zum nächsten Werktag 17:00 Uhr an kundenservice.einkauf@lidl.de. Bitte antworten Sie hierbei immer auf die E-Mail oder geben Sie ref:00D58000000K3E6.500J9000005a8dG:ref in Ihrer E-Mail an. Hinweis: Unsere Kundenanliegen stammen derzeit aus zwei unterschiedlichen CRM-Systemen, daher arbeiten wir aktuell mit zwei unterschiedlichen E-Mail-Adressen (kundenservice.einkauf@lidl.de und ek_kml@lidl.com). Bitte antworten Sie daher direkt auf unsere E-Mails, so können Ihre Antworten direkt dem richtigen System sowie dem entsprechenden Vorgang zugeordnet werden und wir können dadurch eine schnellstmögliche und fehlerfreie Bearbeitung sicherstellen. Vorgangsnummer: 107384554 (bitte bei Schriftverkehr angeben und nicht aus der Betreffzeile löschen!) Kategorie: 3 Food | 3.1 Produktprobleme | 3.1.1 Fremdkörper im Produkt (Achtung: Neuer Prozess) Eingangsdatum: 13.09.2024 14:15 Gesellschaft: Filiale: 00158000016sZF3AAMDE4228 Artikeldaten: IAN: 0085175 Artikel: Kartoffelgitter Crossies Artikelbeschreibung: Kartoffel-Gitter Lieferant: AGRISTO EAN: 4056489181590 Warengruppe: 20 Tiefkühlkost Unterwarengruppe: Kaufdatum: Kundenanliegen: //13.09.2024 Beschreibung: Metallteile in Harvest Basket Knusper Kartoffelgitter Es befand sich eine Schraubenmutter und eine Unterlegscheibe in einer 600g-Packung Zusatzinformationen: Reklamationsgrund: Metall Kurzbeschreibung: Schraubenmutter Datum des Vorfalls: Kaufbetrag: 0,0 Mindesthaltbarkeitsdatum (falls relevant): 21.06.2026 Los- /Chargennummer (falls relevant): G33 24 174 23:35 Beschreibung Fremdkörper (falls relevant): Fremdkörper vorhanden (falls relevant): Mit freundlichen Grüßen Ihr Lidl Kundenservice i.A. Subject: Vattenfall NV Request For Quotation
TextBody: Goedemorgen, Ik wil uw bedrijf graag uitnodigen om ons de bijgevoegde producten te leveren. Sommige van de producten die we mogelijk aanvragen, vallen mogelijk buiten uw werkgebied, daarom willen we graag dat u de producten inkoopt en aan ons levert. Bijgevoegd bij deze e-mail is een offerteaanvraag voor de producten die we nodig hebben. Houd er rekening mee dat dit een spoedaanbieding is, daarom hebben we deze componenten zo snel mogelijk nodig. We wachten nu op uw offerte. Good morning, I would like to extend an invitation to your company to supply us with the attached product(s). Some of the products we may request may fall out of your scope of work hence we would like you to source the products and supply to us. Attached to this email is a Request for Quotation of the products we need.Kindly note this is an urgent once off tender, therefore we require these components at your earliest convenience, We now await for your quotation. Met vriendelijke groet / with

Subject: Visit Uganda Biggest Trade Fair
TextBody: VISIT - BIGGEST TRADE FAIR OF UGANDA Be a part of Business Delegations going to Uganda [none] 500 companies are participating from 18 countries It is indeed our great pleasure to invite your esteemed company to visit the forthcoming 30th UGANDA TRADE FAIR an annual Int'l Trade Fair on all kinds of General, FMCG, Consumer & Industrial Products, Machinery & Equipments etc.. to be held at Lugogo FAIR Grounds, starting from 4 - 8 October 2024, Kampala - Uganda 2nd Biggest Export market for International Companies in East Africa after "KENYA" BE THERE AT 30th UGANDA TRADE FAIR 30th Uganda Int'l Trade Fair, has received strong endorsement from the Ministry of Trade & Industry, Various Government Departments, Key Importing Associations and Foreign Trade & Commercial offices. For 5 days you will have direct access to meet over 500 companies, quality attendees and a buyer profile unmatched by any other industry event. With over 50 million population, Uganda is a excellent & highly potential market for your products and we strongly suggest you to take part at the biggest and largest trade FAIR of Uganda. We Have Designed Special Trade Visitor Packages for International Companies: Trade Visitor Package * 5 Days / 4 Nights 5***** Hotel Accommodation including daily buﬀet breakfast, all room taxes & VAT * Business VISA for Uganda. * Return air ticket of economy class to (Dubai - Entebbe - DUbai) Uganda. Emirates/Fly Dubai * Airport Picks up & drop, * Daily Transportation from hotel - expo center & back. * Expo entry pass will be provided * 100 Companies data of Uganda will be provided. Cost of Above Package: Option # 1: One Person with Single Room AED 7,000 Option # 2: Two Persons with One Double Room AED 11,000 Download Booking Form <https://expoinafrica.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=18c29007520d18783148226d7&id=3ce158ae9d&e=7d1ba1e782> Uganda Trade Fair - A Geat Business Perspective: * Uganda Trade FAIR offers excellent opportunities for generating new business, enhancing existing contacts & opening up new markets and sales channels. * Uganda Trade FAIR gives you everything you need to attract new customers & target groups. * Don't miss the opportunity to expend your share of the market. * Excellent contacts, substantial sales & great opportunities for presenting your products. * This 5 Days FAIR let you concentrate on the essentials. * Uganda Trade FAIR offers you the ideal time frame for your trade FAIR success. Why to Invest in Uganda? * Access one of the fastest growing regions in the world. * Uganda is the most open country in the region for Foreign Direct Investment (FDI). * Uganda offers the lowest cost workforce in the region and labor costs are forecast to grow more slowly than other EAC country. * Uganda has several unexploited mineral deposits & tourism opportunities. * Uganda and the East African region are growing steadily in both population and GDP. * A strong natural resource base and a commitment to the private sector by the government. * A predictable investment environment. * Uganda Investment Authority (UIA) is the agency mandated with promoting investment opportunities in Uganda. * Uganda Investment Authority (UIA) provides Aftercare services for investors that have already set up in the country. For booking & any info kindly contact: [none] Mr. Inaam Salman Project Director INEXPO GROUP IN EXHIBITION ORG & MGMT LLC Dubai - UAE Mob: +971-55-5506187 (whatsapp)

Each set includes three moon cakes, perfectly topped with mixed nut praline and served with fresh fruit, whipped cream, and vanilla ice cream. Subject: Active Specification - Asda Party Seasoned Fries 750g
TextBody: Hi Marlies, I hope you had a good weekend? Please find attached the active spec for the Asda Party Seasoned Fries. Please keep a copy of this spec in your files and archive any older versions. Please sign and date the front page to confirm your agreement with the specification at the time of writing. Please return the signed spec by Monday 7th October. After this date it will be assumed that all information is accurate. Please be aware that there's a requirement for annual nutrition analysis to be held on file for this product. The latest certificate we hold on file is dated January 2024, so please ensure a new certificate will be available no later than 12 months after this. If there are any amends that you wish to make, email an annotated version of the spec or a completed version of the specification amend form.

Subject: New WW NZ Order 16.09
TextBody: Hi Grace, We should be fine for this order. Both gratins are low on stock, but they are both produced before this requested date. The danger is that WW NZ will be using shorter lead times than WW AUS, wich will cause WW NZ "stealing" stock from WW AUS. So ideally, both should use the same lead times when placing orders. I know this is not easy to establish, but it would prevent us from having stock issues for orders which were placed earlier but are shipping later...

Subject: Prio: Kundenreklamation 107384554
TextBody: Dear Lidl team, Thank you for reporting the below. For further communication this incident has been logged as our ticket ID 49720. Based on the pictures and lotcode we have received, a first investigation leads me to the following data: Lot: G33 24 174 2335 Production day : 22/06/2024 Product: Harvest Basket Kartoffelgitter Production site: Agristo Wielsbeke, packaging line 33 at 23h35 As you might know, our factory is equipped with the latest technologies to keep foreign objects out of our production. A HACCP plan has been set up for this purpose. On this basis, attached you can find the metal detection checks of the concerned production. Around the time of your complaint (23h35), the good functioning of the metal detectors on packaging line 33 has been checked around 23h28 and 00h20 (lines marked in bold in the attached overview). Everything has been compliant, no metal has been found during this production. During this production run, there were no specific comments made regarding any break downs or technical interventions, which could be linked to this incident. Based on the pictures we have received, it would be difficult to say if this metal nut and plate, would be a part of our production equipment. Based on our first investigation, at this point we cannot identify the FB nor find its root cause. It would be very interesting to receive the actual FB for further investigation and testing on the concerned packaging line. I read this will be forwarded to us, if it was received from the customer. If so, could you please make sure it is send to the following address and add our reference (ticket49720) in your writing? Agristo Wielsbeke Att. Michèle Vandnbroucke Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 8710 Wielsbeke Belgium In the meantime we apologize for the inconvenience,

Quedo a la espera, Saludos Jessica Delegaciones Canarias, S.L., le informa en cumplimiento del Reglamento General de Protección de Datos y de la Ley Orgánica de Protección de Datos y Garantia de Derechos Digitales, le informamos de que sus datos forman parte de los tratamientos titularidad de la entidad Delegaciones Canarias S.L. Si no desea seguir recibiendo comunicaciones a través de esta vía o si desea ejercitar sus derechos de acceso, rectificación, puede hacerlo enviando una solicitud a la dirección de correo emisora indicando en el asunto “Protección de datos”. Los datos personales se conservarán los plazos necesarios y/o mientras mantenga su consentimiento. La legitimación del tratamiento de los datos personales se basa en el cumplimiento de obligaciones legales contractuales o en el consentimiento dado para hacerlo. Puede ejercer sus derechos ante la Agencia Española de Protección de datos https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/r02/___www.aepd.es___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjkwNzFlZTVmMGZlZDQyN2JmYjIyYmEyNmZiZjRmZWZiOjc6Njk1YTo3ZTI1OTcwZTYyODA1ZTkxYmExZDYwZTQ5YzE5MDQ1OTVkN2E5YmExMTMyNzRmYTA0OGEyYjcyM2M4Y2ZjOGNmOnQ6VDpO

Subject: Asda Policy Updates & New Policies - Sept 2024
TextBody: Good afternoon all, Asda have issued a couple of new policies and some updates on a couple of their existing sustainable sourcing policies that you need to be aware of, as below: * Asda Food Labelling Policy [Updated] * Asda Deforestation Free Policy [New Policy] * Asda Sustainable Animal Feed Sourcing Policy [New Policy] * Asda Sustainable Cocoa Policy [Updated] * Asda Sustainable Coffee Policy [Updated] * Asda Sustainable Imported Beef Policy [New Policy] * Asda Sustainable Palm Oil Sourcing Policy [Updated] * Asda Sustainable Soy Sourcing Policy [Updated] * Meat Secondary Supplier Approval list 09-09-24 [Updated] – Only relevant if you supply meat-containing products to Asda * Labelling Policy Appendices [Updated] Please find the updated policy documents attached. Please ensure you archive any previous versions of these documents and replace with the latest versions. There are some key changes and requirements around compliance to the sustainable sourcing practices for these ‘at risk’ commodities with requirement for fully segregated certifications and certified assurance standards by the end of 2025. If you are using any of these commodities for Asda Brand products then you need to ensure that you read each of the policies in full to ensure you understand, and are aware of, the requirements and the impact on your business and supply chains. Once you have read these policies Alison and I will be happy to discuss further with you to answer any questions you may have. ACTION: Please complete the attached policy acceptance form (for the new / updated policies only) and return, signed and dated by Monday 14th October. If we do not receive the completed form by this deadline we will assume your acceptance of, and compliance with, these policies. If you have any questions or wish to discuss anything within these documents and how to interpret them, please do not hesitate to contact either Marta, Alison or I. Many thanks, Dan Subject: Bestellung von ALDI Ungarn /  Rendeles ALDI Magyarorszag Elelmiszer Bt. (10743/455775)
Cheesy Potato Swirls 450g (Christmas £1)
TextBody: Hey Charlie, I've submitted the changes, please see my comments :) Product Appearance (Before Cooking as Applicable) Please remove 450gr reference as N/S - removed Please add further accept photos if possible - Added professional frozen pic from spec Please add "Belt marks up to 2mm" in the accept column if applicable - added - bottom only Product Appearance (After Cooking as Applicable) Please show the Internal appearance with a cross section - added Please add ‘or equivalent’ where you mention 70c for 2 mins - added Aroma Please add reject any Incorrect/ Off aromas That’s already written under “Aromas not associated with the product” Flavour Please add reject any Incorrect/ Off flavours – Is already captured in the text “Flavours not associated with the product.” “Any sour or rancid flavours to the oil or potato product” Product Presentation in Secondary Pack Please add a photo to show the outercase - done Product Presentation in Primary Pack Please crop the durability area photo as it appears blurred - done Please add "Anything that detracts from the acceptable standard" in the reject column done Depot QA Checks Please add a photo for carbon if possible unavailable Please add a check for block welding if applicable we do not have pictures of it . When we will add this check we need to upload a picture or we cannot get it approved. This will only happen if the product is thawed and got frozen again. What will only happen in the shop or at the costumer. Please add a check for Debris and smearing on outside of outer packaging We don’t check this internally as this all goes automatically. I don’t agree with adding this point. Please add a check for Freezer burn / dehydration if applicable not applicable Please add a check for colour we do not check colour as this is a seasoned product and has a light orange colour so we cannot use the USDA chart for it. Factory Process Standards Please review typo length - done Please add a check for deep frozen if applicable - the value for deep frozen is written in the method Please consider adding a check for packaging Sara Ghasemian Customer Service Officer UK P +447534412045 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Gresswell, Charlie (Leicester) [Charlie.Gresswell@sgs.com] Sent: 13/09/2024 14:28 To: Evelien.Cremers@agristo.com Subject: Quality Tab Amends Request 28285 Cheesy Potato Swirls 450g (Christmas £1) Hello, I have reviewed the quality tab on the igloo system for 28285 Cheesy Potato Swirls 450g (Christmas £1) and some amends are required. I will reject the quality tab to you now, please can you review my comments below and make any necessary amends before resubmitting within 48 hours. Please could you send me an email to let me know when you have resubmitted it. Thank you. Product Appearance (Before Cooking as Applicable) Please remove 450gr reference as N/S Please add further accept photos if possible Please add "Belt marks up to 2mm" in the accept column if applicable Product Appearance (After Cooking as Applicable) Please show the Internal appearance with a cross section Please add ‘or equivalent’ where you mention 70c for 2 mins Aroma Please add reject any Incorrect/ Off aromas Flavour Please add reject any Incorrect/ Off flavours Product Presentation in Secondary Pack Please add a photo to show the outercase Product Presentation in Primary Pack Please crop the durability area photo as it appears blurred Please add "Anything that detracts from the acceptable standard" in the reject column Depot QA Checks Please add a photo for carbon if possible Please add a check for block welding if applicable Please add a check for Debris and smearing on outside of outer packaging Please add a check for Freezer burn / dehydration if applicable Please add a check for colour Factory Process Standards Please review typo lenght Please add a check for deep frozen if applicable Please consider adding a check for packaging

Subject: Export To Ghana - 5th GTS 2024
TextBody: 5TH GHANA TRADE SHOW 2024 International Trade Expo October 15 - 17, Accra Grow Exhibitions, Dubai invites you to participate at Ghana Trade Show 2024 that will take place from 15 - 17 October, 2024 at Accra International Conference Center. As you might be aware Ghana is more of an importer than a producer so the demand for most products is much more compared to other Africa countries. The event which mainly targets the importers, distributors, retailers, and entrepreneurs promises to be a huge success for both exhibitors & visitors. Exhibition Title: 5th Ghana Trade Show 2024 Dates: 15 - 17,October 2024 Venue: Accra International Conference Center, Accra Show Timing: 10 AM to 5 PM Daily Cost for 9 sq.m Booth: US$ 3150 The booth will include one table, two chairs, one electrical socket, two spot lights & fascia with company board. Click Here For More Information<https://growgrp.com/ghanatradeshow/exhibit/index.html> Alternatively you can call or whatsapp on +97150 5352675 for more information. We wish you the very best in your business & look forward to welcome you at the event. Thanks &

Subject: FOODPRO UGANDA, 21st - 23rd November, 2024 AT UMA SHOW GROUNDS LUGOGO, KAMPALA, UGANDA
TextBody: FOODPRO UGANDA 21ST - 23RD NOVEMBER, 2024 AT UMA SHOW GROUNDS LUGOGO, KAMPALA, UGANDA ACCESS TO THE FOOD, BEVERAGES, PROCESSING, PACKAGING AND TECHNOLOGY INDUSTRY IN UGANDA Dear Sir / Madam, Greetings! We are delighted to inform you about Uganda's largest upcoming Food, Beverages, Processing, Packaging and Technology International Exhibition, FoodPro Uganda taking place from 21 - 23 November, 2024 at UMA Show Grounds Lugogo, Kampala, Uganda. The exhibition will be the gateway to the East African Business Community in Uganda. It is the premier upcoming trade exhibition in the East Africa Region in its sector. The event will be hosting Food Professionals, Retailers, Distributors, Food Processors & Packers, Importers & Exporters, Decision Makers and Technologists of the East African Region in Uganda. Exhibitors from around various countries will be participating in this exhibition looking to explore the untapped potential of the East Africa Market. The expo is supported by Uganda Manufacturers Association (UMA) and Uganda Seed Trade Association (USTA). ABOUT UGANDA: Uganda is the largest growing economy in the East Africa Region. 97% of Uganda's exports in Africa are to countries in the EAC and COMESA regions. Uganda has seen an increase of 20% in the total imports in recent years. The main traditional cash crops of Uganda include Coffee, Tea, Cotton. Ugandas non-food imports consist of tallow and machinery. The highest food imports consist of wheat, rice, barley, sugar, maize and milk. Food and drink is a key sector in Uganda’s economy with agriculture accounting for 21% of the GDP, responsible for about 46% of total export earnings and employing over 65% of the population. A good climate, favourable arable land and an abundance of water bodies means that Uganda has the potential to become the bread basket of East and Central Africa. WHY EXHIBIT? Promote your company to decision-makers through numerous branding opportunities offered with each sponsorship and exhibitor package. Meeting point for senior Food, Beverages, Processing and Packaging Executives Access point to the market of Uganda providing networking opportunity Benchmark your company’s strength to leading companies in Uganda Direct Selling to Trade Intermediates Platform for new product launch and branding opportunity Audience Filtering and Match Making Rendezvous with Main Decision Makers and form alliances Largest Upcoming Food, Beverages, Processing and Packaging show in Uganda Be a part of the unique conference programs EXHIBITORS PROFILE: Food & Beverages Confectionery, Bakery & Snacks Tea & Coffee Food Processing Machinery & Equipment Food Packaging Machinery & Technology Packaging Material including Films, Glass, Paper, Foil etc. Spices Grains & Cereals Processed & Canned Food Milk & Dairy Products Seafood & Meat Fruits & Vegetables Fresh & Dried Food Product Freezing, Warehousing & Refrigeration Delicatessen and Convenience Technology BUYERS PROFILE: Distributors & Dealers Importers & Exporters Consultants Food Processors & Packers Third Party Manufacturers Regulatory Bodies Spices Processors Technology Providers Convenient Food Manufacturers Dairy Product Manufacturers Seafood, Meat and Poultry Importers Food Park Facilitators Central & State Government Officials If any further information is required, please feel free to contact us. Thanks &

Subject: Agristo changes in contact
TextBody: Dear Ben Foods Team, I hope this message finds you well. I’m writing to inform you of a recent change at Agristo, in line with what Pieter Lapierre shared a few monts ago. I will also shift towards the Customer Experience team, and from this point forward, my colleague Elynn will be your main contact for all Customer Service inquiries (orders, stock, payments, etc.). While there aren't many changes for you, here’s a quick summary of who to reach out to for different matters: Customer Service inquiries : Elynn Technical Sales inquiries: Kathleen Sales inquiries : Beau Please keep sending all service-related queries for Elynn or Kathleen to: service@agristo.com. For any claims (packaging, quality, logistics), kindly use: claims@agristo.com. On a personal note, I’d like to express my sincere gratitude for the opportunity to work with you, even though it was for a short time. The Ben Foods team has been incredibly kind, collaborative and comprehensivre. It’s been a real pleasure. I hope our paths cross again, perhaps during a future visit. Thank you once again for your trust and partnership.
Hello, See new orders 😃 Med venlig hilsen /

Subject: I AM URGENTLY WAITING FOR YOUR RESPONSE.
TextBody: DEAR FRIEND: GREETINGS FROM MY OWN SIDE; I AM MRS. ANNA ABOUBAKA, A WIDOW TO LATE DIPLOMAT DR. ABOUBAKA ZONGO. I AM 54 YEARS OLD, SUFFERING FROM PANCREATIC CANCER. MY CONDITION IS REALLY BAD AND IT IS QUITE OBVIOUS THAT I WON’T LIVE MORE THAN SIX MONTHS ACCORDING TO MY DOCTORS. I AM WILLING TO DONATE THE SUM OF SEVEN MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSEND EUROS (€7.500, 000.00 EUROS) OUT THROUGH YOU IN OTHER TO HELP THE POOR WIDOWS AND THE LESS PRIVILEGED ONES IN THE RURAL AREAS AND TO CARRY OUT OTHER CHARITABLE WORKS. I WAIT FOR YOUR URGENT REPLY TO PROCEED.

TextBody: Goedemiddag! Ik zie D24-02069 niet in TMS staan. Is daar wat mee of heb je deze misschien niet gehad? Groetjes! Met vriendelijke groet, Kirsten Pancras Logistics Aanwezig: maandag, dinsdag en donderdag [cid:8ed77cc1-1632-4184-8c6a-33f7a52126bd]<https://beemsterboer.nl/> Tel +31 226396404 Fax +31 226396460 E mail planning@jpb.nl J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Mail address: P.O.Box 8, 1749 ZG Warmenhuizen, The Netherlands Office address: Stationsstraat 17, 1749 EG Warmenhuizen, The Netherlands J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als "AHV"), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as "GCT") including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi "CG "), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d'arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l'application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l'application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

TextBody: Good day, I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to reach out and humbly ask for an opportunity to serve your lanes and share a few container shipments this month. With September underway, meeting my targets would be greatly impacted by your support. I’m confident that our rates will not only be competitive but will also provide the value and efficiency you expect. If you could consider trying our services for your upcoming shipments, it would truly mean a lot, and I believe it could lead to a mutually beneficial partnership. Your trust and business are highly valued, and I would love the opportunity to prove that we can meet, if not exceed, your expectations. Looking forward to the possibility of working together and making this month a success for both of us. Thanks &

Subject: Invitation: Webinar on EUDR Compliance – Join Us on October 1st
TextBody: Dear supplier of Jumbo, We hope this message finds you well. As you may be aware, there are significant upcoming changes with the European Union Deforestation Regulation (EUDR). To help you navigate these developments, ImpactBuying is hosting an exclusive online webinar. This will only be relevant for you if you work with the following products: Palm oil, Soy, cocoa, coffee, cattle/beef, rubber, or wood. If you work with one or more of these products, this webinar is for you. Event Details: * Date: October 1, 2024 * Time: 9:30 AM - 12:30 PM * Location: Online via Teams Why Attend? During this webinar, you will learn how to best prepare your company for the upcoming EUDR regulation. We’ll dive into the implications of the law for your business and discuss how to efficiently manage the data you’ll need. With new legislation on the horizon, accurate and comprehensive data is more critical than ever. Our program will cover: * Anticipated Changes: Understanding the evolving data requirements. * Regulatory Impact: Insights into the effects of the EUDR. * Data Management: The latest developments and best practices in managing data. * ImpactBuying’s Role: Discover how ImpactBuying can help you prepare for and comply with the EUDR. This is a valuable opportunity to gain essential insights and strategies for compliance. How to Register: Please confirm your participation by joining the event on Teams through this link<https://impactbuying.com/our_events/webinar-eudr/>. We look forward to your involvement and to supporting you in adapting to these important regulatory changes.

Saludos, Cathaysa Delegaciones Canarias, S.L., le informa en cumplimiento del Reglamento General de Protección de Datos y de la Ley Orgánica de Protección de Datos y Garantia de Derechos Digitales, le informamos de que sus datos forman parte de los tratamientos titularidad de la entidad Delegaciones Canarias S.L. Si no desea seguir recibiendo comunicaciones a través de esta vía o si desea ejercitar sus derechos de acceso, rectificación, puede hacerlo enviando una solicitud a la dirección de correo emisora indicando en el asunto “Protección de datos”. Los datos personales se conservarán los plazos necesarios y/o mientras mantenga su consentimiento. La legitimación del tratamiento de los datos personales se basa en el cumplimiento de obligaciones legales contractuales o en el consentimiento dado para hacerlo.
