Subject: Samples and further enquires following last weeks visit
TextBody: --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Brown, Amy [amy.brown@nomadfoods.com] Sent: 16/09/2024 17:06 To: gilles.willaert@agristo.com; service@agristo.com Cc: katie.lewis@nomadfoods.com; vikki.coggin@nomadfoods.com Subject: Samples and further enquires following last weeks visit Good Afternoon I picked up with Katie and the team this morning, I know you were on with arranging samples Pieter but just wanted to pop in an email the requirements so all in one location Roast Potato Chips – Please send 1 case from start middle and end of the run once packed Roast Potato Renovation 1 x case of std roasts produced last week – se we are comparing from the same time in the season 20kg of trial product – this is to cover the superiority testing and any other samples we require Duck Fat Renovation 15kg of trial product Also the packaging samples that were discussed during the visit Please send some samples of what the 1.1kg bag will be packed into Also if you can confirm the outer size will in fact be the same as the 1.3kg case , with the extra 2 bags in. @Gilles Willaert would you have a TP and the explanation behind these please? Whilst on site there was the discussion around producing the Roast Renovation Recipe at an earlier stage due to the poor quality as we near Jun / July time. Please can you find out from your side if this would be an option and what we would need to do to secure this. There is concern from outside that we would not have film ready to pack in March (time that was discussed with Wanda) – so below are a few questions: when do you believe is the best time to produce launch stock Is there an option to pack into bulk until we do have the film If we were to pack into bulk is there a risk that the coating would chip off the potatoes during the bulking off process. Thanks Amy Amy Brown RDQ Manager Nomad Foods Europe Limited Registered in England & Wales | Company No 5879466 Registered Office: Forge | 43 Church Street West | Woking | GU21 6HT Phone: +44 1482 736324 Mobile: 07972 506594 Fax: email: Amy.Brown@nomadfoods.com Web:www.nomadfoods.com P THINK BEFORE YOU PRINT: Before printing e-mails, think whether it is really necessary. Thanks! LEGAL DISCLAIMER : This e-mail may contain confidential or privileged information. If you have received this e-mail in error, you must not disclose to any other person, nor take copies of, the contents of this e-mail and/or any attachment to it. If this email is marked 'personal' Nomad Foods Europe Limited is not liable in any way for its content. E-mails are susceptible to alteration. Nomad Foods Europe Limited shall not be liable for the message if altered, changed or falsified. We try to ensure that our communications are free of viruses but do not accept responsibility for any loss or damage that viruses may cause. You should take your own steps to ensure that communications are free of viruses. Nomad Foods Europe Limited and its employees operate in compliance with the law. Any recommended selling price (RSP) is provided for guidance only. Retailers are free to set their own prices. Nomad Foods Europe Limited is a limited liability company registered in England and Wales, company registration number 5879466. Subject: Findus Agristo Chargement 39 2024
TextBody: Bonjour Marlies, Pouvez-vous me confirmer les commandes ci-dessous pour les chargements de la semaine prochaine s'il vous plaît ? @Demand Planning you will find in attachment our forecasts. Line "total des entrées" is the planned deliveries, these deliveries are not fixed and not precise especially beyond 2-3 months. Subject: New PO. 01046/24 - 01047/24 - 01048/24 - 01049/24 - COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA
TextBody: Dear team, Please find attached: • P.O. 01046/24 - 1 x 40' fcl - FOB ANTUERPIA + PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Shipment WEEK 42 (Shipment mid October) • P.O. 01047/24 - 1 x 40' fcl - FOB ANTUERPIA + PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Shipment WEEK 42 (Shipment mid October) • P.O. 01048/24 - 1 x 40' fcl - FOB ANTUERPIA + PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Shipment WEEK 46 (Shipment mid November) • P.O. 01049/24 - 1 x 40' fcl - FOB ANTUERPIA + PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Shipment WEEK 46 (Shipment mid November) Dears, could you please let us know the date of production (and due, if possible) of Dippers pallets? The client is considering to add this item to the orders. Please send us PROFORMA INVOICE for approval. Note below important details: • It’s mandatory to place some cartons per item and per lot near the container door for inspection purposes. • If it’s a container reefer, it’s mandatory to have at least 1 thermographs (monitors SENSITECH), next to the container door. It must be programmed to register 120 days. • Send the shipping advice/report including information and photos of loading in order to check the condition of the goods and container before loaded. • Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. Please follow the below instructions for shipping documents: INVOICE / PROFORMA BUYER / IMPORTED BY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY/ADQUIRENTE PAGADOR: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 There is some mandatory information to be mentioned on INVOICE/PROFORMA: • Detailed Description of Goods in Portuguese and English: • Full Producer details: • Country of Origin, Shipment and Purchase: • Total Net Quantity: • Total Gross Quantity: • NCM code – only the 4 first digits • Payment Terms: 60 DD • Loading Port: ANTUERPIA • Unloading Port: PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Incoterm: FOB • Exporter Bank Details • Must be always stamped and signed by hand by AGRISTO N.V. • It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. Only to be added on INVOICE: • Production's date: DD/MM/YYYY • Expiry's date: DD/MM/YYYY • Lot Number: • If importer has a Purchase Order No. (reference no.) please include it. • Date of Invoice must be before or the same as date mentioned in the bill of landing; • It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. • The freight rates mentioned in Purchases Orders and Proformas are an estimated freight. In the original invoice, mention the freight exactly as it appears in the Bill of Landing. BILL OF LANDING - OBS: Report FREE-TIME and perdiem. CONSIGNEE: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 • NCM code – only the 4 first digits • Include CBM (m³) in the B/L. • On the fields Consignee and Notify, please DON’T use the sentence "TO THE ORDER OF". • It must inform the existence or not of wooden package. • Include the thermograph number in B/L. • Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. • Issue 3 set of B/L and one might be used for the bank, one might be used to send to the consignee, one might be kept with the shipper, for safety reasons, as it is not necessary to release the load. PACKING LIST Must be always stamped and signed by AGRISTO N.V. BUYER / IMPORTED BY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY/ADQUIRENTE PAGADOR: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN/ ANALYSIS / ANALYSIS MICROBIOLOGICAL / METAL CERTIFICATE / LOT DECLARATION + OTHER CERTIFICATES • Analysis – Always with the same date as BL, or before. THOSE DOCUMENTS MUST BE ISSUED ONLY IN NAME OF: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 All documents must be sent to us by e-mail for approval, before sending the originals. Please do not issue any original without our approval. It is very important to send all originals of shipping documents before the arrival of the vessel, the originals must be on this side at least 5 days before ETA, in order to avoid unnecessary storage expenses and/or penalty fees due to delay of sending originals. Collection letter to the bank must be made in name of COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 Send to below bank address: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL

Subject: Samples and further enquires following last weeks visit
TextBody: Good Afternoon I picked up with Katie and the team this morning, I know you were on with arranging samples Pieter but just wanted to pop in an email the requirements so all in one location Roast Potato Chips - Please send 1 case from start middle and end of the run once packed Roast Potato Renovation 1 x case of std roasts produced last week - se we are comparing from the same time in the season 20kg of trial product - this is to cover the superiority testing and any other samples we require Duck Fat Renovation 15kg of trial product Also the packaging samples that were discussed during the visit Please send some samples of what the 1.1kg bag will be packed into Also if you can confirm the outer size will in fact be the same as the 1.3kg case , with the extra 2 bags in. @Gilles Willaert<mailto:Gilles.Willaert@agristo.com> would you have a TP and the explanation behind these please? Whilst on site there was the discussion around producing the Roast Renovation Recipe at an earlier stage due to the poor quality as we near Jun / July time. Please can you find out from your side if this would be an option and what we would need to do to secure this. There is concern from outside that we would not have film ready to pack in March (time that was discussed with Wanda) - so below are a few questions: 1. when do you believe is the best time to produce launch stock 2. Is there an option to pack into bulk until we do have the film * If we were to pack into bulk is there a risk that the coating would chip off the potatoes during the bulking off process. Thanks Amy Amy Brown RDQ Manager [cid:Nomad_Foods_LOGORGB-Resized93high_dff506c2-0e22-47e4-abd7-1a687e84ad2d.jpg] Nomad Foods Europe Limited Registered in England & Wales | Company No 5879466 Registered Office: Forge | 43 Church Street West | Woking | GU21 6HT Phone: +44 1482 736324<tel:+44%201482%20736324> Mobile: 07972 506594 <tel:07972%20506594> Fax: email: Amy.Brown@nomadfoods.com<mailto:Amy.Brown@nomadfoods.com> Web:www.nomadfoods.com<http://www.nomadfood.com/> P THINK BEFORE YOU PRINT: Before printing e-mails, think whether it is really necessary. Subject: Artigiano in Fiera anche a Primavera!
TextBody: 31 mai–3 juin 2025, Fieramilano | Entrée gratuite Se non leggi correttamente questo messaggio, clicca qui<https://track.gestionefiere.com/e/r?q=Ls%3dEBLtP_0sWw_K3_vxkr_6C_0sWw_J8gcxZh.B53mIAH.gL5_JUzh_TjC_0sWw_J8vK4.3wMF_JUzh_Tj_OiuT_Zx0mE_0sWw_K6zN0_JUzh_TjQDN49_0sWw_JX2_OiuT_ZvHz_OiuT_YNCl_OiuT_ZvO503b_vxkr_7ABO_2SHbge_0sWw_K3_vxkr_6cF_JUzh_UhMD_JUzh_T0_OiuT_ZvA0AP8_vxkr_6cF_JUzh_UhM8_JUzh_T0S_0sWw_J8Bgw_JUzh_T0U_0sWw_K6tS_0sWw_JXmIuTBBw__JUzh_T0f1_JU3e8szh_UhRHP4T_0sWw_J8Rjdo%26g%3dZNXBa%26v%3d%26Aw%3dXRaBbP%26D%3dB%26K%3dMWCaN%26G%3d6XKb6YN%26L%3d-8bQWDXJS5&mupckp=mupAtu4m8OiX0wt> [https://img.track.gestionefiere.com/static/36684/images/8/testata-fra.jpg]<https://track.gestionefiere.com/e/tr?q=5%3dIZEZJ%26F%3dG%26F%3dKYHVL%26I%3dASIdATL%26O%3dqL0J2_JgwY_UQ_LZuf_VO_JgwY_TV51LyAr34IrFvCnJq.C3_JgwY_TV_LZuf_WOM0G_2GALl7_8ubr_Ihw7CMu70NnJ_8ubr_HZ4L3_Gn6yOv_JgwY_UT9v3yF_1sit_AXANv_5qGy3yAw_JgwY_UTHxNyNj_JqHpG%26t%3d%26C2%3dSPcGWN%26N2%3dTPVCbOU3q5jESLVITI%26B%3dA5G7n5LcEVIaoWH7IUraA7Hcn5O8ISHZlWvYm4sVIZHZnbNdE6N0kVL7D8Gc0TPc&mupckp=mupAtu4m8OiX0wt> Cher/chère , Je suis heureux de t'annoncer une importante nouveauté : Artigiano in Fiera double le rendez-vous avec une nouvelle édition qui se déroulera du 31 mai au 3 juin à Fieramilano, avec une entrée libre. Il s'agit d'une initiative qui répond aux nombreuses sollicitations d'un public passionné, désireux de bénéficier d'une nouvelle occasion de rencontre avec les artisans. En même temps, les artisans du monde entier nous ont également demandé à plusieurs reprises la possibilité de se confronter au marché à un autre moment de l'année. La période choisie, de quatre jours incluant toujours la Fête de la République, ne coïncide pas avec d'autres événements internationaux dans le secteur. Le grand public d'Artigiano in Fiera sera encore dans ses villes, en raison de l'ouverture du système scolaire, pendant une période chaude et agréable, durant laquelle le désir d'explorer croît, en attendant l'été suivant. Ainsi, le choix du printemps devient un point fort de l'événement, à un moment de l'année particulièrement stratégique pour Milan, aussi en raison de la présence des touristes qui visitent la ville. L'édition printanière d'Artigiano in Fiera est donc une occasion supplémentaire de rencontrer un public fidèle, qualifié et conscient qui souhaite retrouver, tout au long de l'année, l'authenticité, l'originalité et la qualité des produits artisanaux. De plus, cet événement offre une opportunité pour se faire connaître auprès de nouveaux clients. La participation à ce nouvel événement permet aux entreprises de vendre leurs produits à un public attentif et sélectif, et aussi de réaliser un test de marché. En outre, la manifestation représente une occasion de communiquer et de se faire connaître dans un large marché, ainsi que de maintenir et de renforcer les relations avec la clientèle existante. Étant donné qu'il s'agit d'un événement de quatre jours, l'investissement est modéré ; les espaces d'exposition, à partir de stands de 10 m² (4x2,5 m), sont au prix de 2.500 € HT. Notre réseau commercial est disponible pour approfondir la proposition ; les inscriptions ouvriront dans les prochains jours et nous nous assurerons de t'en informer rapidement. Espérant te retrouver personnellement à la foire, je profite de cette occasion pour te remercier et t’adresser mes meilleures salutations. Subject: CONXEMAR Fotos y vídeo
TextBody: Buenos días: Como en años anteriores Foto Estudio J.Luis estará por la feria el miércoles día 2 (segundo día de la feria) para realizar las fotos de los stands de los clientes que así lo deseen. De estar interesados en las fotografías y para poder atenderles de forma más personalizada rogamos se pongan en contacto con nosotros y nos digan si tienen una hora preferente a través de este medio o en el teléfono 610555713 que estará operativo durante la feria indicando el nombre y NÚMERO DE STAND. PRECIOS: PACK 1: De 8 a 12 fotos RETOCADAS, que se enviarán al correo que ustedes nos faciliten, 35 € más IVA. PACK 2: Fotos más vídeo publicitario que dependiendo del Stand y necesidades tendrá una duración aproximada de entre 30 y 120 segundos y un precio de entre 350 y 400 € más IVA. En el PACK 2 como las necesidades de cada empresa son distintas es necesario que se pongan en contacto con nosotros como muy tarde tres días antes de la feria para poder personalizar el trabajo según sus necesidades y fijar un precio justo. Un año más agradecerles la confianza depositada en Foto Estudio José Luis s.l. Teléfonos: 981719148 y 610555713 e-mail: jluisfotografia@hotmail.es<mailto:jluisfotografia@hotmail.es> Reciban un cordial saludo.

Subject: Japanese forwarder KINTETSU WORLD EXPRESS
TextBody: Dear Pieter, I have a request. Kintetsu World Express Inc which is one of leading forwarding / logistic companies in Japan and they would like to offer us better services related to transport. Please visit their web site in below to know what they offer. They are quite confident for their services. Kintetsu visited our booth at Foodex this year. I had online meeting with them in March. They wanted to communicate with someone from Head quoters, I communicated with Mr. Maartin BONTE. But at that time he answered me that there is no interest on their service. Now Kintetsu contacted me again and telling me that they would like to visit us in October. I cannot make a judgement by myself if Kintetsu is still worthwhile for us or not, so I have given them your name with mail address of Agristo service and you will receive a contact from them soon, Can you please take care of them ? if you see it is worthwhile for you then you may pass this to the person in charge of logistic OR you may decline their application for meeting. Thank you very much for your cooperation. Hagino Mr. Tomohiko Igawa Kintetsu World Express, Inc. Corporate Sales, Marketing & Operation Department 24th Floor, Shinagawa Intercity Tower A, 2-15-1 Konan, Minato-ku, Tokyo 108-6024 JAPAN Phone : +81-3-6863-6453 Mobile : +81-80-4172-6821 Visit Us : http://www.kwe.com

Subject: 【IEコラム：Vol.5】タイムスタディはどの会社でも行っているが･･･①
TextBody: 画像が表示されない場合はこちらをクリック<http://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/es?s=1673224453&e=1203549&elqTrackId=20f49e6a7ff34e609f310c9929b85f0e&elq=580f2d9633db46908264ae5e45f3354d&elqaid=37298&elqat=1&elqak=8AF58F937E2695C7081B483805473C49D47B6EF72013224EEB37CB1818FF40F42DCB> [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/{5a6ff22d-9a06-49b5-943e-e00a5f7cd3bd}_img-logo.gif] IE（Industrial Engineering）コラム Vol.5 【第5回】タイムスタディ・標準時間の重要性を考える： タイムスタディはどの会社でも行っているが･･･① ここからはIEの代表的な手法や言葉について、その意味や活用方法の事例を交えて解説します。 今回のテーマは「タイムスタディ」と「標準時間」です。 タイムスタディとは、現場の作業者がある作業を行うのにどれだけの時間がかかっているのか測定する分析手法です。 数多くの企業の方に「タイムスタディをしたことがあるか」、あるいは「タイムスタディを知っているか」と質問すると、ほとんどの方が知っている、行ったことがあると回答します。 しかし、タイムスタディの正しい方法を実践している人は意外と少ないようです。 ・対象となる作業をどのように定義するか ・誰を対象に時間を観測するか ・その観測結果をどのように整理するか など、正しい結果を導くためには、正しい方法を理解することが重要です。 タイムスタディを行った時のよくある失敗例として、 「測定するたびに作業手順が変わり、結果が整理できなかった」 「測定はやってみたが、細かく再測定しないと改善に活用できなかった」 など、測定前の準備が不足しているために、再測定をしなければいけないということがあります。 分析前には必ず分析の目的、その目的に合う分析の対象や分析の細かさを決める必要があります。 分析前には、 ・この分析はどのような目的に使えるのか（一つではありません） ・対象をどのように決めればよいのか ・分析の細かさにはどのような種類があるのか など、その活用のポイントを理解したうえで、分析目的を決定し、準備することが大切なのです。 ※以降、次回に続く 執筆者：(株)日本能率協会コンサルティング 角田 賢司（敬称略） IE士資格取得講座 [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/%7B4d1aaadc-15f2-4675-a896-dbd9712c7f7b%7D_seisan-pro_logo.png]<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729837298240917%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC5%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=5372&elqTrackId=49C3E1303070F83E68EE7EE3C15480A0&elq=580f2d9633db46908264ae5e45f3354d&elqaid=37298&elqat=1&elqak=8AF572210D221183FED6432B2D404267F3FD6EF72013224EEB37CB1818FF40F42DCB> 10月7日（月）より開講します！ 生産性改善・サプライチェーン強化・製造DX導入 原点は “IE” です！ 現場が解る、現場の課題解決ができる、IEのプロ『IE士』育成をお勧めします！ 本コースの詳細はこちら<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3729837298240917%E3%80%90%E7%AC%AC5%E5%9B%9E%E3%80%91IE%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA&s=1673224453&lid=5372&elqTrackId=70040E651FFC15A85CF3B04E43F3F7D2&elq=580f2d9633db46908264ae5e45f3354d&elqaid=37298&elqat=1&elqak=8AF52B4F617BBB3151C997B4ED05B0BFAFFC6EF72013224EEB37CB1818FF40F42DCB> Subject: Avis de pénalité n°157625 / Manquants taux service
TextBody: A l'attention du Responsable Commercial, Madame, Monsieur, Nous vous rappelons (article 5.2 de l'annexe 5 du contrat d'entreprise de fabrication de produits à marque distributeur souscrit par votre société) que dans le cadre de la démarche de réduction des échanges papier, la gestion des pénalités est assurée sur l'application WEB "Portail Avis Pénalités" accessible via le portail SCAMARK https://www.scamark.com/EXTRA_AVIS_PENALITES/detail/157625/1. Vous trouverez ci-joint l'avis de pénalité n°157625 vous informant d'un manquement constaté au regard de vos obligations contractuelles. Le manquement constaté et documenté sur le Portail Avis Pénalités, a entraîné un préjudice composé de surcoûts et se décomposant comme suit : Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en réception : gestion des anomalies, décalage du planning de réception, non-optimisation de l'équipe de réception et de l'espace de stockage, ... Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en préparation : retard dans l'activité de préparation, correction du planning de préparation, … Coûts additionnels des expéditions aux magasins : chargement incomplet des camions, livraison supplémentaire, ... Coûts additionnels dans les services annexes : modification du plan de déchargement et des plannings des équipes, envoi de nouvelles commandes, traitement comptable des anomalies, ... Pour information, l'ensemble de ces surcoûts entraînés par votre manquement a fait l'objet d'une certification par un organisme indépendant. Cet avis est soumis à la procédure de vérification des dysfonctionnements prévue dans le contrat liant nos deux sociétés et qui indique un délai de contestation contractuel de 45 jours à compter de la date d'envoi de l'avis de pénalité. Passé ce délai de 45 jours et après un nouveau délai de 10 jours faisant suite à une relance de notre part, nous considérerons que vous acceptez l'avis de pénalité communiqué, celui-ci faisant alors l'objet d'une note de débit. Nous restons à votre disposition pour échanger sur ces éléments via le portail. Si vous n'êtes pas le bon interlocuteur pour le traitement de ces avis pénalités, veuillez transmettre en mettant adv.penalites@scamark.leclerc en copie et vous assurer que cette personne a bien demandé l'accès au portail. Cordialement Le Service ADV

Subject: Innovative Solutions for Sustainable Plastics - Register for Webinar & Chance to Win prizes on Sep 26(Ref:202448195)
TextBody: Wanhua Chemical's experts will share Sustainable plastic materials solutions If you cannot read this e-mail properly, please click here. Hi , Greetings from Adsale! As is well known, sustainable development and low-carbon materials are widely applied across industries like Automotive, Maternal & Infant, Consumer Goods, 3C Appliances, Medical etc. Do you face challenges in material recycling, cost reduction, and efficiency improvement? During this webinar, technical experts from Wanhua Chemical will share Sustainable plastic materials solutions to help you tackle these challenges. ✉ Theme: Create high quality plastics material for sustainable lifestyle ◔ Date: Sep. 26, 2024 (Thursday) ★ Time: 10 AM (UTC+2) ☊ Language: English #PBAT #Bio-based TPU #PA #PC #PEBA #PSU #PPSU #Circulareconomy #Sustainability Register Today for FREE Webinar & Chance to Win Prizes 3 Surprise Rewards for you ! WIN 1: First 20 registered audiences will receive a Special Prize! WIN 2: Everyone who send us a Question may win an Electric Toothbrush made from PC/PCR material. WIN 3: Lucky Draw - USD 50 Amazon e-Gift Card (5 Winners~) Invite your friends and colleagues to join now! Feel free to share with your colleagues who might be interested. Contact us For audience registration/general enquiries: Ms. Winnie Zhang CPRJWebinar@sg.adsale.com.hk Join us as a speaker, pls contact: Mr. Bourne Xu cprj@adsale.com.hk www.AdsaleCPRJ.com Copyright©2024 If you do not wish to receive our emails, please click here to unsubscribe. For privacy policy, please click here. If you are located in the European Union or the European Economic Area, and would like to enquire about your subscription, you may contact us at eu-usercom@adsale.com.hk with this email subject. Sender: Adsale Publishing Limited Address: 6th Floor, 321 Java Road, North Point, Hong Kong. Tel: (852) 2811 8897 Fax: (852) 2516 5024

Subject: 22 th international specialized exhibition
TextBody: Hello, . We invite you to take part in the exhibition Choose language. We speak English and 9 other languages English Deutsch Français Español 中文 日本語 Русский Türkçe 한국어 Українська ArmProd EXPO 2024 22th international specialized exhibition Top Event! Superb Review score 4.9 from 18 to 20 of October Karen Demirchyan Complex | Yerevan, Armenia Participate in the exhibition! Sale % * * Special conditions The largest international food exhibition of the republic of ArmProd Expo which became authoritative and with the developed tradition, is one of the main events in which the leading producers, suppliers and distributors of food and drinks annually take part. Leaders of the domestic food industry and the leading Armenian food firms choose this exhibition for presentation of the products and innovative development as the "ArmProd Expo" exhibition promotes effective realization of qualitative food, commercial productivity and finds new approaches and practical decisions for the modern changing market. The "ArmProd Expo" exhibition completely covers the food market of Armenia and is segmented on thematic sections, uniting in a uniform exposition all branches of food and processing industry, and reflects key tendencies of development of domestic and foreign agro-industrial complex. ArmProd Expo sections: Food processing technologies Agricultural machinery and equipment Agricultural technologies Containers and packaging Seeds and saplings Bakery and pastry products Meat products. Poultry. Sausage products Fish and seafood Dairy products. Cheese Grocery. Pasta. Spices Sunflower and vegetable oils Snacks. Nuts. Dried fruits Tea. Coffee. Coffee machines Vegetables. Fruit. Canned vegetables and fruit Canned food. Sauces. Ketchup. Salads Gastronomy. Products for restaurants Frozen food. Convenience food Juice. Water. Soft drinks Alcoholic beverages Healthy food. Natural and organic products Less than 2 months left until the opening Have time to book the best stand! Request more information for participation in the exhibition Special conditions | Sale % * Do not worry. Filling out the form and sending a request doesn't oblige to participate in the exhibition.

Le manquement constaté et documenté sur le Portail Avis Pénalités, a entraîné un préjudice composé de surcoûts et se décomposant comme suit : Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en réception : gestion des anomalies, décalage du planning de réception, non-optimisation de l'équipe de réception et de l'espace de stockage, ... Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en préparation : retard dans l'activité de préparation, correction du planning de préparation, … Coûts additionnels des expéditions aux magasins : chargement incomplet des camions, livraison supplémentaire, ... Coûts additionnels dans les services annexes : modification du plan de déchargement et des plannings des équipes, envoi de nouvelles commandes, traitement comptable des anomalies, ... Pour information, l'ensemble de ces surcoûts entraînés par votre manquement a fait l'objet d'une certification par un organisme indépendant. Cet avis est soumis à la procédure de vérification des dysfonctionnements prévue dans le contrat liant nos deux sociétés et qui indique un délai de contestation contractuel de 45 jours à compter de la date d'envoi de l'avis de pénalité. Passé ce délai de 45 jours et après un nouveau délai de 10 jours faisant suite à une relance de notre part, nous considérerons que vous acceptez l'avis de pénalité communiqué, celui-ci faisant alors l'objet d'une note de débit. Nous restons à votre disposition pour échanger sur ces éléments via le portail. Si vous n'êtes pas le bon interlocuteur pour le traitement de ces avis pénalités, veuillez transmettre en mettant adv.penalites@scamark.leclerc en copie et vous assurer que cette personne a bien demandé l'accès au portail. Cordialement Le Service ADV

Subject: Collaboration
TextBody: Salaam, I hope this message finds you well. I am Dr. Masairol Haji Masri, Procurement and Strategy Manager. We have a direct mandate from our investors to seek new business opportunities and projects for possible funding and capital financing. Our investors are from Brunei Darusalaam and they are aspiring to fund viable ventures or projects which your company is currently executing or intend to embark upon as a means of expanding their global portfolio. We are reaching out to inquire if you have any viable projects or existing businesses which requires funding. We are open to further discussions on this subject through any medium you deem appropriate for this engagement.

Subject: CAFERES WEST 2025：Exhibitor Applications are Now Open!
TextBody: ※This email is being sent to those who have exchanged business cards with TSO International in the past at our organized exhibitions and other trade shows, as well as those who have visited us in the past. If this email is not displayed correctly, please click here<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/webmail/511761/2463581597/4859104d102961e553002374ab456e8946742598dfab7f664d635b29ae9482d1> [https://bit.ly/4el3w1z]<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/west-en-/7psl23/2463581597/h/uWKprfAwLm9Br4Dv0N5p97Wn-TJG4NmODhEaZQPtEb8>​​​ AGRISTO Dear Sophie Selk san, ________________________________ [https://bit.ly/47rY4rf]<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/west-en-/7psl23/2463581597/h/uWKprfAwLm9Br4Dv0N5p97Wn-TJG4NmODhEaZQPtEb8> 【Date】 MAR. 26th [Wed.] - 28th [Fri.], 2025, 10AM - 5PM 【Venue】 INTEX OSAKA ________________________________ Exhibitor Applications are Now Open! CAFERES WEST is one of the largest trade shows in western Japan, bringing together 250 companies involved in the cafe and bakery industry. ​​​​​​ This year, the show will be doubled in size and held over three days and it provides platform for create business negotiations with 20,000 visitors. With the 2025 World Expo on the horizon, Osaka is rapidly developing its hotels, commercial facilities, and transportation infrastructure, gaining increasing attention as a key international market for inbound tourism. This second edition of the show in the booming Kansai region will support the growth of the cafe and bakery industries, offering exhibitors new business opportunities! ​​​​ ▼Exhibited Products [https://bit.ly/4gr1JtQ]<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/west-en-exhibitor-/7psl29/2463581597/h/uWKprfAwLm9Br4Dv0N5p97Wn-TJG4NmODhEaZQPtEb8> Feel free to contact us regarding pricing, booth locations, and the exhibition process. We’re here to support you every step of the way until your exhibition is set up! [https://bit.ly/3TsEVj8]<https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/en-inquiry-/7psl2d/2463581597/h/uWKprfAwLm9Br4Dv0N5p97Wn-TJG4NmODhEaZQPtEb8> Exhibition Overview: CAFERES WEST 2025 Dates: MAR. 26th [Wed.] - 28th [Fri.],2025 Venue: INTEX OSAKA URL: https://info.tso-int.co.jp/e/511761/west-en-/7psl23/2463581597/h/uWKprfAwLm9Br4Dv0N5p97Wn-TJG4NmODhEaZQPtEb8 ________________________________ ■Contact： CAFERES WEST​​​​​ Show Management Office Organizer: TSO International Inc.

Subject: Supplier Communication Document for Tax ID Change
TextBody: เรียน คู่ค้าทุกท่าน ตามที่ประชุมสามัญผู้ถือหุ้นประจำปี 2567 ได้มีมติอนุมัติการควบบริษัทระหว่าง บริษัท ซีพี แอ็กซ์ตร้า จำกัด (มหาชน) และ บริษัท เอก-ชัย ดีสทริบิวชั่น ซิสเทม จำกัด (“บริษัทฯ”) ซึ่งจะมีผลต่อการเปลี่ยนแปลงของ * เลขประจำตัวผู้เสียภาษีอากร สำหรับบริษัท ซีพี แอ็กซ์ตร้า จำกัด (มหาชน) ฝั่งแม็คโคร โดยบริษัทฯ คาดว่าจะจดทะเบียนแล้วเสร็จวันที่ 1 ตุลาคม 2567 และมีรายละเอียดตามเอกสารแนบ Dear Valued Partners, We would like to inform you that during the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders for the year 2024, it was resolved to approve the merger between CP Axtra Public Company Limited and Ek-Chai Distribution System Company Limited ("the Company"). This merger will result in changes to the following: * Tax identification number The Company expects to complete the registration process by October 1, 2024. Please see the detailed in the attachment. Thank you for your cooperation. ธุรกิจ Business รายละเอียดเดิม (ก่อนวันที่ 1 ตุลาคม 2567) Current details (Before Oct 1, 2024) รายละเอียดใหม่ (ตั้งแต่วันที่ 1 ตุลาคม 2567) New details (Starting from Oct 1, 2024) แม็คโคร Makro บริษัท ซีพี แอ็กซ์ตร้า จากัด (มหาชน) (สานักงานใหญ่) 1468 ถนนพัฒนาการ แขวงพัฒนาการ เขตสวนหลวง กรุงเทพมหานคร 10250 เลขประจาตัวผู้เสียภาษี 017537000521 CP AXTRA Public Company Limited (Head office) 1468 Phatthanakan Road, Suan Luang, Bangkok 10250 Taxpayer identification number 017537000521 บริษัท ซีพี แอ็กซ์ตร้า จากัด (มหาชน) (สานักงานใหญ่) 1468 ถนนพัฒนาการ แขวงพัฒนาการ เขตสวนหลวง กรุงเทพมหานคร 10250 เลขประจาตัวผู้เสียภาษี (รอรายละเอียดหลังการจดทะเบียนกับกรมสรรพากร คาดว่าจะได้รับข้อมูลประมาณวันที่ 1 ตุลาคม 2567) CP AXTRA Public Company Limited (Head office) 1468 Phatthanakan Road, Suan Luang, Bangkok 10250 Taxpayer identification number (Pending Revenue department registration, expected to receive such information around Oct 1, 2024) หากมีข้อสงสัยใดๆ รบกวนติดต่อหน่วยงานบัญชีตามด้านล่างค่ะ [cid:2624c8ed-4fb7-40a2-9744-a257a42caa9a]

Subject: 000200096658  - Incident sur le produit Rosty - 60
TextBody: Bonjour Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informés de ce sujet, que nous avons immédiatement enregistré dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket 49454. Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre que votre client n'était pas satisfait de la qualité de cette série. La qualité de nos produits est d'une importance capitale pour nous, et nous nous engageons à résoudre cette question. Informations sur la série : Code de lot : D07241830631 Jour de production : 30/06/2024 Un système complet d'assurance qualité est en place et les principes de l'HACCP sont appliqués. Cela comprend un système complet de surveillance sur la ligne de production. Les produits finis sont échantillonnés toutes les 60 minutes et examinés pour leur qualité, y compris leur goût. Des enregistrements complets de tous ces contrôles, ainsi que d'autres contrôles, sont conservés. En fonction du code de lot, nous avons effectué une enquête approfondie dans nos registres de production et nos documents de qualité pour cette série spécifique. Pendant cette production aucun déviation a été remarqué qui peuvent être lié à la réclammation du client. Aussi pendant la dégustation quotidienne pas de remarques ont été fait concernant le produit être trop salé. Nous supposons donc que la réclammation plustôt à voir avec les préférences gustatives personnelles du consommateur. Si vous avez d'autres préoccupations, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter à nouveau. Cordialement Felien Van Haudenhuyze Technical Sales Officer P +32 472 40 47 19 --------------- Original Message ---------------

This message is sent to you just to make sure you have all the information needed for the pick-up: The exact pick-up address is: Lidl Järvenpää jakelukeskus Riffikatu 4 04420 JÄRVENPÄÄ, Finland Our warehouse is open from Mon-Fri between 10.00 AM and 14.00 PM. The driver should contact our Goods-In department. References for the pick-up is KT-1008548 and KT-1038529. Driver should present these references to our goods-in staff, in order to receive the goods for pick-up. The driver should know what item from which supplier he is picking up. Our staff will guide him to where the goods can be found. The driver will load the goods himself. Please let us know if you have any further questions. Could you please inform us when you know the time frame for this pick up, so that our staff can make the items ready for returning? Thank you! Ystävällisin terveisin /

TextBody: Hi Evelien, Michelle I received the below text message in regard to a parcel despatched from Wielsbeke by FedEx. Do you know what's in this consignment? Thanks Laura ATTENTION FedEx Tracking# : 778564008528 Your shipment from AGRISTONV is currently delayed under clearance process. FOR AUSTRALIAN QUARANTINE CLEARANCE THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION IS REQUIRED: MANUFACTURER'S DECLARATION WITH A DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE GOODS IS REQUIRED. THIS MUST STATE THE FOLLOWING: a. Itemized and detailed ingredients list showing exact percentages of each and all ingredients (totalling 100%) b. Supply any meat, dairy or egg content percentage in terms of dry or egg content percentage in terms of dry weight of product (i.e excluding water) c. Import permit may be required PLEASE HAVE THE DECLARATION ON COMPANY LETTERHEAD, DATED, SIGNED, NAME AND JOB TITLE OF DECLARANT AND WITH FEDEX AWB#778564008528 BE CLEARLY STATED ON ALL PAGES. As declaration, this is a legal document and you only have one chance to provide this document. Any omission or errors will mean the shipment will return to sender. For Quarantine clearance there may be an applicable admin charge. If the information required for the clearance is not received by Sept.23, 2024, package will be return to sender, as per the shipping contract. Please email with the tracking number as subject to 3982481@fedex.com or call us at 1800 111 112 opt2 to avoid return Thank you. Subject: Report of Damages - INV.90610007, 90603756, 90608525, 90611624, 90611229
TextBody: Dear Ilaria, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention, and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. I’ve logged this issue in our system under case number 49689. We are truly sorry to hear about the damaged boxes on the pallets in the 5 containers you received. Please know that the quality of our products and your satisfaction are our top priorities, and we are fully committed to addressing this matter. After reviewing the photos you kindly shared, we’ve identified a few possible causes: Some of the damage may have occurred due to handling during loading (e.g. forklift-related damage) Other damages seem related to the carton’s strength, where the bottom layers may have sagged under the weight of those above Additionally, there may have been some damage during the packing process As we have previously conducted a detailed investigation into this, I’d like to kindly refer you to the report and countermeasures we proposed at that time. For your convenience, I’ve reattached the report here. We would greatly value the opportunity to discuss this further with you over a video call. Could you please let us know your availability, and we’ll gladly arrange a meeting at a time that works for you? Thank you once again for your valuable feedback, and we look forward to resolving this with you.
Hello, Could you check if possible to load this order on 19/09 (afternoon) or before the afternoon on 20/09? At the moment, seems that there are no slots available Med venlig hilsen /

Subject: Verklaring redenen late productie
TextBody: Goedemorgen, Ik heb gisteren gebeld om te vragen wat de verklaring is voor de beschikbaarheid op een aantal artikelen van jullie. Wij raken door deze late productiemomenten de winkels en ik ben dus op zoek naar een reden. We delen elke maand de forecast wat dit soort situaties zouden moeten voorkomen. Ik verneem graag voor 13:00 vandaag wat de reden is en hoe we dit zo snel mogelijk gaan oplossen. Met vriendelijke groet /

Subject: RFO-SD24-001187 temperature complaint
TextBody: Good morning Neuza, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00049998. May we ask you to always start a new mail for a new complaint please? When you use an earlier mail the claim gets attached to an old claim and that may lead to losing the track of complaint handling. We have requested a temperature logging for this load to our haulier. As soon as we hear from them, I will inform you about his feedback and fill in the included form.

Subject: Offene Bestellungen Agristo
TextBody: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, Sie befinden sich mit u. s. Aufträgen in Verzug! Wir erwarten hierzu bis heute 16:00 Uhr eine Stellungnahme und den Nachliefertermin. Die Rückmeldung ist in der angehängten Datei vorzunehmen (Spalte N und O) und an alle Personen im Verteiler zurück zu melden. Ebenso sind umgehend Maßnahmen zu ergreifen um eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung unserer Läger zukünftig sicherzustellen. Grundsätzlich möchten wir nochmals darauf hinweisen, dass wir auf eine pünktliche und vollumfängliche Belieferung angewiesen sind, um den hohen Anspruch unserer Kunden gerecht zu werden. Die Bestellungen gehen mit entsprechendem Vorlauf bei Ihnen ein. Sollte es im Falle von höherer Gewalt zu Verschiebungen und / oder Kürzungen kommen, so haben die Nachlieferungen am nächsten Werktag zu erfolgen. Der Nachliefertermin ist mit der jeweiligen Disposition abzustimmen. Die Disposition als auch der Einkauf sind hierzu vorab proaktiv zu informieren. Viele Grüße Netto Marken-Discount Stiftung & Co. KG Industriepark Ponholz 1 93142 Maxhütte-Haidhof Lisa Brunner Sachbearbeiter Einkauf TKK _____________________________________ Tel.: 09471 320-9521 Fax: 09471 320-6737 Mail: brunner.lisa@netto-online.de<mailto:brunner.lisa@netto-online.de> Internet: www.netto-online.de<http://www.netto-online.de/> Weitere Angabe zu unserem Unternehmen finden Sie unter: http://www.netto-online.de/impressum [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_facebook_2.png] <https://de-de.facebook.com/nettomarkendiscount/> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_instagram_2.png] <https://www.instagram.com/netto_marken_discount/> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_youtube_2.png] <https://www.youtube.com/user/nettotv> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_pinterest_2.png] <https://www.pinterest.de/netto_marken_discount/> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_tiktok_2.png] <https://www.tiktok.com/@netto_marken_discount> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_linkedin_2.png] <https://de.linkedin.com/company/netto-marken-discount> [https://www.netto-online.de/tools/email/logo_xing_2.png] <https://www.xing.com/pages/nettomarkendiscount>

TextBody: Goedemorgen Melissa, Deze is Rick dus vergeten te mailen ban ik bang voor. Hierbij alsnog Met vriendelijke groet, William Nannes J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Tel: +310226396408 Mobiel: +31610946168 Mail: william@jpb.nl<mailto:william@jpb.nl> J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

Subject: EMALEX IMPORT - EXPORT Sarl.
TextBody: Dear Cabbeke, Thank you very much for your response in which the content is duly noted; I’m excited to get in touch with you and to let you know about my offerings. Yes, I am one of the International accredited sourcing agents based in Togo. I offer composite and strategic solutions like supplier research and assessment, program management, quality assurance, onsite quality inspection, logistics consulting, and business facilitation services. My extensive experience gained from working with the public sector, high commissions, agencies, and ministries is excellent resources that help ensure businesses and projects succeed. I am contacting you to work with you as your agent and business facilitator, and also to develop markets for your products in West Africa. When the business is successful, I will be entitled to 2% of the net invoice value as my remuneration which you will pay to me when you are paid by the buyers. We kindly inform your company about a Government tender supply project here in Togo which is in line with your sector of business/products in large quantities. This Tender is open to Foreign suppliers whose products meet international standards. My company is registered with the Project Board of Togo as a government contract negotiator and facilitator, my commission in every successful contract awarded through my recommendation is 2% of the total invoice value. Terms of Payment: If the contract is awarded to your company, An upfront payment of 80% (T/T) will be made to your account, while 20% will be paid before shipment. Your company will pay my 2% commission after the contract has been consummated and the supplier receives full 100% payment in their Account. This means that you are to include my 2% commission in your price offer. You will stand a chance of having repeated orders if the quality of your products are fair enough; and let me know how many quantities you can supply in a Year. Payment terms are 100% in advance. And West Africa Countries are considered today’s land of opportunities, I will help you make the most from the opportunities in the West Africa markets and extract maximum returns on business. Please confirm your interest to allow me to furnish you with more useful details.

Subject: Transport Partner Solution - Abreu Logistics ( PT-BENELUX / BENELUX - PT )
TextBody: Dear Sirs/Madams, I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to introduce you to Abreu Logistics, a logistics provider based in Portugal with over 25 years of experience in the industry. Our company is committed to delivering high-quality, efficient, and reliable logistics solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our Services for the Benelux Area: As part of our commitment to expanding our international reach, we offer specialized services for the Benelux region (Belgium, Netherlands, Luxembourg), including: * Weekly Full Truckload (FTL) Services EXPORT/IMPORT: * Dedicated trucks for your shipments. * Direct routes with minimized transit times. * Ideal for large, high-volume shipments requiring exclusive use of a truck. * Weekly Less than Truckload (LTL) Services EXPORT/IMPORT: * Cost-effective option for smaller shipments. * Shared truck space with other clients' shipments. * Flexible scheduling and frequent departures. * Whether you need a reliable partner to handle large-scale shipments or more cost-effective options for smaller loads, Abreu Logistics is here to provide solutions that best fit your needs. * EXPRESS SERVICES * CUSTOMS SERVICES * BOUNDED WAREHOUSE * WAREHOUSING We would love the opportunity to discuss how our services can benefit your business and explore potential collaboration opportunities. Please feel free to contact us at benelux.abreu@abreulogistics.com<mailto:benelux.abreu@abreulogistics.com> Thank you for your time and consideration. We look forward to the possibility of working together. Melhores Cumprimentos/ Saludos/

Subject: Meet PERUZA in Iceland
TextBody: IceFish 2024 is tomorrow. Meet PERUZA at booth E61! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ [https://content.app-us1.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,width=650,dpr=2/WYkQG/2021/07/16/e3fd5507-7b71-4423-9b63-56ab23d2de91.png]<https://peruza.acemlnb.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GE6IFLP5pCrzA5JURN0166ovdT2wxo2YHLDInXK68380Ey.zOFt2Y2hjNQ~jvY4X5j> Meet PERUZA at IceFish 2024 tomorrow! [https://content.app-us1.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,width=650,dpr=2/WYkQG/2024/04/12/e428836e-91fb-4b30-a432-460f3fbc69bc.jpeg] We are excited to announce that PERUZA will be taking part in the upcoming IceFish Expo at Smárinn/Fífan halls, Kópavogur, which will take place from 18- 20 of September. As a leading provider of high-quality and innovative fish processing equipment, we will showcase our latest products and solutions. We hope you will stop by our booth E61 to see our fish processing equipment in action. Our specialists will be on hand to help and answer your questions. For expo invitations be free to reach us out and book your consultation time here<https://peruza.acemlnb.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GE6IFLP5pCrzA5JURN0166ovdT2wxo2YHLDInXK68380Ey.zOFt2Y2hjNQ~jvY4XHb> with our sales managers. We guarantee to find you the best solution for improving your business! The 14th Icelandic Fisheries, Seafood & Aqua Exhibition (IceFish) is the longest running international fishing exhibition in Iceland. Celebrating 40 years, first held in 1984, this exhibition has developed into a showcase of every aspect of the commercial fishing industry and seafood sector. Book a consultation<https://peruza.acemlnb.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GE6IFLP5pCrzA5JURN0166ovdT2wxo2YHLDInXK68380Ey.zOFt2Y2hjNQ~jvY4XHb> [Facebook]<https://peruza.acemlnb.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GE6IFLP5pCrzA5JURN0166ovdT2wxo2YHLDInXK68380Ey.zOFt2Y2hjNQ~jvY4XHD> [Linkedin] <https://peruza.acemlnb.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GE6IFLP5pCrzA5JURN0166ovdT2wxo2YHLDInXK68380Ey.zOFt2Y2hjNQ~jvY4XHH> [Youtube] <https://peruza.acemlnb.com/lt.php?x=3DZy~GE6IFLP5pCrzA5JURN0166ovdT2wxo2YHLDInXK68380Ey.zOFt2Y2hjNQ~jvY4XHL> Sent to: sales@agristo.com Unsubscribe<http://peruza.activehosted.com/proc.php?nl=1&c=125&m=155&s=e32f04b4c41c93b8f68ee752015a5a38&act=unsub> PERUZA Ltd, ‘Lejasrandoti’, Mucenieki, Ropazu novads LV-2137, Latvia

Subject: CMPL0059802 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg
TextBody: Geachte, Bedankt dat u deze kwestie onder onze aandacht heeft gebracht. We hebben deze klacht in ons systeem geregistreerd onder ticketnummer 00049892. Het spijt ons te horen dat uw klant niet tevreden was over de kwaliteit van onze producten. De kwaliteit van onze producten is voor ons van het allergrootste belang en wij doen er alles aan om deze kwestie op te lossen. Zou het kunnen zijn dat er een typfout staat in de houdbaarheidsdatum? Dat dit 21/03/2026 moet zijn en niet 21/03/2025? Indien het inderdaad 21/03/2026 is, had ik graag door verwezen naar de klachten CMPL0047441/CMPL0049132/CMPL0046381, waarbij wij een grondig onderzoek gedaan hebben. Hierbij hebben we kunnen melden dat dit over zacht plastiek gaat en daardoor geen gevaar is voor de voedselveiligheid. De resterende paletten van deze batch zijn terug op gehaald geweest uit jullie magazijnen. Zou u nog kunnen bevestigen als het inderdaad over dit lot gaat met BB date 21/03/2026. Zou u toevallig de juiste lotcode hebben? Onze excuses voor het ongemak en wij staan ter uwe beschikking voor verdere vragen. Met vriendelijke groeten Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Verklaring redenen late productie
TextBody: Goedemiddag, Vandaag heb ik meerdere pogingen ondernomen om telefonisch contact met u op te nemen, helaas zonder succes. Vorige week heeft uw Customer Service ons geïnformeerd over problemen met de productie van verschillende artikelen en dat er sprake is van een aansluiting probleem in jullie productie. Dit heeft een directe impact op onze winkels. Wij verstrekken maandelijks een forecast aan u om dergelijke situaties te voorkomen en om een betere inschatting te kunnen maken. Dit zou het proces voor beide partijen moeten vergemakkelijken. Echter, nu gaat het plotseling mis. Kunt u ons uitleggen wat de oorzaak hiervan is en welke stappen er worden ondernomen om dit op te lossen? Met vriendelijke groet /

Subject: AGRISTO x CRF - Appel d'offres / Call for Tender -DIPPER 600g CRF -3560071015206
TextBody: Hi Melissa, After our tasting today, we found your proposal to be missing a coating and to be very pale compared to the national brand (1); [image.png] 1 = National Brand (NB) in France 2 = Agristo Also your proposal took alùmost twice as long to cook versus the other proposals. Please ensure that this item is compatible avec ovens and Airfryers, with clear cooking instructions. Please can you send over two proposals for more coating (5% of the recipe for the NB is coating in France) and a more golden, crispy outside. If you have any questions, please let me know.

Subject: Delivery Operations - Redstar
TextBody: Hi, Please see below, a note from Redstar about their new delivery guidelines. Please confirm if this is something you can accommodate? Many thanks, Beau Beau Taylor Customer Service Agristo P +441 244 562 128 --------------- Forwarded Message --------------- From: Simon Ford [sales2@redstarfoodservice.co.uk] Sent: 6/09/2024 12:39 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Delivery Operations - Redstar Good morning/ afternoon, We would like to inform you of an immediate change in our delivery operations which we would like your co-operation with. Any deliveries made to us from now on in a temperature-controlled vehicle need to have a temperature record reading printed out from the driver’s vehicle which then needs to be stapled to a delivery note. If your drivers don’t have this facility, then we require an email sent to us at sales@redstarfoodservice.co.uk with the above information included. This is to comply with health and safety regulations. Please inform your drivers or if you use a transport company, please inform them. Thank you for your understanding in this matter.

Subject: Private Label for Noridane Foods
TextBody: Hello guys Pleasure to meet you Noridane foods is the fastest growing trading company in Europe, with a very solid ownership by the Norwegian farmer cooperation Nortura. We trade meat and vegetables in 108 different countries, with our professional staff located throughout 13 offices around the world. I am responsible for our fries business. Today we buy our fries from different suppliers in Netherlands and Belgium. But we want to switch all our fries business to our own private label. I hope Agristo could be the best solution for us. I hope we can setup a meeting, to see if we would be a good match Looking forward hearing from you Have a good day

Subject: 000200096826  - Incident sur le produit pommes dau
TextBody: Bonjour Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informé de ce sujet, que nous avons immédiatement enregistré dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket 50022. Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre que votre client n'était pas satisfait de la qualité de cette série. La qualité de nos produits est d'une importance capitale pour nous, et nous sommes déterminés à résoudre cette question. Informations sur le batch: Code de lot : D0524155 Jour d'emballage : 03/06/2024 Je tiens à vous assurer que lors du processus d'emballage, nous effectuons des contrôles de qualité. Notre équipe teste les fermetures des sacs toutes les heures. Un carton est retiré de la ligne d’emballage, et tous les sacs sont minutieusement inspectés pour garantir que les emballages sont correctement fermés. Les résultats de ces inspections sont consignés dans nos documents de qualité. Conformément aux préoccupations que vous avez soulevées, nous avons mené une enquête sur les contrôles d'emballage de cette série en particulier. Pendant ce processus d'emballage aucun commentaire n'a été enrégistré concernant l'emballage qui était ouvert. Tous les contrôles horaires de conformité des emballages ont été enrégistré comme conformes. Nous regrettons tout désagrément que cette situation a pu causer à vous ou à votre client. Nous prenons cette question au sérieux et nous nous engageons à prévenir tels incidents à l'avenir. Si vous avez besoin de plus d'informations ou d'assistance supplémentaire, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter. Cordialement Felien Van Haudenhuyze Technical Sales Officer P +32 472 40 47 19 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Claims [claims@agristo.com] Sent: 17/09/2024 10:15 To: sebastien.fay@scamark.leclerc Subject: Agristo | Votre réclamation a été enregistrée (00050022) Agristo | 17/09/2024 Bonjour, Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informés du problème ci-dessous. Votre réclamation a été enregistrée dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket : 00050022. Afin d'assurer une communication efficace, veuillez répondre à cet e-mail pour toute communication ultérieure à ce sujet. Cordialement, L'équipe des réclamations d'Agristo This message was sent to sebastien.fay@scamark.leclerc in reference to Case #00050022. thread::7_lSQpDcFcSsVg8G9HFWqHQ:: Copyright © 2023, All rights reserved. Agristo n.v. Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9, B-8710 Wielsbeke +32 56 54 09 00 — info@agristo.com www.agristo.be

Subject: Leveranciersperformance Agristo_yeartodate_2024: 92,95%
TextBody: Geachte leverancier, Hierbij ontvangt u de performancecijfers van uw leveringen aan PLUS t/m week 37-2024 Bij vragen of opmerkingen kunt u reageren naar uw contactpersoon. Uw opmerking zal binnen 10 werkdagen beoordeeld worden en indien nodig gecorrigeerd. Met vriendelijke groet, Afdeling Suppy Chain leveranciersperformance@plusretail.nl PLUS Retail B.V. De informatie verzonden in deze e-mail is uitsluitend bestemd voor de geadresseerde(n). Verstrekking aan en gebruik door anderen is niet toegestaan. PLUS sluit iedere aansprakelijkheid uit die voortvloeit uit elektronische verzending. PLUS staat voor PLUS Groep, ??n van haar gelieerde entiteiten of PLUS Holding B.V. Elke PLUS vennootschap is een aparte juridische entiteit en lid van PLUS Groep. PLUS Holding B.V. is statutair gevestigd te Utrecht en ingeschreven bij het Handelsregister onder nummer 85065153. Zie https://www.plus.nl/organisatie/over-ons/plus-retail voor meer informatie. Denk aan het milieu voordat u dit bericht print.

Subject: HEALTHY CHOICE UPDATE - PLEASE READ
TextBody: Customers have told us that eating a healthy diet is important, but it can be challenging to make the right decisions. To help customers, we are introducing a Healthy Choice logo. The Healthy Choice logo will be applied to all products that meet the healthy choice nutritional criteria, deliver a health benefit, and support a balanced diet. We have identified 1600 of our active SKU’s eligible for the addition of a Healthy Choice logo. To bring these SKUs in line with our new Healthy Choice approach, we have developed a light touch process to update our specifications and artwork, to enable us to launch Healthy Choice in January 2025. See Link for further information https://evolve-js.com/rgbu-orbc-sain-prd1-bccs/orbcprod/attachments?type=attachment&attachmentId=32185572 SUPPLIER RESPONSIBLITES Our ask is for your support on the process steps detailed in the attachment. Please see below further context on our requirements: • All approved claims will need to be validated in accordance with our Responsible Sourcing Manual v2. • All rejected claims will be sent back to the Sainsbury’s development team to confirm next steps. Further nutritional testing maybe required to support a new claim, this will be discussed with you on a case-by-case basis. • V1 artwork – please include an updated 2D barcode if used. • V2 artwork – will be final approval of the healthy choice claim and the updated 2D barcode. Please note - No other amends will be accepted outside of the healthy choice updates. CRITICAL PATH The workload itself has been broken down into manageable batches and each batch has it owns critical path, starting September. All updates to current SKU’s will be treated as a soft launch and should be launched at the next possible opportunity from January 2025. Suppliers will be contacted by Wave to upload their packaging details when the product is batched. Reminder that suppliers must not hold more than12 weeks packaging stock. Please click the following link to view the alert and register your response https://evolve-js.com/rgbu-orbc-sain-prd1-bccs/orbcprod/app?flowId=com.micros.creations.core.domain.AlertResponse&class=AlertResponse&id=316548 This alert is intended for: Username: Marlies De Ketele1 Marlies De Ketele1 Abbie Rogers Abbie Rogers Supplier Name: Agristo Site Name: n\a

Subject: From Alex
TextBody: -- Hello Dear, Compliment of the day to you, I know you will be surprise to receive this email from me because we never met before. I am Mr. Alexander Donkor a banker by profession from West African Agricultural Development bank Ghana (ADB) here in West Africa and am currently holding the post of the Bank (Chief Audit Unit) in ECOWAS STATE. I am sending this brief letter to solicit your partnership to transfer (US$11,200,000) into your bank account. I shall send you more information and procedures when I receive a positive response from you and for your information 40% of the above mentioned amount will be for you if you agree to help me execute this business also 10% will be for your expense you will make in this transaction and 50% is for me. please kindly reply by confirming your interest of partnership with me. Best Regard Mr.Alexander

May the light of the full moon bring you happiness, success, and bright opportunities for the future! In the spirit of celebration, we'd like to introduce you to CPS+ eMarketplace, your one-stop platform for plastics and rubber solutions. Whether you're seeking raw materials or looking for new business partnerships, we have you covered: Why Choose CPS+ eMarketplace? 🌟 Explore 7,000+ Products: From raw materials to semi-finished goods, all in one convenient place. 🌟 Tailored for Your Industry: A marketplace 100% dedicated to plastics & rubber solutions. 🌟 Find Your Ideal Partners: Leverage our industry expertise to connect with the right suppliers and buyers effortlessly. 🌟 Stay Ahead of the Curve: Access real-time industry news, trends, and insights to keep your business competitive. As the world of plastics and rubber continues to evolve, we’re here to help you stay ahead with the best solutions. Let CPS+ eMarketplace support your business growth and sourcing needs. Wishing you a wonderful Mid-Autumn Festival and looking forward to working with you! Warm

Subject: Food and Beverage Magazine Weekly Newsletter
TextBody: View in Browser September 17, 2024 Advertisement If you would like to contribute to F&B Weekly, please contact Lauren Kane, Director & Editor-in-Chief, via email at Lauren.Kane@fbmagazine.com or Michael Politz, Publisher, via email at michael@fb101.com. TOP NEWS Michelin-Starred Chef Carlos Altamirano Unveils New Contemporary Cal-Peruvian Restaurant in NoPa Altamirano via Food and Beverage Magazine On Saturday, Sept. 14, Altamirano opened its doors on Fulton Street, marking the eighth restaurant concept by Chef Carlos Altamirano. Amid a wave of restaurant closures, Chef Carlos is bucking the trend exemplifying his unwavering commitment to bringing quality food and career opportunities to San Francisco. Altamirano will celebrate the rich Peruvian culture while incorporating local California produce. Read More How to Host a Luxurious Farewell to Summer Gathering Featuring Buchanan's, CÎROC, DeLeón, and Old Parr Buchanan's, CÎROC, DeLeón, and Old Parr via Food and Beverage Magazine Tequila Don Julio Lone Ranger: Add the Tequila Don Julio Rosado, lemon juice and simple syrup to a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled. Add the sparkling wine. Strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lemon twist. Buchanan's Buchanita: Combine Buchanan's 12-Year-Old DeLuxe Whisky and fresh pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain contents into a Highball glass. Read More Advertisement BEVERAGE This New ProWein Will Inspire Everyone ProWein via Food and Beverage Magazine Under the dynamic motto "Discover the Taste of Tomorrow" ProWein will present itself in a fresh, modern look and with a new hall layout. The whole world of wines and spirits will be represented in Düsseldorf. The line-up of exclusive side events will become even more attractive thanks to an even more high-profile ProWein Forum that addresses current business topics and promotes exchange within the sector. Read More Court of Master Sommeliers, Americas Names New Member of Prestigious Wine Organization Court of Master Sommeliers, Americas via Food and Beverage Magazine The Court of Master Sommeliers, Americas™ is proud to welcome a new member to the organization, Myles Trapp from Napa Valley, California. Read More Advertisement Serving up health plan solutions Promoted by United HealthCare Offering a robust health plan may help with recruiting and retaining top talent, boosting employee satisfaction and encouraging healthier behaviors in your staff. With UnitedHealthcare, you’ll find an array of flexible health plan solutions — including wellness and incentive programs. Learn More HOSPITALITY NEWS Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection Announces Strategic Food & Beverage Appointments Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection via Food and Beverage Magazine Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection, a contemporary beachfront sanctuary in Los Cabos known for its culinary excellence is thrilled to announce strategic appointments within the food & beverage leadership team. Read More Chef Thomas Bellec Appointed Chief Culinary Director for Appellation Appellation via Food and Beverage Magazine Appellation, the culinary-first hotel brand co-founded by celebrated chef Charlie Palmer and luxury hospitality veteran Christopher Hunsberger, appoints chef Thomas Bellec as new Chief Culinary Director. Bellec will ensure the highest possible quality of food service to the hotel restaurants and events throughout the Appellation portfolio, creating consistent and thoughtful experiences for guests to engage with local gastronomy. Read More Advertisement Promoted by Bunzl Food Packaging Supplies Cleaning & Hygiene Supplies Material Handling Supplies Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) Learn More Adam Wohler Appointed Director of Restaurants for Ko'a Kea Resort on Po'ipu Beach Ko'a Kea Resort via Food and Beverage Magazine Ko'a Kea Resort on Po'ipu Beach, Kauai's closest accommodations to the waterfront, welcomes Adam Wohler as the boutique property's new Director of Restaurants. With an extensive background in management of fine dining and a passion for delivering exceptional guest experiences, Wohler is set to lead the resort's renowned dining operations, including Red Salt restaurant & Sushi Bar, the pool bar, in-room dining and onsite events. Read More Hyatt Centric Congress Avenue Austin Unveils 2 New Dining Concepts Opening This Fall Hyatt Centric Congress Avenue Austin and Spa via Food and Beverage Magazine Hyatt Centric Congress Avenue Austin announced the anticipated launch of its two new food and beverage concepts. The first-floor restaurant, The Tradition, An American Kitchen and the 8th floor rooftop bar, Heydey Social Club, are set to open on Sept. 27. Just a few blocks away from the Texas Capitol and next door to the historic Paramount Theatre, Hyatt Centric Austin's new restaurant and bar will be ideal destinations to wine and dine in downtown Austin. Read More Advertisement Jeremiah's Italian Ice Launches Tadpole Mini Size Jeremiah's Italian Ice via Food and Beverage Magazine Jeremiah's Italian Ice, the premiere frozen dessert brand, is introducing a new treat size to suit any budget or appetite with the addition of the Tadpole Mini. Families, friends and all Jeremiah's fans can now order their favorite signature Jeremiah's Ice, Jelatis, Soft Ice Cream and Flavorites in a size that packs all the sweet fun and flavor at an exceptional value. Read More Universal CityWalk Hollywood Welcomes Global Pop Icon Hello Kitty Universal CityWalk Hollywood via Food and Beverage Magazine Universal CityWalk rolls out a virtual pastel pink carpet to welcome the Hello Kitty® and Friends Cafe, serving a scrumptious selection of sweet treats and specialty beverages, and the Sanrio® Smile Shop, offering a variety of collectible merchandise featuring Hello Kitty®, Cinnamoroll™, Keroppi™, Kuromi™, My Melody™, Badtz-maru™ and Chococat™. Both venues opened at Universal CityWalk on Friday, Sept. 6. Read More EVENTS IN MOTION OFF THE HOOK Seafood Festival Returns to the Iconic Santa Monica Pier to Benefit Heal the Bay on Sunday, Oct. 13 OFF THE HOOK Seafood Festival via Food and Beverage Magazine After a 5-year hiatus, OFF THE HOOK Santa Monica Seafood Festival is returning to the iconic Santa Monica Pier on Sunday, Oct. 13 to celebrate the sea and National Seafood Month. This beloved ocean-inspired tasting event features the city's top chefs and restaurants and their favorite underwater ingredients. Attendees will enjoy seafood tastings, beer gardens, wine tastings, live music, oyster schucking competitions, games and more fun in the sun with the Pacific Ocean as the backdrop. Read More Owner Alex Sarkissian and Chef Vartan Abgaryan Celebrate Momed Atwater Village's 10th Anniversary With 4 Renowned Chefs & Monthlong Immigrant Chef Dinner Series! Momed Atwater Village via Food and Beverage Magazine Momed in Atwater Village is turning ten this September, and to celebrate a decade of culinary excellence, Owner Alex Sarkissian and Chef Vartan Abgaryan are bringing back the beloved "Immigrant Chef Series." This special event, kicking off on Sept. 9, will feature four extraordinary Monday night dinners, each showcasing the talents of renowned Los Angeles chefs with rich immigrant backgrounds. Read More SEPTEMBER ISSUE 2024 Food & Beverage Weekly Food & Beverage Magazine 1930 Village Center Circle #3197, Las Vegas, NV 89134 888-959-7260 | Contact Us | Privacy Policy www.fbmagazine.com Lauren Cancienne Sr. Content Editor, Multiview 469-420-2661 | Contact me Unsubscribe | Learn how to add us to your safe sender list so our emails get to your inbox. Subject: Copacol Claim - reference 47380!
TextBody: Good day, Team, We received a new claim from Copacol about spicy wedges with too much pepper . Note the costumer's comments and other information regarding said claim: "Wedges Fries with lots of pepper impossible to eat." Copacol contacted the consumer by telephone on 16/09/2024, where a woman informed them that she had purchased item 6550 Frozen Wedges Fries 1.1kg. When she got home, she went to prepare half of the unit in the airfryer, and when she consumed it, she pointed out that it was excessively spicy, so she had to discard what had already been prepared. TextBody: Dears, Good day! Find below a new complaint from the client BRF. They couldn't say which part of the box these packets were in. The customer asked for these 5 packages to be exchanged. Therefore, according to the analysis of the customer's history, we informed them that the case would be directed to the analysis of the production unit with a deadline of 10 working days for a return". Name: Company: AGRISTO NV Enewsletter (Sep 2024) 繁體中文 Show Info Exhibits Scope >PRT/LAB Quick Reg< >Sino-Pack/PACKINNO Quick Reg< PFP Expo 2025 One-click follow for comprehensive information on 4 expos The PFP Expo 2025 (covering Printing South China, Sino-Label, Sino-Pack and PACKINNO) is set to make a grand return! As an industry event deeply rooted in South China and radiating across the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, it brings together numerous leading brands and premium products. We are committed to creating a comprehensive, highly precise, and efficient platform for printing, labeling, and packaging solution exchanges for end-user enterprises across various industries. We cordially invite the following industry professionals to participate in this grand event: Complete your quick pre-registration to ensure you can enjoy all the exciting content from the moment the exhibition opens. After completing your quick pre-registration, want to be the first to know about exhibition updates, industry trends, and exhibit highlights? Follow our official social media platforms now! Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 17.09.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 17.09.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: Avis de pénalité n°158440 / Manquants taux service
TextBody: A l'attention du Responsable Commercial, Madame, Monsieur, Nous vous rappelons (article 5.2 de l'annexe 5 du contrat d'entreprise de fabrication de produits à marque distributeur souscrit par votre société) que dans le cadre de la démarche de réduction des échanges papier, la gestion des pénalités est assurée sur l'application WEB "Portail Avis Pénalités" accessible via le portail SCAMARK https://www.scamark.com/EXTRA_AVIS_PENALITES/detail/158440/1. Vous trouverez ci-joint l'avis de pénalité n°158440 vous informant d'un manquement constaté au regard de vos obligations contractuelles. Le manquement constaté et documenté sur le Portail Avis Pénalités, a entraîné un préjudice composé de surcoûts et se décomposant comme suit : Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en réception : gestion des anomalies, décalage du planning de réception, non-optimisation de l'équipe de réception et de l'espace de stockage, ... Coûts liés à des temps additionnels en préparation : retard dans l'activité de préparation, correction du planning de préparation, … Coûts additionnels des expéditions aux magasins : chargement incomplet des camions, livraison supplémentaire, ... Coûts additionnels dans les services annexes : modification du plan de déchargement et des plannings des équipes, envoi de nouvelles commandes, traitement comptable des anomalies, ... Pour information, l'ensemble de ces surcoûts entraînés par votre manquement a fait l'objet d'une certification par un organisme indépendant. Cet avis est soumis à la procédure de vérification des dysfonctionnements prévue dans le contrat liant nos deux sociétés et qui indique un délai de contestation contractuel de 45 jours à compter de la date d'envoi de l'avis de pénalité. Passé ce délai de 45 jours et après un nouveau délai de 10 jours faisant suite à une relance de notre part, nous considérerons que vous acceptez l'avis de pénalité communiqué, celui-ci faisant alors l'objet d'une note de débit. Nous restons à votre disposition pour échanger sur ces éléments via le portail. Si vous n'êtes pas le bon interlocuteur pour le traitement de ces avis pénalités, veuillez transmettre en mettant adv.penalites@scamark.leclerc en copie et vous assurer que cette personne a bien demandé l'accès au portail. Cordialement Le Service ADV

Coûts additionnels dans les services annexes : modification du plan de déchargement et des plannings des équipes, envoi de nouvelles commandes, traitement comptable des anomalies, ... Pour information, l'ensemble de ces surcoûts entraînés par votre manquement a fait l'objet d'une certification par un organisme indépendant. Cet avis est soumis à la procédure de vérification des dysfonctionnements prévue dans le contrat liant nos deux sociétés et qui indique un délai de contestation contractuel de 45 jours à compter de la date d'envoi de l'avis de pénalité. Passé ce délai de 45 jours et après un nouveau délai de 10 jours faisant suite à une relance de notre part, nous considérerons que vous acceptez l'avis de pénalité communiqué, celui-ci faisant alors l'objet d'une note de débit. Nous restons à votre disposition pour échanger sur ces éléments via le portail. Si vous n'êtes pas le bon interlocuteur pour le traitement de ces avis pénalités, veuillez transmettre en mettant adv.penalites@scamark.leclerc en copie et vous assurer que cette personne a bien demandé l'accès au portail. Cordialement Le Service ADV

Subject: Milk mash potato 2,5 kg x 4 order
TextBody: Dear Mya san, Thank you very much for your request. I would like to inform you, however, that this particular article is a "Make To Order" item, meaning it is produced specifically based on your orders and is not kept in stock. (We thus do not have this article in stock for the moment.) Additionally, the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for this product is 10 pallets. Therefore, to ensure we can meet your needs, I kindly ask you to place an order for at least 10 pallets, with a lead time of at least 4 weeks from order receipt to loading. We appreciate your understanding and are happy to assist with any further questions or details you may need.
